h4.p: [03] tattha jinasāsanādhigamassa akkharakosallamūlakattā taṃ sampādetabbanti dassetuṃ abhidheyyappayojanavākyamidamuccate.

[03] yo koci lokiyalokuttarādibhedo vacanattho, so sabbo akkhareheva saññāyate. sithiladhanitādiakkharavipattiyañhi atthassa dunnayatā hoti, tasmā ^a^M0.0002^ea^ akkharakosallaṃ bahūpakāraṃ buddhavacanesu, ettha padānipi akkharasannipātarūpattā akkharesveva saṅgayhanti.

[03] akkharā api ādayo ekacattālīsaṃ, te ca kho jinavacanānurūpā akārādayo niggahītantā ekacattālīsamattā vaṇṇā paccekaṃ akkharā nāma honti. taṃ yathā -- ā i ī u ū e o, ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ-iti akkharā.

[03] nakkharantīti ^b^akkharā,^eb^ a ādi yesaṃ te ^b^ādayo^eb^. akārādīnamanukkamo panesa ṭhānādikkamasannissito, tathā hi ṭhānakaraṇappayatanehi vaṇṇā jāyante, tattha ^b^cha ṭhānāni^eb^ kaṇṭhatālumuddhadantaoṭṭhanāsikāvasena.
[03] ṅa ña ṇa na mā ^b^sakaṭṭhānajā, nāsikaṭṭhānajā^eb^ cāti.
[03] ^b^karaṇaṃ^eb^ jivhāmajjhaṃ tālujānaṃ, jivhopaggaṃ muddhajānaṃ, jivhāggaṃ dantajānaṃ, sesā sakaṭṭhānakaraṇā.
[03] ^b^payatanaṃ^eb^ saṃvutādikaraṇaviseso. saṃvutatta^b^ma^eb^kārassa, vivaṭattaṃ sesasarānaṃ ^b^sa^eb^kāra^b^ha^eb^kārānañca, phuṭṭhaṃ vaggānaṃ, īsaṃphuṭṭhaṃ yaralavānanti.
[03] evaṃ ṭhānakaraṇappayatanasutikālabhinnesu akkharesu sarā nissayā, itare nissitā. tattha --
[21] nissayādo sarā vuttā, byañjanā nissitā tato.
[03] tattha tesu akkharesu ^b^a^eb^kārādīsu ^b^o^eb^kārantā aṭṭha akkharā sarā nāma honti. taṃ yathā -- a ā i ī u ū ^b^e^eb^ o-iti sarā.
[03] o anto yesaṃ te ^b^odantā, da^eb^kāro sandhijo, saranti gacchantīti ^b^sarā,^eb^ byañjane sārentītipi ^b^sarā^eb^.
[03] tattha aṭṭhasu saresu lahumattā tayo sarā rassā nāma honti. taṃ yathā -- a i u-iti rassā.

[03] lahukā mattā pamāṇaṃ yesaṃ te ^b^lahumattā, mattā^eb^saddo cettha accharāsaṅghātākkhinimīlanasaṅkhātaṃ kālaṃ vadati, tāya mattāya ^b^e^eb^kamattā ^b^rassā,^eb^ dvimattā ^b^dīghā,^eb^ aḍḍhamattā ^b^byañjanā. lahu^eb^ggahaṇañcettha chandasi diyaḍḍhamattassāpi gahaṇatthaṃ. rassakālayogato ^b^rassā,^eb^ rassakālavanto vā ^b^rassā^eb^.
[03] tattha aṭṭhasu saresu rassehi aññe dvimattā pañca sarā dīghā nāma honti. taṃ yathā -- ā ī ū e o-iti dīghā.

[03] ^b^añña^eb^ggahaṇaṃ diyaḍḍhamattikānampi saṅgahaṇatthaṃ. dīghakāle niyuttā, tabbanto vā ^b^dīghā^eb^. kvaci saṃyogapubbā ekārokārā rassā iva vuccante. yathā -- ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi. ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? maṃ ce tvaṃ nikhaṇaṃ vane. putto tyāhaṃ mahārāja.
[03] dvinnaṃ samūho ^b^du,^eb^ tasmiṃ dumhi. saṃyogabhūte akkhare pare yo pubbo rassakkharo, so garusañño hoti. yathā -- datvā, hitvā, bhutvā.
[03] dīgho ca saro garusañño hoti. yathā -- nāvā, nadī, vadhū, dve, tayo. garukato añño ``lahuko''ti veditabbo.

[03] ṭhapetvā aṭṭha sare sesā aḍḍhamattā akkharā ^b^ka^eb^kārādayo niggahītantā tettiṃsa byañjanā nāma honti. vuttehi aññe ^b^sesā^eb^. byañjīyati etehi atthoti ^b^byañjanā^eb^. taṃ yathā -- ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma, ya ra lava sa ha ḷa aṃ-iti byañjanā. ^b^ka^eb^kārādīsvakāro uccāraṇattho.

[03] tesaṃ kho byañjanānaṃ ^b^ka^eb^kārādayo ^b^ma^eb^kārantā pañcavīsati byañjanā pañcapañcavibhāgena vaggā nāma honti. taṃ yathā -- ka kha ga gha ṅa, ca cha ja jha ña, ṭa ṭha ḍa ḍha ṇa, ta tha da dha na, pa pha ba bha ma-iti vaggā.

[03] te pana paṭhamakkharavasena ^b^ka^eb^vagga^b^ca^eb^vaggādivohāraṃ gatā, ^b^vaggo^eb^ti samūho, tattha pañcapañcavibhāgenāti vā pañca pañca etesamatthīti ^a^M0.0006^ea^ vā ^b^pañcapañcaso,^eb^ mo anto yesaṃ te ^b^mantā^eb^.

[03] ^b^a^eb^kāro uccāraṇattho, ^b^iti^eb^saddo panānantaravuttanidassanattho, aṃiti yaṃ ^b^a^eb^kārato paraṃ vuttaṃ bindu, taṃ niggahītaṃ nāma hoti. rassassaraṃ nissāya gayhati, karaṇaṃ niggahetvā gayhatīti vā ^b^niggahītaṃ^eb^.
[03] idha avuttānaṃ parasamaññānampi payojane sati gahaṇatthaṃ paribhāsamāha.
[03] yā ca pana parasmiṃ sakkataganthe, paresaṃ vā veyyākaraṇānaṃ samaññā ghosāghosalopasavaṇṇasaṃyogaliṅgādikā, tā payoge sati etthāpi yujjante.
[03] parasmiṃ, paresaṃ vā samaññā ^b^parasamaññā,^eb^ veyyākaraṇe, veyyākaraṇamadhītānaṃ vā samaññātyattho. payujjanaṃ ^b^payogo,^eb^ viniyogo.
[03] tattha vaggānaṃ paṭhamadutiyā, ^b^sa^eb^kāro ca ^b^aghosā^eb^. vaggānaṃ tatiyacatutthapañcamā, ya ra lava ha ḷā cāti ekavīsati ^b^ghosā^eb^ nāma.

[03] ettha ca vaggānaṃ dutiyacatutthā ^b^dhanitā^eb^tipi vuccanti, itare ^b^sithilā^eb^ti. vināso ^b^lopo^eb^. rassassarā sakadīghehi aññamaññaṃ ^b^savaṇṇā^eb^ nāma, ye ^b^sarūpā^eb^tipi vuccanti. sarānantaritāni ^a^M0.0007^ea^ byañjanāni ^b^saṃyogo^eb^. dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ ^b^liṅgaṃ^eb^. vibhatyantaṃ ^b^padaṃ^eb^. iccevamādi.

[03] loka aggapuggalo, paññā indriyaṃ, tīṇi imāni, no hi etaṃ, bhikkhunī ovādo, mātu upaṭṭhānaṃ, sametu āyasmā, abhibhū āyatanaṃ, dhanā me atthi, sabbe eva, tayo assu dhammā, asanto ettha na dissanti itīdha sarādisaññāyaṃ sabbasandhikaraṇaṭṭhāne byañjanaviyojanatthaṃ paribhāsamāha.

[03] ^b^sarenā^eb^ti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ, sahayoge vā, sandhitabbe sarasahitaṃ pubbabyañjanaṃ anatikkamanto adhoṭhitamassarañca katvā sarato viyojayeti sarato byañjanaṃ viyojetabbaṃ. ettha ca ^b^assara^eb^ggahaṇasāmatthiyena ``byañjana''nti laddhaṃ.

[03] sarā kho sabbepi sare pare ṭhite lopaṃ papponti. ^b^lopo^eb^ti adassanaṃ anuccāraṇaṃ. ettha ^b^sarā^eb^ti kāriyīniddeso. ^b^bahuvacanaṃ^eb^ panettha ekekasmiṃ sare pare bahūnaṃ lopañāpanatthaṃ. ^b^sare^eb^ti nimittaniddeso, nimittasattamī cāyaṃ, nimittopādānasāmatthiyato vaṇṇakālabyavadhāne sandhikāriyaṃ na hoti. ^b^lopa^eb^nti kāriyaniddeso, idaṃ pana suttaṃ ^a^M0.0008^ea^ upari paralopavidhānato pubbalopavidhānanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, evaṃ sabbattha sattamīniddese pubbasseva vidhi, na parassa vidhānanti veditabbaṃ.

[03] sararahitaṃ kho byañjanaṃ adhoṭhitaṃ parakkharaṃ naye yutte ṭhāneti paranayanaṃ kātabbaṃ. ettha ^b^yutta^eb^ggahaṇaṃ niggahītanisedhanatthaṃ, tena ``akkocchi maṃ avadhi ma''ntiādīsu paranayanasandeho na hoti.
[03] lokaggapuggalo, paññindriyaṃ, tīṇimāni, nohetaṃ, bhikkhunovādo, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ, sametāyasmā, abhibhāyatanaṃ, dhanā matthi, sabbeva, tayassu dhammā, asantettha na dissanti.

[03] yassa idāni, saññā iti, chāyā iva, kathā eva kā, iti api, assamaṇī asi, cakkhu indriyaṃ, akataññū asi, ākāse iva, te api, vande ahaṃ, so ahaṃ, cattāro ime, vasalo iti, moggallāno āsi bījako, pāto evātīdha pubbalope sampatte ``sare''ti adhikāro, idha pana ``atthavasā vibhattivipariṇāmo''ti katvā ``saro, saramhā, lopa''nti ca vattamāne --

[03] asamānarūpamhā saramhā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā. samānaṃ rūpaṃ assāti sarūpo, na sarūpo ^b^asarūpo,^eb^ asavaṇṇo ^a^M0.0009^ea^. yasmā pana mariyādāyaṃ, abhividhimhi ca vattamāno ^b^ā^eb^upasaggo viya ^b^vā^eb^saddo dvidhā vattate, katthaci vikappe, katthaci yathāvavatthitarūpapariggahe, idha pana pacchime, tato niccamaniccamasantañca vidhimettha ^b^vā^eb^saddo dīpeti. ``naye paraṃ yutte''ti paraṃ netabbaṃ.

[03] yassadāni yassa idāni, saññāti saññā iti, chāyāva chāyā iva, kathāva kā kathā eva kā, itīpi iti api, assamaṇīsi assamaṇī asi. cakkhundriya miti niccaṃ. akataññūsi akataññū asi, ākāseva ākāse iva, tepi te api, vandehaṃ vande ahaṃ, sohaṃ so ahaṃ, cattārome cattāro ime, vasaloti vasalo iti, moggallānosi bījako moggallāno āsi bījako, pātova pāto eva.
[03] idha na bhavati -- pañcindriyāni, saddhindriyaṃ, sattuttamo, ekūnavīsati, yassete, sugatovādo, diṭṭhāsavo, diṭṭhogho, cakkhāyatanaṃ, taṃ kutettha labbhā iccādi.

[03] bandhussa iva, upa ikkhati, upa ito, ava icca, jina īritaṃ, na upeti, canda udayo, yathā udake itīdha pubbāvaṇṇassarānaṃ ^a^M0.0010^ea^ lope kate ``paro, asarūpe''ti ca vattate, tathā ``ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā''ti ito ^b^ivaṇṇa^eb^ggahaṇañca, ``vamodudantāna''nti ito ^b^u^eb^ggahaṇañca sīhagatiyā idhānuvattetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^i^eb^vaṇṇabhūto, ^b^u^eb^kārabhūto ca paro saro asarūpe pubbassare lutte kvaci asavaṇṇaṃ pappoti. natthi savaṇṇā etesanti ^b^asavaṇṇā,^eb^ ekārokārā, tattha ṭhānāsannavasena ivaṇṇukārānamekārokārā honti.

[03] bandhusseva, upekkhati, upeto, avecca, jineritaṃ, nopeti, candodayo, yathodake. ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? tatrime, yassindriyāni, mahiddhiko, sabbītiyo, tenupasaṅkami, lokuttaro. ^b^lutte^eb^ti kiṃ? cha ime dhammā, yathā idaṃ, kusalassa upasampadā. ^b^asarūpe^eb^ti kiṃ? cattārimāni, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ.
[03] ettha ca satipi heṭṭhā ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇe ^b^kvaci^eb^karaṇato avaṇṇe eva lutte idha vuttavidhi hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. tato idha na bhavati -- diṭṭhupādānaṃ, pañcahupāli, mudindriyaṃ, yo missaroti.

[03] tatra ayaṃ, buddha anussati, sa atthikā, paññavā assa, tadā ahaṃ, yāni idha bhūtāni, gacchāmi iti, ati ito, kikī iva, bahu upakāraṃ, madhu udakaṃ, su upadhāritaṃ, yopi ayaṃ ^a^M0.0011^ea^, idāni ahaṃ, sace ayaṃ, appassuto ayaṃ, itara itarena, saddhā idha vittaṃ, kamma upanissayo, tathā upamaṃ, ratti uparato, vi upasamo iccatra pubbassarānaṃ lope kate --
[03] saro kho paro pubbassare lutte kvaci dīghabhāvaṃ pappotīti ṭhānāsannavasena rassassarānaṃ savaṇṇadīgho.

[03] tatrāyaṃ, buddhānussati, sātthikā, paññavāssa, tadāhaṃ, yānīdha bhūtāni, gacchāmīti, atīto, kikīva, ^b^ba^eb^hūpakāraṃ, madhūdakaṃ, sūpadhāritaṃ, yopāyaṃ, idānāhaṃ, sacāyaṃ, appassutāyaṃ, itarītarena, saddhīdha vittaṃ, kammūpanissayo, tathūpamaṃ, rattūparato, vūpasamo.

[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? aciraṃ vata'yaṃ kāyo, kimpimāya, tīṇimāni, pañcasupādānakkhandhesu, tassattho, pañcaṅgiko, munindo, satindriyaṃ, lahuṭṭhānaṃ, gacchāmahaṃ, tatridaṃ, pañcahupāli, natthaññaṃ. ^b^lutte^eb^ti kiṃ? yathā ayaṃ, nimi iva rājā, kikī iva, su upadhāritaṃ.
[03] lokassa ^a^M0.0012^ea^ iti, deva iti, vi ati patanti, vi ati nāmenti, saṅghāṭi api, jīvitahetu api, vijju iva, kiṃsu idha vittaṃ, sādhu iti itīdha parassarānaṃ lope kate --
[03] pubbo saro parassare lutte kvacidīghaṃ pappoti. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ luttadīghaggahaṇānukaḍḍhanatthaṃ, taṃ ^b^``cā^eb^nukaḍḍhitamuttaratra nānuvattate''ti ñāpanatthaṃ.
[03] lokassāti, devāti, vītipatanti, vītināmenti, saṅghāṭīpi, jīvitahetūpi, vijjūva, kiṃsūdha vittaṃ, sādhūti.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? yassadāni, itissa, idānipi, tesupi, cakkhundriyaṃ, kinnumāva.
[03] adhigato kho me ayaṃ dhammo, putto te ahaṃ, te assa pahīnā, pabbate ahaṃ, ye assa itīdha pubbalope sampatte --

[03] ekārassa padantabhūtassa ṭhāne sare pare kvaci ^b^ya^eb^kārādeso hoti. ^b^a^eb^kāremeteyesaddādissevāyaṃ vidhi, ^b^ya^eb^nti yaṃ rūpaṃ, e eva anto ^b^edanto,^eb^ ādesiṭṭhāne ādissatīti ^b^ādeso^eb^. ``byañjane''ti adhikicca ``dīgha''nti dīgho.
[03] adhigato ^a^M0.0013^ea^ kho myāyaṃ dhammo, putto tyāhaṃ, tyāssa pahīnā, pabbatyāhaṃ, yyāssa.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? te nāgatā, puttā matthi. ^b^anta^eb^ggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? dhammacakkaṃ pavattento, damento cittaṃ.

[03] yāvatako assa kāyo, tāvatako assa byāmo, ko attho, atha kho assa, ahaṃ kho ajja, yo ayaṃ, so assa, so eva, yato adhikaraṇaṃ, anu addhamāsaṃ, anu eti, su āgataṃ, su ākāro, du ākāro, cakkhu āpāthaṃ, bahu ābādho, pātu akāsi, na tu evātīdha --
[03] okārukārānaṃ antabhūtānaṃ sare pare kvaci ^b^va^eb^kārādeso hoti. ^b^ka kha ya ta^eb^saddādi^b^o^eb^kārassedaṃ gahaṇaṃ.

[03] yāvatakvassa kāyo, tāvatakvassa byāmo, kvattho, atha khvassa, ahaṃ khvajja, yvāyaṃ, svassa, sveva, yatvādhikaraṇaṃ, anvaddhamāsaṃ, anvebhi, svāgataṃ, svākāro, dvākāro, cakkhvāpāthaṃ, bahvābādho, pātvākāsi, na tveva.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? ko attho, atha kho aññatarā, yohaṃ, sohaṃ, cattārome, sāgataṃ, sādhāvuso, hotūti. ^b^anta^eb^ggahaṇaṃ kiṃ? savanīyaṃ, viravanti.
[03] paṭisanthāravutti ^a^M0.0014^ea^ assa, sabbā vitti anubhuyyate, vi añjanaṃ, vi ākato, nadī āsanno itīdha maṇḍūkagatiyā ``asarūpe''ti vattate.
[03] pubbo ivaṇṇo asarūpe sare pare ^b^ya^eb^kāraṃ pappoti navā. i eva vaṇṇo ^b^ivaṇṇo, navā^eb^saddo ^b^kvaci^eb^saddapariyāyo.
[03] paṭisanthāravutyassa, sabbā vityānubhuyyate, byañjanaṃ, byākato, nadyāsanno.
[03] ^b^navā^eb^ti kiṃ? pañcahaṅgehi, tāni attani, gacchāmahaṃ, muttacāgī anuddhato. ^b^asarūpe^eb^ti kiṃ? itihidaṃ, aggīva, atthīti.
[03] ati antaṃ, ati odātā, pati ayo, pati āharati, pati eti, iti assa, iti etaṃ, itiādi itīdha ``ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā''ti ^b^ya^eb^kārādese sampatte --

[03] sabbo ^b^ti^eb^icceso saddo sare pare kvaci ^b^ca^eb^kāraṃ pappoti. ^b^tī^eb^ti niddesato akata^b^ya^eb^kārassevāyaṃ vidhi, itarathā ^b^kvaci^eb^ggahaṇassa ca ``atissa cantassā''tisuttassa ca niratthakatā siyā. ``paradvebhāvo ṭhāne''ti dvittaṃ.
[03] accantaṃ ^a^M0.0015^ea^, accodātā, paccayo, paccāharati, pacceti, iccassa, iccetaṃ, iccādi.
[03] ``te na vāivaṇṇe''ti ito ``na ivaṇṇe''ti ca vattate.

[03] ^b^ati^eb^iccetassa antabhūtassa ^b^ti^eb^saddassa ivaṇṇe pare ``sabbo caṃ tī''ti vuttarūpaṃ na hoti. ^b^atissā^eb^ti ^b^ati^eb^upasaggānukaraṇametaṃ. tenevettha vibhattilopābhāvo. ettha ca ^b^anta^eb^saddo saddavidhinisedhappakaraṇato ^b^ati^eb^saddantabhūtaṃ ^b^ti^eb^saddameva vadati, na ivaṇṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, itarathā idaṃ suttameva niratthakaṃ siyā.
[03] ^b^ca^eb^kāro anuttasamuccayattho, tena ^b^itipatī^eb^namantassa ca na hoti. ati isigaṇo atīsigaṇo, evaṃ atīto, atīritaṃ, itīti, itīdaṃ, patīto.
[03] abhi akkhānaṃ, abhi uggato, abhi okāso itīdha ^b^ya^eb^kāre sampatte --
[03] ^b^adhi^eb^ agamā, adhi upagato, adhi ogāhetvā itīdha
[03] ^b^adhi^eb^iccetassa sabbassa sare pare ^b^ajjhā^eb^deso hoti. ajjhagamā, ajjhupagato, ajjhogāhetvā.

[03] te ca kho ^b^abhiadhi^eb^iccete upasaggā ^b^i^eb^vaṇṇe pare abbho ajjhoiti vuttarūpā na honti vā. saralopaparanayanāni. abhicchitaṃ, adhīritaṃ. ^b^vā^eb^ti kiṃ? abbhīritaṃ, ajjhiṇamutto, ajjhiṭṭho.
[03] ^b^dha^eb^iccetassa sare pare kvaci ^b^da^eb^kāro hoti. ^b^eka^eb^saddato parassa ^b^idha^eb^ssa ^b^dha^eb^kārassevāyaṃ, saralopadīghā. ekamidāhaṃ. ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? idheva.

[03] ^b^yathātathā^eb^dvayaparassedaṃ gahaṇaṃ. dīghasaramhā parassa ^b^eva^eb^saddādibhūtassa ^b^e^eb^kārassa ^b^ri^eb^kāro hoti, pubbo ca saro rasso hoti navā. yathariva, tathariva. ^b^navā^eb^ti kiṃ? yatheva, tatheva.
[03] ti antaṃ,ti addhaṃ, aggi agāre, sattamī atthe, pañcamī antaṃ, du aṅgikaṃ, bhikkhu āsane, puthu āsane, sayambhū āsane itīdha ^b^yavā^eb^desesu sampattesu --
[22] ākhyāte liṅgamajjhe ca, dviliṅgante ca dassanā..
[03] ^b^jhala^eb^iccetesaṃ ^b^iyauva^eb^iccete ādesā honti vā sare pare, saralopo.
[03] tiyantaṃ, tiyaddhaṃ, aggiyāgāre, sattamiyatthe, pañcamiyantaṃ, duvaṅgikaṃ, bhikkhuvāsane, puthuvāsane, sayambhuvāsane. ^b^vā^eb^ti kiṃ? agyāgāre, sattamīatthe, bhikkhuāsane nisīdati.
[03] ^b^go^eb^iccetassa ^b^o^eb^kārassa sare pare ^b^avā^eb^deso hoti samāse. gavājinaṃ, gaveḷakaṃ. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena uvaṇṇassa ^b^uvāvā^eb^desā. yathā -- bhuvi, pasavo.

[03] ^b^putha^eb^iccetassa nipātassa ante kvaci ^b^ga^eb^kārāgamo hoti sare pare. āgacchatīti ^b^āgamo,^eb^ asantuppatti āgamo. ettha ca ``sare''ti nimittāsannavasena puthassa anteti labbhati. puthageva, putha eva.
[03] ^b^pā^eb^iccetassa ante sare pare kvaci ^b^ga^eb^kārāgamo hoti, ^b^pā^eb^ssa anto ca saro rasso hoti. pageva vutyassa, pā eva.
[03] 34^b^.^eb^ ^b^yava ma da na ta ra lā cāgamā^eb^.
[03] sare pare ^b^ya^eb^kārādayo aṭṭha āgamā honti vā. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ga^eb^kārāgamo ca, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0019^ea^ ^b^yakārāgamo yathā^eb^dibho ikārekārādīsu. yathā idaṃ yathayidaṃ, byañjaneti adhikicca ``rassa''nti rassattaṃ, yathā idaṃ vā, yathā eva, yathāyeva, yatheva, evaṃ māyidaṃ, māyevaṃ, taṃyidaṃ, taṃyeva, nayidaṃ, nayimassa, nayimāni, navayime dhammā, buddhānaṃyeva, santiyeva, bodhiyāyeva, satiyeva, pathavīyeva, dhātuyeva, tesuyeva, soyeva, pāṭiyekkaṃ.

[03] tathā sare ^b^vipari^eb^yādito ca. vi añjanā viyañjanā, byañjanā vā, evaṃ viyākāsi, byākāsi. pariantaṃ pariyantaṃ, evaṃ pariyādānaṃ, pariyuṭṭhānaṃ, pariyesati, pariyosānamiti niccaṃ. ni āyogo niyāyogo. idha na bhavati, parikkhato, upaparikkhati.
[03] ^b^vakāro ti^eb^saddādito avaṇṇukāresu. ti aṅgulaṃ tivaṅgulaṃ, evaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ, bhūvādayo, migī bhantā vudikkhati, pavuccati, pāguññavujutā.

[03] ^b^makāro lahu^eb^ppabhutito sare chandānurakkhaṇādimhi. lahu essati lahumessati, evaṃ garumessati, idhamāhu, kena te idha mijjhati, bhadro kasāmiva, ākāse mabhipūjayi, ekamekassa, yena midhekacce, āsatimeva.

[03] ^b^dakāro^eb^ ^a^M0.0020^ea^ ^b^u^eb^upasagga saki kenaci kiñci kismiñci koci sammā yāva tāva puna ya te'tattasādīhi. ^b^u^eb^upasaggato niccaṃ, u aggo udaggo, evaṃ udayo, udapādi, udāhaṭaṃ, udito, udīritaṃ, udeti.

[03] nipātato ca, saki eva sakideva, evaṃ sakadāgāmi, mahāvuttisuttena ^b^i^eb^kārassa ^b^a^eb^kāro. tathā kenacideva, kiñcideva, kismiñcideva, kocideva, sammā attho sammadattho, rassattaṃ. evaṃ sammadakkhāto, sammadaññā vimuttānaṃ, sammadeva, yāvadatthaṃ, yāvadeva, tāvadeva, punadeva.
[03] nāmato, yadatthaṃ, tadatthaṃ, yadantarā, tadantarā, tadaṅgavimutti, etadatthaṃ, attadatthaṃ, sadatthapasuto siyā. yatetattasehi samāseyeva.
[03] ^b^ādi^eb^saddena aññadatthaṃ, manasādaññā vimuttānaṃ, bahudeva rattiṃ, ahudeva bhayaṃ.
[03] ^b^vā^eb^ti kiṃ? kenaci atthakāmena, sammā aññāya, yāvāhaṃ, tāvāhaṃ, punāparaṃ, attatthaṃ.
[03] ^b^nakāro^eb^ āyatādimhi. ito āyati ito nāyati, ciraṃ nāyati.
[03] ^b^takāro^eb^ yasmā tasmā ajjādito ihaggādimhi. yasmātiha, tasmātiha, ajjatagge.

[03] ^b^rakāro^eb^ ^a^M0.0021^ea^ ni dupātu puna dhī pāta caturādito. ni antaraṃ nirantaraṃ, evaṃ nirālayo, nirindhano, nirīhakaṃ, niruttaro, nirojaṃ. du atikkamo duratikkamo, durāgataṃ, duruttaṃ. pāturahosi, pāturahesuṃ. punarāgaccheyya, punaruttaṃ, punareva, punareti. dhiratthu. pātarāso.
[03] ^b^catu^eb^saddādito, caturaṅgikaṃ, caturārakkhā, caturiddhipādapaṭilābho, caturoghanittharaṇatthaṃ. bhatturatthe, vuttiresā, pathavīdhāturevesā.
[03] tathā sarato ivevesu chandānurakkhaṇe. nakkhattarājāriva tārakānaṃ, vijjurivabbhakūṭe, āraggeriva sāsapo, sāsaporiva āragge, usabhoriva, sabbhireva samāsetha.
[03] ^b^lakāro^eb^ chasaṅkhyāhi. laḷānamaviseso. cha abhiññā chaḷabhiññā, chaḷaṅgaṃ, chaḷāsīti, chaḷaṃsā, saḷāyatanaṃ.

[03] ``saralopo''tiādinā pubbassare lutte, paranayane ca kate ``dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ liṅga''nti vuttattāva paccayantassāpi aliṅgattā vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṃ ``taddhitasamāsakitakā nāmaṃ vā'tavetunādīsu cā''ti ettha ^b^va^eb^ggahaṇena itthippaccayantassāpi nāmabyapadeso. pure viya ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti, ``sesato lopaṃ gasipī''ti ^b^si^eb^lopo. sā kaññā.
[03] bahuvacane ``ālapane si gasañño''ti ito ``sañño'', ``te itthikhyā po''ti ito ``itthikhyā''ti ca vattate.
[03] liṅgassanto ^b^ā^eb^kāro yadā itthikhyo, tadā ^b^gha^eb^sañño hotīti ^b^gha^eb^saññāyaṃ ``ghapato ca yonaṃ lopo''ti ^a^M0.0082^ea^ vikappena ^b^yo^eb^lopo. tā kaññā kaññāyo.
[03] ^b^gha^eb^to parassa ^b^ga^eb^ssa ^b^e^eb^kāro hoti, saralopādi. bhoti kaññe, bhotiyo kaññā kaññāyo.
[03] tatiyādīsu ``āya catutthekavacanassa tū''ti ito ``āyo, ekavacanāna''nti ca vattate.

[03] ^b^gha^eb^saññato liṅgassākārā paresaṃ ^b^nā^eb^dīnaṃ ^b^smiṃ^eb^pariyantānaṃ ekavacanānaṃ vibhattigaṇānaṃ ^b^āyā^eb^deso hoti. saralopaparanayanāni. kaññāya, kaññāhi kaññābhi, kaññāya, kaññānaṃ, kaññāya, kaññāhi kaññābhi, kaññāya, kaññānaṃ.
[03] ^b^ghapa^eb^to parassa ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^yaṃ^eb^ hoti vā, aññatthāyādeso. kaññāyaṃ kaññāya, kaññāsu.
[21] saddhā medhā paññā vijjā, cintā mantā vīṇā taṇhā.
[22] icchā mucchā ejā māyā, mettā mattā sikkhā bhikkhā..
[21] pipāsā vedanā saññā, cetanā tasiṇā pajā.
[22] devatā vaṭṭakā godhā, balākā parisā sabhā..
[22] visākhā visikhā sākhā, vacā vañjhā jaṭā ghaṭā..
[21] jeṭṭhā soṇḍā vitaṇḍā ca, karuṇā vanitā latā.
[22] kathā niddā sudhā rādhā, vāsanā siṃsapā papā..
[22] nāsā juṇhā guhā īhā, lasikā vasudhādayo..
[03] ammādīnaṃ ālapaneva rūpabhedo. ammā, ammā ammāyo.
[03] ^b^ammā annā^eb^iccevamādito parassa gassa ālapanekavacanassa na ekārattaṃ hoti. ``ākāro vā''ti rassattaṃ.

[02] bhoti amma bhoti ammā, bhotiyo ammā ammāyo. evaṃ annā, annā annāyo, bhoti anna bhoti annā, bhotiyo annā annāyo. ambā ^a^M0.0084^ea^, ambā ambāyo, bhoti amba bhoti ambā, bhotiyo ambā ambāyo iccādi.

[03] itthiyā ākhyā saññā ^b^itthikhyā,^eb^ liṅgassantā te ivaṇṇuvaṇṇā yadā itthikhyā, tadā ^b^pa^eb^saññā hontīti ^b^pa^eb^saññāyaṃ ``ghapato cā''tiādinā ^b^yo^eb^lopo, ``yosu kata''iccādinā dīgho. rattī rattiyo ratyo vā, he ratti, he rattī he rattiyo.
[03] ^b^pa^eb^saññato ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi paresaṃ ^b^nā^eb^dīnamekavacanānaṃ vibhattigaṇānaṃ ^b^yā^eb^ādeso hoti. rattiyā, rattīhi rattībhi rattihi rattibhi, rattiyā, rattīnaṃ rattinaṃ.

[03] ^b^pa^eb^iccetasmā paresaṃ ^b^smiṃ smā^eb^iccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^aṃ ā^eb^ādesā honti vā. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo ^a^M0.0085^ea^, tena ^b^u^eb^vaṇṇantato na honti, ^b^i^eb^vaṇṇantatopi yathāpayogaṃ.

[03] ^b^pa^eb^saññassa ^b^i^eb^vaṇṇassa ^b^yo^eb^vacanekavacanavibhattīnamādese sare pare ^b^ya^eb^kāro hoti. ettha ca ^b^ya^eb^kārassevādhikārato ^b^pasañña^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^i^eb^vaṇṇova gayhati, ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ``ratto''tiādīsu nivattanatthaṃ. ratyā rattiyā, rattīhi rattībhi rattihi rattibhi, rattiyā, rattīnaṃ rattinaṃ. ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacane ^b^a^eb^mādesa^b^ya^eb^kārādesā, ratyaṃ. ``ghapato smiṃ yaṃ vā''ti ^b^yaṃ^eb^ādeso, rattiyaṃ.
[03] ^b^ādi^eb^iccetasmā ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^aṃ^eb^ oādesā honti vā. ^b^ca^eb^saddena aññasmāpi ^b^ā aṃ^eb^ oādesā. ratyā rattiṃ ratto rattiyā, rattīsu rattisu.
[21] patti yutti vutti kitti, mutti titti khanti kanti.
[22] santi tanti siddhi suddhi, iddhi vuddhi buddhi bodhi..
[21] bhūmi jāti pīti sūti, nandi sandhi sāṇi koṭi.
[27] diṭṭhi vuḍḍhi tuṭṭhi yaṭṭhi, pāḷi āḷi nāḷi keḷi.
[22] sati mati gati cuti, dhiti yuvati vikati..
[03] rati ruci rasmi asani vasani osadhi aṅguli dhūli ^b^du^eb^ndubhi doṇi aṭavi chavi ādīni ^b^i^eb^kārantanāmāni.
[03] ^b^nadā^eb^dito vā ^b^anadā^eb^dito vā itthiyaṃ vattamānā liṅgamhā īppaccayo hoti. ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇama^b^nadā^eb^disampiṇḍanatthaṃ, tena ^b^puthugavā^eb^dito ca ī.

[03] saralope ``kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte''ti asavaṇṇe sampatte pakatibhāvo nāmabyapadeso, ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti. itthī, itthī ``agho rassa''ntiādinā rassattaṃ, itthiyo. sambodhane ``jhalapā rassa''nti rassattaṃ. bhoti itthi, bhotiyo itthī itthiyo.
[03] dutiyekavacane ``ghapato smiṃ yaṃ vā''ti ito ``vā''ti vattate.

[03] ^b^pa^eb^saññato ^b^ī^eb^kārato parassa ^b^aṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^yaṃ^eb^ hoti vā. itthiyaṃ itthiṃ, itthī itthiyo, itthiyā, itthīhi itthībhi, itthiyā, itthīnaṃ, itthiyā, itthīhi itthībhi, itthiyā, itthīnaṃ, itthiyaṃ itthiyā, itthīsu.

[03] evaṃ nadī, nadī. ^b^yo^eb^lopābhāve ``tato yonamo tū''ti ettha ^b^tu^eb^saddena yonamokāro ca, ``pasaññassa cā''ti īkārassa ^b^ya^eb^kāro, ``yavataṃ talana''iccādinā dyassa ^b^ja^eb^kāro, dvittaṃ. najjo sandanti, nadiyo.
[03] ettha ^a^M0.0087^ea^ cevaṃ sijjhantānaṃ ^b^najjo^eb^ādīnaṃ vuttiyaṃ ānattaggahaṇādinā nipphādanaṃ ^b^atraja sugatā^eb^dīnaṃ viya nipphādanūpāyantaradassanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03] he nadi, he nadī he najjo he nadiyo, nadiyaṃ nadiṃ, nadī najjo nadiyo.
[03] amādisutte ^b^ā pato^eb^ti yogavibhāgena kvaci nāsānañcāttaṃ, tena na jaccā vasalo hoti, pathabyā ekarajjenāti ādi ca sijjhati, pure viya ^b^ya^eb^kāra^b^ja^eb^kārādesadvittāni.
[02] najjā kataṃ nadiyā, nadīhi nadībhi, najjā nadiyā, nadīnaṃ, najjā nadiyā, nadīhi nadībhi, najjā nadiyā, nadīnaṃ, najjaṃ nadiyaṃ nadiyā, nadīsu.
[21] mahī vetaraṇī vāpī, pāṭalī kadalī ghaṭī.
[22] nārī kumārī taruṇī, vāruṇī brāhmaṇī sakhī..
[21] gandhabbī kinnarī nāgī, devī yakkhī ajī migī.
[22] vānarī sūkarī sīhī, haṃsī kākī ca kukkuṭī --
[03] ^b^mātula ayyakavaruṇa^eb^iccevamādīnamanto ^b^āna^eb^ttamāpajjate īkāre paccaye pare, antāpekkhāyaṃ chaṭṭhī, saralopādi. mātulānī, evaṃ ayyakānī, varuṇānī, sesaṃ ^b^itthī^eb^saddasamaṃ.

[03] a^b^nadā^eb^dīsu ^a^M0.0088^ea^ ^b^puthu^eb^saddato īppaccayo. ``o sare cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^u^eb^kārassa ^b^avā^eb^deso. puthavī, puthaviyo. ^b^sasmā smiṃ^eb^su puthabyā puthaviyā, puthabyā puthaviyā, puthabyaṃ puthaviyaṃ puthaviyā iccādi.

[03] ^b^go^eb^saddato ``nadādito vā ī''ti īppaccayo. mahāvuttinā vā ``gāva se''ti ettha ^b^gāva^eb^iti yogavibhāgena vā ^b^o^eb^kārassa ^b^āvā^eb^deso. gāvī, gāvī gāviyo iccādi ^b^itthī^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] ^b^ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇantu^eb^ppaccayantehi itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi īppaccayo hoti. ^b^vā^eb^dhikāro katthaci nivattanattho, saralopādi. mānavī, evaṃ nāvikī, venateyyī, gotamī.

[03] sabbasseva ^b^ntu^eb^ppaccayassa ^b^ta^eb^kāro hoti vā ^b^ī^eb^kārappaccaye pare, aññattha saralopādi. guṇavatī, guṇavatī guṇavatiyo, guṇavantī, guṇavantī guṇavantiyo iccādi ^b^itthī^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] evaṃ kulavatī, sīlavatī, yasavatī, rūpavatī, satimatī, gottamatī.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^bhavanta^eb^saddassa ^b^bhotā^eb^deso hoti īkāre itthigate pare. sā bhotī, bhotī bhotiyo, he bhoti, he bhotī bhotiyo iccādi.
[03] ^b^pati bhikkhu rāja^eb^ iccetehi ^b^ī^eb^kārantehi ca itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi ^b^inī^eb^ppaccayo hoti.
[03] ``saralopo'mādesa''iccādisutte ^b^tu^eb^ggahaṇena kvaci pubbalopassa nisedhanato ``vā paro asarūpā''ti saralopo. bhikkhunī, bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyo iccādi.
[03] ^b^pati^eb^saddassa anto ^b^a^eb^ttamāpajjate ^b^inī^eb^ppaccaye pare. tatheva parasare lutte ``pubbo cā''ti dīgho, gahapatānī.

[03] tatheva ^b^rāja^eb^saddato ^b^inī,^eb^ saralopapakatibhāvā, rājinī. ^b^ī^eb^kārantesu ^b^daṇḍī^eb^saddato inī, saralopādi, daṇḍinī, daṇḍinī daṇḍiniyo, evaṃ hatthinī, medhāvinī, tapassinī, piyabhāṇinī iccādi.

[03] ``pokkharinī'' itīdha ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^i^eb^kāra^b^na^eb^kārānaṃ ^b^a^eb^kāra^b^ṇa^eb^kārādesā, pokkharaṇī, pokkharaṇī. ``tato yonamo tū''ti sutte ^b^tu^eb^ggahaṇena yonamokāro ^a^M0.0090^ea^ ca, ^b^ī^eb^kārassa ^b^ya^eb^kāro, ``yavata''miccādisutte ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ṇya^eb^ssa ^b^ña^eb^kāro, dvittaṃ. pokkharañño pokkharaṇiyo vā iccādi.

[03] ^b^vā^eb^dhikāro anuttasamuccayattho, tena ^b^vidū yakkhā^eb^ditopi ^b^inī,^eb^ paracittavidunī, saraloparassattāni, paracittavidunī paracittaviduniyo, yakkhinī yakkhiniyo, sīhinī sīhiniyo iccādi.

[02] yāgu, yāgū yāguyo, he yāgu, he yāgū yāguyo, yāguṃ, yāgū yāguyo, yāguyā, yāgūhi yāgūbhi yāguhi yāgubhi, yāguyā, yāgūnaṃ yāgunaṃ, yāguyā, yāgūhi yāgūbhi yāguhi yāgubhi, yāguyā, yāgūnaṃ yāgunaṃ, yāguyaṃ yāguyā, yāgūsu yāgusu.
[03] evaṃ dhātu dhenu kāsu daddu kacchu kaṇḍu rajju kareṇu piyaṅgu sassuādīni.
[03] ^b^mātu^eb^saddassa bhedo. tassa ^b^pitu^eb^saddasseva rūpanayo. ``āratta''miti bhāvaniddesena ^b^ārā^eb^desābhāve ``pato yā''ti ^b^yā^eb^desova viseso.

[02] mātā, mātaro, bhoti māta, bhoti mātā bhotiyo mātaro, mātaraṃ, mātare mātaro, mātarā mātuyā matyā, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^u^eb^kāralopo ^a^M0.0091^ea^, rassattañca. mātarehi mātarebhi mātūhi mātūbhi mātuhi mātubhi, mātu mātussa mātuyā, mātarānaṃ mātānaṃ mātūnaṃ mātunaṃ, mātarā mātuyā, mātarehi mātarebhi mātūhi mātūbhi, mātu mātussa mātuyā, mātarānaṃ mātānaṃ mātūnaṃ mātunaṃ, mātari, mātaresu mātūsu mātusu.
[03] evaṃ dhītā, dhītaro, duhitā, duhitaro iccādi.
[03] jambū, jambū jambuyo, he jambu, he jambū jambuyo, jambuṃ, jambū jambuyo iccādi ^b^itthī^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[21] evaṃ vadhū ca sarabhū, sarabū sutanū camū.
[21] kaññā ratti nadī itthī, mātulānī ca bhikkhunī.
[22] daṇḍinī yāgu mātā ca, jambū gotitthisaṅgaho..
[03] ^b^si, aṃ^eb^iti dvipadamidaṃ. ^b^a^eb^kārantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi parassa ^b^si^eb^vacanassa ^b^aṃ^eb^ hoti niccaṃ. saralopapakatibhāvādi, cittaṃ.
[03] ^b^a^eb^kārantehi napuṃsakaliṅgehi ^b^yo^eb^naṃ niccaṃ ^b^ni^eb^ hoti. ``sabbayonīnamāe''ti ^b^ni^eb^ssa vā ^b^ā^eb^kāro. aññattha ``yosu kata''iccādinā dīgho. cittā cittāni.
[03] ālapane ^b^ga^eb^lopo. he citta, he cittā cittāni, dutiyāyaṃ ^b^ni^eb^ssa vikappenekāro. cittaṃ, citte cittāni. sesaṃ ^b^purisa^eb^saddena samaṃ.
[03] kammaṃ, kammā kammāni, he kamma, he kammā kammāni, kammaṃ, kamme kammāni.

[03] ^b^kamma^eb^saddantassa ^b^u^eb^kāra ^b^a^eb^kārādesā honti vā ^b^nā^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. ^b^anta^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^thāmaddhā^eb^dīnamantassapi ^b^u^eb^ttaṃ. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena ^b^yuva maghavā^eb^namantassa ^b^ā^eb^ hoti kvaci ^b^nā su^eb^iccetesu. kammunā kammanā kammena vā, kammehi kammebhi.

[03] ^b^sasmā^eb^su ``u nāmhi cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^puma kammathāma^eb^ntassa cukāro vā ^b^sasmā^eb^sūti ^b^u^eb^ttaṃ. kammuno kammassa, kammānaṃ, kammunā kammā kammamhā kammasmā, kammehi kammebhi, kammuno kammassa, kammānaṃ.
[03] ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacane ``brahmato tu smiṃnī''ti ettha ^b^tu^eb^saddena kvaci ^b^ni^eb^ hoti. kammani kamme kammamhi kammasmiṃ, kammesu.
[03] evaṃ ^a^M0.0094^ea^ thāmunā thāmena thāmasā vā, thāmuno thāmassa, thāmunā thāmā. addhunā, addhuno iccādi purimasamaṃ.
[03] napuṃsake vattamānassa liṅgassa sambandhino ^b^ntu^eb^ppaccayassa savibhattissa ^b^aṃ^eb^ hoti ^b^si^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. guṇavaṃ cittaṃ.
[03] ^b^yo^eb^mhi ``ntussanto yosu cā''ti ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ, ^b^i^eb^kāro ca. guṇavanti, guṇavantāni, sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
[03] ^b^gacchanta si,^eb^ ``simhi gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo a''miti ^b^aṃ^eb^. gacchaṃ gacchantaṃ, gacchantā gacchantāni.
[03] ``samāsassā''ti adhikicca ``saro rasso napuṃsake''ti samāsantassa rassattaṃ, samāsattā nāmabyapadeso, ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti. sesaṃ ^b^citta^eb^samaṃ.
[03] assaddhaṃ kulaṃ, assaddhā assaddhāni kulāni iccādi.
[03] tathā ^b^mukhanāsikā^eb^saddo. tassa dvandekattā sabbatthekavacanameva. mukhanāsikaṃ, he mukhanāsika, mukhanāsikaṃ, mukhanāsikena iccādi.
[03] napuṃsakaliṅgehi paresaṃ sabbesaṃ ^b^yonaṃ ni^eb^ hoti vā.
[03] aṭṭhīni, aññattha niccaṃ ^b^yo^eb^lopo, dīgho ca, aṭṭhī, tathā he aṭṭhi, he aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, aṭṭhiṃ, aṭṭhī aṭṭhīni, aṭṭhinā iccādi ^b^aggi^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] evaṃ satthi dadhi vāri akkhi acchi acci iccādīni.

[03] ``sukhabhārī si'' itīdha anapuṃsakattābhāvā ^b^si^eb^smimpi ``agho rassa''miccādinā rassattaṃ, ^b^si^eb^lopo. sukhakāri dānaṃ, sukhakārī sukhakārīni, he sukhakāri, he sukhakārī he sukhakārīni, sukhakārinaṃ sukhakāriṃ, sukhakārī sukhakārīni.
[02] āyu, āyū āyūni, he āyu, he āyū he āyūni, āyuṃ, āyū āyūni, āyunā āyusāti ^a^M0.0096^ea^ manogaṇādittā siddhaṃ. āyūhi āyūbhi, āyuno āyussa, āyūnamiccādi.
[03] evaṃ cakkhu vasu dhanu dāru tipu madhu hiṅgu siggu vatthu matthu jatu ambu assuādīni.

[03] ^b^gotrabhū si,^eb^ napuṃsakattā rassattaṃ, ^b^si^eb^lopo. gotrabhu cittaṃ, gotrabhū gotrabhūni, he gotrabhu, he gotrabhū he gotrabhūni, gotrabhuṃ, gotrabhū gotrabhūni, gotrabhunā iccādi pulliṅge ^b^abhibhū^eb^saddasamaṃ.

[03] ``cittā gāvo assa kulassā''ti atthe bahubbīhisamāse kate ``saro rasso napuṃsake''ti okārassa ṭhānappayatanāsannattā rassattamukāro, ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti, ^b^si^eb^lopo. cittagu kulaṃ, cittagū cittagūni iccādi ^b^āyu^eb^saddasamaṃ.

[03] sabba, katara, katama, ubhaya, itara, añña, aññatara, aññatama, pubba, para, apara, dakkhiṇa, uttara, adhara, ya, ta, eta, ima, amu, kiṃ, eka, ubha, dvi, ti, catu, tumha, amha iti sattavīsati sabbanāmāni, tāni sabbanāmattā tiliṅgāni.
[03] tattha ^b^sabba^eb^saddo niravasesattho, so yadā pulliṅgavisiṭṭhatthābhidhāyī, tadā rūpanayo. pure viya ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti, ``so''ti ^b^si^eb^ssa ^b^o^eb^kāro, saralopaparanayanāni. sabbo jano.
[03] bahuvacane ``sabba yo'' itīdha ``parasamaññā payoge''ti sabbādīnaṃ sabbanāmasaññā.
[03] sabbesaṃ itthipumanapuṃsakānaṃ nāmāni ^b^sabbanāmāni,^eb^ tesaṃ sabbesaṃ sabbanāmasaññānaṃ liṅgānaṃ ^b^a^eb^kārato paro paṭhamo ^b^yo e^eb^ttamāpajjate. sabbe purisā.
[03] he sabba sabbā, he sabbe, sabbaṃ, sabbe, sabbena, sabbehi sabbebhi.
[03] ``ato, ā e, smāsmiṃnaṃ, āya catutthekavacanassā''ti ca vattate.

[03] ^b^a^eb^kārantehi sabbanāmehi paresaṃ ^b^smā smiṃ^eb^ iccetesaṃ, catutthekavacanassa ca ^b^ā e āya^eb^iccete ādesā neva hontīti ^b^āyā^eb^desābhāvo. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ katthaci paṭisedhanivattanatthaṃ, tena pubbādīhi ^b^smā smiṃnaṃ ā e^eb^ ca honti. sabbassa.
[03] sabbato sabbanāmato parassa ^b^naṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^saṃ sānaṃ^eb^iccete ādesā honti.
[02] sabbesaṃ sabbesānaṃ, sabbasmā sabbamhā, sabbehi sabbebhi, sabbassa, sabbesaṃ sabbesānaṃ, sabbasmiṃ sabbamhi, sabbesu.

[03] itthiyaṃ ``itthiyamato āppaccayo''ti ^b^ā^eb^ppaccayo. aññaṃ ^b^kaññā^eb^saddasamaṃ aññatra ^b^sa naṃ smiṃ^eb^vacanehi. sabbā pajā, sabbā sabbāyo, he sabbe, he sabbā sabbāyo, sabbaṃ, sabbā sabbāyo, sabbāya, sabbāhi sabbābhi.
[03] catutthekavacane ``sabbanāmato vā'', ^b^sabbato ko^eb^ti ito ``sabbato''ti ca vattate.
[03] sabbato sabbanāmato ^b^ghapa^eb^saññato ^b^smiṃ sa^eb^iccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^saṃsā^eb^ādesā honti vā.
[03] ^b^saṃ sā^eb^iccetesu ekavacanaṭṭhānasambhūtesu vibhattādesesu paresu liṅgamhā ^b^sa^eb^kārāgamo hoti.
[03] sabbassā sabbāya, sabbāsaṃ sabbāsānaṃ, sabbāya, sabbāhi sabbābhi, sabbassā sabbāya, sabbāsaṃ sabbāsānaṃ.
[03] etehi sabbanāmehi ^b^ghapa^eb^saññehi parassa ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacanassa neva ^b^āya yā^eb^desā hontīti ^b^āyā^eb^bhāvo. ^b^vā^eb^dhikārato kvaci hoti dakkhiṇāya uttarāyāti ādi.
[03] napuṃsake sabbaṃ cittaṃ, sabbāni, he sabba, he sabbāni, sabbaṃ, sabbāni. sesaṃ pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṃ.
[03] dvandasamāsaṭṭhā sabbanāmakārato paro paṭhamo ^b^yo e^eb^ttamāpajjate vā. kataro ca katamo cāti katarakatame, katarakatamā vā iccādi.
[03] pubbo kālo. bahuvacane ``dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā''ti ettha ^b^parā^eb^ti niddesato pubbādīhi ^b^yo^eb^vacanassa vikappenekāro.

[02] pubbe pubbā, he pubba, he pubbe he pubbā, pubbaṃ, pubbe, pubbena, pubbehi pubbebhi, pubbassa, pubbesaṃ pubbesānaṃ. ``smāsmiṃnaṃ vā''ti vikappenākārekārā. pubbā pubbasmā pubbamhā, pubbehi pubbebhi, pubbassa, pubbesaṃ pubbesānaṃ, pubbe pubbasmiṃ pubbamhi, pubbesu.
[03] itthiyaṃ pubbā disā, pubbā pubbāyo iccādi ^b^sabbā^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] napuṃsake ^a^M0.0101^ea^ pubbaṃ ṭhānaṃ, pubbāni, he pubba, he pubbāni, pubbaṃ, pubbāni, sesaṃ pulliṅgasamaṃ. evaṃ ^b^parāparadakkhiṇuttarādhara^eb^saddā.

[03] dvandaṭṭhā sabbanāmato parassa ^b^yo^eb^vacanassa ṭhapetvā ^b^e^eb^ttaṃ aññaṃ sabbanāmikaṃ kāriyaṃ na hotīti ^b^saṃsāna^eb^mādesābhāvo. pubbāparānaṃ, pubbuttarānaṃ adharuttarānaṃ, ``nāññaṃ sabbanāmika''nti vinādhikārena yogena tatiyāsamāsepi. māsapubbāya, māsapubbānaṃ.
[03] bahubbīhimhi ca samāse sabbanāmikavidhānaṃ nāññaṃ hoti. piyapubbāya, piyapubbānaṃ, piyapubbe.
[03] dakkhiṇassā ca pubbassā ca yadantarāḷanti atthe bahubbīhi, dakkhiṇapubbassaṃ, dakkhiṇapubbassā, evaṃ uttarapubbassaṃ, uttarapubbassā iccādi.
[02] yo puriso, ye purisā, yaṃ, ye. yā kaññā, yā yāyo, yaṃ, yā yāyo. yaṃ cittaṃ, yāni, yaṃ, yāni. sesaṃ sabbattha ^b^sabba^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] ^b^ta^eb^ ^a^M0.0102^ea^ ^b^eta ima amu kiṃ^eb^iccete parammukha samīpa accantasamīpadūra pucchanatthavacanā.
[03] ^b^ta^eb^iccetassa sabbanāmassa ^b^ta^eb^kārassa ^b^na^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā sabbattha liṅgesu. ne te, naṃ taṃ, ne te, nena tena, nehi nebhi tehi tebhi.
[03] ^b^ta^eb^iccetassa sabbanāmassa sabbasseva ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā ^b^sa smā smiṃ saṃ sā^eb^iccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu. assa nassa tassa, nesaṃ tesaṃ nesānaṃ tesānaṃ.
[03] ``smāhismiṃnaṃ mhābhimhi vā''ti ito ``smāsmiṃnaṃ, mhāmhī''ti ca vattate.
[03] ^b^ta ima^eb^iccetehi katākārehi paresaṃ ^b^smāsmiṃ^eb^naṃ ^b^mhā mhi^eb^iccete ādesā na honti.
[03] atha ^a^M0.0022^ea^ sarānameva sandhikāriye sampatte pakatibhāvo vuccate.
[03] sarā kho sare pare kvaci chandabhedāsukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne, sandhicchārahitaṭṭhāne ca pakatirūpāni honti, na lopādesavikāramāpajjanteti attho.
[03] tattha ^b^pakatiṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma ālapanantā anitismiṃ acchandānurakkhaṇe asamāse padantadīghā ca ikārukārā ca nāmapadantātītakriyādimhīti evamādi.

[03] ^b^ālapanantesu^eb^ tāva -- katamā cānanda aniccasaññā, katamā cānanda ādīnavasaññā, sāriputta idhekacco, ehi sivika uṭṭhehi, upāsakā idhekacco, bhoti ayye, bhikkhu arogaṃ tava sīlaṃ, siñca bhikkhu imaṃ nāvaṃ, bhikkhave evaṃ vadāmi, pañcime gahapatayo ānisaṃsā iccevamādīsu pakatibhāvo, pubbassaralopa^b^yavā^eb^desādayo na honti.
[03] ^b^kvaci^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^iti^eb^smiṃ chandānurakkhaṇe sandhi hoti, yathā -- sakkā devīti, namo te buddha vīratthu.
[03] ^b^sare^eb^ti kiṃ? sādhu mahārājāti, evaṃ kira bhikkhūti.

[03] ^b^asamāse padantadīghesu^eb^ -- āyasmā ānando gāthā ajjhabhāsi, devā ābhassarā yathā, tevijjā iddhippattā ^a^M0.0023^ea^ ca, bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā, bhagavā etadavoca, abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi, gantvā olokento, bhūtavādī atthavādī, yaṃ itthī arahā assa, sāmāvatī āha, pāpakārī ubhayattha tappati, nadī ottharati, ye te bhikkhū appicchā, bhikkhū āmantesi, bhikkhūujjhāyiṃsu, bhikkhū evamāhaṃsu, imasmiṃ gāme ārakkhakā, sabbe ime, katame ekādasa, gambhīre odakantike, appamādo amatapadaṃ, saṅgho āgacchatu, ko imaṃ pathaviṃ viccessati, āloko udapādi, eko ekāya, cattāro oghā.
[03] ^b^nipātesupi^eb^ -- are ahampi, sace imassa kāyassa, no abhikkamo, aho acchariyo, atho anto ca, atha kho āyasmā, atho oṭṭhavacittakā, tato āmantayī satthā.

[03] ^b^kvaci^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^a^eb^kāra itīvevetthādīsu sandhipi. yathā -- āgatattha, āgatamhā, katamāssu cattāro, appassutāyaṃ puriso, itthīti, ca marīva, sabbeva, sveva, eseva nayo, parisuddhetthāyasmanto, nettha, taṃ kutettha labbhā, sacesa brāhmaṇa, tathūpamaṃ, yathāha.
[03] ^b^asamāse^eb^ti kiṃ? jivhāyatanaṃ, avijjogho, itthindriyaṃ, abhibhāyatanaṃ, bhayatupaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^acchandānurakkhaṇe^eb^ti ^a^M0.0024^ea^ kiṃ? saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, yo missaro.
[03] ^b^nāmapadantaikārukāresu^eb^ -- gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi, pupphāni āhariṃsu, satthu adāsi.

[03] sarā kho byañjane pare pakatirūpā hontīti yebhuyyena dīgharassalopehi vikārābhāvo. yathā -- accayo, paccayo, bhāsati vā karoti vā, vedanākkhandho, bhāgyavā, bhadro kasāmiva, dīyati, tuṇhībhūto, so dhammaṃ deseti.
[03] sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci dīghaṃ pappontīti suttasukhuccāraṇachandānurakkhaṇaṭṭhānesu dīgho.

[03] tyassa pahīnā tyāssa pahīnā, svassa svāssa, madhuva maññati bālo madhuvā maññatī bālo, tathā evaṃ gāme munī ^a^M0.0025^ea^ care, khantī paramaṃ tapo titikkhā, na maṅkū bhavissāmi, svākkhāto, yvāhaṃ, kāmato jāyatī soko, kāmato jāyatī bhayaṃ, sakko ujū ca suhujū ca, anūpaghāto, dūrakkhaṃ, dūramaṃ, sūrakkhaṃ, dūharatā.
[03] yiṭṭhaṃ vā hutaṃ vā loke, yadi vā sāvake, puggalā dhammadasā te, bhovādī nāma so hoti, yathābhāvī guṇena so itīdha --
[03] sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci rassaṃ pappontīti chandānurakkhaṇe, āgame, saṃyoge ca rassattaṃ.
[03] ^b^chandānurakkhaṇe^eb^ tāva yiṭṭhaṃva hutaṃva loke, yadiva sāvake, puggala dhammadasā te, bhovādi nāma so hoti, yathābhāvi guṇena so.
[03] ^b^saṃyoge^eb^ parākamo parakkamo, āsādo assādo, evaṃ taṇhakkhayo, jhānassa lābhimhi, vasimhi, thullaccayo.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? māyidaṃ, manasā daññā vimuttānaṃ, yathākkamaṃ, ākhyātikaṃ, dīyyati, sūyyati.
[03] eso kho byantiṃ kāhiti, so gacchaṃ na nivattati iccatra --
[03] sarā kho byañjane pare kvaci lopaṃ papponti, tatra lutte ṭhāne ^b^a^eb^kārāgamo ca hoti. ^b^etata^eb^saddantokārassevāyaṃ lopo.
[03] esa kho byantiṃ kāhiti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattati, evaṃ esa dhammo, esa pattosi, sa muni, sa sīlavā.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? eso dhammo, so muni, so sīlavā.
[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^eta^eb^saddantassa sarepi kvaci lopo. yathā -- esa attho, esa ābhogo, esa idāni.
[03] saramhā parassa byañjanassa dvebhāvo hoti ṭhāne. dvinnaṃ bhāvo dvibhāvo, so eva dvebhāvo.

[03] ettha ca ^b^ṭhānaṃ^eb^ nāma rassākārato paraṃ pa pati paṭikamukusa kudha kī gaha juta ñāsi su sambhū sara sasādīnamādibyañjanānaṃ dvebhāvaṃ, tika taya tiṃsa vatādīnamādi ca, vatu vaṭudisādīnamantañca, u du ni-upasagga ta catu cha santasaddādesādiparañca, apadantā nākāradīghato ^b^ya^eb^kārādi ca,
[03] ^b^chandānurakkhaṇe ca^eb^ -- ghara jhe dhaṃsu bhamādīnamādi ca, rassākārato vaggānaṃ catutthadutiyā ca iccevamādi.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0027^ea^ ^b^pa pati paṭīsu^eb^ tāva -- idha pamādo idhappamādo, evaṃ appamādo, vippayutto, suppasanno, sammā padhānaṃ sammappadhānaṃ, rassattaṃ, appativattiyo, adhipatippaccayo, suppatiṭṭhito, appaṭipuggalo, vippaṭisāro, suppaṭipanno, suppaṭipatti.
[03] ^b^kamādidhātūsu^eb^ -- pakkamo, paṭikkamo, hetukkamo, ākamati akkamati, evaṃ parakkamati, yathākkamaṃ.
[03] paggaho, viggaho, anuggaho, niggaho, candaggaho, diṭṭhiggāho.
[03] kataññū, viññū, paññāṇaṃ, viññāṇaṃ, anuññā, manuññā, samaññā.
[03] avissajjento, vissajjento, pariccajanto, upaddavo, upakkiliṭṭho, mittaddu, āyabbayo, udabbahi iccādi.
[03] ^b^saramhā^eb^ti ^a^M0.0028^ea^ kiṃ? sampayutto, sampatijāto, sampaṭicchannaṃ, saṅkamanto, saṅgaho.
[03] ^b^ṭhāne^eb^ti kiṃ? mā ca pamādo, patigayhati, vacīpakopaṃ rakkheyya, ye pamattā yathā matā, manopakopaṃ rakkheyya, idha modati, pecca modati.

[03] ^b^tikādīsu^eb^ -- kusalattikaṃ, pītittikaṃ, hetuttikaṃ, vedanāttikaṃ, lokattayaṃ, bodhittayaṃ, vatthuttayaṃ. ekattiṃsa, dvattiṃsa, catuttiṃsa. sīlabbataṃ, subbato, sappītiko, samannāgato, punappunaṃ iccādi.
[03] ^b^vatu vaṭu disādīnamante^eb^ yathā -- vattati, vaṭṭati, dassanaṃ, phasso iccādi.
[03] ^b^u du ni upasaggādiparesu^eb^ -- ukaṃso ukkaṃso. dukaraṃ dukkaraṃ, nikaṅkho nikkaṅkhe.
[03] evaṃ uggataṃ, duccaritaṃ, nijjaṭaṃ, uññātaṃ, unnati, uttaro, dukkaro, niddaro, unnato, duppañño, dubbalo, nimmalo, uyyutto, dullabho, nibbatto, ussāho, dussaho, nissāro.
[03] tathā takkaro, tajjo, tanninno, tappabhavo, tammayo.
[03] ^b^ṭhāne^eb^ti kiṃ? nikāyo, nidānaṃ, nivāso, nivāto, tato, catuvīsati, chasaṭṭhi.
[03] ^b^yakārādimhi^eb^ ^a^M0.0029^ea^ -- nīyyati, sūyyati, abhibhūyya, viceyya, vineyya, dheyyaṃ, neyyaṃ, seyyo, jeyyo, veyyākaraṇo.
[03] ^b^yavatamādese^eb^ -- jāti andho, vipali āso, ani āyo, yadi evaṃ, api ekacce, api ekadā iccatra, ^b^i^eb^kārassa ``ivaṇṇo yaṃ navā''ti ^b^ya^eb^kāre kate --
[03] ``sabbassa so dāmhi vā''ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā ^b^vā^eb^ti vattate.

[03] ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ^b^ya^eb^vataṃ ^b^sa^eb^kāra ^b^ka ca ṭa pa^eb^vaggānaṃ ^b^sa^eb^kāra^b^kacaṭapa^eb^vaggādesatthaṃ, tathā ^b^ya^eb^vataṃ ^b^ta dha ṇa^eb^kārānaṃ ^b^cha jhaña^eb^kārādesatthañca, tato yavatamādesassa anena dvibhāvo.
[03] jaccandho, vipallāso, aññāyo, yajjevaṃ, appekacce appekadā.
[03] ^b^chandānurakkhaṇe^eb^ ^a^M0.0030^ea^ -- nappajjahe vaṇṇabalaṃ purāṇaṃ, ujjugatesu seyyo, gacchanti suggatinti.
[03] vaggacatutthadutiyesu pana tasmiṃyevādhikāre ``paradvebhāvo ṭhāne''ti ca vattate.
[03] saramhā parabhūtānaṃ vagge ghosāghosānaṃ byañjanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ vaggatatiya paṭhamakkharā dvibhāvaṃ gacchanti ṭhāneti ṭhānāsannavasena tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamāva honti.

[03] ettha ca sampatte niyamattā ^b^ghosāghosa^eb^ggahaṇena catutthadutiyāva adhippetā, itarathā aniṭṭhappasaṅgosiyā. tena ``kataññū, tannayo, tammayo''tiādīsu vaggapañcamānaṃ satipi ghosatte tatiyappasaṅgona hoti, ṭhānādhikārato vā.

[03] ^b^gharādīsu pa u du niādiparacatutthesu^eb^ tāva -- pagharati paggharati, evaṃ uggharati, ugghāṭeti, dugghoso, nigghoso, eseva cajjhānaphalo, paṭhamajjhānaṃ, abhijjhāyati, ujjhāyati, viddhaṃseti, uddhaṃsito, uddhāro, niddhāro, niddhano, niddhuto, vibbhanto, ubbhato, dubbhikkhaṃ, nibbhayaṃ, tabbhāvo, catuddhā, cabhubbhi, chaddhā, saddhammo, sabbhūto, mahaddhano, mahabbhayaṃ.
[03] ^b^ṭhāne^eb^ti ^a^M0.0031^ea^ kiṃ? sīlavantassa jhāyino, ye jhānappasutā dhīrā, nidhānaṃ, mahādhanaṃ.

[03] ^b^rassākāratoparaṃ vaggadutiyesu^eb^ -- pañca khandhā pañcakkhandhā, evaṃrūpakkhandho, akkhamo, abhikkhaṇaṃ, avikkhepo, jātikkhettaṃ, dhātukkhobho, āyukkhayo. setachattaṃ setacchattaṃ, evaṃ sabbacchannaṃ, vicchinnaṃ, bodhicchāyā, jambucchāyā, samucchedo. tatra ṭhito tatraṭṭhito, evaṃ thalaṭṭhaṃ, jalaṭṭhaṃ, adhiṭṭhitaṃ, niṭṭhitaṃ, cattāriṭṭhānāni, garuṭṭhāniyo, samuṭṭhito, suppaṭṭhāno. yasatthero, yattha, tattha, pattharati, vitthāro, abhitthuto, vitthambhito, anutthunaṃ, catuttho, kuttha. papphoṭeti, mahapphalaṃ, nipphalaṃ, vipphāro, paripphuseyya, madhupphāṇitaṃ.
[03] ^b^ākārato^eb^ -- ākhāto ākkhāto, evaṃ taṇhākkhayo, āṇākkhettaṃ, saññākkhandho, āchādayati, ācchādayati, evaṃ ācchindati, nāvāṭṭhaṃ, āttharati, āpphoṭeti.
[03] ^b^saramhā^eb^ti kiṃ? saṅkhāro, taṅkhaṇe, sañchannaṃ, taṇṭhānaṃ, santhuto, tamphalaṃ.
[03] ^b^ṭhāne^eb^ti kiṃ? pūvakhajjakaṃ, tassa chaviyādīni chinditvā, yathā ṭhitaṃ, kathaṃ, kammaphalaṃ.
[03] nikamati, nipatti, nicayo, nicarati, nitaraṇaṃ iccatra -- ``do dhassa cā''ti ettha caggahaṇassa bahulatthattā tena ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena yathāpayogaṃ bahudhā ādeso siyā.
[03] yathā -- ^b^ni upasaggato^eb^ kamu pada ci cara tarānaṃ paṭhamassa vaggadutiyo iminā dvittaṃ, nikkhamati, nipphatti, nicchayo, niccharati, nittharaṇaṃ.

[03] tathā ^a^M0.0032^ea^ ^b^bo vassa^eb^ kuva diva siva vajādīnaṃ dvirūpassāti ^b^va^eb^kāradvayassa ^b^ba^eb^kāradvayaṃ, yathā -- kubbanto, evaṃ kubbāno, kubbanti, sadhātvantayādesassa dvittaṃ. divati dibbati, evaṃ dibbanto, sibbati, sibbanto, pavajati pabbajati, pabbajanto, nivānaṃ nibbānaṃ, nibbuto, nibbindati, udabbayaṃ iccādi.
[03] ^b^lo rassa^eb^ pari taruṇādīnaṃ kvaci. paripanno palipanno, evaṃ palibodho, pallaṅkaṃ, taruṇo taluno, mahāsālo, māluto, sukhumālo.
[03] ^b^ṭo tassa^eb^ dukkatādīnaṃ kvaci. yathā -- dukkataṃ dukkaṭaṃ, evaṃ sukaṭaṃ, pahaṭo, patthaṭo, uddhaṭo, visaṭo iccādi.
[03] tathā ^b^ṇo nassa pa pariādito^eb^. panidhānaṃ paṇidhānaṃ, evaṃ paṇipāto, paṇāmo, paṇītaṃ, pariṇato, pariṇāmo, ninnayo niṇṇayo, evaṃ uṇṇato, oṇato iccādi.
[03] ^b^pati^eb^iccetassa upasaggassa sare vā byañjane vā pare kvaci ^b^paṭi^eb^ādeso hoti pubbassaralopo. paṭaggi, paṭihaññati.
[03] ^b^putha^eb^iccetassa anto saro ^b^u^eb^kāro hoti byañjane pare, dvittaṃ. puthujjano, puthubhūtaṃ.
[03] ^b^byañjane^eb^ti kiṃ? putha ayaṃ. ``puthassa a putha''iti samāseneva siddhe puna ^b^anta^eb^ggahaṇādhikārena kvaci aputhantassāpi uttaṃ sare.
[03] mano aññaṃ manuññaṃ, evaṃ imaṃ evumaṃ, paralopo, iti evaṃ itvevaṃ, ^b^u^eb^kārassa ^b^va^eb^kāro.
[03] ^b^ava^eb^iccetassa upasaggassa ^b^o^eb^kāro hoti kvaci byañjane pare. okāso, onaddho, ovadati, osānaṃ.
[03] ^b^ava^eb^saddassa upapade tiṭṭhamānassa tassokārassa viparīto ca hoti byañjane pare.

[03] tassa viparīto tabbiparīto, upoccāritaṃ padaṃ upapadaṃ, ^b^okāraviparīto^eb^ti ukārassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^ca^eb^saddo ^b^ka^eb^tthaci ^a^M0.0034^ea^ nivattanattho, dvittaṃ. uggate sūriye, uggacchati, ^b^u^eb^ggahetvā.
[03] byañjane pare kvaci okārāgamo hotīti ^b^atippa para^eb^saddehi okārāgamo ``yavamada''iccādisutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^atippa^eb^to ^b^ga^eb^kārāgamo ca.
[03] atippago kho tāva, parosataṃ, parosahassaṃ, ettha ``sarā sare lopa''nti pubbassaralopo.
[03] manomayaṃ, ayomayaṃ, evaṃ manoseṭṭhā, ayopatto, tapodhano, tamonudo, siroruho, tejokasiṇaṃ, rajojallaṃ, ahorattaṃ, rahogato.
[03] sīhagatiyā ^b^vā^eb^dhikārato idha na bhavati, manamattena manacchaṭṭhānaṃ, ayakapallaṃ, tamavinodano, manāayatanaṃ.
[03] taṇhaṃ karo, raṇaṃ jaho, saṃ ṭhito, jutiṃ dharo, saṃ mato itīdha ``niggahīta''nti adhikāro, ``byañjane''ti vattate.

[03] vaggabhūte byañjane pare niggahītaṃ kho vaggantaṃ vā pappotīti nimittānusvarānaṃ ṭhānāsannavasena tabbaggapañcamo hoti. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. tena ``taṇhaṅkaro, raṇañjaho, saṇṭhito, jutindharo, sammato''tiādīsu niccaṃ.

[03] taṅkaroti taṃ karoti, taṅkhaṇaṃ taṃkhaṇaṃ, saṅgaho saṃgaho, taṅghataṃ taṃ ghataṃ. dhammañcare dhammaṃ care, tañchannaṃ taṃ channaṃ, tañjātaṃ taṃ jātaṃ, taññāṇaṃ taṃ ñāṇaṃ. taṇṭhānaṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ, taṇḍahati ^b^bhaṃ^eb^ ḍahati. tantanoti taṃ tanoti, tanthiraṃ taṃ thiraṃ, tandānaṃ taṃ dānaṃ, tandhanaṃ taṃ dhanaṃ, tanniccutaṃ taṃ niccutaṃ. tampatto taṃ patto, tamphalaṃ taṃ phalaṃ, tesambodho tesaṃ bodho, sambhūto saṃbhūto, tammittaṃ taṃ mittaṃ. kiṅkato kiṃ kato, dātuṅgato dātuṃ gatoti evamādīsu vikappena.
[03] idha na bhavati, na taṃ kammaṃ kataṃ sādhu, saraṇaṃ gacchāmi.

[03] sati copari ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇe vijjhantare vā idha ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇakaraṇamatthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ, tena niggahītassa ^b^saṃ^eb^upasaggapumantassa ^b^le la^eb^kāro. yathā -- paṭisaṃlīno paṭisallīno, evaṃ paṭisallāṇo, sallakkhaṇā, sallekho, sallāpo, puṃliṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ.
[03] paccattaṃ eva, taṃ eva, tañhi tassa, evañhi vo itīdha ``vā''ti adhikāro.
[03] ^b^e^eb^kāra^b^ha^eb^kāre pare niggahītaṃ kho ^b^ña^eb^kāraṃ pappoti vā, ^b^e^eb^kāre ^b^ñā^eb^desassa dvibhāvo.
[03] paccattaññevapaccattaṃ eva, taññeva taṃ eva, tañhi tassa tañhi tassa, evañhi vo evañhi vo.
[03] vavatthitavibhāsattā ^b^vā^eb^saddassa ^b^evahi^eb^nipātato aññattha na hoti, yathā -- evametaṃ, evaṃ hoti.
[03] saṃyogo, saṃyojanaṃ, saṃyato, saṃyācikāya, yaṃ yadeva, ānantarikaṃ yamāhu itīdha ``ña''miti vattate.
[03] niggahītaṃ kho ^b^ya^eb^kāre pare saha ^b^ya^eb^kārena ^b^ña^eb^kāraṃ pappoti vā, ^b^ñā^eb^desassa dvittaṃ.
[03] saññogo saṃyogo, saññojanaṃ saṃyojanaṃ, saññato saṃyato, saññācikāya saṃyācikāya, yaññadeva yaṃ yadeva, ānantarikaññamāhu ānantarikaṃ yamāhu.
[03] ^b^vā^eb^saddassa vavatthitavibhāsattāva ^b^saṃ^eb^padantato ca sabbanāma^b^ya^eb^kāraparato ca niggahītā aññattha na hoti. yathā -- etaṃ yojanaṃ, taṃ yānaṃ, saraṇaṃ yanti.

[03] ettha ca ``saha ye cā''ti vattabbe ``sa ye cā''ti vacanato suttantesu sukhuccāraṇatthamakkharalopopīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena paṭisaṅkhāya yoniso paṭisaṅkhā yoniso, sayaṃ abhiññāya sacchikatvā sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā, pariyesanāya pariyesanātiādi sijjhati.
[03] taṃ ^a^M0.0037^ea^ ahaṃ brūmi, yaṃ āhu, dhanaṃ eva, kiṃ etaṃ, nindituṃ arahati, yaṃ aniccaṃ, taṃ anattā, etaṃ avoca, etaṃ eva iccatra --
[03] niggahītassa kho sare pare ^b^ma^eb^kāra^b^da^eb^kārādesā honti vā. ettha ca ^b^vā^eb^saddādhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā ^b^da^eb^kāro ^b^yateta^eb^saddato parasseva.
[03] tamahaṃ brūmi, yamāhu, dhanameva, kimetaṃ, ninditumarahati, yadaniccaṃ, tadanattā, etadavoca, etadeva.
[03] ^b^vā^eb^ti kiṃ? taṃ ahaṃ, etaṃ eva, akkocchi maṃ avadhi maṃ.
[03] ettha ca ^b^madā^eb^ti yogavibhāgena byañjanepi vā ^b^ma^eb^kāro. tena ``buddhama saraṇama gacchāmī''tiādi sijjhati.
[03] tāsaṃ ahaṃ santike, vidūnaṃ aggaṃ, tassa adāsiṃ ahaṃ itīdha ``sare''ti vattate.
[03] niggahītaṃ kho sare pare lopaṃ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇe sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne. pubbassaralopo, parassa asaṃyogantassa dīgho.
[03] tāsāhaṃ santike, vidūnaggaṃ, tassa adāsāhaṃ, tathāgatāhaṃ, evāhaṃ, kyāhaṃ.
[03] ariyasaccānaṃ dassanaṃ, etaṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ, saṃratto, saṃrāgo, saṃrambho, avisaṃhāro, ciraṃ pavāsiṃ, gantuṃ kāmo, gantuṃ mano itīdha ``kvaci lopa''nti vattate.
[03] niggahītaṃ kho byañjane ca pare lopaṃ pappoti kvaci chandānurakkhaṇādimhi. ^b^ra^eb^kāra^b^ha^eb^kāresu upasaggantassa dīgho.
[03] ariyasaccāna dassanaṃ, etaṃ buddhāna sāsanaṃ, sāratto, sārāgo, sārambho, avisāhāro, cirappavāsiṃ, dvittaṃ, gantukāmo, gantumano.
[03] kataṃ iti, kiṃ iti, abhinanduṃ iti, uttattaṃ iva, cakkaṃ iva, kaliṃ idāni, kiṃ idāni, tvaṃ asi, idaṃ api, uttariṃ api, dātuṃ api, sadisaṃ eva itīdha ``niggahītamhā, lopa''nti ca vattate.
[03] niggahītamhā paro saro lopaṃ pappoti vā. niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ.
[03] katanti, kinti, abhinandunti, uttattaṃva, cakkaṃva, kalindāni, kindāni, tvaṃsi, idampi, uttarimpi, dātumpi, sadisaṃva.
[03] ^b^vā^eb^ti kiṃ? kataṃ iti, kimiti, dātumapi, sāmaṃ eva.
[03] ayampi ^b^vā^eb^saddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā itīvīdānisīpevādito aññattha na hoti. yathā -- ahaṃ ettha, etaṃ ahosi.
[03] evaṃ assa te āsavā, pupphaṃ assā uppajjati itīdha sare pare lutte vipariṇāmena ``parasmiṃ, sare, lutte''ti ca vattate.
[03] niggahītamhā parasmiṃ sare lutte byañjano saññogo ce, visaññogova hotīti saṃyogekadesassa purimabyañjanassa lopo.
[03] dvinnaṃ byañjanānamekatra ṭhiti saññogo, idha pana saṃyujjatīti saññogo, purimo vaṇṇo, vigato saññogo assāti ^b^visaññogo,^eb^ paro.
[03] evaṃ sa te āsavā, pupphaṃsā uppajjati.
[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddena tiṇṇaṃ byañjanānaṃ sarūpasaṃyogopi visaññogo hoti. yathā -- agyāgāraṃ, vutyassa.
[03] cakkhu udapādi, ava siro, yāvacidha bhikkhave, aṇuthūlāni, ta sampayuttā ibhīdha ``sare, āgamo, kvaci, byañjane''ti ca vattate.
[03] niggahītañca āgamo hoti sare vā byañjane vā kvaci sukhuccāraṇaṭṭhāne. niggahītassa rassānugatattā rassatoyevāyaṃ.
[03] cakkhuṃ udapādi, avaṃsiro, yāvañcidha bhikkhave, aṇuṃthūlāni, taṃsampayuttā, evaṃ taṅkhaṇe, taṃsabhāvo.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? na hi etehi, idha ceva.
[03] evaṃ vutte, taṃ sādhu, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, aggiṃva sanamaṃ itīdha lopādesakāriye sampatte yebhuyyena tadapavādatthamāha.
[03] niggahītaṃ kho byañjane pare aṃiti hoti.
[03] evaṃ vutte, taṃ sādhu, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā, aggiṃva sandhamaṃ.
[03] ye idha amhehi visesato na upadiṭṭhā upasagganipātādayo, tesaṃ vuttayogato vuttanayena sarasandhādīsu vuttanayānusārena rūpasiddhi veditabbā.

[03] tena ``do dhassa cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena pariyādīnaṃ rahanādivaṇṇassa vipariyayo yavādīhi, yathā -- pariyudāhāsi payirudāhāsi, ariyassa ayirassa, bahvābādho bavhābādho, na abhineyya anabhineyya.
[03] ``taṃ imināpi jānāthā''ti ettha ``paro vā saro''ti sare lutte ``tatrākāro''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^a^eb^kāro niggahītassa ^b^da^eb^kāro, tadamināpi jānātha iccādi.
[03] atthābhimukhaṃ namanato, attani catthassa nāmanato ^b^nāmaṃ,^eb^ dabbābhidhānaṃ.
[03] taṃ pana duvidhaṃ anvattharuḷhīvasena, tividhaṃ pumitthinapuṃsakaliṅgavasena. yathā -- rukkho, mālā, dhanaṃ.
[03] catubbidhaṃ sāmaññaguṇakriyāyadicchāvasena, yathā -- rukkho, nīlo, pācako, sirivaḍḍhotiādi.
[03] tattha paṭhamaṃ ^b^a^eb^kārantamhā pulliṅgā jātinimittā ^b^purisa^eb^saddā ^b^syā^eb^divibhattiyo parā yojīyante.

[03] ^b^adhikāro^eb^yaṃ. tattha pañca māre jitavāti jino, buddho. jinassa vacanaṃ jinavacanaṃ, tassa jinavacanassa yuttaṃ ^b^jinavacanayuttaṃ,^eb^ tepiṭakassa buddhavacanassa māgadhikāya sabhāvaniruttiyā yuttaṃ anurūpamevāti idaṃ adhikāratthaṃ veditabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^adhikāro^eb^ pana tividho sīhagatikamaṇḍūkagatikayathānupubbikavasena, ayaṃ pana sīhagatiko pubbāparavilokanato, yathānupubbikoyeva vā.

[03] ^b^liṅgaṃ^eb^pāṭipadikaṃ, yathā yathā jinavacanayuttañhi liṅgaṃ, tathā tathā idha liṅgaṃ nipaccate ṭhapīyati. ^b^ca^eb^saddena dhātavo cāti jinavacanānurūpato ``purisa''iti liṅge ṭhapite tato tassa dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitassa atthavato saddassa ``parasamaññā payoge''ti paribhāsato liṅgasaññāyaṃ --
[03] tato jinavacanayuttehi liṅgehi parā vibhattiyo honti. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena tavetunādipaccayantanipātatopi. kammādivasena, ekattādivasena ca liṅgatthaṃ vibhajantīti vibhattiyo.
[03] kā ca pana tā vibhattiyo? ``vibhattiyo''ti adhikāro.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ^b^siyo, aṃyo, nāhi, sanaṃ, smāhi, sanaṃ, smiṃsu^eb^.
[03] syādayo dvisatta vibhattiyo nāma honti. tattha si, yo iti paṭhamā, aṃ, yo iti dutiyā, nā, hi iti tatiyā, sa, naṃ iti catutthī, smā, hi iti pañcamī, sa, naṃ iti chaṭṭhī, smiṃ, su iti sattamī.

[03] idaṃ ^a^M0.0043^ea^ pana saññādhikāraparibhāsāvidhisuttesu ^b^saññāsutta^eb^nti daṭṭhabbaṃ, vuttañhi vuttiyaṃ ``vibhattīccanena kvattho, amhassa mamaṃ savibhattissa se''ti, itarathā purimasuttena ekayogo kattabboti. ettha ca paṭhamādivohāro, ekavacanādivohāro ca anvatthavasena, parasamaññāvasena vā siddhoti veditabbo.
[03] ekassa vacanaṃ ekavacanaṃ, bahūnaṃ vacanaṃ bahuvacanaṃ, dvinnaṃ pūraṇī dutiyātiādi, itarathā purimasutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena saññākaraṇe appakataniratthakavidhippasaṅgo siyā.
[03] ``jinavacanayuttañhi, liṅgañca nipaccate''ti ca vattate. idha pana padanipphādanampi jinavacanassāvirodhenāti ñāpetuṃ paribhāsantaramāha.

[03] yathā yathā tesaṃ jinavacanānaṃ uparodho na hoti, tathā tathā idha liṅgaṃ, ^b^ca^eb^saddenākhyātañca nipaccate, nipphādīyatīti attho. teneva idha ca ākhyāte ca dvivacanāggahaṇaṃ, sakkatavisadisato vibhattippaccayādividhānañca katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] liṅgatthābhidhānamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hotīti paṭhamā. tatthāpi aniyamenekavacanabahuvacanappasaṅge ``ekamhī vattabbe ekavacana''nti paribhāsato liṅgatthassekattavacanicchāyaṃ paṭhamekavacanaṃ ^b^si^eb^.
[03] si, oiti dvipadamidaṃ. liṅgassa ^b^a^eb^kārato parassa ^b^si^eb^vacanassa ^b^o^eb^kāro hoti.
[03] suttesu hi paṭhamāniddiṭṭhassa kāriyino chaṭṭhīvipariṇāmena vivaraṇaṃ ādesāpekkhanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] ettha ca ^b^sī^eb^ti vibhatti gayhate vibhattikāriyavidhippakaraṇato, ``tato ca vibhattiyo''ti ito ^b^vibhatti^eb^ggahaṇānuvattanato vā, evaṃ sabbattha ^b^syā^eb^dīnaṃ kāriyavidhāne vibhattiyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03] ``vā paro asarūpā''ti paralope sampatte tadapavādena pubbalopamāha.

[03] pubbassarassa lopo hoti ^b^aṃ^eb^vacane, ādesappaccayādibhūte ca sare pare, saralope kate tu parasarassa pakatibhāvo hoti. ettha ca ``saralope''ti punaggahaṇaṃ imināva katasaralopanimitteyeva parassa vikāre sampatte pakatibhāvatthaṃ. parasarassa pakatibhāvavidhānasāmatthiyato amādesappaccayādibhūte sare paretipi siddhaṃ.
[03] ^b^tu^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0045^ea^ ^b^bhikkhunī^eb^ādīsu saralopanivattanatthaṃ, ``naye paraṃ yutte''ti paraṃ netabbaṃ. puriso tiṭṭhati.
[03] puriso ca puriso cāti purisa purisaiti vattabbe --

[03] sarūpānaṃ samānarūpānaṃ padabyañjanānaṃ majjhe ekova sissate, aññe lopamāpajjante asakinti ekaseso. ettha ca ``sarūpāna''nti vuttattāva siddhe asakimpayoge pu^b^nāsakiṃ^eb^gahaṇaṃ ^b^e^eb^kavibhattivisayānamevāsakimpayoge evāyanti dassanatthaṃ, na ca vicchāpayoge'tippasaṅgo. ``vaggā pañcapañcaso mantā''ti ettha ``pañcapañcaso''ti niddeseneva vicchāpayogasiddhiyā ñāpitattā, atha vā sahavacanicchāya'maya'mekaseso.
[03] tattheva liṅgatthassa ^b^ba^eb^huttavacanicchāyaṃ ``bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana''nti paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ ^b^yo,^eb^ purisa yo itīdha ``ato, vā''ti ca vattate.

[03] ^b^a^eb^kārantato liṅgamhā paresaṃ sabbesaṃ paṭhamāyonīnaṃ, dutiyāyonīnañca yayākkamaṃ ākārekārādesā honti vāti ^b^ā^eb^kāro, ^b^sabba^eb^ggahaṇaṃ sabbādesatthaṃ, saralopādi purimasadisameva, purisā tiṭṭhanti.
[03] vā icceva rūpā rūpāni, aggayo, munayo.
[03] ^b^a^eb^bhimukhaṃ katvā lapanaṃ ^b^ālapanaṃ,^eb^ sambodhanaṃ. tasmiṃ ālapanatthādhike liṅgatthābhidhānamatte ca paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. pure viya ekavacanādi.
[03] ālapanatthe vihito ^b^si ga^eb^sañño hotīti ^b^ga^eb^saññāyaṃ ``bho ge tū''ti ito ``ge''ti vattate.
[03] liṅgassa sambandhī ^b^ā^eb^kāro rassamāpajjate ^b^ge pare^eb^ vikappena, adūraṭṭhassālapanevāyaṃ.

[03] ``siṃ, so, syā ca, sakhato gasse vā, ghate cā''ti evamādīhi niddiṭṭhehi añño seso nāma, tato sesato liṅgamhā ^b^gasi^eb^iccete lopamāpajjante. ^b^api^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ^a^M0.0047^ea^ dutiyatthasampiṇḍanatthaṃ, ettha ca satipi ^b^si^eb^ggahaṇe ^b^va^eb^iti vacanameva ñāpakamaññatthāpi ^b^si^eb^ggahaṇe ālapanāggahaṇassa. keci ālapanābhibyattiyā ^b^bhavanta^eb^saddaṃ vā ^b^he^eb^saddaṃ vā payujjante. bho purisa tiṭṭha, he purisā vā.
[03] yaṃ vā karoti, yaṃ vā vikaroti, yaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ kriyānimittaṃ kammasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] kammatthe dutiyāvibhatti hoti. pure viya dutiyekavacanaṃ aṃ, ``saralopo''tiādinā sare lutte ``dīgha''nti dīghe sampatte pakatibhāvo ca, purisaṃ passa.
[03] yo attappadhāno kriyaṃ karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
[03] kattari ca kārake tatiyāvibhatti hotīti tatiyekavacanaṃ ^b^nā^eb^.
[03] ^b^enā^eb^ti avibhattikaniddeso. ^b^a^eb^kārantato liṅgamhā parassa ^b^nā^eb^vacanassa ^b^enā^eb^deso hoti, saralopādi, purisena kataṃ.
[03] sabbato liṅgamhā ^b^smā hi smiṃ^eb^iccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^mhā, bhi, mhi^eb^iccete ādesā honti vā, purisehi, purisebhi kataṃ.
[03] yena vā kayirate, yena vā passati, yena vā suṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ karaṇasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] karaṇakārake tatiyāvibhatti hoti, sesaṃ kattusamaṃ, āviṭṭhena purisena so puññaṃ karoti, purisehi, purisebhi.
[03] yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] sabbato liṅgamhā ^b^sa^eb^kārāgamo hoti ^b^se^eb^ vibhattimhi pare. purisassa dhanaṃ dadāti.
[03] ^b^su naṃ hi^eb^iccetesu paresu liṅgassa antabhūtā sabbe rassasarā dīghamāpajjante, ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇamikārukārānaṃ kvaci nivattanatthaṃ. purisānaṃ.
[03] yasmā vā avadhibhūtā apeti, yasmā vā bhayaṃ, yasmā vā ādatte, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] ^b^a^eb^kārantato liṅgamhā sabbesaṃ ^b^smā smiṃ^eb^iccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ ākārekārādesā honti vā, aññattha ^b^mhā^eb^deso. purisā apeti, purisamhā, purisasmā.
[03] bahuvacane sabbattha tatiyāsamaṃ, ^b^hi^eb^ssa ^b^bhi^eb^ādeso hoti. purisehi, purisebhi apeti.
[03] yassa vā pariggaho, taṃ sāmisaññaṃ hoti.
[03] sāmismiṃ chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti. ṭhapetvā ^b^āyā^eb^desaṃ sabbattha catutthīchaṭṭhīnaṃ samānaṃ rūpaṃ. purisassa etaṃ dhanaṃ, purisānaṃ.
[03] yo kattukammānaṃ kriyāya ādhāro, taṃ kārakaṃ okāsasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] okāsakārake sattamīvibhatti hotīti sattamiyā ekavacanaṃ smiṃ, tassa ``smāsmiṃnaṃ vā''ti ^b^e^eb^kāro, ^b^mhi^eb^ādeso ca, purise patiṭṭhitaṃ, purisamhi, purisasmiṃ.

[02] puriso, purisā, bho purisa bho purisā vā, bhavanto purisā, purisaṃ, purise, purisena, purisehi purisebhi, purisassa, purisānaṃ, purisā purisasmā purisamhā, purisehi purisebhi, purisassa, purisānaṃ, purise purisasmiṃ purisamhi, purisesu.

[02] tathā sugato, sugatā, bho sugata bho sugatā vā, bhavanto sugatā, sugataṃ, sugate, sugatena, sugatehi sugatebhi, sugatassa, sugatānaṃ, sugatā sugatasmā sugatamhā, sugatehi sugatebhi, sugatassa, sugatānaṃ, sugate sugatasmiṃ sugatamhi, sugatesu.
[21] āloka loka nilayā'nila cāga yogā, vāyāma gāma
[22] sārambha thambha mada māna pamāda makkhā..
[03] mano, manā, he mana he manā vā, bhavanto manā, manaṃ, mane.
[03] manopabhuti gaṇo manogaṇo, manogaṇādito ^b^smiṃ, nā^eb^iccetesaṃ yathākkamaṃ ikārākārādesā honti vā. ^b^ādi^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^bilapadā^eb^ditopi.
[03] eteheva manogaṇādīhi sare pare ^b^sā^eb^gamo hoti vā. manasā, manena.
[03] vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, tena ``mano manā manaṃ mane manāayatana''ntiādīsu na hoti. ``mānasikaṃ, cetasika''ntiādīsu niccaṃ. manehi, manebhi.
[02] manaso manassa, manānaṃ, manā manasmā manamhā, manehi manebhi, manaso manassa, manānaṃ, manasi mane manasmiṃ manamhi, manesu.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa savibhattissa ^b^ā^eb^ādeso hoti simhi vibhattimhi. guṇavā.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa savibhattissa ^b^nto^eb^ādeso hoti vā ^b^yo^eb^mhi paṭhame, guṇavanto tiṭṭhanti.

[03] ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa anto ^b^u^eb^kāro ^b^a^eb^ttamāpajjate ^b^sunaṃhi yo^eb^iccetesu, ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena aññesu aṃ ^b^nā smāsmiṃ^eb^su ca. guṇavantā, chaṭṭhiyā siddhepi ^b^antā^eb^dese puna ^b^anta^eb^ggahaṇakaraṇato ^b^yo^eb^naṃ ^b^i^eb^kāro ca kvaci. guṇavanti.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa savibhattissa ^b^aṃ a^eb^vaṇṇaiccete ādesā honti ^b^ge^eb^ pare.
[02] bho guṇavaṃ bho guṇava bho guṇavā, bhavanto guṇavanto guṇavantā, guṇavantaṃ, guṇavante.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa savibhattissa ^b^toti tā^eb^ādesā honti vā ^b^sasmiṃnā^eb^iccetesu yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. guṇavatā guṇavantena, guṇavantehi guṇavantebhi.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa savibhattissa nta^b^ssa^eb^iccayamādeso hoti vā ^b^se^eb^ vibhattimhi. guṇavantassa guṇavato.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa savibhattissa ^b^taṃ^eb^ādeso hoti vā ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. guṇavataṃ guṇavantānaṃ.
[02] guṇavatā guṇavantā guṇavantasmā guṇavantamhā, guṇavantehi guṇavantebhi, guṇavantassa guṇavato, guṇavataṃ guṇavantānaṃ, guṇavati guṇavante guṇavantasmiṃ guṇavantamhī, guṇavantesu.
[03] evaṃ gaṇavā kulavā balavā yasavā dhanavā sutavā bhagavā himavā phalavā sīlavā paññavā iccādayo.
[03] ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa anto ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā ^b^si^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. himavanto, himavā, sesaṃ samaṃ.
[03] puna ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇakaraṇaṃ ^b^himavantu^eb^saddato aññatra attanisedhanatthaṃ, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. tena guṇavantādīsu nātippasaṅgo.

[02] evaṃ satimā dhitimā gatimā matimā mutimā muttimā jutimā sirimā hirimā thutimā ratimā yatimā sucimā kalimā balimā kasimā rucimā buddhimā cakkhumā bandhumā hetumā setumā ketumā rāhumā bhāṇumā khāṇumā vijjumā iccādayo.
[03] tattha ^b^satimantu bandhumantu^eb^saddānaṃ ^b^aṃse^eb^su rūpabhedo. ``attaṃ, ntussā''ti ca vattate.

[03] sabbasseva ^b^ntu^eb^paccayassa ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā ^b^aṃsa^eb^iccetesu. idhāpi ^b^vā^eb^saddassa vavatthitavibhāsattā nātippasaṅgo ^a^M0.0056^ea^. satimaṃ satimantaṃ, bandhumaṃ bandhumantaṃ, satimassa satimato satimantassa, bandhumassa bandhumato bandhumantassa, sesaṃ samaṃ.
[03] ^b^gacchanti^eb^ccevamādīnaṃ ^b^anta^eb^ppaccayantānaṃ ^b^nta^eb^saddo aṃrūpaṃ āpajjate vā ^b^si^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. saralopa^b^si^eb^lopā, so gacchaṃ, gacchanto vā gaṇhāti.
[03] ^b^gacchantā^eb^dīnaṃ ^b^nta^eb^saddo ^b^ntu^eb^paccayova daṭṭhabbo sesesu vibhattippaccayesu, a^b^smi^eb^mhi kāriyātidesoyaṃ. sesaṃ ^b^guṇavantu^eb^samaṃ.

[02] te gacchanto gacchantā, bho gacchaṃ bho gaccha bho gacchā, bhavanto gacchanto gacchantā, [gacchaṃ] gacchantaṃ, gacchante, gacchatā gacchantena, gacchantehi gacchantebhi, gacchato gacchantassa, gacchataṃ gacchantānaṃ, gacchatā gacchantasmā gacchantamhā, gacchantehi gacchantebhi, gacchato gacchantassa, gacchataṃ gacchantānaṃ, gacchati gacchante gacchantasmiṃ gacchantamhī, gacchantesu.
[21] evaṃ mahaṃ caraṃ tiṭṭhaṃ, dadaṃ bhuñjaṃ suṇaṃ pacaṃ.
[22] jayaṃ jīraṃ cavaṃ mīyaṃ, saraṃ kubbaṃ japaṃ vajaṃ --
[03] ^b^bhavanta^eb^saddassa ^a^M0.0057^ea^ ^b^ga yo nā sa^eb^vacanesu viseso. so bhavaṃ.
[03] ^b^bhavanta^eb^iccetassa ^b^va^eb^kārassa ^b^o^eb^bhāvo hoti kvaci ^b^yo^eb^iccetesu. te bhonto bhavanto bhavantā.

[03] sabbasseva ^b^bhavanta^eb^saddassa ^b^bho^eb^ hoti ^b^ge^eb^ pare. ^b^tu^eb^saddena bhante, bhontādi ca, ^b^ga^eb^lopo, bho bhante bhonta bhontā, bhonto bhavanto bhavantā, bhavantaṃ, bhonte bhavante.
[03] bhotā bhavatā bhavantena, bhoto bhavato bhavantassa iccādi.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^bhadanta^eb^saddassa ^b^bhaddanta bhante^eb^iccete ādesā honti kvaci ^b^ge^eb^ pare ^b^yo^eb^su ca. bho bhaddanta bhante, bhadanta bhadantā vā iccādi ^b^purisa^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^santa^eb^saddassa ^b^sa^eb^saddādeso hoti ^b^bha^eb^kāre pare, ante ca ^b^ba^eb^kārāgamo hoti.
[03] atthi ^b^rāja brahma atta sakha^eb^saddādīnaṃ bhedo, tatheva ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti, ``rāja si''iti ṭhite --
[03] ^b^brahma atta sakha rāja^eb^iccevamādito ^b^si^eb^vacanassa ^b^ā^eb^kāro hoti. ^b^ādi^eb^saddena ^b^ātumā^eb^disaddato ca. saralopādi. rājā tiṭṭhati.
[03] ^b^brahmattasakharājā^eb^dito ^b^yo^eb^naṃ ^b^āno^eb^ādeso hoti. rājāno tiṭṭhanti, bho rāja bho rājā, bhavanto rājāno.
[03] ^b^brahmā^eb^dīhi parassa aṃvacanassa ^b^ānaṃ^eb^ hoti vā. rājānaṃ passa rājaṃ vā, rājāno.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^rāja^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^raññā^eb^ādeso hoti vā ^b^nā^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. raññā kataṃ rājena vā.
[03] sabbassa ^b^rāja^eb^saddassa ^b^rāju^eb^ādeso hoti ^b^su naṃ hi^eb^iccetesu vacanesu. ^b^ca^eb^saddo vikappanattho, ``sunaṃhisu cā''ti dīgho, rājūhi rājūbhi, rājehi rājebhi vā.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^rāja^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^rañño rājino^eb^iccete ādesā honti ^b^se^eb^ vibhattimhi. rañño, rājino deti.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^rāja^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^raññaṃ^eb^ādeso hoti vā ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. raññaṃ rājūnaṃ rājānaṃ.
[03] raññā apeti, rājūhi rājūbhi, rājehi rājebhi, rañño, rājino santakaṃ, raññaṃ rājūnaṃ rājānaṃ.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^rāja^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^raññerājini^eb^iccete ādesā honti ^b^smiṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. raññe, rājini patiṭṭhitaṃ, rājūsu rājesu.
[03] ^b^brahma^eb^saddassa ca ^b^ga nā sa smiṃ^eb^su viseso. brahmā, brahmāno.
[03] ^b^brahma^eb^saddato ^b^ga^eb^ssa ca ^b^e^eb^kāro hoti, ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ^b^e^eb^ggahaṇānukaḍḍhanatthaṃ, bho brahme, bhavanto brahmāno, brahmānaṃ brahmaṃ, brahmāno.
[03] ^b^brahma^eb^saddassa anto ^b^u^eb^ttamāpajjate ^b^sa nā^eb^iccetesu vacanesu. ^b^utta^eb^miti bhāvaniddeso katthaci abhāvadassanattho. brahmunā, brahmehi brahmebhi.
[03] ^b^jhala^eb^saññehi ivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi parassa ^b^sa^eb^iccetassa vacanassa ^b^no^eb^iccādeso hoti vā. brahmuno brahmassa, brahmānaṃ brahmūnaṃ vā, ^b^utta^eb^miti yogavibhāgena aññatthāpi uttaṃ.
[03] pañcamiyaṃ nābhāvātideso. brahmunā, brahmehi brahmebhi, brahmuno brahmassa, brahmānaṃ brahmūnaṃ vā.
[03] attā, attāno, bho atta bho attā, bhavanto attāno, attānaṃ attaṃ, attāno.
[03] ^b^nā^eb^mhi ``akammantassa cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^atta^eb^ntassa attaṃ vā. attanā attena vā.

[03] ^b^nābhāvātideseneva^eb^ siddhepi uttarasuttena ekayogamakatvā bhinnayogakaraṇaṃ atthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ, tena ^b^attantata^eb^kārassa ^b^ra^eb^kāro ^b^ja^eb^kāre kvaci. atrajo attajo vā. attanehi attanebhi, attano, attānaṃ.
[03] ^b^sakha^eb^to ^b^ga^eb^ssa ^b^a^eb^kāra ^b^ā^eb^kāra ^b^i^eb^kāra īkāra^b^e^eb^kārādesā honti. ^b^vā^eb^saddena aññasmāpi kvaci ^b^e^eb^kāro. yathā -- bhaddante ise iti.
[03] a ca ā ca i ca ī ca e cātipi e, pubbassarānaṃ kamena lopo.
[03] bho sakha bho sakhā bho sakhi bho sakhī bho sakhe, bhavanto sakhāno sakhāyo sakhino.
[03] ^b^sakha^eb^ntassa ^b^āro^eb^ bhoti vā ^b^sunaṃ aṃ^eb^iccetesu paresu. sakhāraṃ sakhānaṃ sakhaṃ, sakhāno sakhāyo sakhino, sakhinā.
[03] ^b^sakha^eb^ntassa ^b^āro^eb^ hoti vā ^b^hi^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. sakhārehi sakhārebhi, sakhehi sakhebhi.
[03] ^b^i^eb^kārādese ``jhalato sassa no vā''ti ^b^no^eb^. sakhino sakhissa, sakhārānaṃ sakhīnaṃ.
[03] ^b^smā^eb^vacanassa ^b^nā^eb^bhāvo. sakhinā, sakhārehi sakhārebhi sakhehi sakhebhi, sakhino sakhissa, sakhārānaṃ sakhīnaṃ.
[03] ^b^ātuma^eb^saddassa paṭhamādutiyāsu ^b^atta^eb^saddasseva rūpanayo. ātumā, ātumāno, bho ātuma bho ātumā, bhavanto ātumāno, ātumānaṃ ātumaṃ, ātumāno, ātumena iccādi ^b^purisa^eb^samaṃ.
[03] ^b^puma^eb^ntassa savibhattissa ^b^aṃ^eb^ hoti ālapanekavacane pare. he pumaṃ, he pumāno, pumaṃ, pumāno.
[03] ^b^puma^eb^ntassa ^b^āu^eb^ādesā honti vā ^b^nā^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. ^b^ca^eb^saddena pumakammathāmantassa cu'kāro vā ^b^sasmā^eb^su. pumānā pumunā pumena vā.

[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^yuvamaghavā^eb^dīnamantassa vā ^b^ānā^eb^deso hoti sabbavibhattīsu. ``u nāmhi cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena pumantassukāro vā ^b^sasmā^eb^su vibhattīsu. ``jhalato sassa no vā''ti ^b^no^eb^. pumuno pumassa, pumānaṃ.
[03] ^b^jhala^eb^iccetehi ^b^smā^eb^vacanassa ^b^nā^eb^ hoti. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ kvaci nivattanatthaṃ. pumānā pumunā pumā pumasmā pumamhā, pumānehi pumānebhi pumehi pumebhi, pumuno pumassa, pumānaṃ.
[03] ^b^puma^eb^ntassa savibhattissa ^b^āne^eb^ādeso hoti vā smiṃmhi vibhattimhi. pumāne pume pumasmiṃ pumamhi.
[03] ``pumantassā simhī''ti ettha ^b^anta^eb^ggahaṇena ākāro, ``hivibhattimhi cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ānā^eb^deso ca.
[02] yuvā yuvāno, yuvānā yuvā, he yuva he yuvā he yuvāna he yuvānā, bhavanto yuvānā, yuvānaṃ yuvaṃ, yuvāne yuve.

[02] yuvānā yuvena yuvānena vā, yuvānehi yuvānebhi yuvehi yuvebhi, yuvānassa yuvassa, yuvānānaṃ yuvānaṃ, yuvānā yuvānasmā yuvānamhā, yuvānehi yuvānebhi yuvehi yuvebhi, yuvānassa yuvassa, yuvānānaṃ yuvānaṃ, yuvāne yuvānasmiṃ yuvānamhi yuve yuvamhi yuvasmiṃ, yuvānesu yuvāsu yuvesu.
[03] ^b^gha^eb^saññaka^b^ā^eb^kāravajjito liṅgassanto saro rassamāpajjate ekavacanesu ^b^yo^eb^su ca paresūti rassattaṃ. ^b^api^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ^b^si^eb^mhi nivattanatthaṃ. sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
[02] sā tiṭṭhanti, he sa he sā, he sā, saṃ, se, sena, sāhi sābhi, sassa sāya, sānaṃ, sā sasmā samhā, sāhi sābhi, sassa, sānaṃ, se sasmiṃ samhi, sāsu.
[03] ^b^aggi^eb^ssa anto ^b^ini^eb^ hoti vā ^b^si^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. ``sesato lopaṃ gasipī''ti ^b^si^eb^lopo. aggini aggi.
[03] ^b^ghapa^eb^saññehi itthivācakehi ākārivaṇṇuvaṇṇehi, ^b^jhala^eb^saññehi ca paresaṃ ^b^yo^eb^vacanānaṃ lopo hoti vā. vavatthitavibhāsāyaṃ.
[03] liṅgassantabhūtā sabbe rassasarā ^b^yo^eb^su katanikāralopesu dīghamāpajjante. katā ^b^ni^eb^kāralopā yesaṃ te ^b^katanikāralopā^eb^. aggī.
[03] ālapanepevaṃ. he aggi, he aggī he aggayo.
[03] ^b^jhalapa^eb^iccetehi parassa ^b^aṃ^eb^vacanassa, ^b^ma^eb^kārassa ca niggahītaṃ ādeso hoti. aggiṃ.
[03] aggī aggayo, agginā, aggīhi aggībhi, ``sunaṃhisu cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena katthaci dīghābhāvo. aggihi aggibhi.
[03] ``jhalato sassa no vā''ti ^b^no^eb^. aggino aggissa, aggīnaṃ.
[03] ``smā nā''ti vattamāne ``jhalato cā''ti vikappena ^b^nā^eb^. agginā aggismā aggimhā, aggīhi aggībhi aggihi aggibhi, aggino aggissa, aggīnaṃ agginaṃ, aggimhi aggismiṃ, aggīsu aggisu.
[21] joti pāṇi gaṇṭhi muṭṭhi, kucchi vatthi sāli vīhi.
[22] byādhi odhi bodhi sandhi, rāsi kesi sāti dīpi..
[21] isi ^a^M0.0069^ea^ muni maṇi dhani yati giri ravi kavi,
[27] kapi asi masi nidhi vidhi ahi kimi pati.
[26] hari ari timi kali bali jaladhi gahapati,
[03] ``agho rassamekavacanayosvapi cā''ti rassatte sampatte etthevā^b^pi^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^si^eb^smiṃ tadabhāve siddhe niyamatthamāha.
[03] ^b^si^eb^smiṃ napuṃsakavajjitāni liṅgāni na rassamāpajjanteti rassattābhāvo, ^b^si^eb^lopo. daṇḍī tiṭṭhati.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^yo^eb^naṃ sālapanānaṃ ^b^jha^eb^to katarassā paresaṃ ^b^no^eb^iccādeso hoti. daṇḍino tiṭṭhanti.
[03] ``agho rassa''ntiādināva siddhepi rassatte punārambho niyamattho, tena ``bho go''tiādīsu na bhavati. daṇḍī daṇḍino.
[03] dutiyāyaṃ rassatte kate ``a''miti vattate, ``ghapato smiṃ yaṃ vā''ti ito maṇḍūkagatiyā ``vā''ti vattate.
[03] ^b^jha^eb^to katarassā parassa ^b^aṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^naṃ^eb^ hoti vā. daṇḍinaṃ daṇḍiṃ, daṇḍī daṇḍino, daṇḍinā, daṇḍīhi daṇḍībhi, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, daṇḍīnaṃ.
[03] ``jhalato cā''ti ^b^nā^eb^. daṇḍinā daṇḍismā daṇḍimhā, daṇḍīhi daṇḍībhi, daṇḍino daṇḍissa, daṇḍīnaṃ.
[03] ``jhato, katarassā''ti ca vattate, pure viya ``vā''ti ca.
[03] ^b^jha^eb^to katarassā parassa ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^ni^eb^iccādeso hoti vā. daṇḍini daṇḍismiṃ daṇḍimhi, daṇḍīsu.
[21] dhammī saṅghī ñāṇī hatthī, cakkī pakkhī dāṭhī raṭṭhī.
[22] chattī mālī vammī yogī, bhāgī bhogī kāmī sāmī..
[21] dhajī gaṇī sasī kuṭṭhī, jaṭī yānī sukhī sikhī.
[22] dantī mantī karī cāgī, kusalī musalī balī..
[02] gāmaṇī, gāmaṇī gāmaṇino, bho gāmaṇi, bhonto gāmaṇī bhonto gāmaṇino, gāmaṇinaṃ gāmaṇiṃ, gāmaṇī gāmaṇino.
[03] bahuvacane ``ghapato ca yonaṃ lopo''ti ^b^yo^eb^lopo, ``yosu kata''iccādinā dīgho. te bhikkhū.

[03] ^b^la^eb^saññato paresaṃ ^b^yo^eb^vacanānaṃ ^b^vo^eb^kārādeso hoti vā. ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^yo^eb^naṃ ^b^no^eb^ ca hoti. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇaṃ katthaci nivattanatthaṃ. atha vā ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ noggahaṇānuvattanatthaṃ, tena ^b^jantusabbaññū^eb^ādito ^b^yonaṃ no^eb^ ca hoti. ^b^vā^eb^saddo vavatthitavibhāsattho. tena --
[22] vibhāsā na ca vo no ca, amuppabhutito bhave..
[03] ^b^ve vo^eb^iccetesu ca paresu akatarasso ^b^lo^eb^ attamāpajjate. bhikkhavo, bho bhikkhu, bhavanto bhikkhū.
[03] akatarassā ^b^la^eb^to parassa ālapane vihitassa ^b^yo^eb^iccetassa ^b^ve vo^eb^ādesā honti. ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ. bhavanto bhikkhave bhikkhavo. ``aṃ mo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī''ti niggahītaṃ.

[02] bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhū bhikkhavo, bhikkhunā, bhikkhūhi bhikkhūbhi bhikkhuhi bhikkhubhi, bhikkhuno bhikkhussa, bhikkhūnaṃ ^a^M0.0073^ea^ bhikkhunaṃ, bhikkhunā bhikkhusmā bhikkhumhā, bhikkhūhi bhikkhūbhi bhikkhuhi bhikkhubhi, bhikkhuno bhikkhussa, bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunaṃ, bhikkhumhi bhikkhusmiṃ, bhikkhūsu bhikkhusu.
[03] evaṃ setu ketu rāhu bhānu paṅgu ucchu veḷu maccu sindhu bandhu neru meru sattu kāru hetu jantu ruru paṭu iccādayo.
[02] hetu, hetū hetavo hetuyo, bho hetu, bhonto hetū hetave hetavo, hetuṃ, hetū hetavo hetuyo. sesaṃ ^b^bhikkhu^eb^samaṃ.
[02] jantu, jantū jantavo. ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇena yonaṃ no ca hoti. jantuno jantuyo, bho jantu, jantū jantave jantavo, jantuṃ, jantū jantavo jantuno jantuyo iccādi.
[03] ^b^satthu pitu mātu bhātu dhītu kattu^eb^iccevamādīnamanto ^b^ā^eb^ttamāpajjate ^b^si^eb^smiṃ, ^b^si^eb^lopo ca hoti. satthā.
[03] ^b^satthu pitā^eb^dīnamanto ^b^si^eb^vacanato aññesu vacanesu ^b^āra^eb^ttamāpajjate. ^b^āratta^eb^mitibhāvaniddesena katthaci aniyamaṃ dasseti.

[03] ālapane ``akārapitādyantānamā''ti ^b^āttaṃ^eb^. ``ge rassa''nti adhikicca ``ākāro vā''ti vikappena rassattaṃ, ^b^va^eb^lopo. bho sattha bho satthā, bhavanto satthāro, satthāraṃ, satthāre satthāro.
[03] tato ^b^ārā^eb^desato ^b^nā^eb^vacanassa ^b^ā^eb^kārādeso hoti. satthārā, satthunāti ^b^āratta^eb^mitibhāvaniddesena siddhaṃ. satthārehi satthārebhi.
[03] ^b^satthu pitu^eb^iccevamādīnamantassa ^b^u^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā ^b^sa^eb^smiṃ, ^b^sa^eb^lopo ca hoti. ^b^ārā^eb^desāpavādoyaṃ. satthu, aññattha bhāvaniddesenārābhāvo. satthussa satthuno.
[03] ^b^satthu^eb^saddantassa, ^b^pitā^eb^dīnamantassa ca ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi, puna ^b^satthu^eb^ggahaṇaṃ satthuno niccavidhānatthaṃ. satthānaṃ.
[03] ``amhatumhanturājabrahmattasakhasatthupitādīhi smā nāvā''ti ^b^smā^eb^vacanassa^b^nā^eb^bhāvo. satthārā, satthārehi satthārebhi, satthu satthuno satthussa, satthārānaṃ satthānaṃ.
[03] tato ^b^ārā^eb^desato ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^i^eb^kārādeso hoti. puna ^b^tato^eb^ggahaṇena aññasmāpi ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^i^eb^kāro. yathā -- bhuvi, divi.

[02] evaṃ kattā, kattāro, bho katta bho kattā, bhavanto kattāro, kattāraṃ, kattāre kattāro, kattārā, kattārehi kattārebhi. ``u sasmiṃ salopo cā''ti ^b^u^eb^ttaṃ, salopo ca. kattu kattuno kattussa, kattārānaṃ kattānaṃ kattūnaṃ kattunaṃ, kattārā, kattārehi kattārebhi, kattu kattuno kattussa, kattārānaṃ kattānaṃ kattūnaṃ kattunaṃ, kattari, kattāresu, ^b^ārā^eb^bhāve kattūsu kattusu.
[07] bhattu vattu netu sotu, ñātu jetu chettu bhettu. dātu dhātu nattu boddhu, viññāpetu ādayopi.

[03] ^b^sakamandhātu^eb^iccevamādīnamanto ca ^b^u^eb^ttamāpajjate ^b^sa^eb^smiṃ, ^b^sa^eb^lopo ca, niccaṃ punabbidhānā. sakamandhātu viya assa rājino vibhavo, sesaṃ samaṃ. evaṃ mahāmandhātuppabhutayo.

[03] ^b^pitā^eb^dīna^b^mārā^eb^deso rassamāpajjate a^b^si^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. ^b^si^eb^smiṃ ^b^ārā^eb^desābhāvepi ^b^asimhī^eb^ti adhikavacanamatthantaraviññāpanatthaṃ, tena ^b^to^eb^ādimhi ^b^pitā^eb^dīnamikāro ca. yathā -- pitito, mātito, bhātito, dhītito, pitipakkho, mātipakkhoti.

[02] pitaro, sesaṃ ^b^kattu^eb^samaṃ. bho pita bho pitā, bhavanto pitaro, pitaraṃ, pitare pitaro, pitarā pitunā, pitarehi pitarebhi. bhāvaniddesena ^b^ārā^eb^desābhāve pitūhi pitūbhi pituhi pitubhi, pitu pituno pitussa, pitarānaṃ pitānaṃ pitūnaṃ, dīghābhāve pitunaṃ vā, pitarā, pitarehi pitarebhi pitūhi pitūbhi pituhi pitubhi, pitu pituno pitussa, pitarānaṃ pitānaṃ pitūnaṃ pitunaṃ, pitari, pitaresu pitūsu pitusu.
[03] tatheva ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti, ^b^si^eb^lopo. so abhibhū, ^b^yo^eb^lope kate te abhibhū.
[03] ``agho rassa''ntiādinā rassattaṃ, ^b^vo^eb^kāro. katarassattā ^b^a^eb^ttābhāvo. abhibhuvo, bho abhibhu, bhavanto abhibhū abhibhuvo.

[03] katarassattā ^b^ve^eb^ādeso na hoti. sesaṃ ^b^bhikkhu^eb^saddasamaṃ, rassattameva viseso. abhibhuṃ, abhibhū abhibhuvo ^a^M0.0078^ea^, abhibhunā, abhibhūhi abhibhūbhi, abhibhuno abhibhussa, abhibhūnaṃ iccādi.
[03] evaṃ sayambhū, vessabhū, parābhibhū, sahabhūādayo. ^b^sahabhū^eb^saddassa ^b^yo^eb^naṃ ^b^no^eb^ādesova viseso. sahabhū, sahabhū sahabhuvo sahabhuno iccādi.

[03] tathā ^b^sabbaññū^eb^saddassa ^b^yo^eb^sveva viseso. so sabbaññū te sabbaññū, ^b^yo^eb^lopābhāve rassattaṃ, ``lato vokāro cā''ti ettha ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^yo^eb^naṃ ^b^no^eb^ādeso. ^b^vā^eb^dhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā na ca ^b^vo^eb^kāro. sabbaññuno, bho sabbaññu, bhonto sabbaññū sabbaññuno, sabbaññuṃ, sabbaññū sabbaññuno iccādi.
[03] evaṃ maggaññū dhammaññū atthaññū kālaññū rattaññū mattaññū kataññū tathaññū viññū vidū vedagū pāragū iccādayo.

[03] ^b^go^eb^iccetassa ^b^o^eb^kārassa ^b^āvā^eb^deso hoti ^b^yo^eb^su. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^nā smā smiṃsu^eb^iccetesu ca. ``tato yonamo tū''ti ettha ^b^tu^eb^ggahaṇena yonamokāro, saralopādi. gāvo tiṭṭhanti.

[03] ^b^go^eb^iccetassa ^b^o^eb^kārassa ^b^āva ava^eb^iccete ādesā honti ^b^aṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. seddena ^b^yo nā sa smāsmiṃsu^eb^iccetesu ca ^b^avā^eb^deso hoti. gavo gacchanti, he go, he gāvo he gavo.

[03] ^b^āva^eb^iccetassa ^b^gāvā^eb^desassa antasarassa ^b^u^eb^kārādeso hoti vā ^b^aṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. āvassa a āva, tassa ^b^āva^eb^saddantassa. ``aṃmo''tiādinā niggahītaṃ. gāvuṃ gāvaṃ gavaṃ, gāvo gavo.
[03] ^b^su hi nā^eb^iccetesu sabbassa ^b^go^eb^saddassa ^b^goṇā^eb^deso hoti vā. ^b^ca^eb^saddena sesesu ca. goṇo, goṇā, he goṇa he goṇā, goṇaṃ, goṇe, goṇena, goṇehi goṇebhi, goṇassa.
[03] sabbassa ^b^go^eb^saddassa ^b^goṇā^eb^deso hoti vā ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. goṇānaṃ, goṇā goṇasmā goṇamhā, goṇehi goṇebhi, goṇassa, goṇānaṃ, goṇe goṇasmiṃ goṇamhi, goṇesu.
[03] ``go āva se''iti tipadamidaṃ. gossa o go, ^b^go^eb^saddokārassa ^b^āvā^eb^deso hoti ^b^se^eb^ vibhattimhi. gāvassa gavassa.

[03] tato ^b^go^eb^saddato parassa ^b^naṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^aṃ^eb^ādeso hoti, ^b^go^eb^saddokārassa ^b^avā^eb^deso ca ^b^pati^eb^mhi pare alutte ca samāse. ^b^ca^eb^saddena asamāsepi ^b^aṃ avā^eb^desā. gavaṃpatissa therassa, gavaṃ.
[03] ``suhināsu cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena naṃmhi ^b^gu^eb^ādeso. ``no ca dvādito naṃmhī''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^na^eb^kārāgamo ca. gunnaṃgonaṃ vā.
[02] gāvā gāvamhā gāvasmā gavā gavamhā gavasmā, gohi gobhi, gāvassa gavassa, gavaṃ gunnaṃ gonaṃ, gāve gāvamhi gāvasmiṃ gave gavamhi gavasmiṃ, gāvesu gavesu gosu.
[21] puriso guṇavā rājā, sā'ggi daṇḍī ca bhikkhu ca.
[02] asmā ^a^M0.0103^ea^ nasmā tasmā namhā tamhā, nehi nebhi tehi tebhi, assa nassa tassa, nesaṃ tesaṃ nesānaṃ tesānaṃ, asmiṃ nasmiṃ tasmiṃ namhi tamhi, nesu tesu.
[03] itthiyaṃ ``tā si'' itīdha ^b^sā^eb^desa^b^si^eb^lopā. sā kaññā, nattaṃ. nā tā nāyo tāyo, naṃ taṃ, nā tā nāyo tāyo, nāya tāya, nāhi tāhi nābhi tābhi.
[03] ``etimāsamī''ti ito ^b^etimā^eb^ggahaṇañca ``tassā vā''ti ito ^b^ta^eb^ggahaṇañca pañcamiyantavasena vattate ``vā''ti ca.
[03] tato ^b^tā etā imā^eb^to parassa ^b^sa^eb^ssa vibhattissa ^b^ssāyā^eb^deso hoti vā.
[03] ^b^tā^eb^iccetassa itthiyaṃ vattamānassa antassa ^b^i^eb^kāro hoti vā ^b^saṃ sā^eb^svekavacanesu vibhattādesesu. tissāya tassāya assāya nassāya assā nassā tissā tassā nāya tāya, nāsaṃ tāsaṃ.
[03] pañcamīchaṭṭhīsu tatiyācatutthīsamaṃ. sattamiyaṃ assaṃ nassaṃ tissaṃ tassaṃ nāyaṃ tāyaṃ, nāsu tāsu.
[03] napuṃsake ^b^si^eb^mhi^b^sā^eb^desābhāvā nattaṃ. naṃ taṃ, nāni tāni, naṃ taṃ, nāni tāni, nena tena iccādi pulliṅgasamaṃ.
[03] ^b^eta si,^eb^ ``etatesaṃ to''ti ^b^sa^eb^kārādeso. eso puriso, ete, etaṃ, ete iccādi ^b^sabba^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] itthiyaṃ ^a^M0.0104^ea^ ^b^etā si, sā^eb^deso. esā kaññā, etā etāyo, etaṃ, etā etāyo, etāya, etāhi etābhi.
