[03] antāpekkhāyaṃ chaṭṭhī, ^b^etā imā^eb^iccetesamanto saro ^b^i^eb^kāro hoti ^b^saṃsā^eb^svekavacanesu vibhattādesesu. ^b^sā^eb^desagatikattā ^b^ssāyā^eb^desepi. ^b^ca^eb^saddādhikārato ^b^aññekā^eb^saddādīnamantassa ca.
[02] etissāya etissā etāya, etāsaṃ etāsānaṃ, etāya, etāhi etābhi, etissāya etissā etāya, etāsaṃ etāsānaṃ, etissaṃ etāyaṃ, etāsu.
[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddato aññissā aññāya, aññissaṃ aññāyaṃ. ekissā ekāya, ekissaṃ ekāyaṃ. itarissā itarāya, itarissaṃ itarāyaṃ iccādi.
[03] napuṃsake etaṃ, etāni, etaṃ, etāni, sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
[03] ^b^ima^eb^saddassa sabbasseva anapuṃsakassa ^b^ayaṃ^eb^ādeso hoti ^b^si^eb^mhi vibhattimhi, ^b^si^eb^lopo. ayaṃ puriso, ime, imaṃ, ime.
[03] ^b^ima^eb^saddassa sabbasseva ^b^ana imi^eb^ādesā honti ^b^nā^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. anitthiliṅgassevetaṃ gahaṇaṃ. anena iminā.
[03] sabbassa ^b^ima^eb^saddassa ^b^e^eb^kāro hoti vā ^b^su naṃ hi^eb^iccetesu vacanesu.
[03] ^b^ima^eb^saddassa ca sabbasseva ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā ^b^sa smā smiṃsaṃ sā^eb^iccetesu vacanesu sabbattha liṅgesu.
[02] assa imassa, esaṃ esānaṃ imesaṃ imesānaṃ, asmā imasmā imamhā, ehi ebhi imehi imebhi, assa imassa, esaṃ esānaṃ imesaṃ imesānaṃ, asmiṃ imasmiṃ imamhi, esu imesu.

[02] ayaṃ kaññā, imā imāyo, imaṃ, imā imāyo, imāya, imāhi imābhi. catutthiyaṃ ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ, ^b^i^eb^kāra- ^b^ssāyā^eb^desā ^a^M0.0106^ea^ ca, assāya imissāya assā imissā imāya, imāsaṃ imāsānaṃ. sattamiyaṃ assaṃ imissaṃ imissā vā, ``tesu vuddhilopā''dinā ^b^smiṃ^eb^vacanassa vā ^b^sā^eb^deso. imāyaṃ, imāsu. sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ.
[03] napuṃsake vattamānassa sabbasseva ^b^ima^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^idaṃ^eb^ hoti vā ^b^aṃ si^eb^su paresu.
[03] idaṃ cittaṃ virocati, imaṃ, imāni, idaṃ pupphaṃ passasi, imaṃ, imāni, anena iminā, ehi ebhi imehi imebhi iccādi pulliṅge viya ñeyyaṃ.
[03] sabbato sabbanāmato paro ^b^ka^eb^iccayamāgamo hoti vā. puna ^b^sabbato^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^hīnā^eb^ditopi ^b^ko^eb^. ``amussa mo sa''nti vinādhikārena yogena ^b^ka^eb^kārepi ^b^sā^eb^deso.
[03] asuko ^a^M0.0107^ea^, asukā, asukaṃ. ^b^sā^eb^desābhāve amuko, amukā, amukaṃ iccādi.
[03] bahuvacane ``lato vokāro cā''ti sutte anuvattamāna^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^vo^eb^kāro na hoti, niccaṃ ^b^yo^eb^lopo, dīgho ca.

[02] amū purisā, amuṃ, amū, amunā, amūhi amūbhi amuhi amubhi, amussa. ``amussādu''nti vinādhikārena yogena ^b^aduṃ^eb^ādeso, adussa, amūsaṃ amūsānaṃ amusaṃ amusānaṃ, amusmā amumhā, amūhi amūbhi amuhi amubhi, amussa adussa, amūsaṃ amūsānaṃ amusaṃ amusānaṃ, amusmiṃ amumhi, amūsu amusu.
[02] asu kaññā asukā amukā vā, amū amuyo, amuṃ, amū amuyo, amuyā, amūhi amūbhi, amussā amuyā, amūsaṃ amūsānaṃ, amuyā, amūhi amūbhi, amussā amuyā, amūsaṃ amūsānaṃ, amussaṃ amuyaṃ amuyā, amūsu.
[03] napuṃsake vattamānassa sabbasseva ^b^amu^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^aduṃ^eb^ hoti ^b^aṃsi^eb^su paresu. aduṃ pupphaṃ, amū amūni, aduṃ, amū amūni, amunā iccādi pulliṅgasamaṃ.
[03] ``kissa ^a^M0.0108^ea^ ka ve cā''ti ito ``kissa, ka''iti ca vattate.

[03] ^b^ki^eb^miccetassa ^b^ka^eb^saddo ādeso hoti ^b^va^eb^ppaccayato sesesu vibhattibhedesu. ettha ca ``kissa ka ve cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^va^eb^ppaccayāvasiṭṭha ^b^tha^eb^mādippaccayānaṃ gahitattā ^b^sesa^eb^ggahaṇena vibhattiyova gayhante. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ katthaci nivattanatthaṃ, tena ``kissa, kismi''ntiādi ca sijjhati. ``so''ti ^b^si^eb^ssa ^b^o,^eb^ saralopādi.
[02] ko eso, ke, kaṃ, ke, kena, kehi kebhi, kassa kissa, niggahītalopādi, kesaṃ kesānaṃ, kasmā kamhā, kehi kebhi, kassa kissa, kesaṃ kesānaṃ, kasmiṃ kismiṃ kamhi kimhi, kesu.
[03] itthiyaṃ ``kiṃ si''itīdha ``sesesu cā''ti vibhattiyaṃ parāyaṃ ^b^kā^eb^dese kate ``itthiyamato āppaccayo''ti majjhe ^b^ā^eb^ppaccayo, ^b^si^eb^lopo.
[03] kā esā kaññā, kā kāyo, kaṃ, kā kāyo iccādi ^b^sabbā^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] napuṃsake ^b^kiṃ si,^eb^ lopavidhissa balavatarattā paṭhamaṃ ^b^si^eb^lope kate puna vibhattiparattābhāvā, ``tadanuparodhenā''ti paribhāsato vā ^b^kā^eb^desābhāvo. kiṃ etaṃ, kāni.
[03] dutiyekavacane ``kvaci lopa''nti niggahītalope kate ``aṃmo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī''ti niggahītaṃ. kiṃ, kāni iccādi pulliṅgasamaṃ.

[03] ^b^eka^eb^saddo ^a^M0.0109^ea^ saṅkhyātulyāsahāyaññavacano. yadā saṅkhyāvacano, tadā sabbatthekavacanantova, aññattha bahuvacanantopi. eko, ekā, ekaṃ iccādi sabbattha ^b^sabba^eb^saddasamaṃ. ^b^saṃsā^eb^sveva viseso.

[03] ``ubha yo'' itīdha ``tato yonamo tū''ti ettha ^b^tu^eb^ggahaṇena kvaci ^b^yo^eb^namokāro. ubho purisāubhe vā, ubho purise ubhe. ^b^su hi^eb^su ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā kvaci ekārassokāro. ubhohi ubhobhi ubhehi ubhebhi.
[03] ubhinnaṃ, ubhohi ubhobhi ubhehi ubhebhi, ubhinnaṃ, ubhosu ubhesu.

[03] ^b^dvi^eb^iccetassa saṅkhyāsaddassa itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānassa savibhattissa ^b^dve^eb^iccādeso hoti ^b^yo^eb^su paresu. ^b^ca^eb^saddena duve ca, kvaci duvi ca ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi. ^b^bahuvacanu^eb^ccāraṇaṃ ^b^dvi^eb^saddato ^a^M0.0110^ea^ bahuvacanameva hotīti ñāpanatthaṃ. dve dhammā, dve itthiyo, dve rūpāni, duve vā, evaṃ dutiyāyampi, dvīhi dvībhi.

[03] ^b^dvi^eb^iccevamādito saṅkhyāto ^b^na^eb^kārāgamo hoti ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena itthiyaṃ ^b^ti ca tu^eb^saddato ^b^ssa^eb^ñcāgamo ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. dvinnaṃ duvinnaṃ vā, dvīhi dvībhi, dvinnaṃ duvinnaṃ, dvīsu.

[03] ^b^ti catu^eb^nnaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^tisso catasso tayo cattārotīṇi cattāri^eb^iccete ādesā honti ^b^yo^eb^su paresu. tayo purisā, tayo purise passa, tīhi tībhi.
[03] ^b^ti^eb^iccetasmā saṅkhyāsaddā parassa ^b^naṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^iṇṇaṃ iṇṇannaṃ^eb^iccete ādesā honti, saralopādi. tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ, tīhi tībhi, tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ, tīsu.
[03] itthiyaṃ ^a^M0.0111^ea^ tisso itthiyo, tisso, tīhi tībhi, ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi ^b^ssa^eb^ñcāgamo, tissannaṃ, ^b^ssaṃ^eb^byavadhānato ^b^iṇṇā^eb^bhāvo, sesaṃ samaṃ.

[03] tathā ^b^catu^eb^saddassapi yosu ``ticatunna''ntiādinā yathāvuttādeso, ``tato yonamo tū''ti ettha ^b^tu^eb^saddena kvaci ^b^o^eb^kāro ca. cattāro caturo vā, cattāro caturo, catūhi catūbhi catubbhi, catunnaṃ, ^b^na^eb^kārāgamo. catūhi catūbhi catubbhi, catunnaṃ, catūsu.
[03] itthiyaṃ catasso, catasso, ^b^naṃ^eb^mhi ^b^ssa^eb^ñcāgamo, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā caturukārassa ^b^a^eb^kāro. catassannaṃ. sesaṃ samaṃ.
[03] tesaṃ panāliṅgattā tīsu liṅgesu samānarūpaṃ. ^b^``tumhamha''^eb^iti ṭhite ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti.

[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumhāmha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^tvaṃahaṃ^eb^iccete ādesā honti ^b^si^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^tumha^eb^ssa ^b^tuva^eb^ñca hoti. tvaṃ pumā, tvaṃ itthī, tvaṃ napuṃsakaṃ, tuvaṃ satthā vā. ahaṃ pumā, ahaṃ itthī, ahaṃ napuṃsakaṃ.
[03] bahuvacane ``sabbanāmakārate paṭhamo''ti ^b^e^eb^kāro. tumhe tiṭṭhatha, bhiyyo amhe mahemase.
[03] sabbassa ^b^amha^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^mayaṃ^eb^ādeso hoti ^b^yo^eb^mhi paṭhame. mayaṃ gacchāma.
[03] ettha ca ekasmimpi gāravabahumānena bahuttasamāropā bahuvacanaṃ hoti.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ^b^tavaṃ mamaṃ^eb^iccete ādesā honti navā yathākkamaṃ ^b^aṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. tavaṃ, mamaṃ passa.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ^b^taṃ maṃ^eb^iccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ ^b^aṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. taṃ, maṃ.
[03] sabbassa ^b^tumha^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^tuvaṃtvaṃ^eb^iccete ādesā honti ^b^aṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. tuvaṃ tvaṃ.
[03] ^b^tumhamhe^eb^hi paro appaṭhamo ^b^yo ākaṃ^eb^ hoti vā. tumhākaṃ passāmi, tumhe passāmi, amhākaṃ passasi, amhe passasi.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ^b^tayā mayā^eb^iccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ ^b^nā^eb^mhi vibhattimhi.
[03] ^b^tayā tayi^eb^iccetesaṃ ^b^ta^eb^kāro ^b^tva^eb^ttamāpajjate vā. tvayā tayā, mayā, tumhehi tumhebhi, amhehi amhebhi.
[03] ^b^tumhamhe^eb^hi ^b^sa^eb^ssa vibhattissa ^b^amā^eb^deso hoti vā. tumhaṃ, amhaṃ dīyate.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^tavamama^eb^iccete ādesā honti ^b^se^eb^ vibhattimhi, vikappenāyaṃ vijjhantarassa vijjamānattā.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^tuyhaṃmayhaṃ^eb^iccete ādesā ca honti ^b^se^eb^ vibhattimhi. tava, mama tuyhaṃ, mayhaṃ vā dīyate.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^amha^eb^saddassa savibhattissa ^b^mamaṃ^eb^ādeso hoti ^b^se^eb^ vibhattimhi. mamaṃ dīyate.
[03] ^b^tumhamhe^eb^hi parassa ^b^naṃ^eb^vacanassa ^b^āka^eb^miccādeso hoti, ^b^a^eb^ñca. ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^amha^eb^ssa kvaci ^b^asmā^eb^deso. tumhaṃ tumhākaṃ, amhaṃ amhākaṃ asmākaṃ vā.

[03] pañcamiyaṃ ``amhatumhanturāja''iccādinā ^b^smā^eb^vacanassa ^b^nā^eb^bhāvātideso. tayā, mayā apeti, tumhehi, amhehi tumhebhi amhebhi, tumhaṃ amhaṃ tava mama, tuyhaṃ, mayhaṃ mamaṃ pariggaho, tumhaṃ tumhākaṃ, amhaṃ amhākaṃ asmākaṃ dhammatā.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ ^b^tayi mayi^eb^iccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ ^b^smiṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. ^b^ta^eb^kārassa ^b^tva^eb^ttaṃ. tvayi tayi mayi, tumhesu amhesu.
[03] tesaṃ eva ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ padato paresaṃ kvaci ādesantaravidhāne rūpabhedo.

[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ^b^vo no^eb^ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ dutiyācatutthīchaṭṭhīsu bahuvacanesu navā. ettha ca ``ekavacanesū''ti vakkhamānattā ``bahuvacanesū''ti laddhaṃ. pahāya vo gamissāmi, mā no ajja vikantiṃsu, dhammaṃ vo bhikkhave desissāmi, saṃvibhajetha no rajjena, tuṭṭhosmi vo pakatiyā, satthā no bhagavā anuppatto.
[03] ^b^navā^eb^ti kiṃ? bhayaṃ tumhāka no siyā, eso amhākaṃ satthā.

[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ^b^te me^eb^ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ catutthīchaṭṭhīsu ekavacanesu ^a^M0.0116^ea^ navā. dadāmi te gāmavarāni pañca, dadāhi me gāmavaraṃ, idaṃ te raṭṭhaṃ, ayaṃ me putto.
[03] ^b^navā^eb^ti kiṃ? idaṃ cīvaraṃ tuyhaṃ vikappanatthāya dammi, suṇātha vacanaṃ mama.
[27] vo no te meti ye ime.
[21] na socāmi na rodāmi, tava sutvāna māṇava.
[03] evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ mamañceva tumhākañcāti.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ^b^te me^eb^ādesā na honti ^b^aṃ^eb^mhi vibhattimhi. passeyya taṃ vassasataṃ ārogyaṃ. so mamabravīti.

[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ^b^te me^eb^ ādesā honti vā yathākkamaṃ tatiyekavacane pare ^a^M0.0117^ea^. kataṃ te pāpaṃ, kataṃ tayā pāpaṃ, kataṃ me puññaṃ, kataṃ mayā puññaṃ.
[03] sabbesaṃ ^b^tumha amha^eb^saddānaṃ savibhattīnaṃ padasmā paresaṃ ^b^vo no^eb^ādesā honti vā yathākkamaṃ tatiyābahuvacane pare. kataṃ vo kammaṃ, kataṃ no kammaṃ.
[03] ^b^bahuvacana^eb^niddesena kvaci ^b^yo^eb^mhi paṭhame ca ^b^vo no^eb^ honti. gāmaṃ vo gaccheyyātha, gāmaṃ no gaccheyyāma.
[03] tathā ^b^pañcā^eb^dīna^b^maṭṭhārasa^eb^ntānaṃ, ^b^kati^eb^saddassa cāliṅgattā tiliṅgepi samānarūpaṃ, aliṅgattā eva ^b^pañcā^eb^dito itthippaccayābhāvo.
[03] ``yosu dvinnaṃ dve cā''ti ito ``yosū''ti vattate, ``itthipumanapuṃsakasaṅkhya''nti ca.

[03] antāpekkhāyaṃ chaṭṭhī, ^b^pañcā^eb^dīnaṃ ^b^aṭṭhārasa^eb^ntānaṃ saṅkhyānaṃ itthipumanapuṃsake vattamānānamantassa savibhattissa ^b^a^eb^kāro hoti ^b^yo^eb^su paresu. ^b^ā e^eb^ādesāpavādoyaṃ, pañcakkhandhā, pañca gatiyo, pañca indriyāni. evaṃ dutiyāyañca.

[03] ^b^pañcā^eb^dīna^b^maṭṭhārasa^eb^ntānaṃ saṅkhyānamanto ^b^a^eb^ttamāpajjate ^b^su naṃ hi^eb^iccetesu paresu. ^b^e^eb^ttadīghāpavādoyaṃ. pañcahi pañcabhi ^a^M0.0118^ea^, pañcannaṃ, pañcahi pañcabhi, pañcannaṃ, pañcasu. evaṃ ^b^cha sa tta aṭṭhanava dasa^eb^saddā.
[03] ``ekañca dasa cā''ti atthe dvandasamāse, ``ekena adhikā dasā''ti atthe tappurise vā kate
[03] ^b^dviekāṭṭha^eb^iccetesamanto ^b^ā^eb^kāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne uttarapade pare. vavatthitavibhāsāyaṃ. ^b^e^eb^kādasa, dvādasa, aṭṭhārasa.
[03] ^b^ekā^eb^dito saṅkhyāto parassa dasassa ādissa ^b^da^eb^ssa ^b^ra^eb^kāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne. sesaṃ samaṃ. ekārasa, ekādasa.
[03] dve ca dasa ca, dvīhi vā adhikā dasāti dvidasa itīdha --
[03] ^b^vīsati dasa^eb^iccetesu paresu ^b^dvi^eb^saddassa ^b^bā^eb^ hoti vā. ^b^tu^eb^saddena ^b^tiṃsā^eb^yampi. ^b^ra^eb^kāro, ^b^ā^eb^ttañca. bārasa, dvādasa.
[03] tayo ca dasa ca, tīhi vā adhikā dasāti terasa. ettha ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^ti^eb^saddassa ^b^te^eb^ādeso ānavutiyā.
[03] cattāro ^a^M0.0119^ea^ ca dasa ca, catūhi vā adhikā dasāti catuddasa iccatra --
[03] 256 ^b^.^eb^ ^b^catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādi cassa cu copi navā^eb^.

[03] gaṇane ^b^dasa^eb^ssādimhi ṭhitassa ^b^catu^eb^iccetassa upapadassa ^b^tu^eb^saddo lopo hoti, uttarapadādimhi ṭhitassa ^b^catū^eb^papadassa ^b^ca^eb^kārassa ^b^cu co^eb^ādesā honti navā. cuddasa, coddasa, catuddasa.
[03] ^b^api^eb^ggahaṇena anupapadassāpi gaṇane padādi^b^ca^eb^kārassa lopo, ^b^cu co^eb^ honti navā. yathā -- tālīsaṃ, cuttālīsaṃ, cottālīsaṃ, cattālīsaṃ.
[03] pañca ca dasa ca, pañcahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe pañcadasa. ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^pañca^eb^saddassa ^b^dasa vīsatīsu^eb^ kvaci ^b^pannapaṇṇa^eb^ādesā. pannarasa, paṇṇarasa.
[03] cha ca dasa ca, chahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe chadasa itīdha --
[03] ^b^laḷā^eb^namaviseso ^a^M0.0120^ea^. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, tena ``soḷasa'' iti niccaṃ, ``teḷasa, terasa, cattālīsaṃ, cattārīsa''miti vibhāsā, dasa pannarasādīsu na ca hoti.
[03] satta ca dasa ca, sattahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe sattarasa, sattadasa.
[03] aṭṭha ca dasa ca, aṭṭhahi vā adhikā dasāti atthe aṭṭhadasa itīdha ^b^ā^eb^tte kate --
[03] ^b^aṭṭhā^eb^dito ca ^b^dasa^eb^saddassa ^b^da^eb^kārassa ^b^ra^eb^kāro hoti vā saṅkhyāne. aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa.
[03] niccaṃ ^b^yo^eb^lopādi, rassattaṃ, kati tiṭṭhanti, kati passasi, katihi katibhi, katinaṃ, katihi katibhi, katinaṃ, katisu.
[03] tesaṃ panāliṅgattā, nipātattā ca tiliṅge, vacanadvaye ca samānaṃ rūpaṃ.
[03] sabbasmā suddhanāmato, sabbanāmato ca liṅgamhā kvaci ^b^to^eb^paccayo hoti pañcamyatthe.
[03] ^b^to^eb^ādi yesaṃ ^b^dāni^eb^pariyantānaṃ paccayānaṃ te honti paccayā ^b^tvādayo,^eb^ te paccayā vibhattisaññā honti. tena tadantānampi vibhatyantapadattaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.

[03] purisato, evaṃ rājato vā, corato vā, aggito vā, gahapatito vā, hatthito, hetuto, sabbaññuto, kaññato, yuttito, itthito, bhikkhunito, ettha ca ``kvacādimajjhuttarānaṃ dīgharassāpaccayesu cā''ti ^b^to^eb^paccaye rassattaṃ. yāguto, jambuto, cittato, āyuto iccādi.
[03] sabbanāmato sabbasmā, sabbehīti vā atthe sabbato, evaṃ yato, tato, katarato, katamato, itarato, aññato, ekato, ubhayato, pubbato, parato, aparato, dakkhiṇato, uttarato, amuto.
[03] ^b^ki^eb^miccetassa ^b^ku^eb^ hoti ^b^trato tha^eb^iccetesu ca paresu. kasmā, kehīti vā kuto.
[03] sabbassa ^b^eta^eb^saddassa ^b^a^eb^kāro hoti vā ^b^totha^eb^iccetesu. etasmā, etehīti vā ato.

[03] ``kvaci to''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^ādi^eb^ppabhutīhi ^b^to^eb^ sattamiyatthe. ^b^aniccādī^eb^hi tatiyatthe ca. yathā -- ādimhībhi atthe ādito. evaṃ majjhato, ekato, purato, pacchato, passato, piṭṭhito, pādato, sīsato, aggato, mūlato, parato iccādayo.
[03] ^b^tatiyatthe^eb^ aniccenāti aniccato, aniccato sammasati. evaṃ dukkhato, rogato, gaṇḍato iccādayo.

[03] sabbanāmehi parā ^b^tra tha^eb^iccete paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. sabbasmiṃ, sabbesu cāti sabbatra sabbattha. evaṃ ^a^M0.0123^ea^ yatra yattha, tatra tattha, itaratra itarattha, aññatra aññattha, ubhayatra ubhayattha, paratra parattha, kutra kuttha, ``tratothesu cā''ti ^b^ku^eb^ttaṃ. ``kissa ka ve cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^kā^eb^deso. kattha, amutra amuttha.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^eta^eb^saddassa ^b^a^eb^kāro hoti niccaṃ ^b^tre^eb^ pare. atra. ``sabbassetassākāro vā''ti ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ, ^b^``e^eb^ tothesu cā''ti ^b^e^eb^kāro, attha, ettha.
[03] ``kvaci, atthe, sattamiyā''ti ca adhikāro, sabbasminti atthe --

[03] ^b^ki^eb^miccetassa ^b^ka^eb^saddo ādeso hoti ^b^va^eb^ppaccayepare. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^thaha^eb^mādiavappaccayepi. ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^ka^eb^kāre ^b^a^eb^kārassa lopo ca ^b^va^eb^mhi. kva gatosi tvaṃ.
[03] ^b^ki^eb^miccetasmā ^b^hiṃ haṃ hiñcanaṃ^eb^iccete paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe.
[03] ^b^ki^eb^miccetassa ^b^ku^eb^ hoti ^b^hiṃ haṃ^eb^ iccetesu. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^hiñcanaṃdācana^eb^miccādīsupi. kisminti kuhiṃ, kuhaṃ, kuhiñcanaṃ, kahaṃ ^b^kā^eb^deso.
[03] ^b^ta^eb^iccetasmā ca sabbanāmato ^b^hiṃhaṃ^eb^paccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. tasminti tahiṃ, tahaṃ.
[03] ^b^ima^eb^saddato ^b^hadha^eb^ppaccayā honti kvaci sattamyatthe. ``imassi tha''ntiādinā ^b^i^eb^kāro. imasminti iha, idha.
[03] ^b^ya^eb^iccetasmā sabbanāmato ^b^hiṃ^eb^paccayo hoti kvaci sattamyatthe. yasminti yahiṃ.
[03] ^b^kiṃ sabbāññaekaya^eb^iccetehi sabbanāmehi ^b^dā^eb^paccayo hoti. ^b^ku^eb^iccetasmā ^b^dācana^eb^ñca kāle kvaci sattamyatthe.
[03] ``kissa ka ve cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena kādeso, kadā.
[03] ^b^sabba^eb^iccetassa saddassa ^b^sa^eb^saddādeso hoti vā ^b^dā^eb^paccaye pare. sabbasmiṃ kāleti sadā, sabbadā.
[03] evaṃ aññadā, ekadā, yadā, kasmiṃ kāleti kudācanaṃ, ``ku hiṃhaṃsu cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ku^eb^ttaṃ, ^b^``ku''^eb^iti nipātanena vā.
[03] ^b^ta^eb^iccetasmā sabbanāmato ^b^dānidā^eb^paccayā honti kāle kvaci sattamyatthe. tasmiṃ kāleti tadāni, tadā.
[03] ^b^ima^eb^saddato ^b^rahi dhunā dāni^eb^iccete paccayā honti kāle kvaci sattamyatthe.
[03] sabbassa ^b^ima^eb^saddassa ^b^etā^eb^deso hoti ^b^rahi^eb^mhi paccaye pare. imasmiṃ kāleti etarahi.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^ima^eb^saddassa ^b^a^eb^kāro hoti ^b^dhunā^eb^paccaye pare. adhunā, ^b^ima^eb^saddassa ^b^i^eb^kāro. imasmiṃ kāleti idāni.
[03] pa parā ni nī u du saṃ vi ava anu pari adhi abhi pati su ā ati api apa upa iti ^b^pīsati upasaggā^eb^.

[03] tattha ^b^pa^eb^saddo pakārā'dikamma padhāni'ssariya'ntobhāvaviyoga tappara bhusattha sambhavatitti anāvila patthanādīsu. ^b^pa^eb^iti ayamupasaggo etesu pakārādīsu atthesu vattati, yathā -- ^b^pakāre^eb^ paññā, ^b^ādikamme^eb^ vippakataṃ, ^b^padhāne^eb^ paṇītaṃ, padhānaṃ padhānattaṃ, ^b^issariye^eb^ pabhū ayaṃ desassa, ^b^antobhāve^eb^ pakkhittaṃ, ^b^viyoge^eb^ pavāsī, ^b^tappare^eb^ pācariyo, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ pavuddhakāyo, ^b^sambhave^eb^ himavatā gaṅgā pabhavati, ^b^tittiyaṃ^eb^ pahūtamannaṃ, ^b^anāvile^eb^ pasannamudakaṃ, ^b^patthane^eb^ paṇihitaṃ.

[03] ^b^parā^eb^iti ^a^M0.0127^ea^ parihāni parājaya gativikkamā'masanādīsu. yathā -- ^b^parihāniyaṃ^eb^ parābhavo, ^b^parājaye^eb^ parājito, ^b^gatiyaṃ^eb^ parāyanaṃ. ^b^vikkame^eb^ parakkamati, ^b^āmasane^eb^ aṅgassa parāmasanaṃ.

[03] ^b^ni^eb^iti nissesa niggata nīharaṇa'ntopavesanā'bhāvanisedha nikkhanta pātubhāvā'vadhāraṇa vibhajana upamū'padhāraṇā'vasānachekādīsu. ^b^nissese^eb^ nirutti, niravasesaṃ deti, ^b^niggate^eb^ nikkileso, niyyāti, ^b^nīharaṇe^eb^ niddhāraṇaṃ, ^b^antopavesane^eb^ nikhāto, ^b^abhāve^eb^ nimmakkhikaṃ, ^b^nisedhe^eb^ nivāreti, ^b^nikkhante^eb^ nibbāno, nibbānaṃ, ^b^pātubhāve^eb^ nimmitaṃ, ^b^avadhāraṇe^eb^ nicchayo, ^b^vibhajane^eb^ niddeso, ^b^upamāyaṃ^eb^ nidassanaṃ, ^b^upadhāraṇe^eb^ nisāmanaṃ, ^b^avasāne^eb^ niṭṭhitaṃ, ^b^cheke^eb^ nipuṇo.

[03] ^b^u^eb^iti uggatu'ddhakamma padhāna viyoga sambhava atthalābhasatti sarūpakathanādīsu. ^b^uggate^eb^ uggacchati, ^b^uddhakamme^eb^ āsanā uṭṭhito, ukkhepo, ^b^padhāne^eb^ uttamo, lokuttaro, ^b^viyoge^eb^ ubbāsito, ^b^sambhave^eb^ ubbhūto, ^b^atthalābhe^eb^ uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ^b^sattiyaṃ^eb^ ussahati gantuṃ, ^b^sarūpakathane^eb^ uddisati suttaṃ.

[03] ^b^du^eb^iti asobhanā'bhāvakucchitā'samiddhi kiccha virūpatādīsu. ^b^asobhane^eb^ duggandho, ^b^abhāve^eb^ dubbhikkhaṃ, ^b^kucchite^eb^ dukkaṭaṃ, ^b^asamiddhiyaṃ^eb^ dussassaṃ, ^b^kicche^eb^ dukkaraṃ, ^b^virūpatāyaṃ^eb^ dubbaṇṇo, dummukho.

[03] ^b^saṃ^eb^iti samodhāna sammāsama samantabhāvasaṅgata saṅkhepabhusattha sahattha appattha pabhavā'bhimukhabhāva saṅgaha pidhāna punappunakaraṇa samiddhādīsu. ^b^samodhāne^eb^ sandhi, ^b^sammāsamesu^eb^ samādhi ^a^M0.0128^ea^, sampayutto, ^b^samantabhāve^eb^ saṃkiṇṇā samullapanā, ^b^saṅgate^eb^ saṅgamo, ^b^saṅkhepe^eb^ samāso, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ sāratto, ^b^sahatthe^eb^ saṃvāso, ^b^appatthe^eb^ samaggho. ^b^pabhave^eb^ sambhavo, ^b^abhimukhabhāve^eb^ sammukhaṃ, ^b^saṅgahe^eb^ saṅgaṇhāti, ^b^pidhāne^eb^ saṃvutaṃ, ^b^punappunakaraṇe^eb^ sandhāvati, ^b^samiddhiyaṃ^eb^ sampanno.

[03] ^b^vi^eb^iti visesa vividha viruddha vigata viyoga virūpatādīsu. ^b^visese^eb^ vimutti visiṭṭho, ^b^vividhe^eb^ vimati vicitraṃ, ^b^viruddhe^eb^ vivādo, ^b^vigate^eb^ vimalaṃ, ^b^viyoge^eb^ vippayutto, ^b^virūpatāyaṃ^eb^ virūpo.

[03] ^b^ava^eb^iti adhobhāga viyoga paribhava jānana suddhi nicchayadesa theyyādīsu. ^b^adhobhāge^eb^ avakkhittacakkhu, ^b^viyoge^eb^ omukkaupāhano avakokilaṃ vanaṃ, ^b^paribhave^eb^ avajānanaṃ avamaññati, ^b^jānane^eb^ avagacchati, ^b^suddhiyaṃ^eb^ vodānaṃ, ^b^nicchaye^eb^ avadhāraṇaṃ, ^b^dese^eb^ avakāso, ^b^theyye^eb^ avahāro.

[03] ^b^anu^eb^iti anugatā'nupacchinna pacchattha bhusattha sādissa hīnatatiyattha lakkhaṇi'tthambhūtakkhāna bhāga vicchādīsu. ^b^anugate^eb^ anveti, ^b^anupacchinne^eb^ anusayo, ^b^pacchāsaddatthe^eb^ anurathaṃ, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ anuratto, ^b^sādisse^eb^ anurūpaṃ. ^b^hīne^eb^ anusāriputtaṃ paññavanto, ^b^tatiyatthe^eb^ nadimanvavasitā senā, ^b^lakkhaṇe^eb^ rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate vijju, ^b^itthambhūtakkhāne^eb^ sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ anu, ^b^bhāge^eb^ yadettha maṃ anusiyā taṃ dīyatu, ^b^vicchāyaṃ^eb^ rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu vijjotate cando.

[03] ^b^pari^eb^iti samantatobhāva pariccheda vajjanā'liṅgana nivāsanapūjābhojanā'vajānana dosakkhāna lakkhaṇādīsu. ^b^samantatobhāve^eb^ parivuto, ^b^paricchede^eb^ pariññeyyaṃ, ^b^vajjane^eb^ pariharati ^a^M0.0129^ea^, ^b^āliṅgane^eb^ parissajati, ^b^nivāsane^eb^ vatthaṃ paridhassati, ^b^pūjāyaṃ^eb^ pāricariyā, ^b^bhojane^eb^ bhikkhuṃ parivisati. ^b^avajānane^eb^ paribhavati, ^b^dosakkhāne^eb^ paribhāsati, ^b^lakkhaṇādīsu^eb^ rukkhaṃ pari vijjotate vijjuiccādi.

[03] ^b^adhi^eb^iti adhiki'ssa'rūparibhāvā'dhibhavanajjhāyanā'dhiṭṭhānanicchayapāpuṇanādīsu. ^b^adhike^eb^ adhisīlaṃ, ^b^issare^eb^ adhipati, adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, ^b^uparibhāve^eb^ adhirohati, pathaviṃ adhisessati, ^b^adhibhavane^eb^ adhibhavati, ^b^ajjhāyane^eb^ byākaraṇamadhīte, ^b^adhiṭṭhāne^eb^ bhūmikampādiṃ adhiṭṭhāti, ^b^nicchaye^eb^ adhimokkho, ^b^pāpuṇane^eb^ bhogakkhandhaṃ adhigacchati.

[03] ^b^abhi^eb^iti abhimukhabhāva visiṭṭhā'dhi ku'ddhakamma kula sāruppavandana lakkhaṇi'tthambhūtakkhāna vicchādīsu. ^b^abhimukhabhāve^eb^ abhimukho abhikkamati, ^b^visiṭṭhe^eb^ abhidhammo, ^b^adhike^eb^ abhivassati, ^b^uddhakamme^eb^ abhiruhati, ^b^kule^eb^ abhijāto, ^b^sāruppe^eb^ abhirūpo, ^b^vandane^eb^ abhivādeti, ^b^lakkhaṇādīsu^eb^ purimasamaṃ.

[03] ^b^pati^eb^iti patigata paṭilomapatinidhi patidāna nisedhanivattana sādissa patikaraṇā'dāna patibodha paṭicca lakkhaṇi'tthambhūtakkhāna bhāgavicchādīsu. ^b^patigate^eb^ paccakkhaṃ, ^b^paṭilome^eb^ patisotaṃ, ^b^patinidhimhi^eb^ ācariyato pati sisso, ^b^patidāne^eb^ telatthikassa ghataṃ pati dadāti, ^b^nisedhe^eb^ paṭisedhanaṃ, ^b^nivattane^eb^ paṭikkamati, ^b^sādisse^eb^ patirūpakaṃ, ^b^patikaraṇe^eb^ patikāro, ^b^ādāne^eb^ patiggaṇhāti, ^b^patibodhe^eb^ paṭivedho, ^b^paṭicce^eb^ paccayo, ^b^lakkhaṇādīsu^eb^ purimasamaṃ.

[03] ^b^su^eb^iti sobhana suṭṭhusammā samiddhi sukhatthādīsu. ^b^sobhane^eb^ sugandho, ^b^suṭṭhusammādatthesu^eb^ suṭṭhu gato sugato, sammā gatotipi sugato, ^b^samiddhiyaṃ^eb^ subhikkhaṃ, ^b^sukhatthe^eb^ sukaro.

[03] ^b^ā^eb^iti ^a^M0.0130^ea^ abhimukhabhāvu'ddhakamma mariyādā'bhividhi patti'cchāparissajana ādikammaggahaṇa nivāsa samīpa'vhānādīsu. ^b^abhimukhabhāve^eb^ āgacchati, ^b^uddhakamme^eb^ ārohati, ^b^mariyādāyaṃ^eb^ āpabbatā khettaṃ, ^b^abhividhimhi^eb^ ākumāraṃ yaso kaccāyanassa, ^b^pattiyaṃ^eb^ āpattimāpanno, ^b^icchāyaṃ^eb^ ākaṅkhā, ^b^parissajane^eb^ āliṅganaṃ, ^b^ādikamme^eb^ ārambho, ^b^gahaṇe^eb^ ādīyati ālambati, ^b^nivāse^eb^ āvasatho, ^b^samīpe^eb^ āsannaṃ, ^b^avhāne^eb^ āmantesi.
[03] ^b^ati^eb^iti abhikkamanā'tikkantā'tisaya bhusatthādīsu. ^b^atikkamane^eb^ atirocati amhehi, atīto, ^b^atikkante^eb^ accantaṃ, ^b^atisaye^eb^ atikusalo, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ atikkodho ativuddhi.

[03] ^b^api^eb^iti sambhāvanā'pekkhā samuccaya garaha pañhādīsu. ^b^sambhāvanāyaṃ^eb^ api dibbesu kāmesu, merumpi vinivijjhitvā gaccheyya, ^b^apekkhāyaṃ^eb^ ayampi dhammo aniyato, ^b^samuccaye^eb^ itipi arahaṃ, antampi antaguṇampi ādāya, ^b^garahe^eb^ api amhākaṃ paṇḍitaka, ^b^pañhe^eb^ api bhante bhikkhaṃ labhittha.

[03] ^b^apa^eb^iti apagata garaha vajjana pūjā padussanādīsu. ^b^apagate^eb^ apamāno apeto, ^b^garahe^eb^ apagabbho, ^b^vajjane^eb^ apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, ^b^pūjāyaṃ^eb^ vuddhāpacāyī, ^b^padussane^eb^ aparajjhati.

[03] ^b^upa^eb^iti upagamana samīpū'papatti sādissā'dhikū'paribhāvā'nasana dosakkhāna saññā pubbakamma pūjā gayhākāra bhusatthādīsu. ^b^upagamane^eb^ nisinnaṃ vā upanisīdeyya, ^b^samīpe^eb^ upanagaraṃ, ^b^upapattiyaṃ^eb^ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati, atha vā ^b^upapatti^eb^ yutti, yathā ^a^M0.0131^ea^-- upapattito ikkhatīti upekkhā, ^b^sādisse^eb^ upamānaṃ upamā, ^b^adhike^eb^ upa khāriyaṃ doṇo, ^b^uparibhāve^eb^ upasampanno, ^b^anasane^eb^ upavāso, ^b^dosakkhāne^eb^ paraṃ upapadati, ^b^saññāyaṃ^eb^ upadhā upasaggo, ^b^pubbakamme^eb^ upakkamo upakāro, ^b^pūjāyaṃ^eb^ buddhupaṭṭhāko, mātupaṭṭhānaṃ, ^b^gayhākāre^eb^ soceyyapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ, ^b^bhusatthe^eb^ upādānaṃ, upāyāso, upanissayoti. iti anekatthā hi upasaggā.
[21] ``upasagga nipātā ca, paccayā ca ime tayo.
[03] tattha upasaggānaṃ nāmākhyātavisesakattā liṅgasaññāyaṃ aniyamena syādimhi sampatte tesaṃ saṅkhyākammādibhedābhāvā tehi paṭhamekavacanameva bhavati.

[03] ^b^āvuso^eb^saddato, upasagganipātehi ca sabbāsaṃ parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo hoti. ^b^ādi^eb^saddena kvaci ^b^suttapadā^eb^dīhi ca. ettha ca ^b^āvuso^eb^timassa visuṃ gahaṇaṃ sasaṅkhyattadīpanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] paharaṇaṃ pahāro, evaṃ parābhavo, nivāso, nīhāro, uhāro, duhāro, saṃhāro, vihāro, avahāro, anuhāro, parihāro, adhihāro, abhihāro, patihāro, suhāro, āhāro, atihāro, apihāro, apahāro ^a^M0.0132^ea^, upahāro. paharati, parābhavati, nivasati, nīharati, uddharati iccādi yojetabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^na no mā a alaṃ halaṃ^eb^ iccete paṭisedhanatthe.
[03] tattha atha khalu vata vatha atho assu yagghe hi carahi naṃ taṃ vā ca tuva vo pana have kīva ha tato yathā sudaṃ kho ve haṃ enaṃ seyyathidaṃ iccevamādīni padapūraṇāni.
[03] ^b^āvuso ambho hambho re are hare je^eb^iccete āmantane.
[03] ^b^sayaṃ sāmaṃ saṃ sammā kinti^eb^ iccete tatiyatthe, ^b^soto dhā^eb^paccayantā ca. suttaso padaso aniccato dukkhato ekadhā dvidhā iccādi.
[03] ^b^tave tuṃ^eb^paccayantā catutthiyā, kātave dātave kātuṃ kāretuṃ dātuṃ dāpetuṃ iccādi.
[03] ^b^so to^eb^paccayantā pañcamiyatthe, dīghaso oraso rājato vā corato vā iccādi.
[03] ^b^to^eb^ sattamyatthepi, ^b^trathā^eb^dipaccayantā ca. ekato purato pacchato passato piṭṭhito pādato sīsato aggato mūlato yatra yattha yahiṃ tatra tattha tahiṃ tahaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^samantā sāmantā parito abhito samantato ekajjhaṃ ekamantaṃ heṭṭhā upari uddhaṃ adho tiriyaṃ^eb^ ^b^sammukhā^eb^ ^a^M0.0134^ea^ ^b^parammukhā āvi raho tiro uccaṃ nīcaṃ anto antarā ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā bāhirā bāhiraṃ bahi oraṃ pāraṃ ārā ārakā pacchā pure huraṃ pecca^eb^ iccete sattamiyā.

[03] ^b^sampati āyati ajja aparajju parajja suve sve parasuve hiyyo pare sajju sāyaṃ pāto kālaṃ kallaṃ divā nattaṃ niccaṃ satataṃ abhiṇhaṃ abhikkhaṇaṃ muhuṃ muhuttaṃ bhūtapubbaṃ purā yadā tadā kadā^eb^ iccādayo kālasattamiyā. iti vibhattiyuttāni.
[03] avibhattiyuttesu ca ^b^appeva appevanāma nu^eb^ iccete saṃsayatthe.
[03] ^b^addhā aññadatthu taggha jātu kāmaṃ sasakkaṃ^eb^iccete ekaṃsatthe.
[03] ^b^yāva tāva yāvatā tāvatā kittāvatā ettāvatā kīva^eb^ iccete paricchedanatthe.
[03] ^b^evaṃ sāhu lahu opāyikaṃ patirūpaṃ āma sādhu^eb^ iti sampaṭicchanatthe.

[03] ^b^yathā tathā yatheva tatheva evaṃ evameva evamevaṃ evampi yathāpi seyyathāpi seyyathāpināma viya iva yathariva tathariva yathānāma tathānāma yathāhi tathāhi yathācatathāca^eb^ iccete paṭibhāgatthe.
[03] yathā -- passituna passiya passitvāna passitvā disvā disvānadassetvā dātuna datvāna datvā upādāya dāpetvā viññāpetvā viceyya vineyya nihacca samecca apecca upecca ārabbha āgamma iccādi.
[03] evaṃ nāmākhyātopasaggavinimuttaṃ yadabyayalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ nipātapadanti veditabbaṃ.
[22] nepātikanti taṃ vuttaṃ, yaṃ abyaya salakkhaṇa''nti..
[03] tattha ekampi atthaṃ kammādivasena, ekattādivasena ca vibhajantīti ^b^vibhattiyo,^eb^ syādayo. tā pana paṭhamādibhedena sattavidhā.

[03] liṅgassa attho ^b^liṅgattho^eb^. ettha ca līnaṃ aṅganti liṅgaṃ, apākaṭo avayavo, purisotiādīnañhi pakatippaccayādivibhāgakappanāya nipphāditānaṃ saddappatirūpakānaṃ nāmikapadānaṃ paṭhamaṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ pakatirūpaṃ apākaṭattā, avayavattā ca liṅganti vuccati. atha vā visadāvisadobhayarahitākāravohārasaṅkhātena tividhaliṅgena sahitatthassa, tabbinimuttassupasaggādīnamatthassa ca līnassa gamanato, liṅganato vā liṅganti anvatthanāmavasena vā ``dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṃ liṅga''nti vacanato parasamaññāvasena vā liṅganti idha pāṭipadikāparanāmadheyyaṃ ^b^syā^eb^divibhatyantapadapakatirūpameva vuccatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] liṅgassattho nāma pabandhavisesākārena pavattamāne rūpādayo upādāya paññāpīyamāno tadaññānaññabhāvena anibbacanīyo samūhasantānādibhedo upādāpaññattisaṅkhāto ghaṭapaṭādivohārattho ca pathavīdhātuphassādīnaṃ sabhāvadhammānaṃ ^a^M0.0138^ea^ kāladesādibhedabhinnānaṃ vijātiyavinivatto sajātiyasādhāraṇo yathāsaṅketamāropasiddho tajjāpaññattisaṅkhāto kakkhaḷattaphusanādisāmaññākāro ca.

[03] so pana kammādisaṃsaṭṭho, suddho cāti duvidho. tattha kammādīsu dutiyādīnaṃ vidhīyamānattā kammādisaṃsaggarahito liṅgasaṅkhyāparimāṇayutto, tabbinimuttupasaggādipadatthabhūto ca suddho saddattho idha ^b^liṅgattho^eb^ nāma.
[03] yo pana ākhyātakitakataddhitasamāsehi vutto kammādisaṃsaṭṭho attho, sopi dutiyādīnaṃ puna attanā vattabbassa atthavisesassābhāvena avisayattā, liṅgatthamattassa sambhavato ca paṭhamāyeva visayo.
[03] saliṅge tāva -- eso puriso, ete purisā, esā kaññā, etā kaññāyo, etaṃ cittaṃ, etāni cittāni.
[03] liṅgādivinimutte sattāmatte -- ca vā ha ahaṃ atthi sakkālabbhā iccādi.
[03] ``liṅgatthe paṭhamā''ti adhikicca ``ālapane cā''ti ālapanatthe ca paṭhamā, abhimukhaṃ katvā lapanaṃ ālapanaṃ, āmantanaṃ avhānanti attho.

[03] ettha ca āmantanaṃ nāma pageva laddhasarūpassa saddena abhimukhīkaraṇaṃ, katābhimukho pana ``gacchā''tiādinā nayena kriyāya ^a^M0.0139^ea^ yojīyati, tasmā āmantanasamaye kriyāyogābhāvato idaṃ kārakavohāraṃ na labhati.
[03] bho purisa ehi, bho purisā vā, bhavanto purisā etha.
[03] anabhihite evāyaṃ, ``kammani dutiyāyaṃ tto''ti vacanañcettha ñāpakaṃ.
[03] ``yena vā kayirate taṃ karaṇa''nti ito ``vā''ti vattate.
[03] yaṃ vā karoti, yaṃ vā vikaroti, yaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ kammasaññaṃ hoti.

[03] idha liṅgakālavacanamatantaṃ. karīyatīti ^b^kammaṃ^eb^. tattha kārakaṃ, sādhakaṃ kriyānipphattiyā kāraṇamuccate, taṃ pana ^b^kārakaṃ^eb^ chabbidhaṃ kammaṃ kattā karaṇaṃ sampadānamapādānamokāso cāti. tattha sabhāvato, parikappato vā kammādimhi satiyeva kriyābhāvato kammādīnaṃ channampi kārakavohāro siddhova hoti.

[03] taṃ ^a^M0.0140^ea^ pana ^b^kammaṃ^eb^ tividhaṃ nibbattanīyaṃ vikaraṇīyaṃ pāpaṇīyañcāti. yathā -- mātā puttaṃ vijāyati, āhāro sukhaṃ janayati. ghaṭaṃ karoti devadatto, kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṃ karoti, suvaṇṇaṃ keyūraṃ, kaṭakaṃ vā karoti, vīhayo lunāti. devadatto nivesanaṃ pavisati, ādiccaṃ passati, dhammaṃ suṇāti, paṇḍite payirupāsati.
[03] ettha ca icchitānicchitakathitākathitādibhedamanapekkhitvā sabbasaṅgāhakavasena ``yaṃ karoti taṃ kamma''nti vuttattā, atthantaravikappanavādhikārato ca sabbattha imināva kammasaññā hoti.
[03] tattha ^b^anicchitakammaṃ^eb^ yathā -- kaṇṭakaṃ maddati, visaṃ gilati, gāmaṃ gacchanto rukkhamūlaṃ upagacchati.

[03] ^b^akathitakammaṃ^eb^ yathā -- yaññadattaṃ kambalaṃ yācate brāhmaṇo. ettha hi ``kambala''miti kathitakammaṃ dvikammikāya yācanakriyāya pattumicchitatarattā. ``yaññadatta''miti appadhānattā akathitakammaṃ. tathā samiddhaṃ dhanaṃ bhikkhate, ajaṃ gāmaṃ nayati, parābhavantaṃ purisaṃ, mayaṃ pucchāma gotamaṃ, bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca iccādi.
[03] ^b^abhihitakamme^eb^ pana na hoti, yathā -- kaṭo karīyate devadattena, sugatena desito dhammo, yaññadatto kambalaṃ yācīyate brāhmaṇena iccādi.
[03] 286^b^.^eb^ gati ^a^M0.0141^ea^ buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṃ kārite vāb^.

[03] ^b^gamu sappa^eb^ gatimhi, ^b^budha^eb^ bodhane, ^b^budha^eb^ avagamane vā, ^b^bhuja^eb^ pālanabyavaharaṇesu, ^b^paṭha^eb^ byattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, ^b^hara^eb^ haraṇe, ^b^kara^eb^ karaṇe, ^b^si^eb^ saye iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge kārite sati payojjakakattubhūte kammani liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā. niccasampatte vikappatthoyaṃ, tena tassa pakkhe tatiyā hoti.

[03] yo koci puriso gāmaṃ gacchati, tamañño payojayati. puriso purisaṃ gāmaṃ gamayati, purisena vā gāmaṃ gamayati. evaṃ sissaṃ dhammaṃ bodheti ācariyo, mātā puttaṃ bhojanaṃ bhojayati, sissaṃ dhammaṃ pāṭheti ācariyo, puriso purisaṃ bhāraṃ hāreti, tathā puriso purisaṃ kammaṃ kārayati, purisena vā kammaṃ kārāpayati, puriso purisaṃ sayāpayati. evaṃ sabbattha kārite kattukammani dutiyā.
[03] abhihite na bhavati, purisena puriso gāmaṃ gamīyate, sisso dhammaṃ bodhīyate iccādi.
[03] accantaṃ nirantaraṃ saṃyogo^b^accantasaṃyogo^eb^. kāladdhānaṃ dabbaguṇakriyāhi accantasaṃyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi liṅgehi dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
[03] ^b^kāle^eb^ tāva -- sattāhaṃ gavapānaṃ, māsaṃ maṃsodanaṃ, saradaṃ ramaṇīyā nadī, sabbakālaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ nandanaṃ, māsaṃ sajjhāyati, tayo māse abhidhammaṃ desesi.
[03] ^b^addhāne^eb^ ^a^M0.0142^ea^ -- yojanaṃ vanarāji, yojanaṃ dīgho pabbato, kosaṃ sajjhāyati.
[03] ^b^accantasaṃyoge^eb^ti kiṃ? māse māse bhuñjati, yojane yojane vihāraṃ patiṭṭhāpesi.
[03] kammappavacanīyehi nipātopasaggehi yutte yoge sati liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
[03] kammaṃ pavacanīyaṃ yesaṃ te ^b^kammappavacanīyā,^eb^ parasamaññāvasena vā anvādayo kammappavacanīyā.

[03] tattha ^b^anu^eb^saddassa lakkhaṇe, sahatthe, hīne ca kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā. yathā -- pabbajitamanu pabbajiṃsu, nadimanvavasitā bārāṇasī, nadiyā saha avabaddhāti attho, anu sāriputtaṃ paññavā.
[03] lakkhaṇādīsu ``lakkhaṇi'tthambhūtakkhānabhāga vicchāsu pati pari anavo''ti pati pari anūnaṃ kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā.
[03] ^b^lakkhaṇe^eb^ sūriyuggamanaṃ pati dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṃ, rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ pari, rukkhaṃ anu.
[03] ^b^itthambhūtakkhāne^eb^ sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ pati, mātaraṃ pari, mātaraṃ anu.
[03] ^b^bhāge^eb^ yadettha maṃ pati siyā, maṃ pari, maṃ anu, taṃ dīyatu.
[03] ^b^vicchāyoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0143^ea^ atthamatthaṃ pati saddo nivisati, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ pari, rukkhaṃ rukkhaṃ anu.
[03] ``abhirabhāge''ti abhissa bhāgavajjitesu lakkhaṇādīsu kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā. taṃ kho pana bhavantaṃ gotamaṃ evaṃ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato, sādhu devadatto mātaraṃ abhi.

[03] chaṭṭhīnaṃ atthe kvaci dutiyāvibhatti hoti. antarāabhito parito pati paṭibhātiyoge ayaṃ. antarā ca rājagahaṃ antarā ca nāḷandaṃ addhānamaggappaṭipanno, rājagahassa ca nāḷandāya ca majjheti attho. abhito gāmaṃ vasati, parito gāmaṃ vasati, nadiṃ nerañjaraṃ pati, nerañjarāya nadiyā samīpeti attho. paṭibhantu taṃ cunda bojjhaṅgā, upamā maṃ paṭibhāti, upamā mayhaṃ upaṭṭhahatīti attho.
[03] tatiyāsattamīnamatthe ca kvaci liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
[03] ^b^tatiyatthe^eb^ sace maṃ nālapissati, tvañca maṃ nābhibhāsasi, vinā saddhammaṃ kuto sukhaṃ, upāyamantarena na atthasiddhi.
[03] ^b^sattamiyatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0144^ea^-- kāle, upānvajjhāvasassa payoge, adhisiṭṭhāvasānaṃ payoge, tappānacāre ca dutiyā.
[03] ^b^kāle^eb^ tāva -- pubbaṇhasamayaṃ nivāsetvā, ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā. imaṃ rattiṃ cattāro mahārājāno.

[03] ^b^upā^eb^dipubbassa ^b^vasa^eb^dhātussa payoge -- gāmaṃ upavasati, gāmaṃ anuvasati, vihāraṃ adhivasati, gāmaṃ āvasati, agāraṃ ajjhāvasati. tathā pathaviṃ adhisessati, gāmaṃ adhitiṭṭhati, gāmaṃ ajjhāvasati.
[03] yena vā kattā upakaraṇabhūtena vatthunā kriyaṃ abyavadhānena karoti, yena vā vikaroti, yena vā pāpuṇāti, taṃ kārakaṃ karaṇasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] karīyate anenāti ^b^karaṇaṃ,^eb^ ettha ca satipi sabbakārakānaṃ kriyāsādhakatte ``yena vā kayirate''ti visesetvā vacanaṃ kattūpakaraṇabhūtesu kārakesu sādhakatamasseva gahaṇatthaṃ.
[22] sambhāvīyati taṃ vuttaṃ, karaṇaṃ nāma kāraka''nti..
[03] yathā -- hatthena kammaṃ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṃ passati, manasā dhammaṃ viññāya. dattena vīhayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṃ jhāpeti.

[03] kattari ca kārake liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti. caggahaṇena itthambhūtalakkhaṇe, kriyāpavagge, pubbasadisasamūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missaka sakhilatthādiyoge, kāladdhānesu, paccattakammatthapañcamiyatthādīsu ca tatiyā.
[03] yo kriyaṃ attappadhāno hutvā karoti, so kattusañño hoti.

[03] so tividho suddhakattā hetukattā kammakattāti. tattha yo sayameva kriyaṃ karoti, so ^b^suddhakattā^eb^. yo aññaṃ kātuṃ samatthaṃ akarontaṃ kammaṃ niyojeti, so ^b^hetukattā,^eb^ yathā -- gantuṃ samattho devadatto, tamañño payojeti ``gamayati devadatta''nti.

[03] yaṃ pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto, tamañño payojayati ``gamayati devadatta''nti hetvatthanidassanaṃ, tampi sāmatthiyadassanavasena ^a^M0.0146^ea^ vuttanti gahetabbaṃ. aññathā yadi sayameva gacchati, kiṃ tattha payojakabyāpārena akarontaṃ balena kārayati, pāsāṇaṃ uṭṭhāpayatītiādikañca na sijjheyya.
[03] yo kattāraṃ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā cāti hetukattusaññā.
[03] yo pana parassa kriyaṃ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā sayameva sijjhanto viya hoti, so ^b^kammakattā^eb^ nāma, yathā -- sayaṃ karīyate kaṭo, sayameva paccate odanoti.
[22] appayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati..

[03] nanu ca ``saṃyogo jāyate''tiādīsu kathaṃ pure asato jananakriyāya kattubhāvosiyāti? vuccate -- lokasaṅketasiddho hi saddappayogo, avijjamānampi hi loko saddābhidheyyatāya vijjamānaṃ viya gahetvā voharati ^a^M0.0147^ea^, vikappabuddhigahitākāroyeva hi saddenābhidhīyate, na tu vatthusabhāvo, aññathā sutamayañāṇenapi paccakkhena viya vatthusabhāvasacchikaraṇappasaṅgo ca musāvāda kudiṭṭhivādādīnamabhāvappasaṅgo ca siyā, tasmā buddhiparikappitapaññattivasenapi saddappavatti hotīti asato saṃyogādissapi hoteva jananakriyāya kattukārakatāti.
[21] buddhiyā gahitattā hi, saṃyogo jāyate iti.
[03] tatra ^b^tatiyā^eb^ jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito māro, ahinā daṭṭho naro, buddhena bodhito loko, saddhehi kārito vihāro.
[03] abhihite na bhavati. kaṭaṃ karoti devadatto, kāreti vā.
[03] ^b^itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe^eb^ -- sā bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivissakānaṃ ujjhāpesi, ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpeyya, tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhi.
[03] ^b^apavagge^eb^ -- ekāheneva bārāṇasiṃ pāyāsi, navahi māsehi vihāraṃ niṭṭhāpesi, yojanena adhītaṃ byākaraṇaṃ, ^b^kriyāpavaggo^eb^ti kriyāya āsuṃ pariniṭṭhāpanaṃ.

[03] ^b^pubbādiyoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0148^ea^-- māsena pubbo, pitarā sadiso, mātarā samo, kahāpaṇena ūno, dhanena vikalo, asinā kalaho, ācārena nipuṇo, vācāya nipuṇo, guḷena missakaṃ, tilena missakaṃ, vācāya sakhilo, maṇinā attho, dhanena attho, pitarā tulyo.
[03] ^b^saha saddhiṃ samaṃ nānā vinā alaṃ ki^eb^miccevamādīhi yoge liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena sahatthepi.

[03] tattha ^b^saha^eb^saddena yogo kriyā guṇa dabba samavāye sambhavati. yathā -- vitakkena saha vattati, puttena saha thūlo, antevāsikasaddhivihārikehi saha ācariyupajjhāyānaṃ lābho, nisīdi bhagavā saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena, sahassena samaṃ mitā, sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo, saṅgho vināpi gaggena uposathaṃ kareyya, alaṃ te idha vāsena, kiṃ me ekena tiṇṇena, purisena thāmadassinā, kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ te ajinasāṭiyā.
[03] ^b^sahatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0149^ea^-- devadatto rājagahaṃ pāvisi kokālikena pacchāsamaṇena, dukkho bālehi saṃvāso.
[03] ^b^yoga^eb^ggahaṇamihānuvattate, hetvatthe, hetvatthappayoge ca liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
[03] kismiñci phale diṭṭhasāmatthiyaṃ kāraṇaṃ hetu, soyeva attho, tasmiṃ hetvatthe, annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjāya vasati.
[21] kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo.
[22] kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṃ pāṇimhi ijjhati..
[03] ^b^hetvatthappayoge^eb^ -- kena nimittena, kena payojanena, kenaṭṭhena, kena hetunā vasati.

[03] kāladdhānadisādesādīsu cāyaṃ. tena samayena, tena kālena, kālena dhammassavaṇaṃ, so vo mamaccayena satthā, māsena bhuñjati, yojanena dhāvati. puratthimena dhataraṭṭho, dakkhiṇena virūḷhako, pacchimena virūpakkho, uttarena ^a^M0.0150^ea^ kasivanto janoghamaparena ca, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami iccādi.
[03] yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate, tattha tatiyāvibhatti hoti. ettha ca aṅgamassa atthīti ^b^aṅgaṃ,^eb^ sarīraṃ. akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo.

[03] visesīyati visesitabbaṃ anenāti ^b^visesanaṃ,^eb^ gottādi. tasmiṃ gottanāmajātisippavayoguṇasaṅkhāte visesanatthe tatiyāvibhatti hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^pakati^eb^ādīhi ca. gottena gotamo nātho.
[21] sāriputtoti nāmena, vissuto paññavā ca so.
[03] sippena naḷakāro so, ekūnatiṃso vayasā, vijjāya sādhu, paññāya sādhu, tapasā uttamo, suvaṇṇena abhirūpo.
[03] ^b^pakati^eb^ādīsu -- pakatiyā abhirūpo, yebhuyyena mattikā, samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṃ kiṇāti, sahassena assake kiṇāti iccādi.
[03] 302^b^.^eb^ ^b^yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṃ sampadānaṃ^eb^.
[03] yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṃ kārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti. sammā padīyate assāti ^b^sampadānaṃ,^eb^ paṭiggāhako.

[03] taṃ pana tividhaṃ diyyamānassānivāraṇajjhesanānumativasena. yathā -- buddhassa pupphaṃ yajati, bodhirukkhassa jalaṃ dadāti. ^b^ajjhesane^eb^ -- yācakānaṃ dhanaṃ dadāti. ^b^anumatiyaṃ^eb^ -- bhikkhūnaṃ dānaṃ deti.
[22] sampadānaṃ tidhā vuttaṃ, rukkha yācaka bhikkhavo''ti..
[03] ^b^rocanā^eb^dīsu pana -- samaṇassa rocate saccaṃ, māyasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, yassāyasmato khamati, devadattassa suvaṇṇacchattaṃ dhārayate yaññadatto.

[03] 303^b^.^eb^ ^b^silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhi ssāsūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇapubbakattārocanatthatadattha tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini gatyatthakammani āsisattha sammuti bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca^eb^.

[03] catuppadamidaṃ ^a^M0.0152^ea^. ^b^silāgha^eb^ katthane, ^b^hanu^eb^ apanayane, ^b^ṭhā^eb^ gatinivattimhi, ^b^sapa^eb^ akkose, ^b^dhara^eb^ dhāraṇe, ^b^piha^eb^ icchāyaṃ iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge, ^b^kudha^eb^ kope, ^b^duha^eb^ jighaṃsāyaṃ, ^b^issa^eb^ issāyaṃ, ^b^usūya^eb^ dosāvikaraṇe iccetesaṃ tadatthavācīnañca dhātūnaṃ payoge ca ^b^rādha^eb^ hiṃsāsaṃrādhesu, ^b^ikkha^eb^ dassanaṅkesūti imesaṃ payoge ca ^b^pati ā^eb^pubbassa ^b^su^eb^ savaṇeti imassa ca ^b^anupati^eb^pubbassa ^b^ge^eb^saddeti imassa ca pubbakattā ca ārocanatthappayoge, tadatthe, tumatthe, alamatthappayoge ca maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini ca gatyatthānaṃ kammani ca āsisatthappayoge ca sammuti bhiyyappayogesu ca sattamyatthe cāti taṃ kammādikārakaṃ sampadānasaññaṃ hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena pahiṇatikappati pahoti upamāñjalikaraṇa phāsu atthaseyyappabhutiyoge ca pure viya catutthī.
[03] ^b^silāghādippayoge^eb^ tāva -- buddhassa silāghate. upajjhāyassa silāghate, thometīti attho.
[03] hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatīti attho.
[03] upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṃ vaḍḍhakī, ettha ca upaṭṭhānaṃ nāma upagamanaṃ. bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya.
[03] tuyhaṃ sapate, mayhaṃ sapate, ettha ca ^b^sapanaṃ^eb^ nāma saccakaraṇaṃ.
[03] ^b^dhārayatippayoge^eb^ dhanikoyeva sampadānaṃ, suvaṇṇaṃ te dhārayate, iṇaṃ dhārayatīti attho. tassa rañño mayaṃ nāgaṃ dhārayāma.
[03] ^b^pihappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0153^ea^ icchitoyeva, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, devāpi tesaṃ pihayanti, sambuddhānaṃ satīmataṃ, patthentīti attho.
[03] ^b^kodhādiatthānaṃ payoge^eb^ yaṃ pati kopo, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṃ tassa kuppeyyaṃ.
[03] duhayati disānaṃ megho, yo mittānaṃ na dubbhati.
[03] dujjanā guṇavantānaṃ usūyanti, kā usūyā vijānataṃ.

[03] ^b^rādhikkhappayoge^eb^ yassa vipucchanaṃ kammavikhyāpanatthaṃ, ^b^vā^eb^dhikārato dutiyā ca. ārādho me rañño, rañño aparajjhati, rājānaṃ vā aparajjhati, kyāhaṃ ayyānaṃ aparajjhāmi, kyāhaṃ ayye aparajjhāmi vā.
[03] āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṃ vā.

[03] ^b^paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṃ pubbakattā ca^eb^ suṇotissa dhātussa paccāyoge, giṇassa ca anupatiyoge pubbassa kammuno yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti. yathā -- bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca, ettha ``bhikkhū''ti akathitakammaṃ, ``eta''nti kathitakammaṃ, pubbassa vacanakammassa kattā bhagavā. bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū, tathā bhikkhu janaṃ dhammaṃ sāveti, tassa bhikkhuno jano anugiṇāti, tassa bhikkhuno jano patigiṇāti, sādhukāradānādinā taṃ ussāhayatīti attho.
[21] yo vadeti sa kattāti, vuttaṃ kammanti vuccati.

[03] ^b^ārocanatthappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0154^ea^ yassa āroceti, taṃ sampadānaṃ. ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi vo bhikkhave, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, āmanta kho taṃ gacchāmāti vā. ettha ca ^b^ārocana^eb^saddassa kathanappakāratthattā desanatthādippayogepi catutthī. dhammaṃ vo desessāmi, desetu bhante bhagavā dhammaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, niruttiṃ te pavakkhāmi iccādi.
[03] ^b^a^eb^kārantato liṅgamhā parassa catutthekavacanassa ^b^āyā^eb^deso hoti vā, saralopādi.

[03] buddhassatthāya dhammassatthāya saṅghassatthāya jīvitaṃ pariccajāmi, piṇḍapātaṃ paṭisevāmi neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā, atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattati.
[03] ^b^alaṃ^eb^saddassa atthā arahapaṭikkhepā. ^b^arahatthe^eb^ -- alaṃ me rajjaṃ, alaṃ bhikkhu pattassa, akkhadhutto purisapuggalo nālaṃ dārabharaṇāya, alaṃ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa.
[03] ^b^paṭikkhepe^eb^ ^a^M0.0155^ea^-- alaṃ te idha vāsena, alaṃ me hiraññasuvaṇṇena, kiṃ me ekena tiṇṇena, kiṃ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṃ tettha catumaṭṭhassa.
[03] ^b^maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini^eb^ kammaniyeva -- kaṭṭhassa tuvaṃ maññe, kaḷiṅgarassa tuvaṃ maññe, jīvitaṃ tiṇāyapi na maññamāno.
[03] ^b^anādare^eb^ti kiṃ? suvaṇṇaṃ taṃ maññe. ^b^appāṇinī^eb^ti kiṃ? gadrabhaṃ tuvaṃ maññe.
[03] ^b^gatyatthakammani vā^eb^dhikārato dutiyā ca. appo saggāya gacchati, appo saggaṃ gacchati, nibbānāya vajantiyā, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mūlaṃ paṭikasseyya.

[03] ^b^āsīsanatthe āyubhaddakusalā^eb^diyogeyeva, āyasmato dīghāyu hotu, ``totitā sasmiṃnāsū''ti ^b^ntu^eb^ssa savibhattissa ^b^to^eb^ ādeso. bhaddaṃ bhavato hotu, kusalaṃ bhavato hotu, anāmayaṃ bhavato hotu, sukhaṃ bhavato hotu, atthaṃ bhavato hotu, hitaṃ bhavato hotu, svāgataṃ bhavato hotu, sotthi hotu sabbasattānaṃ.
[03] ^b^sammutippayoge^eb^ -- sādhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanāya.
[03] ^b^sattamiyatthe āvikaraṇa pātubhavanā^eb^diyoge -- tuyhañcassa āvikaromi, tassa me sakko pāturahosi.

[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena ^a^M0.0156^ea^ pahiṇādikriyāyoge, phāsuādināmapayoge ca -- tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṃ dūtaṃ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṃ āyogo, ekassa dinnaṃ dvinnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pahoti, upamaṃ te karissāmi, añjaliṃ te paggaṇhāmi. tathā tassa phāsu hoti, lokassattho, maṇinā me attho, seyyo me attho iccādi.

[03] ^b^namo^eb^saddayoge, ^b^sotthisvāgatādī^eb^hi ca yoge liṅgamhā catutthīvibhatti hoti. namo te buddha vīratthu, namo karohi nāgassa, namatthu buddhānaṃ, namatthu bodhiyā, sotthi pajānaṃ, svāgataṃ te mahārāja, atho te adurāgataṃ.
[03] bhāvavācimhi catutthīvibhatti hoti bhavissatikāle. bhavanaṃ ^b^bhāvo^eb^. paccissate, pacanaṃ vā pāko, pākāya vajati, pacituṃ gacchatīti attho. evaṃ bhogāya vajati iccādi.
[03] yasmā vā avadhito apeti, yasmā vā bhayahetuto bhayaṃ bhavati, yasmā vā akkhātārā vijjaṃ ādadāti, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti. apanetvā ito ādadātīti ^b^apādānaṃ^eb^.
[03] taṃ pana tividhaṃ visayabhedena niddiṭṭhavisayaṃ, upāttavisayaṃ, anumeyyavisayañcāti.
[03] apādānasaññāvisayassa kriyāvisesassa niddiṭṭhattā ^b^niddiṭṭhavisayaṃ^eb^. yathā -- gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā.
[03] ettha ca ``pāpā cittaṃ nivāraye, pāpā nivārentī''tiādīsu yadipi kāyasaṃyogapubbakāpagamanaṃ natthi, tathāpi cittasaṃyogapubbakassa apagamanassa sambhavato iminā ca apādānasaññā.

[03] yattha pana apagamanakriyaṃ upāttaṃ ajjhāhaṭaṃ visayaṃ katvā pavattati, taṃ ^b^upāttavisayaṃ^eb^. yathā -- valāhakā vijjotate vijju, kusūlato pacatīti. ettha ca ``valāhakā nikkhamma, kusūlato apanetvā''ti ca pubbakriyā ajjhāharīyati.

[03] ^b^anumeyyavisayaṃ^eb^ yathā -- māthurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpā. ettha hi kenaci guṇena ukkaṃsīyantīti anumeyyova kriyāviseso. idha pana ^b^dūrantikā^eb^disutte ^b^vibhatta^eb^ggahaṇena apādānasaññā.
[03] ^b^bhayahetumhi^eb^ -- corā bhayaṃ jāyati, taṇhāya jāyatī bhayaṃ, pāpato uttasati, ^b^akkhātari^eb^ -- upajjhāyā sikkhaṃ gaṇhāti, ācariyamhā adhīte, ācariyato suṇāti.
[03] dhātavo ca nāmāni ca ^b^dhātunāmāni,^eb^ tesaṃ avihitalakkhaṇānaṃ dhātunāmānaṃ payoge, upasaggayoge ca ^b^ādi^eb^saddena nipātayoge ca taṃyuttaṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^dhātuppayoge^eb^ tāva -- ^b^parāji^eb^yoge yo asayho, pabhūyoge pabhavo, janiyoge jāyamānassa pakati ca. yathā -- buddhasmā parājenti aññatitthiyā. himavatā pabhavanti pañca mahānadiyo, anavatattamhā mahāsarā pabhavanti, aciravatiyā pabhavanti kunnadiyo. kāmato jāyatī soko, yasmā so jāyate gini, urasmā jāto putto, kammato jātaṃ indriyaṃ.
[03] ^b^nāmappayoge aññatthitarā^eb^dīhi yutte -- nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhati, tato aññena kammena, tato itaraṃ, ubhato sujāto putto iccādi.

[03] ^b^upasaggayuttesu^eb^ ^a^M0.0159^ea^ ^b^apaparī^eb^hi vajjanatthehi yoge, mariyādābhividhiatthe āyoge ^b^pati^eb^nā patinidhipatidānatthena yoge ca. yathā -- apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṃ vajjetvāti attho. tathā paripabbatā devo vassati, pabbataṃ vajjetvāti attho. ^b^mariyādāyaṃ^eb^ -- āpabbatā khettaṃ. ^b^abhividhimhi^eb^ -- ābrahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchati, brahmalokaṃ abhibyāpetvāti attho. ^b^patinidhimhi^eb^ -- buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammadesanāya ālapati temāsaṃ. ^b^patidāne^eb^ -- ghatamassa telasmā pati dadāti, kanakamassa hiraññasmā pati dadāti.

[03] ^b^nipātayuttesu rite nānā vinā^eb^dīhi yoge -- rite saddhammā kuto sukhaṃ labhati. te bhikkhū nānākulā pabbajitā. vinā saddhammā natthañño koci nātho loke vijjati. ariyehi puthagevāyaṃ jano, yāva brahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchati.

[03] ^b^api^eb^ggahaṇena kammāpādānakārakamajjhepi pañcamī kāladdhānehi, pakkhasmā vijjhati migaṃ luddako, ito pakkhasmā migaṃ vijjhatīti vuttaṃ hoti. evaṃ māsasmā bhuñjati bhojanaṃ, kosā vijjhati kuñjaraṃ.

[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena ^b^pabhutyā^eb^diatthe, tadatthappayoge ca -- yatohaṃ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā jāto, yato sarāmi attānaṃ, yato pattosmi viññutaṃ, yatvādhikaraṇamenaṃ, yato pabhuti, yato paṭṭhāya, tato paṭṭhāya iccādi.

[03] rakkhaṇatthānaṃ dhātūnaṃ payoge yaṃ icchitaṃ, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti, ^b^ca^eb^kārādhikārato anicchitañca. rakkhaṇañcettha nivāraṇaṃ, tāyanañca. kāke rakkhanti taṇḍulā, yavā paṭisedhenti gāvo.
[03] ^b^anicchitaṃ^eb^ yathā -- pāpā cittaṃ ^b^ni^eb^vāraye, pāpānivārenti, rājato vā corato vā aggito vā udakato vā nānābhayato vā nānārogato vā nānāupaddavato vā ārakkhaṃ gaṇhantu.
[03] yena adassanamicchitaṃ antaradhāyantena, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti vā, antaradhānevāyaṃ. upajjhāyā antaradhāyati sisso, nilīyatīti attho. mātāpitūhi antaradhāyati putto.
[03] ^b^vā^eb^ti kiṃ? jetavane antarahito. ^b^yenā^eb^ti kiṃ? yakkho tattheva antaradhāyati.
[03] 312^b^.^eb^ ^b^dūrantikaddhakālanimmānatvālopadisāyogavibhattārappayoga suddhappamocana hetu vivittappamāṇa pubbayoga bandhana guṇavacana pañha kathanathokākattūsu ca^eb^.

[03] dūratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmāne, kālanimmāne, tvālope, disāyoge, vibhatte, āratippayoge, suddhatthappayoge, pamocanatthappayoge, hetvatthe, vivittatthappayoge, pamāṇatthe, pubbayoge, bandhanatthappayoge, guṇavacane ^a^M0.0161^ea^, pañhe, kathane, thokatthe, akattari ca yadavadhibhūtaṃ, hetukammādibhūtañca, taṃ kārakaṃ apādānasaññaṃ hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena yathāyogaṃ dutiyā, tatiyā, chaṭṭhī ca.
[03] ^b^e^eb^ttha ca dūrantikañca dūrantikatthañcāti ^b^dūrantika^eb^nti sarūpekasesaṃ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena dūrantikatthappayoge, tadatthe ca apādānasañño hoti.

[03] ^b^dūratthappayoge^eb^ tāva -- kīvadūro ito naḷakāragāmo, tato have dūrataraṃ vadanti, gāmato nātidūre. ārakā te moghapurisā imasmā dhammavinayā, ārakā tehi bhagavā. ^b^dūratthe^eb^ -- dūratova namassanti, addasa dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
[03] ^b^antikatthappayoge^eb^ -- antikaṃ gāmā, āsannaṃ gāmā, samīpaṃ gāmā, gāmassa samīpanti attho.
[03] dutiyā, tatiyā ca, dūraṃ gāmaṃ āgato, dūrena gāmena āgato, dūrato gāmā āgatoti attho. dūraṃ gāmena vā. antikaṃ gāmaṃ āgato, antikaṃ gāmena vā, āsannaṃ gāmaṃ, āsannaṃ gāmena vā iccādi.
[03] ^b^addhakālanimmāne^eb^ nimmānaṃ nāma parimāṇaṃ, tasmiṃ gamyamāne -- ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṃ, rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake sāvatthi.
[03] ^b^kālanimmāne^eb^ -- ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassī bhagavā loke udapādi, ito vassasahassaccayena buddho loke uppajjissati.

[03] ^b^tvāpaccayantassa lopo^eb^ nāma tadatthasambhavepi avijjamānatā, tasmiṃ tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu -- pāsādā saṅkameyya, pāsādaṃ abhiruhitvā saṅkameyyāti attho ^a^M0.0162^ea^. tathā hatthikkhandhā saṅkameyya, abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṃ sutvā vā, abhidhammā kathayanti, abhidhammaṃ paṭhitvā vā, āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya, āsane nisīditvā vā.

[03] ^b^disatthavācīhi yoge, disatthe^eb^ ca -- ito sā purimā disā, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā, ito sā pacchimā disā, ito sā uttarā disā, avīcito uparibhavaggā, uddhaṃ pādatalā, adho kesamatthakā iccādi. ^b^disatthe^eb^ -- puratthimato dakkhiṇatotiādi. ettha pana sattamiyatthe ^b^to^eb^paccayopi bhavissati.

[03] ^b^vibhattaṃ^eb^ nāma sayaṃ vibhattasseva tadaññato guṇena vibhajanaṃ, tasmiṃ vibhatte -- yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto tato varaṃ. kiñcāpi dānato sīlameva varaṃ, tato mayā sutā assutameva bahutaraṃ, sīlameva sutā seyyo. chaṭṭhī ca, channavutīnaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃ pavaraṃ yadidaṃ sugatavinayo.
[03] ^b^āratippayogo^eb^ nāma viramaṇatthasaddappayogo. tattha -- asaddhammā ārati, virati pāpā, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā paṭivirato, appaṭivirato musāvādā.
[03] ^b^suddhatthappayoge^eb^ -- lobhanīyehi dhammehi suddho asaṃsaṭṭho, mātito ca pitito ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho agarahito.
[03] ^b^pamocanatthappayoge^eb^ ^a^M0.0163^ea^-- parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, mutto mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā, muttohaṃ sabbapāsehi.

[03] ^b^hetvatthe,^eb^ sarūpekasesassa gahitattā hetvatthappayoge ca sabbanāmato -- kasmā nu tumhaṃ daharā na mīyare, kasmā idheva maraṇaṃ bhavissati, kasmā hetunā, yasmā ca kammāni karonti, yasmā tiha bhikkhave, tasmā tiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ, tasmā buddhosmi brāhmaṇa, yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā kāraṇā, kiṃ kāraṇā. dutiyā, chaṭṭhī ca, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ, taṃ kissa hetu, kissa tumhe kilamatha.
[03] kena hetunā, kena kāraṇena, yena midhekacce sattā, tena nimittena, tena vuttamiccādīsu ``hetvatthe cā''ti tatiyā.
[03] ^b^vivittaṃ^eb^ nāma vivecanaṃ, tadatthappayoge -- vivitto pāpakā dhammā, vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi.
[03] ^b^pamāṇatthe^eb^ tatiyā ca, āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanaṃ, gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṃ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṃ, parikkhepato navayojanasataparimāṇo majjhimapadeso.
[03] dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā.
[03] ettha ca ``smāhismiṃna''miccādito ``smā''ti ca ``so, vā''ti ca vattamāne
[03] dīghaso, dīghamhā vā, [oraso, oramhā vā] tatiyā ca, yojanaṃ āyāmena, yojanaṃ vitthārena, yojanaṃ ubbedhena sāsaparāsi.

[03] paṭhamatthavācakena ^b^pubba^eb^saddena yogo ^b^pubbayogo,^eb^ ettha ca ^b^pubba^eb^ggahaṇaṃ adisatthavuttino ^b^pubbā^eb^diggahaṇassupalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena ^b^parā^eb^diyogepi. yathā -- pubbeva me bhikkhave sambodhā, ito pubbenāhosi, tato paraṃ paccantimā janapadā, dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā, tato aparena samayena, tato uttarimpi iccādi.
[03] ^b^bandhanatthappayoge^eb^ bandhanahetumhi iṇe pañcamī, tatiyā ca hoti, satasmā baddho naro raññā, satena vā baddho naro.

[03] phalasādhanahetubhūtassa guṇassa vacanaṃ ^b^guṇavacanaṃ,^eb^ tasmiṃ guṇavacane pañcamī, tatiyā ca, issariyā janaṃ rakkhati rājā, issariyena vā, sīlato naṃ pasaṃsanti, sīlena vā, paññāya vimuttimano iccādi.
[03] ^b^pañhakathanesu^eb^ -- kutosi tvaṃ, kuto bhavaṃ, pāṭaliputtato. ettha ca ^b^kathanaṃ^eb^ nāma vissajjanaṃ.
[03] ^b^thokatthe asatvavacane^eb^ karaṇe tatiyā ca, thokā muccati, thokena muccati vā, appamattakā muccati, appamattakena vā, kicchā muccati, kicchena vā.

[03] ^b^akattari^eb^ ^a^M0.0165^ea^ ^b^akārake ñāpakahetumhi^eb^ -- kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā uppannaṃ hoti cakkhuviññāṇa, ^b^na^eb^ tāvidaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ahetukaṃ sabbattha sabbadā sabbesañca ekasadisabhāvāpattito.

[03] karoti attano phalanti ^b^kāraṇaṃ,^eb^ kārakahetu [janakahetu], tasmiṃ kāraṇatthe ca pañcamīvibhatti hoti, vikappenāyaṃ, hetvatthe tatiyāya ca vihitattā, ananubodhā appaṭivedhā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ adassanā evamidaṃ dīghamaddhānaṃ sandhāvitaṃ saṃsaritaṃ, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṃ, avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā saṅkhāranirodho, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho, viññāṇanirodhā iccādi.
[03] pariggayhatīti ^b^pariggaho,^eb^ yo yassa pariggaho āyatto sambandhī, taṃ pati so attho sāmisañño hoti. ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena sāmitabba rujādiyogepi.

[03] ettha ^a^M0.0166^ea^ ca kriyābhisambandhābhāvā na kārakatā sambhavati. sāmibhāvo hi kriyākārakabhāvassa phalabhāvena gahito, tathā hi ``rañño puriso''ti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti, puriso ca patiggaṇhāti, tasmā ``rājapuriso''ti viññāyati. evaṃ yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena vā bhaṇḍabhāvena vā samīpa samūhāvayavavikāra kāriyāvatthā jāti guṇa kriyādivasena vā, tassa sabbassāpi so sambandhādhārabhūto visesanaṭṭhānī āgamīvasena tividhopi attho ^b^sāmī^eb^ nāmāti gahetabbo.

[03] ^b^visesanato^eb^ tāva -- rañño purisoti, ettha ca rājā purisaṃ aññasāmito viseseti nivattetīti ^b^visesanaṃ,^eb^ puriso tena visesīyatīti ^b^visesitabbo,^eb^ evaṃ sabbattha visesitabbayoge visesanatova chaṭṭhī.
[03] ^b^bhaṇḍena sambandhe^eb^ -- pahūtaṃ me dhanaṃ sakka, etassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṃ.
[03] ^b^kāriyasambandhe^eb^ -- yavassa aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko.
[03] ^b^avatthāsambandhe^eb^ -- khandhānaṃ pātubhāvo, khandhānaṃ jarā, khandhānaṃ bhedo.

[03] ^b^guṇasambandhe^eb^ -- suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa, buddhassa guṇaghoso, pupphānaṃ gandho, phalānaṃ raso, cittassa phusanā, sippikānaṃ sataṃ natthi, tilānaṃ muṭṭhi, tesaṃ samāyogo, sandhino vimokkho, tathāgatassa paññāpāramiṃ ārabbha, pubbacariyaṃ vā, sukhaṃ te, dukkhaṃ te, cetaso parivitakko udapādi, paññāya paṭubhāvo, rūpassa lahutā, rūpassa mudutā, rūpassa upacayo.

[03] ^b^kriyāsambandhe^eb^ -- pādassa ukkhipanaṃ, pādassa avakkhepanaṃ vā, hatthassa samiñjanaṃ, pādānaṃ pasāraṇaṃ, dhātūnaṃ gamanaṃ, dhātūnaṃyeva ṭhānaṃ, nisajjā, sayanaṃ vā. tathā tassa nāmagottādi, tassa kāraṇaṃ, tassa mātāpitaro, tassa purato pāturahosi, tassa pacchato, nagarassa dakkhiṇato, vassānaṃ tatiye māse, na tassa upamā, kuverassa bali iccādi.
[03] ^b^tabba rujādiyoge^eb^ -- mahāsenāpatīnaṃ ujjhāpetabbaṃ vikanditabbaṃ viravitabbaṃ, devadattassa rujati, tassa rogo uppajjati, rajakassa vatthaṃ dadāti, musāvādassa ottappaṃ iccādi.
[03] ^b^yajassa karaṇe^eb^ -- pupphassa buddhaṃ yajati, pupphena vā, ghatassa aggiṃ juhoti.
[03] ^b^suhitatthayoge^eb^ -- pattaṃ odanassa pūretvā, odanenāti attho. imameva kāyaṃ pūraṃ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati, pūraṃ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa, pūrati bālo pāpassa.
[03] ^b^tulyatthakimalamādiyoge^eb^ -- pitussa tulyo, pitarā vā tulyo, mātu sadiso, mātarā sadiso vā, kiṃ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa, kiṃ tena tuṭṭhenāti attho. alaṃ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa.

[03] ^b^kattari kitappaccayayoge^eb^ -- sobhanā kaccāyanassa kati, kaccāyanena vā, rañño sammato, raññā vā, evaṃ rañño ^a^M0.0169^ea^ pūjito, rañño sakkato, rañño apacito, rañño mānito, amataṃ tesaṃ bhikkhave aparibhuttaṃ, yesaṃ kāyagatāsati aparibhuttā iccādi.

[03] ^b^sattamiyatthe kusalādiyoge^eb^ -- kusalā naccagītassa sikkhitā cāturitthiyo, kusalo tvaṃ rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ, kusalo maggassa, kusalo amaggassa, santi hi bhante uḷārā yakkhā bhagavato pasannā, divasassa tikkhattuṃ, divase tikkhattuṃ vā, māsassa dvikkhattuṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^dutiyatthe kammani kitakayoge^eb^ -- tassa bhavanti vattāro, sahasā kammassa kattāro, amatassa dātā, bhinnānaṃ sandhātā, sahitānaṃ anuppadātā, bodhetā pajāya, kammassa kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako, avisaṃvādako lokassa, pāpānaṃ akaraṇaṃ sukhaṃ, catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāya pasādo, acchariyo arajakena vatthānaṃ rāgo, acchariyo agopālakena gāvīnaṃ doho.
[03] ^b^tathā saricchādīnaṃ kammani^eb^ -- mātu sarati, mātaraṃ sarati, na tesaṃ koci sarati, sattānaṃ kammappaccayā, puttassa icchati, puttamicchati.
[03] ^b^karotissa^eb^ ^a^M0.0170^ea^ ^b^patiyatane ca^eb^ -- patiyatanaṃ abhisaṅkhāro, udakassa patikurute, udakaṃ patikurute, kaṇḍassa patikurute, kaṇḍaṃ patikurute.

[03] ^b^pañcamiyatthe parihānibhayatthayoge^eb^ -- assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, kiṃ nu kho ahaṃ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno, bhīto catunnaṃ āsivisānaṃ iccādi.
[03] ^b^kvacī^eb^ti kiṃ? gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, kālena dhammiṃ kathaṃ bhāsitā hoti, paresaṃ puññāni anumoditā, bujjhitā saccāni, kaṭaṃ kārako, pasavo ghātako.
[03] tathā ^b^na niṭṭhādīsu ca^eb^ -- sukhakāmī vihāraṃ kato, rathaṃ katavanto, rathaṃ katāvī, kaṭaṃ katvā, kaṭaṃ karonto, kaṭaṃ karāno, kaṭaṃ kurumāno iccādi.
[03] ādhārīyati asminti ^b^ādhāro,^eb^ adhikaraṇaṃ. kattukammasamavetānaṃ nisajjapacanādikriyānaṃ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena yo ādhāro, taṃ kārakaṃ okāsasaññaṃ hoti.
[03] kaṭe ^a^M0.0171^ea^ nisīdati devadatto, thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati. ettha hi devadattataṇḍulānaṃ kattukammānaṃ dhāraṇato taṃsamavetaṃ āsanapacanasaṅkhātaṃ kriyaṃ dhāreti nāma.
[03] so panāyamokāso catubbidho byāpiko opasilesiko sāmīpiko vesayikoti.

[03] tattha ^b^byāpiko^eb^ nāma yattha sakalopi ādhārabhūto attho ādheyyena patthaṭo hoti, yasmiñca ādheyyabhūtaṃ kiñci byāpetvā tiṭṭhati, taṃ yathā -- tilesu telaṃ atthi, khīlesu jalaṃ, dadhimhi sappīti.

[03] ^b^opasilesiko^eb^ nāma paccekasiddhānaṃ bhāvānaṃ yattha upasilesena upagamo hoti, yasmiñca ādheyyo upasilissati allīyitvā tiṭṭhati, taṃ yathā -- āsane nisinno saṅgho, thāliyaṃ odanaṃ pacati, ghaṭesu udakaṃ atthi, dūre ṭhito, samīpe ṭhitoti.

[03] ^b^sāmīpiko^eb^ nāma yattha samīpe samīpivohāraṃ katvā tadāyattavuttitādīpanatthaṃ ādhārabhāvo vikappīyati, taṃ yathā -- gaṅgāyaṃ ghoso vasati, gaṅgāya samīpe vajo vasatīti attho. bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane, sāvatthiyā samīpeti attho.

[03] ^b^vesayiko^eb^ nāma yattha aññatthābhāvavasena, desantarāvacchedavasena vā ādhārabhāvo parikappo, taṃ yathā -- ākāse sakuṇā pakkhanti, bhūmīsu manussā caranti, jalesu macchā, pādesu patito, pāpasmiṃ ramatī mano, pasanno buddhasāsane, paññāya sādhu, vinaye nipuṇo, mātari sādhu, pitari nipuṇo iccādi.
[03] sabbopi ^a^M0.0172^ea^ cāyamādhāro padhānavasena vā parikappitavasena vā kriyāya patiṭṭhā bhavatīti ^b^okāso^eb^tveva vuttoti veditabbo.
[03] sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhipatibhū pasūta kusalaiccetehi yoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. ubhayatthaṃ vacanaṃ.

[03] gavaṃ sāmi, gosu sāmi, gavaṃ issaro, gosu issaro, gavaṃ adhipati, gosu adhipati, gavaṃ dāyādo, gosu dāyādo, gavaṃ sakkhi, gosu sakkhi, gavaṃ patibhū, gosu patibhū, gavaṃ pasūto, gosu pasūto, gavaṃ kusalo, gosu kusalo.

[03] nīharitvā dhāraṇaṃ ^b^niddhāraṇaṃ,^eb^ jāti guṇa kriyā nāmehi samudāyato ekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṃ, tasmiṃ niddhāraṇatthe gamyamāne ^a^M0.0173^ea^ tato samudāyavāciliṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.

[03] manussānaṃ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo, kaṇhā gāvīnaṃ sampannakhīratamā, kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā, addhikānaṃ dhāvanto sīghatamo, addhikesu dhāvanto sīghatamo, āyasmā ānando arahataṃ aññataro ahosi, arahantesu vā iccādi.
[03] anādare gamyamāne bhāvavatā liṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. akāmakānaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ rudantānaṃ pabbaji, mātāpitūsu rudantesu pabbaji.
[03] ^b^kammatthe^eb^ -- bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, purisassa bāhāsu gahetvā.
[03] ^b^karaṇatthe^eb^ -- hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pattesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, sopi maṃ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi matthake.
[03] ^b^nimittatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0174^ea^-- dīpi cammesu haññate, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ, musāvādanimittaṃ musāvādappaccayāti attho.
[03] sampadānatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
[21] yā palālamayaṃ mālaṃ, nārī datvāna cetiye.
[03] pañcamyatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti.

[03] ^b^kālo^eb^ nāma nimesa khaṇa laya muhutta pubbaṇhādiko, ^b^bhāvo^eb^ nāma kriyā, sā cettha kriyantarūpalakkhaṇāva adhippetā, tasmiṃ kālatthe ca bhāvalakkhaṇe bhāvatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
[03] ^b^kāle^eb^ -- pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato, akāle vassati tassa, kāle tassa na vassati, phussamāsamhā tīsu māsesu vesākhamāso, ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji cakkhumā.

[03] ^b^bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe^eb^ ^a^M0.0175^ea^-- bhikkhusaṅghesu bhojīyamānesu gato, bhuttesu āgato, gosu duyhamānāsu gato, duddhāsu āgato, jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte ayaṃ dasasahassilokadhātu saṃkampi sampakampi sampavedhi.
[03] dvipadamidaṃ. adhikatthe, issaratthe ca vattamānehi ^b^upādhi^eb^iccetehi yoge adhikissaravacane gamyamāne liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.

[03] ^b^adhikavacane^eb^ -- upa khāriyaṃ doṇo, khāriyā doṇo adhikoti attho. tathā upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṃ, adhi devesu buddho, sammutiupapattivisuddhidevasaṅkhātehi tividhehipi devehi sabbaññū buddhova adhikoti attho.
[03] ^b^issaravacane^eb^ -- adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, brahmadattissarā pañcālāti attho.

[03] maṇḍitaussukkaiccetesvatthesu gamyamānesu liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. ^b^maṇḍita^eb^saddo panettha pasannatthavācako, ^b^ussukka^eb^saddo saīhattho. ñāṇena pasanno, ñāṇasmiṃ pasanno, ñāṇena ussukko, ñāṇasmiṃ ussukko sappuriso.
[22] pabhedā sattadhā kammaṃ, kattā pañcavidho bhave..
[21] karaṇaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti, sampadānaṃ tidhā mataṃ.
[03] vibhattiyo pana paccattavacanādivasena aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti. yathāha
[03] ^b^atha nāmameva^eb^ aññamaññasambandhīnaṃ samāsoti nāmanissitattā, sayañca nāmikattā nāmānantaraṃ ^b^samāso^eb^ vuccate.
[03] so ca saññāvasena chabbidho abyayībhāvo kammadhārayo digu tappuriso bahubbīhi dvando cāti.

[03] ``upanagaraṃ''itīdha -- ^b^upa^eb^saddato paṭhamekavacanaṃ ^b^si,^eb^ tassa upasaggaparattā ``sabbāsamāvusopasagganipātādīhi cā''ti lopo, ^b^nagara^eb^saddato chaṭṭhekavacanaṃ ^b^sa,^eb^ nagarassa samīpanti aññapadena viggahe --

[03] ^b^upasagga^eb^pubbako, ^b^nipāta^eb^pubbako ca nāmiko yuttattho teheva attapubbakehi upasagganipātehi saha niccaṃ samasīyate, so ca samāso ^b^abyayībhāva^eb^sañño hoti. idha abyayībhāvādisaññāvidhāyakasuttāneva vā saññāvidhānamukhena samāsavidhāyakānīti daṭṭhabbāni.

[03] tattha ^b^abyaya^eb^miti upasagganipātānaṃ saññā, liṅgavacanabhedepi byayarahitattā, abyayānaṃ atthaṃ vibhāvayatīti ^b^abyayībhāvo^eb^ abyayatthapubbaṅgamattā, anabyayaṃ abyayaṃ bhavatīti vā ^a^M0.0178^ea^ abyayībhāvo. pubbapadatthappadhāno hi abyayībhāvo, ettha ca ``upasagganipātapubbako''ti vuttattā upasagganipātānameva pubbanipāto.
[03] tesaṃ nāmānaṃ payujjamānapadatthānaṃ yo yuttattho, so samāsasañño hoti, tadaññaṃ vākyamiti ruḷhaṃ.

[03] duvidhañcassa samasanaṃ saddasamasanamatthasamasanañca, tadubhayampi luttasamāse paripuṇṇameva labbhati. aluttasamāse pana atthasamasanameva vibhattilopābhāvato, tatthāpi vā ekapadattūpagamanato duvidhampi labbhateva. dve hi samāsassa payojanāni ekapadattamekavibhattittañcāti.

[03] yutto attho ^b^yuttatto,^eb^ atha vā yutto saṅgato, sambandho vā attho yassa soyaṃ yuttattho, etena saṅgatatthena ^b^yuttattha^eb^vacanena bhinnatthānaṃ ekatthībhāvo samāsalakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. ettha ca ``nāmāna''nti vacanena ``devadatto pacatī''tiādīsu ākhyātena samāso na hotīti dasseti. sambandhatthena pana ^b^yuttattha^eb^ggahaṇena ``bhaṭo rañño putto devadattassā''tiādīsu aññamaññānapekkhesu, ``devadattassa kaṇhā dantā''tiādīsu ca aññasāpekkhesu ^a^M0.0179^ea^ ayuttatthatāya samāso na hotīti dīpeti.

[03] idha padantarena vā taddhitappaccayehi vā ^b^āyā^eb^dippaccayehi vā ekatthībhūtā yuttatthā nāma, tena ``tesaṃ yuttatthānaṃ samāsānaṃ, taddhitā^b^yā^eb^dippaccayantānañca vibhattiyo lopanīyā hontī''ti attho. ^b^samāsa^eb^ggahaṇādhikāre pana sati ^b^tesaṃ^eb^gahaṇena vā taddhitā^b^yā^eb^dippaccayanta vibhattilopo. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ``pabhaṅkaro''tiādīsu lopanivattanatthaṃ.

[03] luttāsu vibhattīsu sarantassa assa yuttatthabhūtassa tividhassapi liṅgassa pakatibhāvo hoti. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^kiṃsamudaya idappaccayatā^eb^dīsu niggahītantassapi. nimittābhāve nemittakābhāvassa idha anicchitattā ayamatideso.
[03] sakatthavirahenidha samāsassa ca liṅgabhāvābhāvā vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṃ nāmabyapadesātidesamāha.

[03] taddhitantā ^a^M0.0180^ea^, kitantā, samāsā ca nāmamiva daṭṭhabbā ^b^tavetuna tvāna tvā^eb^dippaccayante vajjetvā. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ kiccappaccaya^b^āīinī^eb^itthippaccayantādissapi nāmabyapadesatthaṃ. idha ^b^samāsa^eb^ggahaṇaṃ atthavataṃ samudāyānaṃ nāmabyapadeso samāsassevāti niyamatthanti apare.

[03] so abyayībhāvasamāso napuṃsakaliṅgova daṭṭhabboti napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ. ettha hi satipi liṅgātidese ``adhipañña''ntiādīsu ``adhiñāṇaṃ''ntiādi rūpappasaṅgo na hoti saddantarattā, ``tipañña''ntiādīsu viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, na cāyaṃ atideso, sutte atidesaliṅgassa ^b^iva^eb^saddassa adassanato. pure viya syādyuppatti.
[03] tasmā akārantā abyayībhāvā parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ kvaci ^b^aṃ^eb^ hoti, sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
[03] taṃ upanagaraṃ, nagarassa samīpaṃ tiṭṭhatīti attho. tāni upanagaraṃ, ālapanepevaṃ, taṃ upanagaraṃ passa, tāni upanagaraṃ.

[03] tena upanagaraṃ kataṃ, upanagarena vā, tehi upanagaraṃ, upanagarehi vā, tassa upanagaraṃ dehi, tesaṃ upanagaraṃ, upanagarā ānaya, upanagaramhā upanagarasmā, upanagarehi, upanagaraṃ santakaṃ, upanagarassa vā, tesaṃ upanagaraṃ, upanagarānaṃ vā ^a^M0.0181^ea^, upanagaraṃ nidhehi, upanagaramhi upanagarasmiṃ, upanagaraṃ upanagaresu vā. evaṃ upakumbhaṃ.
[03] ^b^vicchāyaṃ^eb^ -- attānamattānaṃ pati paccattaṃ, addhamāsaṃ addhamāsaṃ anu anvaddhamāsaṃ.
[03] ^b^paṭilome^eb^ -- sotassa paṭilomaṃ paṭisotaṃ, paṭipathaṃ, pativātaṃ, attānaṃ adhikicca pavattā ajjhattaṃ.
[03] ^b^pariyādābhividhīsu^eb^ āpāṇakoṭiyā āpāṇakoṭikaṃ, ``kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto''ti ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo, ākumārehi yaso kaccāyanassa ākumāraṃ.
[03] ^b^samiddhiyaṃ^eb^ -- bhikkhāya samiddhīti atthe samāseva napuṃsakaliṅgatte ca kate --

[03] napuṃsake vattamānassa samāsassa anto saro rasso hoti. ettha ca ^b^abyayībhāva^eb^ggahaṇaṃ nānuvattetabbaṃ, tena digudvandabahubbīhīsupi napuṃsake vattamānassa samāsantassarassa rassattaṃ siddhaṃ hoti. ``aṃ vibhattīna''miccādinā ^b^a^eb^mādeso, subhikkhaṃ. gaṅgāya samīpe vattatīti upagaṅgaṃ, maṇikāya samīpaṃ upamaṇikaṃ.

[03] ^b^a^eb^kārantato aññasmā abyayībhāvasamāsā parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo ca hoti. adhitti, itthīsu adhikicca kathā pavattatīti attho. adhitthi passa, adhitthi kataṃ iccādi, evaṃ adhikumāri, vadhuyā samīpaṃ upavadhu, gunnaṃ samīpaṃ upagu, ^b^o^eb^kārassa rassattaṃ ^b^u^eb^kāro. evaṃ ^b^upasaggapubbako^eb^.

[03] ^b^nipātapubbako^eb^ yathā -- vuḍḍhānaṃ paṭipāṭi, ye ye vuḍḍhā vā yathāvuḍḍhaṃ, ^b^padatthānatikkame^eb^ -- yathākkamaṃ, yathāsatti, yathābalaṃ karoti, balamanatikkamitvā karotīti attho. jīvassa yattako paricchedo yāvajīvaṃ, yāvatāyukaṃ, ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo. yattakena attho yāvadatthaṃ, pabbatassa parabhāgo tiropabbataṃ, tiropākāraṃ, tirokuṭṭaṃ, pāsādassa anto antopāsādaṃ, antonagaraṃ, antovassaṃ, nagarassa bahi bahinagaraṃ, pāsādassa upari uparipāsādaṃ, uparimañcaṃ, mañcassa heṭṭhā heṭṭhāmañcaṃ, heṭṭhāpāsādaṃ, bhattassa pure purebhattaṃ, evaṃ pacchābhattaṃ.
[03] ^b^sākallatthe^eb^ -- saha makkhikāya samakkhikaṃ bhuñjati, na kiñci parivajjetīti attho. ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^saha^eb^saddassa ^b^sā^eb^deso. gaṅgāya oraṃ oragaṅgamiccādi.

[03] so ca navavidho visesanapubbapado visesanuttarapado visesanobhayapado upamānuttarapado sambhāvanāpubbapado avadhāraṇapubbapado ^b^na^eb^nipātapubbapado ^b^ku^eb^pubbapado ^b^pā^eb^dipubbapado cāti.

[03] tattha ^b^visesanapubbapado^eb^ tāva -- ``mahanta purisa''itīdha ubhayattha paṭhamekavacanaṃ ^b^si,^eb^ tulyādhikaraṇabhāvappasiddhatthaṃ ^b^ca^eb^sadda ^b^ta^eb^saddappayogo, mahanto ca so puriso cāti viggahe --
[03] ito paraṃ ``vibhāsā rukkhatiṇa''iccādito ``vibhāsā''ti samāsavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
[03] dve padāni nāmikāni tulyādhikaraṇāni aññamaññena saha vibhāsā samasyante, tasmiṃ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe sati so samāso kammadhārayasañño ca hoti.

[03] dve padāni ^b^dvipadaṃ,^eb^ tulyaṃ samānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attho yassa padadvayassa taṃ ^b^tulyādhikaraṇaṃ,^eb^ tasmiṃ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe. bhinnappavattinimittānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena ekasmiṃ atthe pavatti ^b^tulyādhikaraṇatā^eb^. kammamiva dvayaṃ dhārayatīti ^b^kammadhārayo^eb^. yathā hi kammaṃ kriyañca payojanañca dvayaṃ dhārayati, kamme sati kriyāya, payojanassa ca sambhavato, tathā ayaṃ samāso ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhārayati, tasmiṃ samāse sati ^b^e^eb^katthajotakassa nāmadvayassa sambhavato.
[03] pure ^a^M0.0184^ea^ viya samāsasaññāvibhattilopapakatibhāvā, samāseneva tulyādhikaraṇabhāvassa vuttattā ``vuttatthānamappayogo''ti ^b^ca^eb^sadda ^b^ta^eb^saddānamappayogo.

[03] ^b^mahanta^eb^ saddassa ^b^mahā^eb^ hoti tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare. ^b^mahata^eb^nti bahuvacanaggahaṇena kvaci ^b^maha^eb^ādeso ca, ettha ca visesanassa pubbanipāto visesanabhūtassa pubbapadassa ^b^mahā^eb^desavidhānatova viññāyati.

[03] tassa puriso tappuriso, tappurisasadisattā ayampi samāso anvatthasaññāya ^b^tappuriso^eb^ti vutto. yathā hi ^b^tappurisa^eb^saddo guṇamativatto, tathā ayaṃ samāsopi. uttarapadatthappadhāno hi tappurisoti. tato nāmabyapadeso syādyuppatti. ayaṃ pana tappuriso abhidheyyavacano, paraliṅgo ca.

[03] mahāpuriso, mahāpurisā iccādi ^b^purisa^eb^saddasamaṃ, evaṃ mahāvīro, mahāmuni, mahantañca taṃ balañcāti mahābalaṃ, mahabbhayaṃ, ^b^maha^eb^ādeso. santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso, ``santasaddassa so bhe bo cante''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^santa^eb^saddassa samāse a^b^bha^eb^kārepi ^b^sā^eb^deso, tathā pubbapuriso, parapuriso, paṭhamapuriso, majjhimapuriso, uttamapuriso, dantapuriso, paramapuriso, vīrapuriso, setahatthī, kaṇhasappo, nīluppalaṃ, lohitacandanaṃ.
[03] kvaci ^a^M0.0185^ea^ vibhāsādhikārato na bhavati, yathā -- puṇṇo mantāniputto, citto gahapati, sakko devarājāti.
[03] pumā ca so kokilo cāti atthe samāse kate --
[03] ^b^puma^eb^iccetassa anto ^b^a^eb^kāro lopamāpajjate ^b^liṅgā^eb^dīsu parapadesu samāsesu, ``aṃmo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī''ti ^b^ma^eb^kārassa niggahītaṃ. puṅkokilo. evaṃ punnāgo.
[03] khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti viggayha samāse kate --
[03] ``tulyādhikaraṇe, pade, itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumitthī pumāva ce''ti ca vattate.
[03] kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṃ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare pubbabhūto itthivācako saddo pubbe bhāsitapumā ce, so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayassa nivatti hoti.
[03] khattiyakaññā, khattiyakaññāyo iccādi. evaṃ rattalatā, dutiyabhikkhā, brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā, nāgamāṇavikā.
[03] pubbapadassevāyaṃ pumbhāvātideso, tena ``khattiyakumārī kumārasamaṇī taruṇabrāhmaṇī''tiādīsu uttarapadesu itthippaccayassa na nivatti hoti.
[03] ^b^bhāsitapumā^eb^ti kiṃ? gaṅgānadī, taṇhānadī, pathavīdhātu. ``nandāpokkharaṇī, nandādevī''tiādīsu pana saññāsaddattā na hoti.

[03] tathā puratthimo ca so kāyo cāti puratthimakāyo, ettha ca kāyekadeso ^b^kāya^eb^saddo. evaṃ pacchimakāyo, heṭṭhimakāyo, uparimakāyo, sabbakāyo, purāṇavihāro, navāvāso, kataranikāyo, katamanikāyo, hetuppaccayo, abahulaṃ bahulaṃ katanti bahulīkataṃ, jīvitappadhānaṃ navakaṃ jīvitanavakaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^visesanuttarapade^eb^ jinavacanānuparodhato therācariyapaṇḍitādi visesanaṃ parañca bhavati. yathā -- sāriputto ca so thero cāti sāriputtatthero. evaṃ mahāmoggallānatthero, mahākassapatthero, buddhaghosācariyo, dhammapālācariyo, ācariyaguttiloti vā, mahosadho ca so paṇḍito cāti mahosadhapaṇḍito. evaṃ vidhurapaṇḍito, vatthuviseso.

[03] ^b^visesanobhayapado^eb^ yathā -- sītañca taṃ uṇhañcāti sītuṇhaṃ, siniddho ca so uṇho cāti siniddhuṇho, māso. khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo. evaṃ andhabadhiro, katākataṃ, chiddāvachiddaṃ, uccāvacaṃ, chinnabhinnaṃ, sittasammaṭṭhaṃ, gatapaccāgataṃ.

[03] ^b^upamānuttarapade^eb^ abhidhānānurodhato upamānabhūtaṃ visesanaṃ paraṃ bhavati. yathā -- sīho viya sīho, muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho. evaṃ munivasabho, munipuṅgavo, buddhanāgo, buddhādicco, raṃsi viya raṃsi, saddhammo ca ^a^M0.0187^ea^ so raṃsi cāti saddhammaraṃsi. evaṃ vinayasāgaro, puṇḍarīkamiva puṇḍarīko, samaṇo ca so puṇḍarīko cāti samaṇapuṇḍarīko, samaṇapadumo. cando viya cando, mukhañca taṃ cando cāti mukhacando. evaṃ mukhapadumaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^sambhāvanāpubbapado^eb^ yathā -- dhammo iti buddhi dhammabuddhi. evaṃ dhammasaññā, dhammasaṅkhāto, dhammasammato, pāṇasaññitā, asubhasaññā, aniccasaññā, anattasaññā, dhātusaññā, dhītusaññā, attasaññā, atthisaññā, attadiṭṭhi iccādi.

[03] ^b^avadhāraṇapubbapado^eb^ yathā -- guṇo eva dhanaṃ guṇadhanaṃ. evaṃ saddhādhanaṃ, sīladhanaṃ, paññādhanaṃ, cakkhu eva indriyaṃ cakkhundriyaṃ. evaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhudhātu, cakkhudvāraṃ, rūpārammaṇamiccādi.
[03] ^b^nanipātapubbapado^eb^ yathā -- na brāhmaṇoti atthe kammadhārayasamāse, vibhattilopādimhi ca kate --
[03] ^b^na^eb^ssa nipātapadassa tappurise uttarapade pare sabbasseva ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ hoti. tappurisekadesattā tappuriso, abrāhmaṇo.

[03] tattha ^a^M0.0188^ea^ yo ``asūriyapassā rājadārā''tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthassa sabbathā abhāvaṃ dīpeti, so ^b^pasajjappaṭisedhavācī^eb^ nāma. yo pana ``abrāhmaṇa amanussā''tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthaṃ pariyudāsitvā taṃsadise vatthumhi kāriyaṃ paṭipādayati, so ^b^pariyudāsavācī^eb^ nāma.

[03] vuccate -- ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^disaddānaṃ brāhmaṇādiatthasseva taṃsadisādiatthassāpi vācakattā, ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^disaddā hi kevalābrāhmaṇādiatthesveva pākaṭā, ^b^bhū^eb^saddo viyasattāyaṃ, yadā te pana aññena sadisādivācakena ^b^na^eb^iti nipātena yujjanti, tadā taṃsadisatadaññatabbiruddhatadabhāvesupi vattanti, ^b^bhū^eb^saddo viya ^b^anvabhi^eb^yādiyoge anubhavanābhibhavanādīsu, tasmā uttarapadatthajotakoyevettha ^b^na^eb^iti nipātoti na doso, tena abrāhmaṇoti brāhmaṇasadisoti vuttaṃ hoti. evaṃ amanusso, assamaṇo.
[03] ^b^viruddhatthe^eb^ -- na kusalā akusalā, kusalapaṭipakkhāti attho. evaṃ alobho, amitto.
[03] ^b^pasajjappaṭisedhe^eb^ -- na katvā akatvā, akātuna puññaṃ akaronto.
[03] ^b^na^eb^iccetassa padassa tappurise uttarapade ^b^ana^eb^ hoti sare pare.
[03] ^b^na^eb^ asso anasso, na ariyo anariyo. evaṃ anissaro, aniṭṭho, anupavādo, na ādāya anādāya, anoloketvā iccādi.
[03] ^b^kupubbapado^eb^ yathā -- kucchitamannanti niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, kammadhārayasamāse kate --
[03] ^b^ku^eb^iccetassa nipātassa tappurise uttarapade ^b^kada^eb^ hoti sare pare. kadannaṃ. evaṃ kadasanaṃ.

[03] ^b^ku^eb^iccetassa appatthe vattamānassa ^b^kā^eb^ hoti tappurise uttarapade pare. bahuvacanuccāraṇato kucchitatthe ca kvaci tappurise. appakaṃ lavaṇaṃ kālavaṇaṃ. evaṃ kāpupphaṃ, kucchito puriso kāpuriso, kupuriso vā.

[03] ^b^pādipubbapado^eb^ ca niccasamāsova, padhānaṃ vacanaṃ pāvacanaṃ, bhusaṃ vaddhaṃ pavaddhaṃ, sarīraṃ, samaṃ, sammā vā ādhānaṃ samādhānaṃ, vividhā mati vimati, vividho kappo vikappo, visiṭṭho vā kappo ^a^M0.0190^ea^ vikappo, adhiko devo atidevo. evaṃ adhidevo, adhisīlaṃ, sundaro gandho sugandho, kucchito gandho duggandho, sobhanaṃ kataṃ sukataṃ, asobhanaṃ kataṃ dukkaṭaṃ iccādi.

[03] ye idha avihitalakkhaṇā nāmanipātopasaggā, tesaṃ ``nāmānaṃ samāso''ti yogavibhāgena samāso daṭṭhabbo. yathā -- apunageyyā gāthā, acandamullokikāni mukhāni, assaddhabhojī, alavaṇabhojītiādīsu ayuttatthattā nāññena samāso.

[03] tathā diṭṭho pubbanti diṭṭhapubbo tathāgataṃ. evaṃ sutapubbo dhammaṃ, gatapubbo maggaṃ, ^b^kammani^eb^ diṭṭhā pubbanti diṭṭhapubbā devā tena. evaṃ sutapubbā dhammā, gatapubbā disā, pahāro, parābhavo, vihāro, āhāro, upahāro iccādi.
[03] tayo lokā samāhaṭā cittena sampiṇḍitā, tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ samāhāroti vā atthe --
[03] ``nāmānaṃ samāso yuttattho''ti vattamāne ``dvipade''tiādinā kammadhārayasamāso, tato samāsasaññāyaṃ, vibhattilope, pakatibhāve ca kate --

[03] dve gāvo digu, digusadisattā ayampi samāso ^b^digū^eb^ti vutto. atha vā saṅkhyāpubbattanapuṃsakekattasaṅkhātehi dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gato avagatoti digūti vuccati, dvīhi vā lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatīti digu. ettha ca ``saṅkhyāpubbo''ti vuttattā saṅkhyāsaddasseva pubbanipāto, ``ubhe tappurisā''ti tappurisasaññā.
[03] samāhāradigussetaṃ gahaṇaṃ, tattha sabbatthekavacanameva hoti, aññatra pana bahuvacanampi, nāmabyapadesasyādyuppatti ^b^a^eb^mādesādi.
[03] tilokaṃ, he tiloka, tilokaṃ, tilokena, tilokassa, tilokā tilokasmā tilokamhā, tilokassa, tiloke tilokamhi tilokasmiṃ.

[03] evaṃ tayo daṇḍā tidaṇḍaṃ, tīṇi malāni samāhaṭāni, tiṇṇaṃ malānaṃ samāhāroti vā timalaṃ, tilakkhaṇaṃ, catussaccaṃ, catasso disā catuddisaṃ, ``saro rasso napuṃsake''ti rassattaṃ, pañcasikkhāpadaṃ, saḷāyatanaṃ, sattāhaṃ, aṭṭhasīlaṃ, navalokuttaraṃ, dasasīlaṃ, satayojanaṃ.
[03] tathā -- dve rattiyo dvirattaṃ, tisso rattiyo tirattaṃ, dve aṅguliyo dvaṅgulaṃ, satta godāvariyo, tāsaṃ samāhāroti vā sattagodāvaraṃ.
