[03] rājādigaṇassetaṃ gahaṇaṃ, tena samāsantagatānaṃ ^b^rājādī^eb^naṃ nāmānaṃ anto kvaci ^b^a^eb^kāro hotīti attho. ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇena bahubbīhādimhi samāsante kvaci ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo hoti, ^b^surabhi su du pūtī^eb^hi ^b^gandha^eb^ntassikāro ca.

[03] atha vā ^b^a^eb^ ca ^b^ko^eb^ ca akā, ^b^ra^eb^kāro padasandhikaro, tena kvaci samāsantagatānamanto hutvā ^b^a ka^eb^ iccete paccayā hontīti attho. tena pañca gāvo samāhaṭāti atthe samāsādiṃ katvā samāsante ^b^a^eb^ppaccaye, ``o sare cā''ti ^b^avā^eb^dese ca kate ``pañcagava''ntiādi ca sijjhati. ``dviratta''ntiādīsu pana ^b^a^eb^ppaccaye kate pubbasarassa ``saralopo''tiādinā lopo.
[03] ^b^asamāhāradigu^eb^ yathā -- eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo. evaṃ ekadhammo, ekaputto, tayo bhavā tibhavā, catasso disā catuddisā, dasasahassacakkavāḷāni iccādi.
[03] so pana dutiyādīsu chasu vibhattīsu bhāvato chabbidho. tattha dutiyātappuriso gatanissitātītātikkantappattāpannādīhi bhavati.
[03] ^b^a^eb^mādivibhatyantāni yuttatthāni pubbapadāni nāmehi parapadebhi saha vibhāsā samasyante, so samāso tappurisasañño hoti. ayañca tappuriso abhidheyyavacanaliṅgo.
[03] ^b^gatā^eb^disaddā kitantattā tiliṅgā, vibhattilopādi sabbaṃ pubbasamaṃ. so saraṇagato, te saraṇagatā. sā saraṇagatā, tā saraṇagatāyo. taṃ kulaṃ saraṇagataṃ, tāni kulāni saraṇagatāni iccādi.

[03] evaṃ araññagato, bhūmigato, dhammaṃ nissito dhammanissito, atthanissito, bhavaṃ atīto bhavātīto, kālātīto, pamāṇaṃ atikkantaṃ pamāṇātikkantaṃ. lokātikkantaṃ, sukhaṃ patto sukhappatto, dukkhappatto, sotaṃ āpanno sotāpanno, nirodhasamāpanno, rathaṃ āruḷho rathāruḷho, sabbarattiṃ sobhano sabbarattisobhano, muhuttasukhaṃ.

[03] ^b^upapadasamāse^eb^ pana vuttiyeva tassa niccattā. yathā -- kammaṃ karotīti kammakāro, kumbhakāro, atthaṃ kāmetīti atthakāmo, dhammakāmo, dhammaṃ dhāretīti dhammadharo, vinayadharo, saccaṃ vadituṃ sīlamassāti saccavādī iccādi.

[03] ^b^tavantumānantā^eb^dikitantehi vākyameva vavatthitavibhāsādhikārato. yathā -- odanaṃ bhuttavā, dhammaṃ suṇamāno, dhammaṃ suṇanto, kaṭaṃ karāno, anabhidhānato vā, abhidhānalakkhaṇā hi taddhitasamāsakitakāti.
[03] tatiyā ^a^M0.0194^ea^ kitaka pubba sadisa samūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missasakhilādīhi.

[03] buddhena bhāsito buddhabhāsito, dhammo. evaṃ jinadesito, satthārā vaṇṇito satthuvaṇṇito, viññūhi garahito viññugarahito, viññuppasattho, issarakataṃ, sayaṃkataṃ, sukehi āhaṭaṃ sukāhataṃ, raññā hato rājahato, rogapīḷito, aggidaḍḍho, sappadaṭṭho, sallena viddho sallaviddho, icchāya apakato icchāpakato, sīlena sampanno sīlasampanno. evaṃ sukhasahagataṃ, ñāṇasampayuttaṃ, mittasaṃsaggo, piyavippayogo, jātitthaddho, guṇahīno, guṇavuḍḍho, catuvaggakaraṇīyaṃ, catuvaggādikattabbaṃ, kākehi peyyā kākapeyyā, nadī.
[03] kvaci vuttiyeva, urena gacchatīti urago, pādena pivatīti pādapo. kvaci vākyameva, parasunā chinnavā, kākehi pātabbā, dassanena pahātabbā.

[03] ^b^pubbādiyoge^eb^ -- māsena pubbo māsapubbo. evaṃ mātusadiso, pitusamo, ekūnavīsati, sīlavikalo, asikalaho, vācānipuṇo, yāvakālikasaṃmissaṃ, vācāsakhilo, satthārā sadiso satthukappo, puññena atthiko puññatthiko, guṇādhiko, guḷena saṃsaṭṭho odano guḷodano, khīrodano, assena yutto ratho assaratho, maggacittaṃ, jambuyā paññāto lakkhito dīpo jambudīpo, ekena adhikā dasa ekādasa, jātiyā andho jaccandho, pakatiyā medhāvī pakatimedhāvī iccādi.

[03] ^b^tadatthe^eb^ -- kathinassa dussaṃ kathinadussaṃ, kathinacīvaratthāyāti attho. evaṃ cīvaradussaṃ, cīvaramūlyaṃ, yāguyā atthāya taṇḍulā yāgutaṇḍulā, bhattataṇḍulā, saṅghassatthāya bhattaṃ saṅghabhattaṃ, āgantukānamatthāya bhattaṃ āgantukabhattaṃ. evaṃ gamikabhattaṃ, pāsādāya dabbaṃ pāsādadabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^atthe^eb^ bhikkhusaṅghassatthāya vihāro bhikkhusaṅghattho vihāro, bhikkhusaṅghatthā yāgu, bhikkhusaṅghatthaṃ cīvaraṃ. yassatthāya yadattho, yadatthā, yadatthaṃ. evaṃ tadattho, tadatthā. tadatthaṃ. etadattho vāyāmo, etadatthā kathā, etadatthaṃ sotāvadhānaṃ. kimatthaṃ, attatthaṃ, paratthaṃ, vinayo saṃvaratthāya, sukhaṃ samādhatthāya, nibbidā virāgatthāya, virāgo vimuttatthāya. tathā lokassa hito lokahito, buddhassa deyyaṃ buddhadeyyaṃ, pupphaṃ. saṅghadeyyaṃ, cīvaraṃ. idha na bhavati, saṅghassa dātabbaṃ, saṅghassa dātuṃ iccādi.

[03] methunasmā apeto methunāpeto. evaṃ palāpāpagato, nagaraniggato, piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto. gāmato nikkhantaṃ gāmanikkhantaṃ, rukkhaggā patito rukkhaggapatito, sāsanacuto, āpattivuṭṭhānaṃ, dharaṇitaluggato, sabbabhavehi nissaṭo sabbabhavanissaṭo.

[03] ^b^bhayatthādiyoge^eb^ yathā -- rājato bhayaṃ rājabhayaṃ, corehi bhayaṃ corabhayaṃ, amanussehi bhayaṃ amanussabhayaṃ, aggito bhayaṃ aggibhayaṃ. pāpato bhīto pāpabhīto ^a^M0.0196^ea^, pāpabhīruko, akattabbato virati akattabbavirati. evaṃ kāyaduccaritavirati, vacīduccaritavirati, bandhanā mutto bandhanamutto, vanamutto, bandhanamokkho, kammato samuṭṭhitaṃ kammasamuṭṭhitaṃ, ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhaṃ, omakomakaṃ.
[03] kvaci vuttiyeva, kammato jātaṃ kammajaṃ. evaṃ cittajaṃ, utujaṃ, āhārajaṃ. idha na bhavati, pāsādā patito.

[03] chaṭṭhī rañño putto rājaputto. evaṃ rājapuriso, ācariyapūjako, buddhasāvako, buddharūpaṃ, jinavacanaṃ, samuddaghoso, dhaññānaṃ rāsi dhaññarāsi, pupphagandho, phalaraso, kāyassa lahutā kāyalahutā, maraṇassati, rukkhamūlaṃ, ayassa patto ayopatto, evaṃ suvaṇṇakaṭāhaṃ, pānīyathālakaṃ, sappikumbho.

[03] ``devānaṃ rājā''ti atthe samāsādimhi kate ``kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto''ti ^b^a^eb^kāro, tato ``syā cā''ti ^b^ā^eb^ttaṃ ^b^na^eb^ bhavati. devarājo, devarājā, devarājaṃ, devarāje iccādi ^b^purisa^eb^saddasamaṃ. ^b^a^eb^ttābhāve so devarājā, te devarājāno iccādi ^b^rāja^eb^saddasamaṃ. tathā devānaṃ sakhā devasakho, devasakhā, so devasakhā, te devasakhāno iccādi.
[03] pumassa liṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ. evaṃ pumbhāvo, pumantalopādi.
[03] hatthipadaṃ, itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhunisaṅgho, jambusākhā, ettha ca ``kvacādimajjhuttarāna''ntiādinā majjhe ^b^ī^eb^kārūkārānaṃ rassattaṃ.
[03] vibhāsādhikārato ^a^M0.0197^ea^ kvaci vākyameva, sahasā kammassa kattāro, bhinnānaṃ sandhātā, kappassa tatiyo bhāgo, yā ca pakkhassa aṭṭhamī, manussānaṃ khattiyo sūratamo.

[03] ^b^yuttattho^eb^ icceva? ``bhaṭo rañño puriso devadattassā''ti ettha ``bhaṭasambandhe chaṭṭhī''ti aññamaññānapekkhatāya ayuttatthabhāvato samāso na bhavati, ``kosalassa rañño putto''tiādīsu pana sāpekkhatāya asamatthattā na bhavati, ^b^sambandhī^eb^saddānaṃ pana niccaṃ sāpekkhattepi gamakattā samāso, yathā -- devadattassa gurukulaṃ, bhagavato sāvakasaṅghotiādi.

[03] sattamī rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, evaṃ rūpasañcetanā, saṃsāradukkhaṃ, cakkhumhi sannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, dhamme rato dhammarato, dhammābhirati, dhammaruci, dhammagāravo, dhammesu nirutti dhammanirutti, dānādhimutti, bhavantarakataṃ, dassane assādo dassanassādo, araññe vāso araññavāso, vikāle bhojanaṃ vikālabhojanaṃ, kāle vassaṃ kālavassaṃ, vane pupphaṃ vanapupphaṃ. evaṃ vanamahiso, gāmasūkaro, samuddamaccho, āvāṭakacchapo, āvāṭamaṇḍūko, kūpamaṇḍūko, titthanāvā, itthīsu dhutto itthidhutto chāyāya sukkho chāyāsukkho, aṅgārapakkaṃ, cārakabaddho.

[03] idha vuttiyeva, yathā -- vane caratīti vanacaro, kucchimhi sayatīti kucchisayo, thale tiṭṭhatīti thalaṭṭho. evaṃ jalaṭṭho, pabbataṭṭho, maggaṭṭho, paṅke jātaṃ paṅkajaṃ, sire ruhatīti siroruhaṃ iccādi.
[03] idha ^a^M0.0198^ea^ na bhavati, bhojane mattaññutā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, āsane nisinno, āsane nisīditabbaṃ.
[03] ``tadanuparodhenā''ti vuttattā yathābhidhānaṃ tappurise kvaci ^b^accantā^eb^dīsu ^b^a^eb^mādivibhatyantaṃ pubbapadaṃ paraṃ sambhavati.

[03] yathā -- antaṃ atikkantaṃ accantaṃ, accantāni, velaṃ atikkanto ativelo, rassattaṃ. evaṃ mālaṃ atīto atimālo, pattajīviko, āpannajīviko, akkhaṃ patigataṃ nissitanti paccakkhaṃ dassanaṃ, paccakkho attabhāvo, paccakkhā buddhi, atthaṃ anugataṃ anvatthaṃ, kokilāya avakuṭṭhaṃ avakokilaṃ vanaṃ, pariccattanti attho. avamayūraṃ, ajjhayanāya parigilāno pariyajjhayano, kammassa alaṃ samatthoti alaṃkammo, vacanāya alanti alaṃvacano, vānato nikkhantaṃ nibbānaṃ, kilesehi nikkhanto nikkileso, niraṅgaṇo, kosambiyā nikkhanto nikkosambī, vanato niyyāto nibbano, ācariyato paro pācariyo. evaṃ payyako, parahiyyo, gaṅgāya upari uparigaṅgaṃ. evaṃ heṭṭhānadī, antosamāpatti, haṃsānaṃ rājā rājahaṃso, haṃsarājā vā, māsassa addhaṃ addhamāsaṃ, māsaddhaṃ vā, āmalakassa addhaṃ addhāmalakaṃ, āmalakaddhaṃ vā, kahāpaṇassa aḍḍhaṃ aḍḍhakahāpaṇaṃ, aḍḍhamāsakaṃ, rattiyā aḍḍhaṃ aḍḍharattaṃ, rattiyā pubbaṃ pubbarattaṃ, rattiyā pacchā pacchārattaṃ. ettha ca ``kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto''ti ^b^ratti^eb^saddantassa ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ, ahassa pubbaṃ pubbanhaṃ. evaṃ sāyanhaṃ, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^aha^eb^ssa ^b^anhā^eb^deso.

[03] yathā -- pabhaṃ karotīti atthe ``amādayo parapadebhī''ti samāso, ``nāmānaṃ samāso yuttattho''ti samāsasaññā, tato ``tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā cā''ti vibhattilope sampatte tattheva ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena pubbapade vibhattilopābhāvo. sesaṃ samaṃ. pabhaṅkaro, amataṃ dadātīti amatandado, raṇaṃ jahātīti raṇañjaho, jutiṃ dhāretīti jutindharo, tathā sahasākataṃ, parassapadaṃ. attanopadaṃ, bhayato upaṭṭhānaṃ bhayatūpaṭṭhānaṃ, paratoghoso, gavaṃpatitthero, manasikāro, pubbenivāso, pubbenivāsānussati, majjhekalyāṇaṃ, antevāsī, antevāsiko, janesuto, urasilomo, kaṇṭhekāḷo, sarasijamiccādi.
[03] so ca navavidho dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo, dvipado bhinnādhikaraṇo, tipado ^b^na^eb^nipātapubbapado, ^b^saha^eb^pubbapado upamānapubbapado saṅkhyobhayapado disantarāḷattho byatihāralakkhaṇo cāti.
[03] tattha ^b^dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo^eb^ bahubbīhi kammādīsu chasu vibhatyatthesu bhavati.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0200^ea^ ^b^dutiyatthe^eb^ tāva -- ``āgatā samaṇā imaṃ saṅghārāma''nti viggahe --
[03] samasyamānapadato aññesaṃ paṭhamadutiyādivibhatyantānaṃ padānamatthesu yuttatthāni nāmāni vibhāsā samasyante, so samāso bahubbīhisañño ca hoti.
[03] bahavo vīhayo yassa so bahubbīhi, bahubbīhisadisattā ayampisamāso anvatthasaññāvasena ^b^bahubbīhī^eb^ti vutto, aññapadatthappadhāno hi bahubbīhi.
[03] duvidho cāyaṃ bahubbīhi tagguṇasaṃviññāṇātagguṇasaṃviññāṇavasena, tesu yattha visesanabhūto attho ^b^aññapadattha^eb^ggahaṇena gayhati, so ^b^tagguṇasaṃviññāṇo,^eb^ yathā -- lambakaṇṇamānayāti.
[03] yattha pana na gayhati, so ^b^atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo,^eb^ yathā -- bahudhanamānayāti.
[03] idha ^b^bahubbīhi^eb^sadde viya visesanassa pubbanipāto, sesaṃ pubbasamaṃ.

[03] āgatasamaṇo saṅghārāmo. ettha ca ^b^āgata^eb^saddo, ^b^samaṇa^eb^saddo ca attano atthe aṭṭhatvā dutiyāvibhatyatthabhūte saṅghārāmasaṅkhāte aññapadatthe vattanti, tadatthajotanatthameva tadanantaraṃ ``saṅghārāmo''ti padantaraṃ payujjati, tato samāseneva kammatthassa abhihitattā puna dutiyā na hoti. ^b^idaṃ^eb^saddassa ca appayogo, evaṃ sabbattha. bahubbīhi cāyaṃ abhidheyyaliṅgavacano.

[03] tathā āgatasamaṇā sāvatthi, āgatasamaṇaṃ jetavanaṃ, paṭipannā addhikā yaṃ pathaṃ soyaṃ paṭipannaddhiko patho ^a^M0.0201^ea^, abhiruḷhā vāṇijā yaṃ nāvaṃ sā abhiruḷhavāṇijā nāvā. evaṃ kammatthe bahubbīhi.
[03] ^b^tatiyatthe^eb^ bahubbīhi yathā -- jitāni indriyāni yena samaṇena soyaṃ jitindriyo samaṇo. evaṃ diṭṭhadhammo, pattadhammo, katakicco, jitā mārā anenāti jitamāro bhagavā, paṭividdhasabbadhammo.
[03] ^b^catutthiyatthe^eb^ bahubbīhi yathā -- dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṃ dinnasuṅko rājā, upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ assa samaṇassāti upanītabhojano samaṇo, upahaṭo bali assāti upahaṭabali yakkho.

[03] ^b^pañcamiyatthe^eb^ bahubbīhi yathā -- niggatā janā asmā gāmā soyaṃ niggatajano gāmo, niggato ayo asmāti nirayo, niggatā kilesā etasmāti nikkileso, apetaṃ viññāṇaṃ asmāti apetaviññāṇo matakāyo, apagataṃ bhayabheravaṃ asmāti apagatabhayabheravo arahā.

[03] ^b^chaṭṭhiyatthe^eb^ bahubbīhi yathā -- chinnā hatthā yassa purisassa soyaṃ chinnahattho puriso. evaṃ paripuṇṇasaṅkappo, khīṇāsavo, vīto rāgo assāti vītarāgo, dve padāni assāti dvipado, dvihattho paṭo, tevijjo, catuppado, pañca cakkhūni assāti pañcacakkhu bhagavā, chaḷabhiñño, rassattaṃ, navaṅgaṃ satthusāsanaṃ, dasabalo, anantañāṇo, tīṇi dasa parimāṇametesanti tidasā devā, samāsantassa ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ, idha ^b^parimāṇa^eb^saddassa sannidhānato ^a^M0.0202^ea^ ^b^dasa^eb^saddo saṅkhyāne vattate, ayaṃ paccayo etesanti idappaccayā, ko pabhavo assāti kiṃpabhavo ayaṃ kāyo, vigataṃ malamassāti vimalo, sundaro gandho assāti sugandhaṃ candanaṃ. evaṃ susīlo, sumukho, kucchito gandho assāti duggandhaṃ kuṇapaṃ, duṭṭhu mano assāti dummano. evaṃ dussīlo, dummukho, tapo eva dhanaṃ assāti tapodhano, khantisaṅkhātaṃ balaṃ assāti khantibalo, indoti nāmaṃ etassāti indanāmo.

[03] ^b^chandajātā^eb^dīsu visesanavisesitabbānaṃ yathicchitattā ubhayaṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, yathā -- chando jāto assāti chandajāto, jāto chando assātipi jātachando. evaṃ sañjātapītisomanasso, pītisomanassasañjāto, māsajāto, jātamāso, chinnahattho, hatthacchinno.

[03] itthiyaṃ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe pade pare pubbe bhāsitapumā itthivācako saddo atthi ce, so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayābhāvo, bahubbīhivisayoyaṃ, upari ``kammadhārayasaññe cā''ti vakkhamānattā.
[03] kvaci taddhitasamāsanāmopasaggādīsu padesu ādimajjhuttarabhūtānaṃ sarānaṃ jinavacanānuparodhena dīgharassā honti paccayesu, apaccayesu paresu, aparabhūtesu ca.
[22] rassattaṃ ajjave itthi- rūpādo ca ka, tādisūti..

[03] bahubbīhisamāse sati pulliṅge uttarapadantassa rassattaṃ. dīghajaṅgho puriso, tathā pahūtā jivhā assāti pahūtajivho bhagavā. mahatī paññā assāti mahāpañño. ``mahataṃ mahā tulyādhikaraṇe pade''ti ^b^mahā^eb^deso.

[03] ^b^itthiya^eb^miti kiṃ? khamādhano. ^b^bhāsitapumā^eb^ti kiṃ? saddhādhuro, saddhāpakatiko, paññāpakatiko, paññāvisuddhiko, ettha ca ``kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto''ti ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo. ^b^tulyādhikaraṇe^eb^ icceva? samaṇibhattiko, kumāribhattiko, kumāribhatti.
[03] pubbapadassevāyaṃ pumbhāvātideso, tena idha na bhavati. bahudāsiko puriso. bahukumārikaṃ kulaṃ.
[03] tipadamidaṃ. kvacisamāsantagatā ^b^dhanu^eb^saddā ^b^ā^eb^paccayo hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^dhammā^eb^dito ca, ``vamodudantāna''nti ^b^va^eb^kāro, gāṇṭhivadhanvā. evaṃ paccakkhadhammā.

[03] ^b^nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu^eb^ iccatra -- nānappakārā dumā nānādumā, nānādumehi patitāni nānādumapatitāni, nānādumapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni cāti nānādumapatitapupphāni, tehi vāsitā nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā, nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā sānū yassa pabbatassa soyaṃ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu ^a^M0.0204^ea^ pabbato. ayaṃ pana kammadhārayatappurisagabbho tulyādhikaraṇabahubbīhi.

[03] tathā byālambo ambudharo byālambambudharo, tassa bindūni byālambambudharabindūni, tehi cumbito byālambambudharabinducumbito, tādiso kūṭo yassa soyaṃ ^b^byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo^eb^ iccādi.

[03] ^b^sattamiyatthe^eb^ bahubbīhi yathā -- sampannāni sassāni yasmiṃ janapade soyaṃ sampannasasso janapado, sulabho piṇḍo imasminti sulabhapiṇḍo deso. ākiṇṇā manussā yassaṃ rājadhāniyaṃ sā ākiṇṇamanussā rājadhānī, bahavo tāpasā etasminti bahutāpaso assamo, upacitaṃ maṃsalohitaṃ asminti upacitamaṃsalohitaṃ sarīraṃ, bahavo sāmino asminti bahussāmikaṃ nagaraṃ.

[03] samāsantagatā ^b^nadi^eb^mhā ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena tuantā ca. niccatthaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^nadī^eb^ti cettha itthivācakānaṃ ^b^ī^eb^kārūkārānaṃ parasamaññā, tato ``kvacādimajjhuttarāna''ntiādinā nadisaññassa ^b^ka^eb^ppaccaye rassattaṃ, bahunadiko janapado. evaṃ bahujambukaṃ vanaṃ. bahunārikoti chaṭṭhībahubbīhinā siddhaṃ. bahavo kattāro asmiṃ, assāti vā bahukattuko deso. evaṃ bahubhattuko.

[03] ^b^bhinnādhikaraṇo^eb^ yathā -- ekarattiṃ vāso assāti ekarattivāso, samānena janena saddhiṃ vāso assāti samānavāso ^a^M0.0205^ea^ puriso. ubhato byañjanamassa atthīti ubhabhobyañjanako, chattaṃ pāṇimhi assāti chattapāṇi puriso. evaṃ daṇḍapāṇi, satthapāṇi, vajirapāṇi, khaggahattho, satthahattho, dāne ajjhāsayo assāti dānajjhāsayo, dānādhimuttiko, buddhabhattiko, saddhammagāravo iccādi.

[03] ^b^tipado^eb^ yathā -- parakkamenādhigatā sampadā yehi te bhavanti parakkamādhigatasampadā mahāpurisā. evaṃ dhammādhigatabhogā, oṇīto pattato pāṇi yena soyaṃ oṇītapattapāṇi, sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo, mattā bahavo mātaṅgā asminti mattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^nanipātapubbapado^eb^ yathā -- natthi etassa samoti asamo bhagavā. idha ``attaṃ nassa tappurise''ti sutte ``attaṃ nassā''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^na^eb^ssa ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ. evaṃ appaṭipuggalo, aputtako, ahetuko, ``kvaci samāsanta''iccādinā ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo, natthi saṃvāso etesanti asaṃvāsā, ^b^na^eb^ vijjate vuṭṭhi etthāti avuṭṭhiko janapado, abhikkhuko vihāro, natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro, ``sare ana''ti ^b^ana, tappurisa^eb^ggahaṇamupalakkhaṇaṃ, athavā ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^na^eb^ssa ^b^ana^eb^. evaṃ natthi anto assāti anantaṃ, na vijjanti āsavā etesanti anāsavā iccādi.

[03] ^b^paṭhamāyatthe sahapubbapado^eb^ yathā -- saha hetunā yo vattateti sahetuko, sahetu vā, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^a^M0.0206^ea^ ^b^saha^eb^saddassa ^b^sā^eb^deso, ``kvaci samāsanta''iccādinā ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo ca, saha pītiyā ime vattantīti sappītikā. evaṃ saha paccayehi vattantīti sappaccayā, sakileso, saupādāno, saparivāro, saha mūlena uddhato samūluddhato rukkho.

[03] ^b^upamānapubbapado paṭhamāyatthe^eb^ tāva -- upamānopameyyabhāvappasiddhatthaṃ ^b^iva^eb^saddappayogo, kāyabyāmānaṃ samappamāṇatāya nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo yo rājakumāro soyaṃnigrodhaparimaṇḍalo rājakumāro. ``vuttatthānamappayogo''ti ^b^iva^eb^saddassa appayogo, saṅkho viya paṇḍaro ayanti saṅkhapaṇḍaro, kāko viya sūro ayanti kākasūro, cakkhu iva bhūto ayaṃ paramatthadassanatoti cakkhubhūto bhagavā. evaṃ atthabhūto. dhammabhūto, brahmabhūto, andho viya bhūto ayanti andhabhūto bālo. muñjapabbajamiva bhūtā ayanti muñjapabbajabhūtā kudiṭṭhi. tantākulakamiva jātā ayanti tantākulakajātā.

[03] ^b^chaṭṭhiyatthe^eb^ -- suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa soyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhagavā. uttarapadalopo, nāgassa viya assa gatīti nāgagati. evaṃ sīhagati, nāgavikkamo, sīhavikkamo, sīhahanu, eṇissa viya assa jaṅghāti eṇijaṅgho, sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya assa kāyoti sīhapubbaddhakāyo, brahmuno viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato saro assāti brahmassaro.

[03] ^b^vāsaddatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0207^ea^ ^b^saṅkhyobhayapado^eb^ yathā -- dve vā tayo vā pattā dvattipattā, ``dvekaṭṭhānamākāro vā''ti ^b^dvi^eb^saddantassa ^b^ā^eb^ttaṃ, rassattaṃ, dvīhaṃ vā tīhaṃ vā dvīhatīhaṃ, cha vā pañca vā vācā chappañcavācā. evaṃ sattaṭṭhamāsā, ekayojanadviyojanāni.

[03] ^b^disantarāḷattho^eb^ yathā -- pubbassā ca dakkhiṇassā ca disāya yadantarāḷaṃ sāyaṃ pubbadakkhiṇā vidisā. ettha tulyādhikaraṇapadaparattābhāvā na pumbhāvātideso, ``kvacādimajjhuttarāna''ntiādinā disantarāḷatthe pubbapadassa rassattaṃ. evaṃ pubbuttarā, aparadakkhiṇā, pacchimuttarā. yadā pana dakkhiṇā ca sā pubbā cāti kammadhārayasamāso hoti, tadā pumbhāvātideso uttarapadatthappadhānattā, sabbanāmikavidhānampi niccaṃ bhavatiyeva, yathā -- dakkhiṇapubbassā, dakkhiṇapubbassamiti.

[03] ^b^byatihāralakkhaṇo^eb^ yathā -- kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti kesākesi, daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti daṇḍādaṇḍi, ``kvacādimajjhuttarāna''ntiādinā majjhedīgho, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā antassikāro.
[03] tattha ^a^M0.0208^ea^ ^b^itarītarayoge^eb^ tāva -- ``sāriputtamoggallāna''itīdha ubhayatthāpi paṭhamekavacanaṃ, samuccayajotanatthaṃ ^b^ca^eb^saddappayogo ca.
[03] nānānāmānameva ekavibhattikānaṃ yuttatthānaṃ yo samuccayo, so vibhāsā samāso bhavati, dvandasañño ca.
[03] ettha ca ^b^samuccayo^eb^ nāma sampiṇḍanaṃ, so pana atthavasena kevalasamuccayo anvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāro cāti catubbidho.

[03] tattha kevalasamuccaye, anvācaye ca samāso na bhavati, kriyāsāpekkhatāya nāmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ ayuttatthabhāvato, yathā -- cīvaraṃ piṇḍapātañca paccayaṃ sayanāsanaṃ adāsi, dānañca dehi, sīlañca rakkhāhi. itarītarayoge, samāhāre ca samāso bhavati, tattha nāmānaṃ aññamaññaṃ yuttatthabhāvato.
[03] dve dve padāni dvandā, dvandaṭṭhā vā dvandā, dvandasadisattā ayaṃ samāsopi anvatthasaññāya ^b^dvando^eb^ti vuccati, ubhayapadatthappadhāno hi dvando.

[03] nanu ca ubhayapadatthappadhānatte sati dvande kathamekatthībhāvo siyāti? vuccate -- sadisādiatthepi saddappavattisambhavenadvinnaṃ padānaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva atthadvayadīpakattā na virodho, tañca dvandavisayameva, tesamatthadvayadīpakattā. yathā hi ^b^bhū^eb^saddo anubhavābhibhavādike atthe ^b^anvabhi^eb^ādiupasaggasahitova dīpeti, na kevalo, evaṃ ``gavassaka''ntiādīsu ^a^M0.0209^ea^ gavādīnaṃ ^b^assā^eb^disaddantarasahitānameva atthadvayadīpanaṃ, na kevalānanti tañca dvandavisayameva, na sabbatthāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. atha vā dvinnampi yathāvuttasamuccayadīpakattā atthi dvandepekatthitāti na koci virodho, tato samāsasaññāvibhattilopādi vuttanayameva, samāseneva catthassa vuttattā ``vuttatthānamappayogo''ti ^b^ca^eb^saddassa appayogo.
[03] idha dvande accitataraṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, parasseva liṅgañca. itarītarayogassa avayavappadhānattā sabbattha bahuvacanameva.

[03] sāriputtamoggallānā, sāriputtamoggallāne, sāriputtamoggallānehi iccādi, samaṇo ca brāhmaṇo ca samaṇabrāhmaṇā. evaṃ brāhmaṇagahapatikā, khattiyabrāhmaṇā, devamanussā, candimasūriyā, mātā ca pitā ca mātāpitaro, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā dvande ^b^mātu^eb^ādipubbapad^b^u^eb^kārassa ^b^ā^eb^kāro. evaṃ pitāputtā.
[03] ^b^jāyā^eb^saddassa ^b^tudaṃ jāni^eb^iccete ādesā honti ^b^pati^eb^sadde pare kvaci. tudaṃpati, jānipati, jayampatikā. ^b^e^eb^ttha niggahītāgamo, ``kvacā''dinā rassattañca.

[03] kvaci appasaraṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, yathā -- cando ca sūriyo ca candasūriyā, nigamā ca janapadā ca nigamajanapadā, surā ca asurā ^a^M0.0210^ea^ ca garuḷā ca manujā ca bhujagā ca gandhabbā ca surāsuragaruḷamanujabhujagagandhabbā.
[03] kvaci ^b^ivaṇṇu^eb^vaṇṇantānaṃ pubbanipāto, yathā -- aggi ca dhūmo ca aggidhūmā. evaṃ gatibuddhibhujapaṭhaharakarasayā, dhātavo ca liṅgāni ca dhātuliṅgāni.
[03] kvaci sarādi^b^a^eb^kārantānaṃ pubbanipāto, yathā -- attho ca dhammo ca atthadhammā. evaṃ atthasaddā, saddatthā vā.
[03] ^b^samāhāre^eb^ pana -- ``cakkhu ca sotañcā''ti atthe ``nāmānaṃ samuccayo dvando''ti dvandasamāsaṃ katvā vibhattilopādimhi kate --
[03] 359^b^.^eb^ ^b^tathā dvande pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅga khuddajantuka vividha viruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca^eb^.
[03] yathā digusamāse, tathā samāhāradvandasamāsepi pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅgatthānaṃ, khuddajantukavividha viruddhavisabhāgatthaiccevamādīnañca ekattaṃ hoti, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca.

[03] pāṇino ca tūriyāni ca yoggāni ca senā cāti pāṇitūriya yoggasenā, tāsamaṅgāni ^b^pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgāni,^eb^ dvandato parattā ^b^aṅga^eb^saddo paccekamabhisambajjhate. khuddā ca te jantukā ceti ^b^khuddajantukā,^eb^ vividhenākārena viruddhā ^b^vividhaviruddhā,^eb^ niccavirodhino. samāno bhāgo yesaṃ te sabhāgā, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^samāna^eb^ssa ^b^sa^eb^ādeso, vividhā ca te lakkhaṇato sabhāgā ca kiccatoti ^b^visabhāgā^eb^. pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgāni ca khuddajantukā ca vividhaviruddhā ca visabhāgā cāti dvando, idha bahuttā pubbanipātassa aniyamo, te atthā yesaṃ ^a^M0.0211^ea^ te pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgakhuddajantukavividhaviruddhavisabhāgatthā, te ādayo yesaṃ te tadādayo.

[03] ^b^ādi^eb^ggahaṇena aññoññaliṅgavisesita saṅkhyāparimāṇattha pacanacaṇḍālattha disatthādīnañca dvande ekattaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca, iti pāṇyaṅgatthabhāvato cakkhusotasaddānaṃ iminā ekattaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca katvā samāsattā nāmabyapadese kate ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti ^b^a^eb^mādesādi.

[03] cakkhusotaṃ, he cakkhusota, cakkhusotaṃ, cakkhusotena. evaṃ sabbatthekavacanameva. mukhañca nāsikā ca mukhanāsikaṃ, ``saro rasso napuṃsake''ti antassa rassattaṃ, hanu ca gīvā ca hanugīvaṃ. evaṃ kaṇṇanāsaṃ, pāṇipādaṃ, chavimaṃsalohitaṃ. hatthapādā maṃsalohitānītiādīnaṃ pana itarītarayogena siddhaṃ. evaṃ ^b^pāṇyaṅgatthe^eb^.

[03] ^b^tūriyaṅgatthe^eb^ gītañca vāditañca gītavāditaṃ, sammañca tāḷañca sammatāḷaṃ, ^b^samma^eb^nti kaṃsatāḷaṃ. ^b^tāḷa^eb^nti hatthatāḷaṃ. saṅkhe ca paṇavo ca ḍiṇḍimo ca, saṅkhā ca paṇavā ca ḍaṃṇḍimā cāti vā saṅkhapaṇavaḍiṇḍimaṃ, paṇavādayo dvepi bheriviseso.
[03] ^b^yoggaṅgatthe^eb^ yathā -- phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṃ.

[03] ^b^senaṅgatthe^eb^ hatthino ca assā ca hatthiassaṃ, rathā ca pattikā ca rathapattikaṃ, asi ca cammañca asicammaṃ, ^b^camma^eb^nti saravāraṇaphalakaṃ. dhanu ca kalāpo ca dhanukalāpaṃ, ^b^kalāpo^eb^ti tūṇīraṃ.
[03] ^b^khuddajantukatthe^eb^ ḍaṃsā ca makasā ca ḍaṃsamakasaṃ. evaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ, kīṭapaṭaṅgaṃ, kīṭasarīsapaṃ. tattha ^b^kunthā^eb^ sukhumakipillikā, ^b^kīṭā^eb^ kapālapiṭṭhikapāṇā.
[03] ^b^vividhaviruddhatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0212^ea^ ahi ca nakulo ca, ahī ca nakulā cāti vā ahinakulaṃ. evaṃ biḷāramūsikaṃ, antassa rassattaṃ, kākolūkaṃ, sappamaṇḍūkaṃ, garuḷasappaṃ.

[03] ^b^visabhāgatthe^eb^ sīlañca paññāṇañca sīlapaññāṇaṃ, samatho ca vipassanā ca samathavipassanaṃ. evaṃ nāmarūpaṃ, hirottappaṃ. satisampajaññaṃ, lobhamohaṃ, dosamohaṃ, ahirikānottappaṃ, thinamiddhaṃ, uddhaccakukkuccamiccādi. ``aṃmo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī''ti ettha ``aṃmo''ti niddesadassanato katthaci napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ, tena ādhipaccaparivāro chandapārisuddhi paṭisandhippavattiyantiādi sijjhati.
[03] ^b^aññoññaliṅgavisesitānaṃ dvande^eb^ dāsī ca dāso ca dāsidāsaṃ, ``kvacādī''tiādinā majjhe rassattaṃ. evaṃ itthipumaṃ, pattacīvaraṃ, sākhāpalāsamiccādi.
[03] ^b^saṅkhyāparimāṇatthānaṃ dvande^eb^ ekakañca dukañca ekakadukaṃ, saṅkhyādvande appasaṅkhyā pubbaṃ nipatati. evaṃ dukatikaṃ, tikacatukkaṃ, catukkapañcakaṃ, dīgho ca majjhimo ca dīghamajjhimaṃ.

[03] ^b^pacanacaṇḍālatthānaṃ dvande^eb^ orabbhikā ca sūkarikā ca orabbhikasūkarikaṃ. evaṃ sākuṇikamāgavikaṃ, sapāko ca caṇḍālo ca sapākacaṇḍālaṃ, pukkusachavaḍāhakaṃ, venarathakāraṃ. tattha ^b^venā^eb^ tacchakā, ^b^rathakārā^eb^ cammakārā.

[03] ^b^disatthānaṃ dvande^eb^ pubbā ca aparā cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṃ, vibhattilopañca katvā idhā^b^di^eb^ggahaṇena ekatte, napuṃsakaliṅgatte ca kate ``saro rasso napuṃsake''ti rassattaṃ, pubbāparaṃ ^a^M0.0213^ea^, he pubbāpara, pubbāparaṃ, pubbāparena, pubbāparassa iccādi. evaṃ puratthimapacchimaṃ, dakkhiṇuttaraṃ, adharuttaraṃ.
[03] 360^b^.^eb^ ^b^vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnañca^eb^.
[03] rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnamekattaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca vibhāsā hoti dvande samāse. ^b^e^eb^kattābhāve bahuvacanaṃ, parasseva liṅgañca.

[03] tattha ^b^rukkhānaṃ dvande^eb^ assatthā ca kapitthā cāti atthe samāhāre dvandasamāsādimhi kate iminā vikappenekattaṃ, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca. assatthakapitthaṃ, assatthakapitthā vā. evaṃ ambapanasaṃ, ambapanasā vā, khadirapalāsaṃ, khadirapalāsā vā, dhavassakaṇṇakaṃ, dhavassakaṇṇakā vā.
[03] ^b^tiṇānaṃ dvande^eb^ usīrāni ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṃ, usīrabīraṇāni vā. evaṃ muñjapabbajaṃ, muñjapabbajā vā, kāsakusaṃ, kāsakusā vā.

[03] ^b^pasūnaṃ dvande^eb^ ajā ca eḷakā ca ajeḷakaṃ, ajeḷakā vā, hatthī ca gāvo ca assā ca vaḷavā ca hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ, hatthigavassavaḷavā vā, ``kvacā''tiādinā rassattaṃ, ``osare cā''ti ^b^avā^eb^deso ca, gomahiṃsaṃ, gomahiṃsā vā, eṇeyyavarāhaṃ, eṇeyyavarāhā vā, sīhabyagghataracchaṃ, sīhabyagghataracchā vā.
[03] ^b^dhanānaṃ dvande^eb^ hiraññañca suvaṇṇañca hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ, hiraññasuvaṇṇāni vā. evaṃ jātarūparajataṃ, jātarūparajatāni vā, maṇimuttasaṅkhaveḷuriyaṃ, maṇimuttasaṅkhaveḷuriyā vā.
[03] ^b^dhaññānaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0214^ea^ ^b^dvande^eb^ sālī ca yavā ca sāliyavaṃ, sāliyavā vā. evaṃ tilamuggamāsaṃ, tilamuggamāsā vā.
[03] ^b^janapadānaṃ dvande^eb^ kāsī ca kosalā ca kāsikosalaṃ, kāsikosalā vā, vajjī ca mallā ca vajjimallaṃ, vajjimallā vā, aṅgā ca magadhā ca aṅgamagadhaṃ, aṅgamagadhā vā.

[03] ^b^ādi^eb^ggahaṇena aññoññappaṭipakkhadhammānaṃ, sakuṇatthānañca dvande vibhāsā ekattaṃ hoti, napuṃsakaliṅgattañca. kusalañca akusalañca kusalākusalaṃ, kusalākusalā vā, evaṃ sāvajjānavajjaṃ, sāvajjānavajjā vā, hīnappaṇītaṃ, hīnappaṇītā vā, kaṇhasukkaṃ, kaṇhasukkā vā, sukhadukkhaṃ, sukhadukkhāni vā, paṭighānunayaṃ, paṭighānunayā vā, chāyātapaṃ, chāyātapā vā, ālokandhakāraṃ, ālokandhakārā vā, ratti ca divā ca rattindivaṃ, rattindivā vā, ahañca ratti ca ahorattaṃ, ahorattā vā, ``kvaci samāsanta''iccādinā ^b^ā^eb^kārikārānamattaṃ.
[03] ^b^sakuṇānaṃ dvande^eb^ haṃsā ca bakā ca haṃsabakaṃ, haṃsabakā vā. evaṃ kāraṇḍavacakkavākaṃ, kāraṇḍavacakkavākā vā, mayūrakoñcaṃ, mayūrakoñcā vā, sukasālikaṃ, sukasālikā vā.
[27] digu dudhā tappuriso, aṭṭhadhā navadhā bhave.
[03] atha ^a^M0.0216^ea^ nāmato eva vibhatyantā apaccādiatthavisese taddhituppattīti nāmato paraṃ taddhitavidhānamārabhīyate.

[03] tattha tasmā tividhaliṅgato paraṃ hutvā hitā sahitāti ^b^taddhitā, ṇā^eb^dipaccayānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ, tesaṃ vā nāmikānaṃ hitā upakārā taddhitāti anvatthabhūtaparasamaññāvasenāpi ^b^ṇā^eb^dippaccayāva taddhitā nāma.
[03] chaṭṭhiyantato liṅgamhā ^b^ṇa^eb^ppaccayo hoti vikappena ``tassa apacca''miccetasmiṃ atthe.

[03] dhātūhi, liṅgehi ca paccayā parāva hontīti paribhāsato apaccatthasambandhiliṅgato chaṭṭhiyantāyeva paro hoti. paṭicca etasmā attho etīti ^b^paccayo,^eb^ patīyanti anena atthāti vā paccayo, ``vuttatthānamappayogo''ti ^b^apacca^eb^saddassa appayogo, ``tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā ce''ti vibhattilopo ca.

[03] ādisarassa vā ādibyañjanassa vā asaṃyogantassa vuddhi hoti sa^b^ṇa^eb^kārappaccaye pare. saṃyogo anto assāti saṃyoganto, tadañño ^b^asaṃyoganto^eb^. atha vā vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, tadā ca pakatibhūte liṅge sarānamādisarassa asaṃyogantassa vuddhi hoti sa^b^ṇa^eb^kāre taddhitappaccaye pareti attho.

[03] tesaṃ ^b^a^eb^kāra^b^i^eb^va^b^ṇṇu^eb^vaṇṇānameva yathākkamaṃ ^b^ā eo^eb^iccete vuddhiyo honti. ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇamavuddhisampiṇḍanatthaṃ, avadhāraṇatthaṃ vā. i ca u ca yu, yu eva vaṇṇā yuvaṇṇā, a ca yuvaṇṇā ca ^b^ayuvaṇṇā^eb^. ā ca e ca o ca ^b^āyo^eb^. puna ^b^vuddhi^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ``negamajānapadā''tiādīsu uttarapadavuddhibhāvatthaṃ, ettha ca ``ayuvaṇṇāna''nti ṭhānaniyamavacanaṃ āyonaṃ vuddhibhāvappasaṅganivattanatthaṃ.
[21] yathā ^a^M0.0218^ea^ hi katavuddhīnaṃ, puna vuddhi na hotiha.
[22] tathā sabhāvavuddhīnaṃ, āyonaṃ puna vuddhi na..

[03] tato ^b^a^eb^kārassa ^b^ā^eb^kāro vuddhi, ``saralopomādesappaccayādimhi saralope tu pakatī''ti saralopapakatibhāvā, ``naye paraṃ yutte''ti paranayanaṃ katvā taddhitattā ``taddhitasamāsa''iccādinā nāmabyapadese kate pure viya ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti.
[03] vāsiṭṭho, vasiṭṭhassa putto vā, vāsiṭṭhā iccādi ^b^purisa^eb^saddasamaṃ. tassa nattupanattādayopi tadupacārato vāsiṭṭhāyeva. evaṃ sabbattha gottataddhite paṭhamappakatitoyeva paccayo hoti.

[03] ^b^itthiyaṃ^eb^ ṇappaccayantattā ``ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇa ntūhī''ti ^b^vāsiṭṭha^eb^saddato īpaccayo. saralopādiṃ katvā itthippaccayantattā ``taddhitasamāsa''iccādisutte ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena nāmabyapadese kate ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti, vāsiṭṭhī kaññā, vāsiṭṭhī, vāsiṭṭhiyo iccādi ^b^itthi^eb^saddasamaṃ.
[03] ^b^napuṃsake^eb^ vāsiṭṭhaṃ apaccaṃ, vāsiṭṭhāni apaccāni iccādi ^b^citta^eb^saddasamaṃ. evaṃ uparipi taddhitantassa tiliṅgatā veditabbā.

[03] bhāradvājassa putto bhāradvājo, vesāmittassa putto vesāmitto, gotamassa putto gotamo. ettha ca ayuvaṇṇattābhāvā ^b^ā^eb^kārādīnaṃ na vuddhi hoti. vasudevassa apaccaṃ vāsudevo, baladevo. ``cittako''tiādīsu pana saṃyogantattā vuddhi na bhavati.

[03] ``vacchassa apacca''nti viggahe ^b^ṇa^eb^mhi sampatte ``vā ṇa'pacce''ti ito ^b^vā^eb^ti taddhitavidhāne sabbattha vattate, tena sabbattha vākyavuttiyo bhavanti. ``apacce''ti padaṃ yāva ^b^saṃsaṭṭha^eb^ggahaṇāva vattate.

[03] ^b^vaccha kacca^eb^iccevamādito chaṭṭhiyantato gottagaṇato ^b^ṇāyana ṇāna^eb^iccate paccayā honti vā ``tassāpacca''miccetasmiṃ atthe. sabbattha ^b^ṇa^eb^kārānubandho vuddhattho, sesaṃ pubbasamaṃ, saṃyogantattā vuddhiabhāvova viseso.

[03] vacchāyano vacchāno vacchassa putto vā. evaṃ kaccassa putto kaccāyano kaccāno, moggallassa putto moggallāyano moggallāno. evaṃ aggivessāyano aggivessāno, kaṇhāyano kaṇhāno, sākaṭāyano sākaṭāno, muñcāyano muñcāno, kuñjāyano kuñjāno iccādi. ākatigaṇo'yaṃ.
[03] ^b^ādi^eb^saddoyaṃ pakāre vattate. ^b^kattikā vinatārohiṇī^eb^iccevamādīhi itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi ^b^ṇeyya^eb^ppaccayo hoti vā ``tassāpacca''miccetasmiṃ atthe.

[03] vibhattilope ``pakati cassa sarantassā''ti pakatibhāvo. kattikeyyo, kattikāya putto vā. evaṃ vinatāya apaccaṃ venateyyo, ^b^i^eb^kāra^b^sse^eb^kāro vuddhi, rohiṇiyā putto rohiṇeyyo, gaṅgāya apaccaṃ gaṅgeyyo, bhaginiyā putto bhāgineyyo, nadiyāputto nādeyyo. evaṃ anteyyo, āheyyo, kāmeyyo. suciyā ^a^M0.0220^ea^ apaccaṃ soceyyo, ettha ^b^u^eb^kāra^b^sso^eb^kāro vuddhi, bālāya apaccaṃ bāleyyo iccādi.

[03] ^b^a^eb^kārantato liṅgamhā ^b^ṇi^eb^paccayo hoti vā ``tassāpacca''miccetasmiṃ atthe. dakkhi, dakkhī, dakkhayo, doṇassa apaccaṃ doṇi. evaṃ vāsavi, sakyaputti, nāṭaputti, dāsaputti, dāsarathi. vāruṇi, kaṇḍi, bāladevi, pāvaki, jinadattassa apaccaṃ jenadatti, suddhodani, anuruddhi iccādi.

[03] puna ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena apaccatthe ^b^ṇika^eb^ppaccayo, ^b^aditi^eb^ādito ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayo ca. yathā -- sakyaputtassa putto sakyaputtiko, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^ka^eb^kārassa ^b^ya^eb^kāro, sakyaputtiyo. evaṃ nāṭaputtiko, jenadattiko, vimātuyā putto vemātiko.

[03] ^b^a^eb^vaṇṇo taddhitabhūte ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye pare lopamāpajjate. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ivaṇṇopīti ^b^i^eb^kāralopo, ``yavataṃ talanadakārānaṃ byañjanāni ca la ña jakāratta''nti ^b^tya^eb^kārasaṃyogassa ^b^ca^eb^kāro, ``paradvebhāvo ṭhāne''ti dvittaṃ, ādicco. evaṃ ditiyā putto decco.

[03] tesu ādimajjhuttaresu avihitalakkhaṇesu jinavacanānuparodhena kvaci vuddhi lopa āgama vikāra viparītāadesā hontīti saṃyogantattepi ādivuddhi, ^b^i^eb^kāralope ^b^nya^eb^ssa^b^ñā^eb^deso, koṇḍañño, kuruno putto korabyo, etthāpi teneva ^b^u^eb^kārassa ^b^avā^eb^deso, bhātuno putto bhātabyo.

[03] ^b^upagu manu^eb^iccevamādīhi ^b^u^eb^kārantehi gottagaṇehi ^b^ṇava^eb^ppaccayo hoti vā ``tassāpacca''miccetasmiṃ atthe. ^b^ādi^eb^saddassa cettha pakāravācakattā ^b^u^eb^kārantatoyevāyaṃ. opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṃ, manuno apaccaṃ mānavo, ``mānuso''ti ^b^ṇa^eb^ppaccaye, ^b^sā^eb^game ca kate rūpaṃ, bhagguno apaccaṃ bhaggavo, paṇḍuno apaccaṃ paṇḍavo, upavindussa apaccaṃ opavindavo iccādi.

[03] ^b^vidhavā^eb^dito ^b^ṇera^eb^ppaccayo hoti vā apaccatthe. vigato dhavo pati etissāti vidhavā, vedhavero, bandhukiyā abhisāriṇiyā putto bandhukero, samaṇassa upajjhāyassa putto puttaṭṭhāniyattāti sāmaṇero, nāḷikero iccādi.
[03] 373^b^.^eb^ ^b^yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tarati carati vahati ṇiko^eb^.

[03] yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ, yena vā tarati, yena vā carati, yena vā vahati, tato tatiyantato liṅgamhā tesu saṃsaṭṭhādīsvatthesu ^b^ṇika^eb^ppaccayo hoti vā. telikaṃ bhojanaṃ, tilena abhisaṅkhatanti attho. telikī yāgu. guḷena saṃsaṭṭhaṃ egāḷikaṃ. evaṃ ghātikaṃ, dādhikaṃ, māricikaṃ, loṇikaṃ.

[03] nāvāya taratīti nāviko, uḷumpena taratīti oḷumpiko, vuddhiabhāvapakkhe uḷumpiko. evaṃ kulliko, gopucchiko. sakaṭena caratīti sākaṭiko. evaṃ pādiko, daṇḍiko, dhammena carati pavattatīti dhammiko. sīsena vahatīti sīsiko, ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ī^eb^kārassa vuddhi na hoti. evaṃ aṃsiko, khandhiko, hatthiko, aṅguliko.
[03] puna ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena aññatthesupi ^b^ṇika^eb^ppaccayo, paradāraṃ gacchatīti pāradāriko, pathaṃ gacchatīti pathiko.

[03] catuppadamidaṃ. tamadhīteti atthe, tena katādīsvatthesu ca tamhi sannidhāno, tattha niyutto, tamassa sippaṃ, tamassa bhaṇḍaṃ ^a^M0.0223^ea^, tamassa jīvikā iccetesvatthesu ca dutiyādivibhatyantehi liṅgehi ^b^ṇika^eb^ppaccayo hoti vā. venayiko. evaṃ suttantiko, ābhidhammiko.
[03] ^b^i u^eb^iccebhesaṃ ādisarānaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ mā vuddhi hoti saṇe, tatreva vuddhi āgamo hoti ca ṭhāneti ekāravuddhāgamo.

[03] veyyākaraṇiko, nyāyamadhīteti neyyāyiko. evaṃ takkiko, vediko, nemittiko, kāyena kato payogo kāyiko, kāyena kataṃ kammaṃ kāyikaṃ, vacasā kataṃ kammaṃ vācasikaṃ. evaṃ mānasikaṃ, ettha ca ``sasare vāgamo''ti sutte vavatthita^b^vā^eb^saddena paccaye parepi ^b^sā^eb^gamo, therehi katā saṅgīti therikā. evaṃ pañcasatikā, sattasatikā, ettha ``ṇavaṇikā''disutte anuvattita^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena īpaccayo na hoti.
[03] ^b^sannidhānatthe^eb^ sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā, sārīrikaṃ dukkhaṃ. evaṃ mānasikā, mānasikaṃ.

[03] ^b^niyuttatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0224^ea^ dvāre niyutto dovāriko, ettha ``māyūnamāgamo ṭhāne''ti ^b^va^eb^kārato pubbe^b^o^eb^kārāgamo. evaṃ bhaṇḍāgāriko, nāgariko, navakammiko, vanakammiko, ādikammiko, odariko, rathiko, pathiko, upāye niyutto opāyiko, cetasi niyuttā cetasikā.
[03] ^b^sippatthe^eb^ vīṇāvādanaṃ vīṇā, vīṇā assa sippaṃ veṇiko. ^b^e^eb^vaṃ pāṇaviko, modiṅgiko, vaṃsiko.
[03] ^b^bhaṇḍatthe^eb^ gandho assa bhaṇḍanti gandhiko. evaṃ teliko, goḷiko, pūviko, paṇṇiko, tambūliko, loṇiko.
[03] ^b^jīvikatthe^eb^ urabbhaṃ hantvā jīvati, urabbhamassa jīvikāti vā orabbhiko. evaṃ māgaviko, ettha ^b^va^eb^kārāgamo. sūkariko, sākuṇiko, macchiko iccādi.

[03] ``tena katādī''ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^ggahaṇena tena hataṃ, tena baddhaṃ, tena kītaṃ, tena dibbati, so assa āvudho, so assa ābādho, tattha pasanno, tassa santakaṃ, tamassa parimāṇaṃ, tassa rāsi, taṃ arahati, tamassa sīlaṃ, tattha jāto, tattha vasati, tatra vidito, tadatthāya saṃvattati, tato āgato, tato sambhūto, tadassa payojananti evamādiatthe ca ^b^ṇika^eb^ppaccayo hoti. yathā -- jālena hato, hanatīti vā jāliko. evaṃ bāḷisiko, vākariko, suttena baddho suttiko, varattāya baddho vārattiko nāgo.

[03] vatthena ^a^M0.0225^ea^ kītaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vatthikaṃ. evaṃ kumbhikaṃ, phālikaṃ, sovaṇṇikaṃ, sātikaṃ. akkhena dibbatīti akkhiko. evaṃ sālākiko, tindukiko, ambaphaliko. cāpo assa āvudhoti cāpiko. evaṃ tomariko, muggariko, mosaliko.
[03] vāto assa ābādhoti vātiko. evaṃ semhiko, pittiko.
[03] buddhe pasanno buddhiko. evaṃ dhammiko, saṅghiko. buddhassa santako buddhiko. evaṃ dhammiko, saṅghiko vihāro, saṅghikā bhūmi, saṅghikaṃ cīvaraṃ, puggalikaṃ.

[03] kumbho assa parimāṇanti kumbhikaṃ. evaṃ khārikaṃ, doṇikaṃ. kumbhassa rāsi kumbhiko. kumbhaṃ arahatīti kumbhiko. evaṃ doṇiko, aṭṭhamāsiko, kahāpaṇiko, āsītikā gāthā, nāvutikā, sātikaṃ, sāhassikaṃ. sandiṭṭhamarahatīti sandiṭṭhiko, ``ehi passā''ti imaṃ vidhiṃ arahatīti ehipassiko.
[03] ^b^sīlatthe^eb^ paṃsukūladhāraṇaṃ paṃsukūlaṃ, taṃ sīlamassāti paṃsukūliko. evaṃ tecīvariko, ekāsane bhojanasīlo ekāsaniko, rukkhamūle vasanasīlo rukkhamūliko, tathā āraññiko, sosāniko.

[03] ^b^jātatthe^eb^ apāye jāto āpāyiko. evaṃ nerayiko, sāmuddiko maccho, vassesu jāto vassiko, vassikā, vassikaṃ pupphaṃ, sāradiko, hemantiko, vāsantiko, cātuddasiko, rājagahe jāto, rājagahe ^a^M0.0226^ea^ vasatīti vā rājagahiko jano, magadhesu jāto, vasatīti vā māgadhiko, māgadhikā, māgadhikaṃ, sāvatthiyaṃ jāto, vasatīti vā sāvatthiko, kāpilavatthiko, vesāliko.
[03] loke vidito lokiko, lokāya saṃvattatītipi lokiko. tathā mātito āgataṃ mātikaṃ, pitito āgataṃ pettikaṃ nāmaṃ.
[03] ^b^sambhūtatthe^eb^ mātito sambhūtaṃ mattikaṃ. evaṃ pettikaṃ. upadhitassa payojanaṃ opadhikaṃ.

[03] ^b^sakatthepi^eb^ asaṅkhāroyeva asaṅkhārikaṃ. evaṃ sasaṅkhārikaṃ, nāmameva nāmikaṃ. evaṃ ākhyātikaṃ, opasaggikaṃ, nepātikaṃ, catumahārāje bhatti etesanti cātumahārājikā. evaṃ aññatthepi yojetabbaṃ.
[03] rāgatthavācakā liṅgamhā ``tena ratta''miccetasmiṃ atthe, ``tasse''ti chaṭṭhiyantato ``ida''miccetasmiṃ atthe ca aññatthesu ca ^b^ṇa^eb^ppaccayo hoti vā.
[03] kāsāvaṃ vatthaṃ. evaṃ kāsāyaṃ, kusumbhena rattaṃ kosumbhaṃ, haliddiyā rattaṃ hāliddaṃ, pattaṅgaṃ, mañjiṭṭhaṃ, kuṅkumaṃ, nīlena rattaṃ nīlaṃ. evaṃ pītaṃ.
[03] ^b^idamatthe^eb^ ^a^M0.0227^ea^ mahiṃsassa idaṃ māhiṃsaṃ maṃsaṃ, dadhi sappi cammādikaṃ vā, sūkarassa idaṃ sūkaraṃ, kaccāyanassa idaṃ kaccāyanaṃ byākaraṇaṃ. evaṃ sogataṃ sāsanaṃ.
[03] ^b^i u^eb^iccetesaṃ ādisarānaṃ ^b^ā^eb^ttañca hoti ^b^saṇa^eb^kārappaccaye pare, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ri^eb^kārāgamo ca ṭhāneti ^b^i^eb^kārassa ^b^ā^eb^ttaṃ.
[03] ārisyaṃ, usabhassa idaṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ, āsabhī vācā.

[03] ^b^aññattha^eb^ggahaṇena pana avidūrabhavo, tatra bhavo, tatra jāto, tato āgato, so assa nivāso, tassa issaro, kattikādīhi niyutto māso, sāssa devatā, tamaveccādhīte, tassa visayo deso, tasmiṃ dese atthi, tena nibbattaṃ, taṃ arahati, tassa vikāro, tamassa parimāṇanti iccevamādīsvatthesu ca ^b^ṇa^eb^ppaccayo. yathā -- vidisāya avidūre bhavo vediso gāmo, udumbarassa avidūre bhavaṃ odumbaraṃ vimānaṃ.

[03] ^b^bhavatthe^eb^ manasi bhavaṃ mānasaṃ sukhaṃ, sāgamo. sare bhavo sāraso sakuṇo, sārasā sakuṇī, sārasaṃ pupphaṃ ^a^M0.0228^ea^, urasi bhavo oraso putto, urasi saṃvaḍḍhitattā, mitte bhavā mettā, mettī vā, pure bhavā porī vācā.

[03] ^b^jātādīsu^eb^ pāvuse jāto pāvuso megho, pāvusā ratti, pāvusaṃ abbhaṃ, sarade jāto sārado māso, sāradā ratti, sāradaṃ pupphaṃ. evaṃ sisiro, hemanto, vasanto, vimho, mathurāyaṃ jāto māthuro jano, māthurā gaṇikā, māthuraṃ vatthaṃ. mathurāya āgato māthuro, mathurā assa nivāsoti māthuro, mathurāya issaro māthuro rājā. ``sabbato ko''ti ettha puna ^b^sabbato^eb^ggahaṇena taddhitatopi kvaci sasara^b^ka^eb^kārāgamo, māthurako vā, rājagahe jāto, rājagahā āgato, rājagaho assa nivāsoti vā, rājagahassa issaroti vā rājagaho, rājagahako vā. evaṃ sāgalo, sāgalako vā, pāṭaliputto, pāṭaliputtako vā, vesāliyaṃ jātotiādiatthe vesālo, vesālako vā, kusināre jāto kosināro, kosinārako vā. evaṃ sāketo, sāketako vā, kosambo, kosambako vā, indapatto, indapattako vā, kapillo, kapillako vā, bhārukaccho, bhārukacchako vā, nagare jāto, nagarā āgato, nagare vasatīti vā nāgaro, nāgarako vā. evaṃ jānapado.

[03] janapadanāmesu pana sabbattha bahuvacanameva bhavati. yathā -- aṅgesu jāto, aṅgehi āgato, aṅgā assa nivāso, aṅgānaṃ issaro vā aṅgo, aṅgako vā, māgadho, māgadhako vā, kosalo, kosalako vā ^a^M0.0229^ea^, vedeho, vedehako vā, kambojo, kambojako vā, gandhāro, gandhārako vā, sovīro, sovīrako vā, sindhavo, sindhavako vā, assako, kāliṅgo, pañcālo, sakko, tathā suraṭṭhe jāto, suraṭṭhassa issaro vā soraṭṭho, soraṭṭhako vā. evaṃ mahāraṭṭho, mahāraṭṭhako vā iccādi.

[03] ^b^nakkhattayoge^eb^ kattikāya puṇṇacandayuttāya yutto māso kattiko, magasirena candayuttena nakkhattena yutto māso māgasiro. evaṃ phussena yutto māso phusso, maghāya yutto māso māgho, phagguniyā yutto māso phagguno, cittāya yutto māso citto, visākhāya yutto māso vesākho, jeṭṭhāya yutto māso jeṭṭho, uttarāsāḷhāya yutto māso āsāḷho, āsāḷhī vā, savaṇena yutto māso sāvaṇo, sāvaṇī. bhaddena yutto māso bhaddo, assayujena yutto māso assayujo, buddho assa devatāti buddho. evaṃ sogato, māhindo, yāmo, somo.
[03] byākaraṇaṃ aveccādhīte veyyākaraṇo. evaṃ mohutto, nemitto, aṅgavijjo, vatthuvijjo. vasātīnaṃ visayo deso vāsāto, udumbarā asmiṃ padese santīti odumbaro deso.
[03] sahassena nibbattā sāhassī parikhā, payasā nibbattaṃ pāyāsaṃ, sahassaṃ arahatīti sāhassī gāthā, ayaso ^a^M0.0230^ea^ vikāro āyaso. evaṃ sovaṇṇo, puriso parimāṇamassāti porisaṃ udakaṃ.

[03] ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena tattha jāto, tattha vasati, tassa hitaṃ, taṃ arahatītiādīsu ^b^ṇeyya^eb^ppaccayo. bārāṇasiyaṃ jāto, vasatīti vā bārāṇaseyyako, pure viya ^b^ka^eb^kārāgamo. evaṃ campeyyako, sāgaleyyako, mithileyyako jano, gaṅgeyyo maccho, silāya jātaṃ seleyyakaṃ, kule jāto koleyyako sunakho, vane jātaṃ vāneyyaṃ pupphaṃ. evaṃ pabbateyyo mānuso, pabbateyyā nadī, pabbateyyaṃ osadhaṃ, pathassa hitaṃ pātheyyaṃ, sapatissa hitaṃ sāpateyyaṃ dhanaṃ, padīpeyyaṃ telaṃ, mātu hitaṃ matteyyaṃ. evaṃ petteyyaṃ. dakkhiṇamarahatīti dakkhiṇeyyo iccādi.
[03] ^b^jāta^eb^iccevamādīnaṃ saddānaṃ atthe ^b^ima iya^eb^iccete paccayā honti vā.
[03] pacchā jāto pacchimo, pacchimā janatā, pacchimaṃ cittaṃ, ante jāto antimo, antimā, antimaṃ. evaṃ majjhimo, purimo, uparimo, heṭṭhimo, paccantimo, gopphimo, ganthimo.

[03] tathā ^a^M0.0231^ea^ ^b^iya^eb^ppaccaye manussajātiyā jāto manussajātiyo, manussajātiyā, manussajātiyaṃ. evaṃ assajātiyo, hatthijātiyo, bodhisattajātiyo, ^b^dabba^eb^jātiyo, samānajātiyo, lokiyo iccādi.

[03] ^b^ādi^eb^ggahaṇena tattha niyutto, tadassa atthi, tattha bhavotiādīsvapi ^b^ima iya^eb^ppaccayā honti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ika^eb^ppaccayo ca. ante niyutto antimo, antiyo, antiko, putto assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti puttimo, puttiyo, vuttiko, kappo assa atthīti kappiyo, jaṭā assa atthīti jaṭiyo, hānabhāgo assa atthīti hānabhāgiyo. evaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyo, bodhissa pakkhe bhavā bodhipakkhiyā, pañcavagge bhavā pañcavaggiyā. evaṃ chabbaggiyā, udariyaṃ, attano idanti attaniyaṃ, nakārāgamo.
[03] ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena ^b^kiya yaṇya^eb^ppaccayā ca. jātiyā niyutto jātikiyo. evaṃ andhakiyo, jaccandhe niyutto jaccandhakiyo. sassa ayanti sakiyo. evaṃ parakiyo.

[03] ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayo ^b^sādhuhitabhavajātā^eb^diatthesu. yathā -- kammani sādhu kammaññaṃ. sabhāyaṃ sādhu sabbhaṃ, ``yavataṃ talanā''dinā ^b^u^eb^kārādi. evaṃ medhāya hitaṃ mejjhaṃ ghaṭaṃ. pādānaṃ hitaṃ pajjaṃ telaṃ, rathassa hitā racchā, gāme bhavo gammo ^a^M0.0232^ea^, gave bhavaṃ gabyaṃ, ``osare cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye parepi ^b^avā^eb^deso. kavimhi bhavaṃ kabyaṃ, divi bhavā dibyā, ^b^tha^eb^nato jātaṃ thaññaṃ, dhanāya saṃvattatīti dhaññaṃ.
[03] ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayo parisāyaṃ sādhu pārisajjo, ^b^da^eb^kārāgamo, samaṇānaṃ hitā sāmaññā janā, brāhmaṇānaṃ hitā brāhmaññā, arūpe bhavā āruppā iccādi.

[03] chaṭṭhiyantato ``tesaṃ samūho''ti atthe ^b^kaṇaṇa^eb^iccete paccayā honti. rājaputtako, rājaputtakaṃ vā, rājaputto. evaṃ mānussako, mānusso, māthurako, māthuro, porisako, poriso, vuddhānaṃ samūho vuddhako, vuddho. evaṃ māyūrako, māyūro, kāpoto, kokilo, māhiṃsako, māhiṃso, oṭṭhako, orabbhako, aṭṭhannaṃ samūho aṭṭhako, rājānaṃ samūho rājako, bhikkhānaṃ samūho bhikkho, sikkhānaṃ samūho sikkho, dvinnaṃ samūho dvayaṃ, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^i^eb^kārassa ^b^ayā^eb^deso. evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ samūho tayaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^gāmajanabandhusahāya^eb^iccevamādīhi ^b^tā^eb^paccayo hoti samūhatthe. gāmānaṃ samūho gāmatā. evaṃ janatā, bandhutā, sahāyatā, nāgaratā. ``tā''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^sakatthepi^eb^ devoyeva devatā, ^b^tā^eb^paccayantassa niccamitthiliṅgatā.

[03] ``tadassa ṭhāna''miccetasmiṃ atthe chaṭṭhiyantato ^b^iya^eb^ppaccayo hoti. madanassa ṭhānaṃ madaniyo, madaniyā, madaniyaṃ, bandhanassa ṭhānaṃ bandhaniyaṃ. evaṃ mucchaniyaṃ. rajaniyaṃ, gamaniyaṃ, dassaniyaṃ, upādāniyaṃ, pasādaniyaṃ. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^hitā^eb^diatthepi upādānānaṃ hitā upādāniyā iccādi.
[03] upamatthe upamāvāciliṅgato ^b^āyitatta^eb^ppaccayo hoti. dhūmo viya dissatīti dhūmāyitattaṃ. evaṃ timirāyitattaṃ.
[03] ``tannissita''nti atthe, ``tadassaṭhāna''nti atthe ca ^b^la^eb^ppaccayo hoti. duṭṭhu nissitaṃ, duṭṭhu ṭhānaṃ vā duṭṭhullaṃ, duṭṭhullā vācā, ^b^la^eb^ssa dvibhāvo. evaṃ vedallaṃ.
[03] ``abhijjhā ^a^M0.0234^ea^ assa pakati, abhijjhā assa bahulā''ti vā viggahe --

[03] paṭhamāvibhatyantato ^b^ālu^eb^ppaccayo hoti ``tadassa bahula''miccetasmiṃ atthe. abhijjhālu, abhijjhālū, abhijjhālavo. evaṃ sītālu, dhajālu, dayālu. ``sabbato ko''ti ettha puna ^b^sabbato^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ka^eb^kārāgamo, abhijjhāluko, abhijjhālukā, abhijjhālukaṃ. evaṃ sītāluko, dayāluko, tathā hīnova hīnako. evaṃ potako, kumārako, māṇavako, muduko, ujuko, appamattakaṃ, oramattakaṃ, sīlamattakaṃ iccādi.

[03] ``yadanupapannā nipātanā sijjhantī''ti iminā paṭibhāgakucchitasaññānukampādiatthesu ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo. ^b^paṭibhāgatthe^eb^ hatthino iva hatthikā. evaṃ assakā. ^b^kucchitatthe^eb^ kucchito samaṇo samaṇako. evaṃ brāhmaṇako, muṇḍako, paṇḍitako, veyyākaraṇako. ^b^saññāyaṃ^eb^ katako, bhaṭako. ^b^anukampāyaṃ^eb^ puttako.

[03] tathā ^b^kiṃyateta^eb^to parimāṇatthe ^b^ttakavantu^eb^ppaccayā. kiṃ parimāṇamassāti kittakaṃ. evaṃ yattakaṃ, tattakaṃ, ettakaṃ. ^b^vantumhi ā^eb^ttañca, yaṃ parimāṇamassāti yāvā, yāvanto ^a^M0.0235^ea^, guṇavantusamaṃ. evaṃ tāvā, tāvanto. etāvā, etāvanto iccādi.

[03] tappakativacanatthe ^b^maya^eb^ppaccayo hoti, pakarīyatīti pakati, tena pakati tappakati, tappakatiyā vacanaṃ kathanaṃ ^b^tappakativacanaṃ^eb^. suvaṇṇamayo ratho, sovaṇṇamayo vā, suvaṇṇamayā bhājanavikati, suvaṇṇamayaṃ bhājanaṃ. evaṃ rūpiyamayaṃ, rajatamayaṃ, jatumayaṃ, dārumayaṃ, mattikāmayaṃ, iddhiyā nibbattaṃ iddhimayaṃ.
[03] manato nipphannā manomayā, ayasāpakataṃ ayomayaṃ. ettha ca ``manogaṇādīna''nti vattamāne --
[03] gavena pakataṃ karīsaṃ, goto nibbattanti vā gomayaṃ. ``mayo''tiyogavibhāgena ^b^sakatthepi^eb^ dānameva dānamayaṃ, sīlamayaṃ iccādi.

[03] chaṭṭhiyantato ^b^ṇyattatā^eb^iccete paccayā honti ``tassa bhāvo'' iccetasmiṃ atthe, ^b^tu^eb^saddaggahaṇena ^b^ttanaṇeyyā^eb^dippaccayā ca. bhavanti etasmā buddhisaddā iti ^b^bhāvo,^eb^ saddappavattinimittaṃ vuccati, vuttañca -- ``yassa guṇassa hi bhāvā dabbe saddaniveso tadabhidhāneṇyattatādayo''ti. ^b^ṇyattattana^eb^ntānaṃ niccaṃ napuṃsakattaṃ, ^b^tā^eb^paccayantassa sabhāvato niccamitthiliṅgatā. ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayoyaṃ guṇavacane ^b^brāhmaṇā^eb^dīhi, tattha ``avaṇṇo ye lopañcā''ti ^b^avaṇṇa^eb^lopo, ādivuddhi.
[03] ālasyaṃ. evaṃ ārogyaṃ, udaggassa bhāvo odagyaṃ, sakhino bhāvo sakhyaṃ, aṇaṇassa bhāvo āṇaṇyaṃ, vidhavāya bhāvo vedhabyaṃ, dubbalassa bhāvo dubbalyaṃ, capalassa bhāvo cāpalyaṃ.
[03] viyattassa bhāvo veyyattiyaṃ, maccharassa bhāvo macchariyaṃ. evaṃ issariyaṃ, ālasiyaṃ, muṇḍiyaṃ, mūḷhiyaṃ. ettha ``veyyattiya''ntiādīsu ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^ya^eb^mhi ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo.

[03] ``paṇḍitassa bhāvo paṇḍitya''ntiādīsu ``yavataṃ talanadakārānaṃ byañjanāni calañajakāratta''nti ^b^tya^eb^kārasaṃyogādīnaṃ ^b^calañaja^eb^kārādesā ^a^M0.0237^ea^, dvittaṃ. paṇḍiccaṃ, bahussutassa bhāvo bāhussaccaṃ, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^u^eb^kārassa ^b^a^eb^kāro, evaṃ porohiccaṃ, adhipatissa bhāvo ādhipaccaṃ, muṭṭhassatissa bhāvo muṭṭhassaccaṃ, ^b^ivaṇṇa^eb^lopo. kusalassa bhāvo kosallaṃ. evaṃ vepullaṃ, samānānaṃ bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, gilānassa bhāvo gelaññaṃ, ``kvacādimajjhuttarā''disuttena saṃyoge pare rassattaṃ.

[03] suhadassa bhāvosohajjaṃ. evaṃ vesārajjaṃ, kusīdassabhāvokosajjaṃ, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā īkārassa ^b^a^eb^kāro. tathā ``purisassa bhāvo porisa''ntiādīsu ``yavataṃ talanā''disutte ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇena yavataṃ ^b^sa^eb^kāra^b^kacaṭapa^eb^vaggānaṃ ^b^sa^eb^kāra^b^kacaṭapa^eb^vaggādesā. sumanassa bhāvo somanassaṃ. evaṃ domanassaṃ, sovacassaṃ, dovacassaṃ, ettha ^b^sa^eb^kārāgamo. tathā nipakassa bhāvo nepakkaṃ, dvittaṃ. evaṃ ādhikkaṃ, dubhagassa bhāvo dobhaggaṃ, vāṇijassa bhāvo vāṇijjaṃ, rājino bhāvo rajjaṃ, ``kvacā''dinā rassattaṃ. sarūpassa bhāvo sāruppaṃ. evaṃ opammaṃ, sokhummaṃ.

[03] tathassa bhāvo tacchaṃ, dummedhassa bhāvo dummejjhaṃ, samaṇassa bhāvo sāmaññaṃ. evaṃ brāhmaññaṃ, nipuṇassa bhāvo nepuññaṃ. ``taccha''ntiādīsupi ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇeneva yavataṃ ^b^thadhaṇa^eb^kārānaṃ ^b^chajhaña^eb^kārādesā.

[03] ^b^ttatā^eb^paccayesu ^a^M0.0238^ea^-- paṃsukūlikassa bhāvo paṃsukūlikattaṃ, paṃsukūlikatā. evaṃ tecīvarikattaṃ, tecīvarikatā, odarikattaṃ, odarikatā, manussattaṃ, manussatā jāti, nīlattaṃ, nīlatā guṇo, yācakattaṃ, yācakatā kriyā, daṇḍittaṃ, daṇḍitā dabbaṃ, saccavāditā, pāramitā, kataññutā, sabbaññutā, ``kvacā''dinā ^b^tā^eb^paccaye rassattaṃ, appicchatā, asaṃsaggatā, bhassārāmatā, niddārāmatā, lahutā iccādi.
[03] ^b^ṇeyye^eb^ -- sucissa bhāvo soceyyaṃ. evaṃ ādhipabheyyaṃ, kavissa bhāvokāveyyaṃ, thenassa bhāvo theyyaṃ, mahāvuttinā ^b^na^eb^kārassa lopo.

[03] ``ṇyattatā''ti yogavibhāgena kammani, sakatthe ca ^b^ṇyā^eb^dayo, vīrānaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ vā vīriyaṃ, paribhaṭassa kammaṃ pāribhaṭyaṃ, pāribhaṭyassa bhāvo pāribhaṭyatā. evaṃ sovacassatā, bhisaggassa kammaṃ bhesajjaṃ, byāvaṭassa kammaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ, saṭhassa bhāvo, kammaṃ vā sāṭheyyaṃ.
[03] ^b^sakatthe^eb^ pana -- yathābhūtameva yathābhuccaṃ, karuṇāyeva kāruññaṃ, pattakālameva pattakallaṃ, ākāsānantameva ^a^M0.0239^ea^ ākāsānañcaṃ, kāyapāguññameva kāyapāguññatā iccādi.

[03] ^b^visama^eb^iccevamādīhi chaṭṭhiyantehi ^b^ṇa^eb^ppaccayo hoti, ^b^tta tā^eb^ ca ``tassa bhāvo'' iccetasmiṃ atthe. ākatigaṇoyaṃ. vesamaṃ, visamattaṃ, visamatā. sucissa bhāvo socaṃ, sucittaṃ, sucitā, garuno bhāvo gāravo, ādivuddhi, ``o sare cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^saddaggahaṇena ^b^u^eb^kārassa ca ^b^avā^eb^deso. paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṃ, paṭuttaṃ, paṭutā.

[03] ujuno bhāvo ajjavaṃ, muduno bhāvo maddavaṃ iccatra ``āttañcā''ti ^b^ṇa^eb^mhi ^b^i^eb^kārukārānaṃ ^b^ā^eb^ttaṃ, ^b^dvi^eb^bhāvo, saṃyoge ādirassattañca. ujutā, mudutā. evaṃ isissa bhāvo ārisyaṃ, āsabhaṃ, kumārassa bhāvokomāraṃ, yuvassa bhāvo yobbanaṃ, mahāvuttinā ^b^na^eb^kārāgamo, paramānaṃ bhāvo, kammaṃ vā pāramī dānādikriyā, ``ṇavaṇikā''disuttena ^b^ī^eb^paccayo, samaggānaṃ bhāvo sāmaggī.

[03] ^b^ramaṇīya^eb^iccevamādito ^b^kaṇa^eb^paccayo hoti, ^b^tta tā^eb^ ca bhāvatthe. ramaṇīyassa bhāvo rāmaṇīyakaṃ, ramaṇīyattaṃ, ramaṇīyatā ^a^M0.0240^ea^. evaṃ mānuññakaṃ, manuññattaṃ, manuññatā, piyarūpakaṃ, piyarūpattaṃ, piyarūpatā, kalyāṇakaṃ, kalyāṇattaṃ, kalyāṇatā, corakaṃ, corikā vā, corattaṃ, coratā, aḍḍhakaṃ, aḍḍhattaṃ, aḍḍhatā iccādi.
[03] ``sabbe ime pāpā ayamimesaṃ visesena pāpo''ti viggahe --

[03] visesatthe ^b^tara tama isika iya iṭṭha^eb^iccete paccayā honti. pāpataro, pāpatarā, pāpataraṃ. tatopi adhiko pāpatamo, pāpatamā, pāpatamaṃ. pāpisiko, pāpisikā, pāpisikaṃ. pāpiyo, pāpiyā, pāpiyaṃ. pāpiṭṭho, pāpiṭṭhā, pāpiṭṭhaṃ. atisayena pāpiṭṭho, pāpiṭṭhataro. evaṃ paṭutaro, paṭutamo, paṭisiko, paṭiyo, paṭiṭṭho. sabbesaṃ atisayena varo varataro, varatamo, varisiko, variyo, variṭṭho. evaṃ paṇītataro, paṇītatamo.
[03] ``sabbe ime vuḍḍhā ayamimesaṃ visesena vuḍḍho''ti atthe ^b^iyaiṭṭha^eb^ppaccayā honti.

[03] sabbasseva ^b^vuḍḍha^eb^saddassa ^b^jo^eb^ hoti ^b^iya iṭṭha^eb^iccetesu paccayesu. jeyyo, jeṭṭho, ettha ca ``saralopādi''sutte ^b^tu^eb^ggahaṇena lopamakatvā ``sarā sare lopa''nti pubbasare lutte ``kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte''ti ^b^e^eb^kāro.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^pasattha^eb^saddassa ^b^sā^eb^deso hoti, ^b^jo^eb^ ca iyiṭṭhesu. ayañca pasattho ayañca pasattho sabbe ime pasatthā ayamimesaṃ visesena pasatthoti seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^antika^eb^saddassa ^b^nedā^eb^deso hoti iyiṭṭhesu. visesena antikoti nediyo, nediṭṭho.
[03] sabbasseva ^b^bā^eb^ḷhasaddassa ^b^sādhā^eb^deso hoti iyiṭṭhesu. visesena bāḷhoti sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho.
[03] sabbassa ^b^appa^eb^saddassa ^b^kaṇa^eb^ hoti iyiṭṭhesu. visesena appoti kaṇiyo, kaṇiṭṭho.
[03] sabbassa ^b^yuva^eb^saddassa ^b^kaṇa^eb^ hoti iyiṭṭhesu. ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^ṇa^eb^kārassa ^b^na^eb^kāro. kaniyo, kaniṭṭho.

[03] ^b^vantumantuvī^eb^ iccetesaṃ paccayānaṃ lopo hoti iyiṭṭhesu. sabbe ime guṇavanto ayamimesaṃ visesena guṇavāti guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho, visesena satimāti satiyo, satiṭṭho, visesena medhāvīti medhiyo, medhiṭṭho iccādi.
[03] ``medhā yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī''ti viggahe --

[03] paṭhamāvibhatyantā ``tadassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjati'' iccetesvatthesu ^b^vī^eb^paccayo hoti. ^b^medhāmāyā^eb^ saddehi cāyaṃ. medhāvī, medhāvino. itthiyaṃ ^b^ī^eb^kārantattā ``patibhikkhurājīkārantehi inī''ti ^b^inī,^eb^ medhāvinī, medhāviniyo. napuṃsake medhāvi kulaṃ. evaṃ māyāvī, māyāvinī, māyāvi cittaṃ.

[03] ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^so i lava ālā^eb^dippaccayā ca. yathā -- sumedhā yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti sumedhaso, rassattaṃ. evaṃ lomaso. picchaṃ assa atthi, tasmiṃ ^a^M0.0243^ea^ vā vijjatīti picchilo. evaṃ phenilo, tuṇḍilo, jaṭilo. kesā assa atthīti kesavo, vācālo iccādi.
[03] ``tapo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī''ti viggahe --
[03] ^b^tapa^eb^iccevamādito ^b^sī^eb^paccayo hoti ``tadassatthi'' iccetasmiṃ atthe. sassa dvibhāvo. tapassī, tapassino, tapassinī, tapassi. evaṃ tejassī, yasassī, manassī, payassī.
[03] ``daṇḍo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī''ti viggahe --

[03] ^b^ādi^eb^saddoyaṃ pakārattho, ^b^daṇḍa^eb^iccevamādito avaṇṇantā ^b^ika ī^eb^ iccete paccayā honti ``tadassatthi'' iccetasmiṃ atthe. daṇḍiko, daṇḍī, daṇḍino, daṇḍinī. evaṃ māliko, mālī, mālinī, chattiko, chattī, rūpiko, rūpī, kesiko, kesī, saṅghī, ñāṇī, hatthī iccādi.

[03] ^b^madhu^eb^ādito ^b^ra^eb^ppaccayo hoti ``tadassatthī''ti atthe. madhu assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti madhuro guḷo, madhurā sakkharā, madhuraṃ khīraṃ, kuñjā hanū etassa santīti kuñjaro, sabbasmiṃ ^a^M0.0244^ea^ vattabbe mukhamassa atthīti mukharo, susi assa atthīti susiro. evaṃ ruciro, nagaro.
[03] ``guṇo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī''ti viggahe --

[03] ^b^guṇa^eb^iccevamādito ^b^vantu^eb^ppaccayo hoti ``tadassa atthī''ti atthe. vibhattilope, nāmabyapadese ca kate ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti. guṇavantu ^b^si,^eb^ ``savibhattissa, ntussā''ti adhikicca ``ā simhī''ti ^b^ā^eb^ttaṃ, guṇavā puriso, sesaṃ ñeyyaṃ. evaṃ gaṇavā, kulavā iccādayo. itthiyaṃ ``ṇava ṇika ṇeyyaṇantūhī''ti īpaccayo, ``vā''ti vattamāne ``ntussa tamīkāre''ti ^b^ta^eb^kāro, guṇavatī, guṇavantī iccādi. napuṃsake ``aṃ napuṃsake''ti savibhattissa ntussa ^b^a^eb^mādeso, guṇavaṃ iccādi.
[03] ``sati assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī''ti viggahe --

[03] ^b^sati^eb^iccevamādīhi avaṇṇantarahitehi paṭhamāvibhatyantehi liṅgehi ^b^mantu^eb^ppaccayo hoti ``tadassatthī''ti atthe. sesaṃ ^b^guṇava^eb^ntusamaṃ. satimā, satimatī, satimantī, satimaṃ. evaṃ dhitimā, gatimā iccādayo.
[03] āyussa ukāro ^b^asa^eb^ hoti ^b^mantu^eb^mhīti asādeso. āyasmā, sesaṃ samaṃ. gāvo assa santīti gomā, gomanto, gomatī, gomantī, gomaṃ kulaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^saddhā paññā^eb^iccevamādito ^b^ṇa^eb^ppaccayo hoti ``tadassatthi''iccetasmiṃ atthe. saddho puriso, saddhā kaññā, saddhaṃ kulaṃ. evaṃ pañño, amaccharo, tathā buddhaṃ, buddhi assa atthīti buddho iccādi.

[03] pūrayati saṅkhyā anenāti pūraṇo, saṅkhyāya pūraṇo ^b^saṅkhyāpūraṇo,^eb^ tasmiṃ saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe chaṭṭhiyantato ^b^ma^eb^ppaccayo hoti. pañcamo, pañcannaṃ pūraṇī pañcamī, ``nadādito vā ī''ti īpaccayo. ``itthiyamato āpaccayo''ti ^b^ā^eb^paccayo, pañcamā vīriyapāramī, pañcamaṃ jhānaṃ. evaṃ sattamo, sattamī, sattamā, sattamaṃ, aṭṭhamo, aṭṭhamī, aṭṭhamā, aṭṭhamaṃ, navamo ^a^M0.0246^ea^, navamī, navamā, navamaṃ, dasamo, dasamī, dasamā, dasamaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^catucha^eb^iccetehi ^b^thaṭha^eb^iccete paccayā honti saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe. catunnaṃ pūraṇo catuttho, dvittaṃ, catutthī, catutthā, catutthaṃ, channaṃ pūraṇo chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhī, chaṭṭhā, chaṭṭhaṃ, chaṭṭho eva chaṭṭhamo.
[03] ^b^cha^eb^ssa ^b^sa^eb^kārādeso hoti vā saṅkhyāne. chāhamassa jīvitaṃ sāhaṃ, chāhaṃ vā, saḷāyatanaṃ.

[03] ^b^dviti^eb^iccetesaṃ ^b^duta^eb^iccādesā honti ^b^tiya^eb^ppaccaye pare. dutiyo puriso, dutiyā, dutiyaṃ. evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pūraṇo tatiyo, tatiyā, tatiyaṃ. ^b^api^eb^ggahaṇena aññatthāpi ^b^dvi^eb^saddassa ^b^du^eb^ādeso hoti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^di^eb^ ca. dve rattiyo durattaṃ, duvidhaṃ, duvaṅgaṃ, dirattaṃ, diguṇaṃ, digu.
[03] tesaṃ catutthadutiyatatiyānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadena saha ^b^aḍḍhuḍḍhadivaḍḍhadiyaḍḍhāḍḍhatiyā^eb^desā honti.
[03] aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena dutiyo divaḍḍho, diyaḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.

[03] ``ekañca dasa cā''ti atthe dvandasamāse, ``ekena adhikā dasā''ti atthe tappurisasamāse vā kate ``saṅkhyāne''ti vattamāne ``dvekaṭṭhānamākāro vā''ti ^b^ā^eb^ttaṃ. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo.
[03] tato bahuvacanaṃ yo, ``pañcādīnamakāro''ti savibhattissa antassa ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ. ekārasa, ekādasa, liṅgattayepi samānaṃ.
[03] ^b^e^eb^kādito parassa ^b^dasa^eb^ssa ante īpaccayo hoti vā pūraṇatthe.
[03] dve ca dasa ca, dvīhi vā adhikā dasāti ``dvi dasa''iccatra ``vā''ti vattate.
[03] ``vīsati dasesu bā dvissa tū''ti ^b^bā^eb^deso, ^b^da^eb^ssa ^b^rā^eb^deso. bārasa, aññatra ^b^ā^eb^ttaṃ, dvādasa. dvādasannaṃ pūraṇo bārasamo, dvādasamo, dvādasī.
[03] tayo ca dasa ca, tīhi vā adhikā dasāti terasa, ``tesu vuddhi lopā''dinā ^b^ti^eb^ssa ^b^te^eb^ādaso ānavutiyā, terasamo, terasī.

[03] cattāro ca dasa ca, catūhi vā adhikā dasāti catuddasa iccatra ``gaṇane dasassā''ti ca vattamāne ``catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādi cassa cucopi navā''ti ^b^tu^eb^lopo, ^b^cuco^eb^ ca. cuddasa, coddasa, catuddasa. cuddasamo, catuddasamo, cakuddasī, cātuddasī vā.

[03] pañca ca dasa ca, pañcahi vā adhikā dasāti pañcadasa, ``tesu vuddhi lopā''dinā pañcasaddassa dasa vīsesu ^b^pannapaṇṇa^eb^ādesāpi, ``aṭṭhādito cā''ti rattaṃ. pannarasa, pañcadasa. pannarasamo, pañcadasamo, pannarasī, pañcadasī.

[03] ``cha ^a^M0.0249^ea^ ca dasa ca, chahi vā adhikā dasā''ti samāse kate ``chassā''ti vattamāne ``dase so niccañcā''ti ^b^so,^eb^ ``saṅkhyānaṃ, vā''ti ca vattate, ``la darāna''nti lattaṃ, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo.
[21] ḷo niccaṃ soḷase dassa, cattālīse ca terase.
[03] laḷānamaviseso kvaci, soḷasa. teḷasa, cattālīsaṃ, cattārīsaṃ. soḷasamo, soḷasī.

[03] ``vā, dasara saṅkhyāne''ti adhikicca ``aṭṭhādito cā''ti rattaṃ. aṭṭhārasa, aṭṭhādasa, ^b^ā^eb^ttaṃ. aṭṭhārasannaṃ pūraṇo aṭṭhārasamo, aṭṭhādasamo. evaṃ sattarasa, sattadasa. sattarasamo, sattadasamo.

[03] ekena ūnā vīsatīti tappuriso, ekūnavīsati. ekūnavīsatādayo ānavutiyā ^b^e^eb^kavacanantā, itthiliṅgā ca daṭṭhabbā, te ca saṅkhyāne, saṅkhyeyye ca vattante, yadā ^b^saṅkhyāne^eb^ vattante, tadā bhikkhūnamekūnavīsati tiṭṭhati, bhoti bhikkhūnamekūnavīsati tiṭṭhatu, bhikkhūnamekūnavīsatiṃ passa, bhikkhūnamekūnavīsatiyā kataṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^saṅkhyeyye^eb^ pana ekūnavīsati bhikkhavo tiṭṭhanti, bhonto ekūnavīsati bhikkhavo tiṭṭhatha, ekūnavīsatiṃ bhikkhū passa, ekūnavīsatiyā bhikkhūhi kataṃ iccādi. evaṃ vīsatādīsupi yojetabbaṃ, ekūnavīsatiyā pūraṇo ekūnavīsatimo.
[03] dasa ca dasa cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṃ katvā ``dasadasā''ti vattabbe ``sarūpānamekasesvasaki''nti ekasese kate ^a^M0.0250^ea^ ^b^dasa^eb^saddato paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ ^b^yo^eb^. ``dasa yo''itīdha --
[03] 413^b^.^eb^ ^b^gaṇane dasassa dviti catu pañca cha satta aṭṭhanavakānaṃ vīti cattāra paññā cha sattāsa navā yosu yonañcī samāsaṃ ṭhiri tītuti^eb^.

[03] gaṇane dasassa sambandhīnaṃ ^b^dvika tika catukka pañcaka chakkasattaka aṭṭhaka navakānaṃ^eb^ katekasesānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ^b^vīti cattāra paññā cha satta asa nava^eb^ iccādesā honti ^b^yo^eb^su paresu, yonañca ^b^īsaṃ āsaṃ ṭhi riti īti uti^eb^iccete ādesā hontīti dvidasatthavācakassa ^b^dasa^eb^ssa ^b^vī^eb^ādeso hoti, ^b^yo^eb^vacanassa ^b^īsa^eb^ñca, saralopādi.

[03] ``byañjane cā''ti niggahītalopo, puna taddhitattā nāmabyapadese ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti. bhikkhūnaṃ vīsati, vīsaṃ vā, vīsati bhikkhū, vīsaṃ vā iccādi. vīsatimo. tathā ekavīsati kusalacittāni, ekavīsaṃ vā. ekavīsatimo. bāvīsati, bāvīsaṃ vā. bāvīsatimo. dvāvīsati, dvāvīsaṃ vā. dvāvīsatimo. tevīsati, tevīsaṃ vā. tevīsatimo. catuvīsati, catuvīsaṃ vā. catuvīsatimo. paṇṇavīsati, paṇṇavīsaṃ vā. paṇṇavīsatimo. pañcavīsati, pañcavīsaṃ vā. pañcavīsatimo. chabbīsati ^a^M0.0251^ea^, chabbīsaṃ vā. chabbīsatimo. sattavīsati, sattavīsaṃ vā. sattavīsatimo. aṭṭhavīsati, aṭṭhavīsaṃ vā. aṭṭhavīsatimo. ekūnatiṃsati, ekūnatiṃsaṃvā. ekūnatiṃsatimo.

[03] dasa ca dasa ca dasa cāti ``dasa dasa dasā''ti vattabbe ekasese kate ``gaṇane dasassā''tiādinā ^b^tīisa^eb^mādesā, ``kvacā''dinā rassattaṃ, niggahītāgamo ca, sesaṃ vīsatisamaṃ. tiṃsati, tiṃsaṃ, tiṃsa vassāni, niggahītalopo, tiṃsaṃ, tiṃsāya iccādi. ekatiṃsati, ekatiṃsaṃ vā, bāttiṃsaṃ, dvattiṃsaṃ, tettiṃsaṃ iccādi.

[03] catudasatthavācakassa katekasesassa ^b^da^eb^sassa ^b^cattāra, yo^eb^vacanassa ^b^īsaṃ,^eb^ cattālīsaṃ, ``la darāna''nti rassa ^b^la^eb^ttaṃ, tālīsaṃ vā. cattālīsatimo. ekacattālīsaṃ, dvācattālīsaṃ, dvicattālīsaṃ, tecattālīsaṃ, ticattālīsaṃ iccādi.
[03] pañcadasatthavācakassa ^b^dasa^eb^ssa ^b^paññā, yo^eb^vacanassa ^b^āsa^eb^ñca. paññāsaṃ, ``tesu vuddhi lopā''dinā ^b^paṇṇā^eb^deso, paṇṇāsaṃ vā. ekapaññāsaṃ, dvepaññāsaṃ, dvipaññāsaṃ.
[03] chadasatthavācakassa ^b^dasa^eb^ssa ^b^cha, yo^eb^vacanassa ^b^ṭhi^eb^ādeso, ``sa chassa vā''ti ^b^sa^eb^kārādeso, saṭṭhi, dvāsaṭṭhi, dvesaṭṭhi, dvisaṭṭhi, tesaṭṭhi, tisaṭṭhi.
[03] sattadasatthavācakassa ^b^dasa^eb^ssa ^b^satta, yo^eb^vacanassa ri, ^b^ti^eb^ ca. sattari, sattati, dvāsattari, dvāsattati, dvisattari, disattati, tesattati, tisattati iccādi.
[03] aṭṭhadasatthavācakassa ^b^dasa^eb^ssa ^b^asa, yo^eb^vacanassa ^b^īti^eb^ādeso ca. asīti, ekāsīti, dveasīti, teasīti, caturāsīti, ``kvacā''dinā dīgho.

[03] navadasatthavācakassa ^a^M0.0252^ea^ ^b^dasa^eb^ssa ^b^nava, yo^eb^vacanassa ^b^uti^eb^ ca, navuti, dvānavuti, dvenavuti, dvinavuti, tenavuti, tinavuti, catunavuti, channavutiyā, channavutīnaṃ pāsaṇḍānaṃ.

[03] gaṇane pariyāpannassa dasadasakatthavācakassa ^b^dasa^eb^saddassa ^b^sataṃ^eb^ hoti, satadasakatthavācakassa ^b^dasa^eb^ssa ^b^sahassaṃ^eb^ hoti ^b^yo^eb^mhi. iminā nipātanena ^b^yo^eb^lopo, taddhitattā puna nāmabyapadese ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti, niggahītassa lopo, ``si''nti ^b^a^eb^mādeso, yojanānaṃ sataṃ, sahassaṃ. sataṃ napuṃsakamekavacanantañca, tathā sahassaṃ, vaggabhede sabbattha bahuvacanampi bhavati. dve vīsatiyo. evaṃ tiṃsādīsupi, dve satāni, bahūni satāni, dve sahassāni, bahūni sahassāni.

[03] satassa dvikanti atthe chaṭṭhītappurisaṃ katvā ``sataṃ dvika''nti vattabbe ``dvikādīnaṃ taduttarapadānañca nipaccante''ti vuttiyaṃ vacanato iminā nipātanena uttarapadassa pubbanipāto, ^b^ka^eb^kāralopo ca hoti. dvisataṃ. evaṃ satassa tikaṃ tisataṃ, tathā catusataṃ, pañcasataṃ, chasataṃ, sattasataṃ, aṭṭhasataṃ, navasataṃ, dasasataṃ sahassaṃ hoti. atha vā dve satāni dvisatanti digusamāso. evaṃ tisataṃ, catusataṃ iccādi.

[03] yāva tāsaṃ saṅkhyānamuttari, tāva dasaguṇitañca kātabbaṃ, ettha ^b^da^eb^kāro sandhijo. yathā -- dasassa gaṇanassa dasaguṇitaṃ ^a^M0.0253^ea^ sataṃ hoti, satassa dasaguṇitaṃ sahassaṃ, sahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ dasasahassaṃ, idaṃ ^b^nahuta^eb^ntipi vuccati, dasasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ satasahassaṃ, taṃ ^b^lakkha^eb^ntipi vuccati, satasahassassa dasaguṇitaṃ dasasatasahassaṃ.

[03] yāsaṃ pana saṅkhyānaṃ aniddiṭṭhanāmadheyyānaṃ yāni rūpāni, tāni sakehi nāmehi nipaccante. satasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭi, itthiliṅgā, ekavacanantā ca, vaggabhede bahuvacanañca bhavati, koṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ pakoṭi, pakoṭisatasahassānaṃ sataṃ koṭippakoṭi. evaṃ nahutaṃ, ninnahutaṃ, akkhobhinī, bindu, abbudaṃ, nirabbudaṃ, ahahaṃ, ababaṃ, aṭaṭaṃ, sogandhikaṃ, uppalaṃ, kumudaṃ, puṇḍarīkaṃ, padumaṃ, kathānaṃ, mahākathānaṃ, asaṅkhyeyyanti.

[03] ^b^dvi^eb^iccevamādito gaṇanato ^b^ka^eb^ppaccayo hoti anekatthe. dviko rāsi dvikaṃ. evaṃ tikaṃ, catukkaṃ, pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ, sattakaṃ, aṭṭhakaṃ, navakaṃ, dasakaṃ, paṇṇāsakaṃ, satakaṃ, sahassakaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^ekadviti^eb^iccevamādito gaṇanato sakissa ṭhāne vāratthe ^b^kkhattuṃ^eb^paccayo hoti. ekakkhattuṃ, dvikkhattuṃ bhuñjati, ``sabbāsamāvuso''tiādinā ^b^si^eb^lopo. evaṃ tikkhattuṃ, catukkhattuṃ, pañcakkhattuṃ, chakkhattuṃ, sattakkhattuṃ, aṭṭhakkhattuṃ, navakkhattuṃ, dasakkhattuṃ, satakkhattuṃ, sahassakkhattuṃ, bahukkhattuṃ, katikkhattuṃ.

[03] vibhāgatthe ekādisaṅkhyāto ^b^dhā^eb^paccayo hoti. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^eka^eb^dvito ^b^jjha^eb^ ca, ^b^suttā^eb^dito ^b^so^eb^ ca. ekadhā. dvīhi vibhāgehi dvidhā, dudhā vā, dvedhā. tīhi vibhāgehi tidhā, tedhā vā, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ikārassekāro. evaṃ catudhā, pañcadhā, chadhā, sattadhā, aṭṭhadhā, navadhā, dasadhā, satadhā, sahassadhā, katidhā, bahudhā.
[03] jjhappaccaye ekadhā karotīti ekajjhaṃ. evaṃ dvejjhaṃ.
[03] ^b^so^eb^paccaye suttena vibhāgena suttaso. evaṃ byañjanaso, padaso, atthaso, bahuso, sabbākārena sabbaso ^a^M0.0255^ea^, upāyaso, hetuso, ṭhānaso, yoniso.

[03] sabbanāmehi pakāravacanatthe ^b^thā^eb^paccayo hoti, ^b^tu^eb^saddena ^b^thattā^eb^paccayo ca. sāmaññassa bhedako viseso pakāro, tassābhidhāneti attho, so pakāro tathā, taṃ pakāraṃ tathā, tena pakārena tathā, yena pakārena yathā. evaṃ sabbathā, aññathā, itarathā, ubhayathā, ^b^thattā^eb^paccaye tena pakārena tathattā. evaṃ yathattā, aññathattā.

[03] ^b^kiṃima^eb^iccetehi ^b^thaṃ^eb^paccayo hoti pakāravacanatthe. ``kissa ka ve cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^ki^eb^ssa ^b^kā^eb^deso. kathaṃ, kaṃ pakāraṃ kathaṃ, kena pakārena kathaṃ, ayaṃ pakāro itthaṃ, imaṃ pakāraṃ itthaṃ. anena pakārena itthaṃ, ``imassi thaṃ dāniha to dhesu cā''ti ^b^ima^eb^saddassa ^b^i^eb^kāro, dvittaṃ. ettha hi ^b^kkhattuṃ^eb^ ādi^b^thaṃ^eb^pariyosānappaccayantānaṃ abyayataddhitattā nāmabyapadesaṃ katvā vibhattimhi kate ``sabbāsamāvuso''tiādinā vibhattilopo, ``kvaci to pañcamyatthe''tiādinā vutta^b^to^eb^ādippaccayantā ca idheva ^b^a^eb^byayataddhite saṅgayhanti.
[03] ye saddā lakkhaṇena anupapannā ^b^a^eb^niddiṭṭhalakkhaṇā akkharādito, nāmopasagganipātato vā samāsataddhitādito vā, te nipātanā sijjhanti.
[21] imasmā jja siyā kāle, samānāparato jju ca.
[22] imasaddassa'kāro ca, samānassa ca so siyā..

[03] imasmiṃ kāle, imasmiṃ divase vā ajja, samāne kāle sajju, aparasmiṃdivase aparajju. nipātehi ^b^bhavatthe tana^eb^ppaccayo. ajja bhavaṃ ajjatanaṃ, ajja bhavā ajjatanī, sve bhavaṃ svātanaṃ. evaṃ purātanaṃ, hiyyo bhavaṃ hiyyattanaṃ, hiyyo bhavā hiyyattanī iccādi.
[03] atha ^a^M0.0257^ea^ ākhyātavibhattiyo kriyāvācīhi dhātūhi parā vuccante.

[03] tattha kriyaṃ ācikkhatīti ^b^ākhyātaṃ,^eb^ kriyāpadaṃ. vuttañhi ``kālakārakapurisaparidīpakaṃ kriyālakkhaṇamākhyātika''nti. tattha ^b^kālo^eb^ti atītādayo, ^b^kāraka^eb^miti kammakattubhāvā, ^b^purisā^eb^ti paṭhamamajjhimuttamā, ^b^kriyā^eb^ti gamanapacanādiko dhātvattho, kriyālakkhaṇaṃ saññāṇaṃ etassāti ^b^kriyālakkhaṇaṃ,^eb^ atiliṅgañca.
[03] kālādivasena dhātvatthaṃ vibhajantīti ^b^vibhattiyo,^eb^ tyādayo, tā pana vattamānā pañcamī sattamī parokkhāhiyyattanī ajjatanī bhavissantī kālātipatti cāti aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti.

[03] kriyaṃ dhārentīti ^b^dhātavo,^eb^ bhūvādayo, khādidhātuppaccayantā ca, te pana atthavasā dvidhā bhavanti sakammakā, akammakā cāti. tatra ^b^sakammakā^eb^ ye dhātavokammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadanti, yathā -- kaṭaṃ karoti, gāmaṃ gacchati, odanaṃ pacatītiādayo, ^b^akammakā^eb^ ye kammanirapekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadanti, yathā -- acchati, seti, tiṭṭhatītiādayo.

[03] te ^a^M0.0258^ea^ pana sattavidhā bhavanti vikaraṇappaccayabhedena, kathaṃ? ^b^a^eb^vikaraṇā bhūvādayo. niggahītapubbaka^b^a^eb^vikaraṇā rudhādayo, ^b^ya^eb^vikaraṇā divādayo, ṇu^b^ṇā uṇā^eb^vikaraṇā svādayo, ^b^nāppaṇhā^eb^vikaraṇā kiyādayo, ^b^oyira^eb^vikaraṇā tanādayo, sakatthe ^b^ṇe ṇaya^eb^ntā curādayoti.
[03] tattha paṭhamaṃ ^b^a^eb^vikaraṇesu bhūvādīsu dhātūsu paṭhamabhūtā akammakā ^b^bhū^eb^iccetasmā dhātuto ^b^tyā^eb^dayo parā yojīyante.
[03] ^b^bhū^eb^sattāyaṃ, ``bhū''iccayaṃ dhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, kriyāsāmaññabhūte bhavane vattateti attho.
[03] ^b^bhū^eb^iccevamādayo ye kriyāvācino saddagaṇā, te ^b^dhātu^eb^saññā honti. bhū ādi yesaṃ te ^b^bhūvādayo,^eb^ atha vā bhūvā ādī pakārā yesaṃ te ^b^bhūvādayo^eb^.
[03] anekassarassa dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti.
[03] ^b^kvaci^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ``mahīyati samatho''tiādīsu nivattanatthaṃ, iti anekassarattābhāvā idha dhātvantalopo na hoti.
[03] 426^b^.^eb^ ^b^vattamānā tianti, sitha, mima, teante, sevhe, emhe^eb^.
[03] paccuppanne kāle gamyamāne vattamānāvibhatti hoti, ^b^kālo^eb^ti cettha kriyā, karaṇaṃ kāro, ^b^ra^eb^kārassa ^b^la^eb^kāro, kālo.

[03] idha pana kālassa atītānāgatapaccuppannāṇattiparikappakālābhipattivasena chadhā bhinnattā ``paccuppanne''ti viseseti. taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca uppanno ^b^paccuppanno,^eb^ paṭiladdhasabhāvo, na tāva atītoti attho.

[03] tasmiṃ paccuppanne vattamānāvibhattiṃ katvā, tassā ṭhānāniyame ``dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā''ti paribhāsato dhātuto ^a^M0.0260^ea^ paraṃ vattamānappaccaye katvā, tesamaniyamappasaṅgesati ``vatticchānupubbikā saddappaṭipattī''ti parassapadavacanicchāyaṃ --

[03] ^b^atha^eb^ taddhitānantaraṃ vuccamānānaṃ sabbāsaṃ vattamānādīnaṃ aṭṭhavidhānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni ^b^cha^eb^ padāni, tāni tāni atthato aṭṭhacattālīsamattāni ^b^parassapada^eb^saññāni hontītiādimhi channaṃ parassapadasaññā, parassatthāni padāni ^b^parassapadāni,^eb^ tabbāhullato tabbohāro.
[03] ^b^kattari^eb^kārake abhidheyye sabbadhātūhi ^b^parassapadaṃ^eb^ hotīti parassapadaṃ katvā, tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge vatticchāvasā --

[03] tāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ parassapadāna'mattanopadānañca ^b^dve dve^eb^ vacanāni yathākkamaṃ ^b^paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisa^eb^saññāni honti. taṃ yathā? ^b^ti anti^eb^iti paṭhamapurisā, ^b^si tha^eb^iti majjhimapurisā, ^b^mi ma^eb^iti uttamapurisā. attanopadesupi ^b^te ante^eb^iti paṭhamapurisā, ^b^se vhe^eb^iti majjhimapurisā, ^b^e mhe^eb^iti uttamapurisā. evaṃ sesāsu sattasu vibhattīsupi yojetabbanti ^a^M0.0261^ea^. evaṃ aṭṭhavibhattivasena channavutividhe ākhyātapade dvattiṃsa dvattiṃsa paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisā hontīti vattamānaparassapadādimhi dvinnaṃ paṭhamapurisasaññā.

[03] ^b^tumhāmha^eb^saddavajjite tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sādhakavācake nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi paṭhamapuriso hotīti paṭhamapurisaṃ katvā, tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge kriyāsādhakassa kattuno ekatte vattumicchite ``ekamhi vattabbe ekavacana''nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ^b^ti^eb^.
[03] ``paro, paccayo, dhātū''ti ca adhikāro, ``yathā kattari cā''ti ito ``kattarī''ti vikaraṇappaccayavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
[03] ^b^bhū^eb^iccevamādito dhātugaṇato paro ^b^a^eb^paccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu paresu. sabbadhātukamhiyevāyamissate.

[03] kāritato aññesu paccayesu asaṃyogantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vuddhi hoti. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ṇu^eb^ppaccayassāpi vuddhi hoti. ettha ca ``ghaṭādīnaṃ vā''ti ito ^b^vā^eb^saddo anuvattetabbo, so ca vavatthitavibhāsattho. tena --
[21] yuvaṇṇānampi ^a^M0.0262^ea^ ya ṇu ṇā-nāniṭṭhādīsu vuddhi na.
[03] ^b^o^eb^kārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ^b^avā^eb^deso hoti. ``saralopo mādesa''iccādinā saralopādimhi kate ``naye paraṃ yutte''ti paranayanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
[03] so puriso sādhu bhavati, sā kaññā sādhu bhavati, taṃ cittaṃ sādhu bhavati.

[03] satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṃ bahuttā ``bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana''nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisabahuvacanaṃ ^b^anti,^eb^ pure viya appaccayavuddhiavādesā, saralopādi. te purisā bhavanti, appayujjamānepi bhavati, bhavanti.

[03] tulyādhikaraṇabhūte ^b^tumha^eb^sadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi ^b^majjhima^eb^puriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadamajjhimapurisekavacanaṃ^b^si,^eb^ sesaṃ purimasamaṃ. tvaṃ bhavasi, tumhe bhavatha, appayujjamānepi bhavasi, bhavatha.
[03] tulyādhikaraṇabhūte ^b^amha^eb^sadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi ^b^uttama^eb^puriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadauttamapurisekavacanaṃ ^b^mi, a^eb^ppaccayavuddhi^b^avā^eb^desā.
[03] ^b^a^eb^kāro ^b^dīgha^eb^māpajjate ^b^himima^eb^iccetāsu vibhattīsu. ahaṃ bhavāmi, mayaṃ bhavāma. bhavāmi, bhavāma.
[03] sabbāsaṃ vattamānānaṃ aṭṭhavidhānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni, tāni tāni ^b^attanopada^eb^saññāni hontīti ^b^te^eb^ādīnaṃ attanopadasaññā.

[03] ^b^kattari^eb^ ca kārake abhidheyye dhātūhi attanopadāni honti. ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇaṃ katthaci nivattanatthaṃ, sesaṃ parassapade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavāmhe.

[03] ^b^paca^eb^ pāke, dhātusaññāyaṃ dhātvantalopo, vuttanayeneva ^b^tyā^eb^dyuppatti, ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānamabhāvā vuddhiabhāvovettha viseso. so devadatto odanaṃ pacati, pacanti, pacasi ^a^M0.0264^ea^, pacatha, pacāmi, pacāma, so odanaṃ pacate, te pacante, tvaṃ pacase, tumhe pacavhe, ahaṃ pace, mayaṃ pacāmhe.

[03] sabbesaṃ paṭhamamajjhimānaṃ, paṭhamuttamānaṃ, majjhimuttamānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā purisānaṃ ekatobhidhāne kātabbe paro puriso yojetabbo. ekakālānamevābhidhāne cāyaṃ. so ca pacati, tvañca pacasīti pariyāyappasaṅge ^b^tumhe pacathā^eb^ti bhavati. evaṃ so ca pacati, ahañca pacāmīti ^b^mayaṃ pacāma,^eb^ tathā tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi, ^b^mayaṃ pacāma,^eb^ so ca pacati, tvañca pacasi, ahañca pacāmi, ^b^mayaṃ pacāma^eb^. evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^ekābhidhāne^eb^ti kimatthaṃ? ``so ca pacati, tvañca pacissasi, ahaṃ paciṃ'' ettha bhinnakālattā ``mayaṃ pacimhā''ti na bhavati.
[03] ^b^gamu sappa^eb^ gatimhi, pure viya dhātusaññāyaṃ dhātvantalopo.

[03] ^b^gamu^eb^iccetassa dhātussanto ^b^ma^eb^kāro ^b^ccho^eb^ hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu, ^b^sabba^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^mānanta ya^eb^ kāritappaccayesu ca. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. tenāyaṃ --
[21] vidhiṃ niccañca vāsaddo, māna'ntesu tu kattari.

[03] appaccayaparanayanāni ^a^M0.0265^ea^, so puriso gāmaṃ gacchati, te gacchanti, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa ^b^re^eb^ vā hoti, gacchare. tvaṃ gacchasi, tumhe gacchatha. ahaṃ gacchāmi, mayaṃ gacchāma.
[03] ^b^cchā^eb^desābhāve ``lopañcettamakāro''ti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayassa ^b^e^eb^kāro. gameti, gamenti, saralopo. gamesi, gametha. gamemi, gamema.
[03] attanopadepi so gāmaṃ gacchate, gacchante, gacchare. gacchase, gacchavhe. gacche, gacchāmhe.
[03] ``kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasi, rājagahato āgacchāmī''tiādīsu pana paccuppannasamīpe vattamānavacanaṃ.
[03] ^b^gamu^eb^iccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ^b^ghammā^eb^deso hoti vā. ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.

[03] ^b^bhāve^eb^ ca ^b^kammani^eb^ ca kārake abhidheyye attanopadāni honti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena kammakattaripi. bhavanaṃ ^b^bhāvo,^eb^ so ca kārakantarena asaṃsaṭṭho kevalo bhavanalavanādiko dhātvattho. karīyatīti ^b^kammaṃ^eb^. akammakāpi dhātavo sopasaggā sakammakāpi bhavanti, tasmā kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto vattamānattanopadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ^b^te^eb^.

[03] sabbadhātūhi paro bhāvakammesu ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayo hoti. attanopadavisayevāyamissate, ``aññesu cā''ti sutte anuvattita^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye vuddhi na bhavati, anubhūyate sukhaṃ devadattena.
[03] anubhūyante sampattiyo tayā. anubhūyase tvaṃ devadattena, anubhūyavhe tumhe. ahaṃ anubhūye tayā, mayaṃ anubhūyāmhe.

[03] attanopadāni kvaci parassapadattamāpajjante, akattariyevetaṃ. ^b^ya^eb^kārassa dvittaṃ, anubhūyyati mayā sukhaṃ, anubhūyyate vā, anubhūyyanti. anubhūyyasi, anubhūyyatha. anubhūyyāmi, anubhūyyāma. dvittābhāve -- anubhūyati, anubhūyanti.
[03] bhāve adabbavuttino bhāvassekattā ^b^e^eb^kavacanameva, tañca paṭhamapurisasseva, bhūyate devadattena, devadattena sampati bhavananti attho.
[03] pacadhātuto ^a^M0.0267^ea^ kammani attanopade yappaccaye ca kate --

[03] tassa bhāvakammavisayassa ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayassa ^b^ca^eb^vagga^b^ya^eb^kāra^b^va^eb^kārattaṃ hoti dhātvantena saha yathāsambhavaṃ. ettha ^b^ca^eb^ ``ivaṇṇāgamo vā''ti ito sīhagatiyā ^b^vā^eb^saddo anuvattetabbo, so ^b^ca^eb^ vavatthitavibhāsattho. tena --
[21] cavaggo ca ta vaggānaṃ, dhātvantānaṃ yavattanaṃ.

[03] dhātvantassa cavaggādittā ^b^ca^eb^kāre kate ``paradvebhāvo ṭhāne''ti ^b^ca^eb^kārassa dvittaṃ. paccate odano devadattena, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa kvaci ^b^re^eb^ hoti. paccare, paccante. paccase, paccavhe. pacce, paccāmhe.
[03] parassapadādese paccati, paccanti. paccasi, paccatha. paccāmi, paccāma. tathā kammakattari paccate odano sayameva, paccante. paccati, paccanti vā iccādi.

[03] sabbehi dhātūhi tasmiṃ bhāvakammavisaye ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vāti īkārāgamo. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. ^b^cchā^eb^deso, gacchīyate gāmo devadattena ^a^M0.0268^ea^, gacchīyante. gacchīyase, gacchīyavhe. gacchīye, gacchīyāmhe.

[03] heṭṭhānuttehi parassevedaṃ, tena ^b^kaṭapa^eb^vagga^b^ya^eb^kāra^b^lasa^eb^nteheva dhātūhi paro ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayo pubbarūpamāpajjate vāti ^b^ma^eb^kārā parassa ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ^b^ma^eb^kāro. gammate, gamīyate, gammante, gamīyante. gammase, gamīyase, gammavhe, gamīyavhe. gamme, gamīye, gammāmhe, gamīyāmhe.

[03] ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ -- gacchīyyati, gacchīyyanti. gacchīyati, gacchīyanti vā. gammati, gammanti. gamīyati, gamīyanti. ^b^i^eb^kārāgame gamiyyati, gamiyyanti. tathā ghammīyati, ghammīyanti iccādi.
[03] 450^b^.^eb^ ^b^pañcamī tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṃ antaṃ, ssuvho, e āmase^eb^.

[03] satipi kālādhikāre puna ^b^kāla^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^vidhinimantanājjhesanānumatipatthanāpattakālā^eb^dīsu ca pañcamī. āṇāpana^b^māṇatti,^eb^ āsīsanamā^b^siṭṭho,^eb^ so ca iṭṭhassa asampattassa ^a^M0.0269^ea^ atthassa patthanaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^āṇatyāsiṭṭhe^eb^. anu samīpe uttakālo ^b^anuttakālo,^eb^ paccuppannakāloti attho, na uttakāloti vā anuttakālo, tasmiṃ anuttakāle, kālamanāmasitvā hotīti attho.
[03] tattha ^b^āsīsanatthe^eb^ bhūdhātuto pañcamīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ^b^tu, a^eb^ppaccayavuddhi^b^avā^eb^desā. so sukhī bhavatu, te sukhitā bhavantu.
[03] ^b^a^eb^kārato paro ^b^hi^eb^vibhatti ^b^lopa^eb^māpajjate vā. tvaṃ sukhī bhava, bhavāhi vā, himhi dīgho. tumhe sukhitā bhavatha. ahaṃ sukhī bhavāmi, mayaṃ sukhino bhavāma.
[03] ^b^attanopade^eb^ so sukhī bhavataṃ, te sukhitā bhavantaṃ. tvaṃ sukhī bhavassu, tumhe sukhitā bhavavho. ahaṃ sukhī bhave, mayaṃ sukhitā bhavāmase.

[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ anubhūyataṃ tayā, anubhūyantaṃ. anubhūyassu, anubhūyavho. anubhūye, anubhūyāmase. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ anubhūyyatu, anubhūyyantu. anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu vā, anubhūyyāhi iccādi. ^b^bhāve^eb^ bhūyataṃ.
[03] ^b^āṇattiyaṃ kattari^eb^ devadatto dāni odanaṃ pacatu, pacantu. paca, pacāhi, pacatha. pacāmi, pacāma. pacataṃ, pacantaṃ. pacassu, pacavho. pace, pacāmase.

[03] ^b^kammani ya^eb^ppaccayacavaggādi, paccataṃ odano devadattena, paccantaṃ. paccassu, paccavho. pacce, paccāmase. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ paccatu, paccantu. pacca, paccāhi, paccatha. paccāmi, paccāma.

[03] tathā ^a^M0.0270^ea^ so gāmaṃ gacchatu, gacchantu. gaccha, gacchāhi, gacchatha. gacchāmi, gacchāma. gametu, gamentu. gama, gamāhi, gametha. gamemi, gamema. gacchataṃ, gacchantaṃ. gacchassu, gacchavho. gacche, gacchāmase. ^b^ghammā^eb^dese ghammatu, ghammantu iccādi.
[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ gacchīyataṃ, gacchīyatu, gamīyataṃ, gamīyatu, gammataṃ, gammatu iccādi.
[03] ^b^vidhimhi^eb^ idha pabbato hotu, ayaṃ pāsādo suvaṇṇamayo hotūtiādi.
[03] ^b^nimantane^eb^ adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā bhojanaṃ, idha nisīdatu bhavaṃ.
[03] ^b^anumatiyaṃ^eb^ pucchatu bhavaṃ pañhaṃ, pavisatu bhavaṃ, ettha nisīdatu.
[03] ^b^patthanā^eb^ yācanā, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, ekaṃ me nayanaṃ dehi.
[03] ^b^pattakāle^eb^ sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṃ karotu bhavaṃ iccādi.
[03] 453^b^.^eb^ ^b^sattamī eyya eyyuṃ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmieyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṃeyyāmhe^eb^.
[03] anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle ^b^sattamī^eb^vibhatti hoti.
