[03] ^b^attha^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^vidhinimantanā^eb^dīsu ca sattamī. kattumicchato parassa anujānanaṃ ^b^anumati,^eb^ parikappanaṃ ^b^parikappo,^eb^ ``yadi nāma bhaveyyā''ti sallakkhaṇaṃ nirūpanaṃ, hetukriyāya sambhave phalakriyāya sambhavaparikappo ca.

[03] tattha ^b^parikappe^eb^ sattamīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ^b^eyya,^eb^ appaccayavuddhādi purimasamaṃ, ``kvaci dhātu vibhattī''tiādinā eyya eyyāsi eyyāmi eyyaṃiccetesaṃ vikappena ekārādeso. so dāni kiṃ nu kho bhave, yadi so paṭhamavaye pabbajeyya, arahā bhaveyya, sace saṅkhārā niccā bhaveyyuṃ, na nirujjheyyuṃ. yadi tvaṃ bhaveyyāsi, tumhe bhaveyyātha. kathamahaṃ devo bhaveyyāmi, kiṃ nu kho mayaṃ bhaveyyāma. tathā bhavetha, bhaveraṃ. bhavetho, bhaveyyāvho.
[03] ^b^patthane^eb^ tu ahaṃ sukhī bhave, buddho bhaveyyaṃ, bhaveyyāmhe.

[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ sukhaṃ tayā anubhūyetha, anubhūyeraṃ. anubhūyetho, anubhūyeyyāvho. anubhūye, anubhūyeyyaṃ, anubhūyeyyāmhe. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ anubhūyeyya, anubhūyeyyuṃ. anubhūyeyyāsi iccādi. ^b^bhāve^eb^ bhūyetha.

[02] ^b^vidhimhi^eb^ so odanaṃ pace, paceyya, paceyyuṃ. tvaṃ pace, paceyyāsi, tumhe paceyyātha. ahaṃ pace, paceyyāmi, mayaṃ paceyyāma. pacetha, paceraṃ. pacetho, paceyyāvho. pace, paceyyaṃ, paceyyāmhe.
[02] ^b^kammani^eb^ ^a^M0.0272^ea^ paccetha, pacceraṃ. paccetho, pacceyyāvho. pacce, pacceyyaṃ, pacceyyāmhe. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ pacce, pacceyya, pacceyyuṃ. pacceyyāsi iccādi.

[02] ^b^anumatiyaṃ^eb^ so gāmaṃ gacche, gaccheyya, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^eyyu^eb^ssa uṃ vā, gacchuṃ, gaccheyyuṃ. tvaṃ gacche, gaccheyyāsi, gaccheyyātha. gacche, gaccheyyāmi, gaccheyyāma. game, gameyya, gamuṃ, gameyyuṃ. game, gameyyāsi, gameyyātha. game, gameyyāmi, gameyyāma. gacchetha, gaccheraṃ. gacchetho, gaccheyyāvho. gacche, gaccheyyaṃ, gaccheyyāmhe. gametha, gameraṃ iccādi.
[02] ^b^kammani^eb^ gacchīyetha, gamīyetha, gacchīyeraṃ, gamīyeraṃ iccādi. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ gacchīyeyya, gamīyeyya, gammeyya, gammeyyuṃ iccādi. tathā ghamme, ghammeyya, ghammeyyuṃ iccādi.
[03] 455^b^.^eb^ ^b^hiyyattanī āū, ottha, aṃmhā, tthatthuṃ, sevhaṃ, iṃmhase^eb^.
[03] hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā appaccakkhe vā ^b^hiyyattanī^eb^vibhatti hotīti hiyyattanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ^b^ā^eb^.
[03] kvaci dhātūnamādimhi ^b^a^eb^kārāgamo hoti ^b^hiyyattanīajjatanīkālātipatti^eb^iccetāsu tīsu vibhattīsu. kathamayamakārāgamo dhātvādimhīti ce?
[02] abhavā, abhavū. abhavo, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^o^eb^kārassa ^b^a^eb^ādeso vā, abhava, abhavattha. abhavaṃ, abhavamhā. abhavattha, abhavatthuṃ. abhavase, abhavavhaṃ. abhaviṃ, abhavamhase.

[02] ^b^kammani ya^eb^ppaccayo, tayā sukhamanvabhūyattha, ^b^a^eb^kārāgamābhāve anubhūyattha, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^ttha^eb^ssa ^b^thā^eb^deso, anvabhūyatha, anubhūyatha, anvabhūyatthuṃ, anubhūyatthuṃ. anvabhūyase, anubhūyase, anvabhūyavhaṃ, anubhūyavhaṃ. anvabhūyiṃ, anubhūyiṃ, anvabhūyamhase, anubhūyamhase. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ anvabhūyā, anubhūyā iccādi. ^b^bhāve^eb^ anvabhūyattha.

[02] tathā so odanaṃ apacā, pacā, apacū, pacū. apaco, paco, apacattha, pacattha. apacaṃ, pacaṃ, apacamhā, pacamhā. apacattha, pacattha, apacatthu, pacatthuṃ. apacase, pacase, apacavhaṃ, pacavhaṃ. apaciṃ, paciṃ, apacamhase, pacamhase.
[02] ^b^kammani^eb^ ^a^M0.0274^ea^ apaccatha, apaccattha, apaccatthuṃ. apaccase, apaccavhaṃ. apacciṃ, apaccamhase. apaccā, apaccū iccādi.

[02] tathā agacchā, agacchū. agaccho, agaccha, agacchattha. agacchaṃ, agacchamhā. agacchattha, agacchatthuṃ. agacchase, agacchavhaṃ. agacchiṃ, agacchamhase. agamā, agamū. agamo, agama, agamattha. agamaṃ, agamamhā. agamattha, agamatthuṃ. agamase, agamavhaṃ. agamiṃ, agamamhase.
[02] ^b^kammani^eb^ agacchīyattha, gacchīyattha, agamīyattha, gamīyattha, agacchīyatthuṃ, gacchīyatthuṃ, agamīyatthuṃ, gamīyatthuṃ iccādi. tathā aghammā, aghammū iccādi.
[03] ^b^hiyyattanā^eb^dayo catasso vibhattiyo ^b^sabbadhātuka^eb^saññā hontīti hiyyattanādīnaṃ sabbadhātukasaññattā ``ikārāgamo asabbadhātukamhī''ti vutto ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo na bhavati.
[03] 459^b^.^eb^ ^b^parokkhā a u, e ttha, aṃ mha, ttha re, tho vho, iṃmhe^eb^.
[03] ^b^a^eb^ādayo dvādasa ^b^parokkhā^eb^saññā honti. akkhānaṃ indriyānaṃ paraṃ parokkhā, taddīpakattā ayaṃ vibhatti ^b^parokkhā^eb^ti vuccati.
[03] apaccakkhe vattuno indriyāvisayabhūte atīte kāle ^b^parokkhā^eb^vibhatti hoti. atikkamma itoti ^b^atīto,^eb^ hutvā atikkantoti attho.
[03] dhātūnamādibhūtānaṃ vaṇṇānamekassarānaṃ kvaci dvebhāvo hoti. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^kvaci^eb^saddo, tena --
[21] kha cha sesu parokkhāyaṃ, dvebhāvo sabbadhātunaṃ.
[03] dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo avayavo, so ^b^abbhāsa^eb^sañño hotīti abbhāsasaññā.
[03] abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti vā, ^b^a^eb^kāro ca. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. tena --
[03] abbhāsagatānaṃ dutiyacatutthānaṃ vaggabyañjanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ paṭhamatatiyā hontīti ^b^bha^eb^kārassa ^b^ba^eb^kāro.

[03] ^b^brūbhū^eb^iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ ^b^āhabhūva^eb^iccete ādesā honti parokkhāvibhattiyanti ^b^bhū^eb^saddassa ^b^bhūva^eb^ādeso, ``saralopo mādesappaccayādimhī''tiādinā saralopādi, so kira rājā babhūva, te kira babhūvu. tvaṃ kira babhūve.
[03] sabbasmiṃ asabbadhātukamhi pare kvaci dhātūhi paro ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo hoti.

[03] ettha ca ``na sabbadhātukaṃ asabbadhātuka''miti katvā ``hiyyattanī sattamī pañcamī vattamānā sabbadhātuka''nti hiyyattanīādīnaṃ sabbadhātukasaññāya vuttattā tadaññā catasso vibhattiyo asabbadhātukanti vuccati.
[03] tumhe ^a^M0.0277^ea^ kira babhūvittha. ahaṃ kira babhūvaṃ, mayaṃ kira babhūvimha. ^b^attanopade^eb^ so babhūvittha, babhūvire. babhūvittho, babhūvivho. babhūviṃ, babhūvimhe.

[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ attanopade ^b^ī^eb^kārāgama^b^ya^eb^ppacca^b^yi^eb^kārāgamā, anubabhūvīyittha, ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayassa asabbadhātukamhi ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā lope kate ivaṇṇāgamo na bhavati, tayā kira anubabhūvittha, anubabhūvire iccādi. ^b^bhāve^eb^ babhūvīyittha, babhūvittha vā.
[03] tathā papaca, papacū. papace, papacittha. papacaṃ, papacimha. papacittha, papacire. papacittho, papacivho. papaciṃ, papacimhe.
[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ papaccittha, papaccire iccādi. tathā apacca, apaccū iccādi.

[03] abbhāse vattamānassa ^b^ka^eb^vaggassa ^b^ca^eb^vaggo hotīti ^b^va^eb^kārassa ^b^ja^eb^kāro, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā anabbhāsassa paṭhamapurisekavacanamhi dīgho. so gāmaṃ jagāma kira, jagama vā, jagamu. jagame, jagamittha. jagamaṃ, jagamimha. jagamittha, jagamire. jagamittho, jagamivho. jagamiṃ, jagamimhe.
[03] 468^b^.^eb^ ajjatanīb^ ^a^M0.0278^ea^ ī uṃ, ^b^o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, amhe^eb^.
[03] ^b^ī^eb^ādayo dvādasa ^b^ajjatanī^eb^saññā honti. ajja bhavo ajjatano, taddīpakattā ayaṃ vibhatti ^b^ajjatanī^eb^ti vuccati.
[03] ^b^samīpe^eb^ samīpato paṭṭhāya ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe ca apaccakkhe ca ^b^ajjatanī^eb^vibhatti hotīti ajjatanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ī.

[03] pure viya ^b^a^eb^kārāgamo, vuddhādi ca, ``kvaci dhātuvibhattī''tiādinā ^b^īmhā^eb^divibhattīnaṃ kvaci rassattaṃ, ^b^oāa^eb^vacanānaṃ ^b^itthā^eb^mādesā ca, saralopādi, so abhavi, abhavī vā, ^b^a^eb^kārāgamābhāve bhavi.

[02] te abhaviṃsu, bhaviṃsu vā, abhavuṃ, bhavuṃ vā. tvaṃ abhavi, bhavi vā, abhavo, bhavo vā, tumhe abhavittha, bhavittha vā, ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo. ahaṃ abhaviṃ, bhaviṃ vā, mayaṃ abhavimha, bhavimha vā, abhavimhā, bhavimhā vā. so abhavittha, bhavittha vā, abhavā, bhavā vā, abhavū, bhavū vā. abhavise, bhavise vā, abhavivhaṃ, bhavivhaṃ vā. abhavaṃ ^a^M0.0279^ea^, bhavaṃ vā, abhava, bhava vā, abhavimhe, bhavimhe vā.

[02] ^b^kammani ya^eb^ppaccayalope vuddhiavādesādi, sukhaṃ tayā anubhavittha, anvabhūyittha, anubhūyittha vā iccādi. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ tayā anvabhūyi, anubhūyi, anvabhūyī, anubhūyī vā, anvabhūyiṃsu, anubhūyiṃsu, anvabhūyuṃ, anubhūyuṃ. tvaṃ anvabhūyi, anubhūyi, tumhe anvabhūyittha, anubhūyittha. ahaṃ anvabhūyiṃ, anubhūyiṃ, mayaṃ anvabhūyimha, anubhūyimha, anvabhūyimhā, anubhūyimhā vā. ^b^bhāve^eb^ abhavittha, abhūyittha tayā.

[02] so apaci, paci, apacī, pacī vā, te apaciṃsu, paciṃsu, apacuṃ, pacuṃ. tvaṃ apaci, paci, apaco, paco vā, tumhe apacittha, pacittha. ahaṃ apaciṃ, paciṃ, mayaṃ apacimha, pacimha, apacimhā, pacimhā vā. so apacittha, pacittha, apacā, pacā vā, apacū, pacū. apacise, apacivhaṃ. apacaṃ, pacaṃ, apaca, paca vā, apacimhe, pacimhe.

[02] ^b^kammani^eb^ apaccittha, paccittha iccādi. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ apacci, pacci, apaccī, paccī vā, apacciṃsu, pacciṃsu, apaccuṃ, paccuṃ. apacci, pacci, apacco, pacco vā, apaccittha, paccittha. apacciṃ, pacciṃ, apaccimha, paccimha, apaccimhā, paccimhā vā.

[02] so gāmaṃ agacchī, gacchī, agacchi, gacchi vā, te agacchiṃsu, gacchiṃsu, agacchuṃ, gacchuṃ. tvaṃ agacchi, gacchi, agaccho, gaccho vā, tumhe agacchittha, gacchittha. ahaṃ agacchiṃ, gacchiṃ, mayaṃ agacchimha, gacchimha, agacchimhā, gacchimhā vā.

[02] ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ajjatanimhi gamissa ^b^ccha^eb^ssa kvaci ^b^ñchā^eb^deso, agañchi, gañchi, agañchī, gañchī vā, te agañchiṃsu ^a^M0.0280^ea^, gañchiṃsu, agañchuṃ, gañchuṃ. tvaṃ agañchi, gañchi, agañcho, gañcho vā, tumhe agañchittha, gañchittha. ahaṃ agañchiṃ, gañchiṃ, mayaṃ agañchimha, gañchimha, agañchimhā, gañchimhā vā.

[2ﾠ]^b^cchā^eb^desābhāve so agami, gami, agamī, gamī vā, ``karassa kāsattamajjatanimhī''ti ettha ^b^bhāva^eb^niddesena, ``sattamajjatanimhī''ti yogavibhāgena vā ^b^sā^eb^game ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā byañjanato ^b^ā^eb^kārāgamo, agamāsi, uṃvacanassa kvaci ^b^aṃsvā^eb^deso, ^b^u^eb^cāgamo ^b^tthamhe^eb^su kvaci, agamiṃsu, gamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, gamaṃsu, agamuṃ, gamuṃ, tvaṃ agami, gami, agamo, gamo vā, agamittha, gamittha, agamuttha, gamuttha. ahaṃ agamiṃ, gamiṃ, agamimha, gamimha, agamumha, gamumha, agamimhā, gamimhā vā.
[02] ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā gamissa ajjatanimhi ^b^gā^eb^deso ca, so ajjhagā, paralopo, te ajjhaguṃ. tvaṃ ajjhago, tumhe ajjhaguttha. ahaṃ ajjhagiṃ, mayaṃ ajjhagumha.

[02] ^b^attanopade^eb^ so agacchittha, gacchittha, agañchittha, gañchittha iccādi. ^b^cchā^eb^desābhāve so agamittha, gamittha, agamā, gamā, te agamū, gamū, ajjhagū, agū. tvaṃ agamise, gamise, agamivhaṃ, gamivhaṃ. ahaṃ agamaṃ, gamaṃ, agama, gama, ajjhagaṃ vā, agamimhe, gamimhe.

[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ gāmo agacchīyittha tena, gacchīyittha, agañchiyittha, gañchiyittha, agamīyittha, gamīyittha, agamittha, gamittha iccādi. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ agacchīyi, gacchīyi vā, agamīyi, gamīyi ^a^M0.0281^ea^ vā, agacchīyuṃ, agamīyuṃ vā. tathā aghammīyi, aghammīyiṃsu iccādi.

[03] yadā^b^mā^eb^yogo, tadā ^b^hiyyattanajjatanī^eb^vibhattiyo sabbakālepi honti, ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^pañcamī^eb^ ca. mā bhavati, mā bhavā, mā bhavissatīti vā atthe hiyyattanajjatanīpañcamī vibhattiyo, sesaṃ neyyaṃ, so mā bhavā, mā bhavī, mā te bhavantvantarāyā. mā pacā, mā pacī, mā pacatu. mā gacchā, mā gacchī, mā gacchatu. mā kañci pāpamāgamā, mā agami, mā gamā, mā gamī, mā gametu. tvaṃ mā gaccho, mā gacchi, mā gacchāhi iccādi.
[03] 472^b^.^eb^ ^b^bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmissāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃssāmhe^eb^.
[03] ssatyādīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ vacanānaṃ ^b^bhavissantī^eb^saññā hoti. bhavissatīti bhavissanto, taṃkāladīpakattā ayaṃ vibhatti ^b^bhavissantī^eb^ti vuccati.
[03] na ^a^M0.0282^ea^ āgato ^b^anāgato,^eb^ paccayasāmaggiyaṃ sati āyatiṃ uppajjanārahoti attho, ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo, vuddhi^b^avā^eb^desā, saralopādi ca.
[02] bhavissati, bhavissanti. bhavissasi, bhavissatha. bhavissāmi, bhavissāma. bhavissate, bhavissante. bhavissase, bhavissavhe. bhavissaṃ, bhavissāmhe.

[02] ^b^kamme ya^eb^ppaccayalopo, sukhaṃ tayā anubhavissate, anubhavissante. anubhavissase, anubhavissavhe. anubhavissaṃ, anubhavissāmhe. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ anubhavissati devadattena, anubhavissanti iccādi. ^b^bhāve^eb^ bhavissate tena, ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayalopābhāve anubhūyissate, anubhūyissante iccādi. ^b^bhāve^eb^ bhūyissate.
[02] tathā pacissati, pacissanti. pacissasi, pacissatha. pacissāmi, pacissāma. pacissate, pacissante. pacissase, pacissavhe. pacissaṃ, pacissāmhe.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ paccissate odano devadattena, paccissante iccādi. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ paccissati, paccissanti. paccissasi, paccissatha. paccissāmi, paccissāma.

[02] gacchissati, gacchissanti. gacchissasi, gacchissatha. gacchissāmi, gacchissāma. gacchissate, gacchissante. gacchissase, gacchissavhe. gacchissaṃ, gacchissāmhe. so saggaṃ gamissati, gamissanti. gamissasi, gamissatha. gamissāmi, gamissāma iccādi.

[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ gacchīyissate, gacchīyissante. gacchīyissati, gacchīyissanti vā, gamīyissate, gamīyissante. gamīyissati, gamīyissanti vā iccādi. ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayalope gamissate ^a^M0.0283^ea^, gamissante. gamissati, gamissanti vā. tathā ghammissati, ghammissanti iccādi.
[03] 484^b^.^eb^ ^b^kālātipatti ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃssāmhase^eb^.

[03] ^b^ssā^eb^dīnaṃ dvādasannaṃ ^b^kālātipatti^eb^saññā hoti. kālassa atipatanaṃ kālātipatti, sā pana viruddhapaccayūpanipātato, kāraṇavekallato vā kriyāya anabhinibbatti, taddīpakattā ayaṃ vibhatti ^b^kālātipattī^eb^ti vuccati.

[03] kriyātipannamatte atīte kāle ^b^kālātipatti^eb^vibhatti hoti. kriyāya atipatanaṃ ^b^kriyātipannaṃ,^eb^ taṃ pana sādhakasattivirahena kriyāya accantānuppatti. ettha ca kiñcāpi na kriyā atītasaddena voharitabbā, tathāpi takkiriyuppattippaṭibandhakarakriyāya kālabhedena atītavohāro labbhatevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] kālātipattiparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ^b^ssā, a^eb^kārikārāgamā, vuddhi^b^avā^eb^desā ca, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^ssā ssāmhā^eb^vibhattīnaṃ kvaci rassattaṃ, ^b^sse^eb^vacanassa ca ^b^a^eb^ttaṃ.

[02] so ce paṭhamavaye pabbajjaṃ alabhissa, arahā abhavissa, bhavissa, abhavissā, bhavissāvā, te ce taṃ alabhissaṃsu, arahanto abhavissaṃsu, bhavissaṃsu. evaṃ tvaṃ abhavissa, bhavissa, abhavisse vā, tumhe abhavissatha, bhavissatha. ahaṃ abhavissaṃ, bhavissaṃ, mayaṃ ^a^M0.0284^ea^ abhavissamha, bhavissamha, abhavissāmhā, bhavissāmhā vā. so abhavissatha, abhavissisu. abhavissase, abhavissavhe. abhavissiṃ, abhavissāmhase.

[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ anvabhavissatha, anvabhavissisu. anvabhūyissatha vā iccādi. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ anvabhavissa, anvabhavissaṃsu. anvabhūyissa vā iccādi. ^b^bhāve^eb^ abhavissatha devadattena, abhūyissatha.

[02] tathā so ce taṃ dhanaṃ alabhissa, odanaṃ apacissa, pacissa, apacissā, pacissā vā, apacissaṃsu, pacissaṃsu. apacissa, pacissa, apacisse, pacisse vā, apacissatha, pacissatha. apacissaṃ, pacissaṃ, apacissamha, pacissamha, apacissāmhā, pacissāmhā vā. apacissatha, pacissatha, apacissisu, pacissisu. apacissase, pacissase, apacissavhe, pacissavhe. apacissiṃ, pacissiṃ, apacissāmhase, pacissāmhase.

[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ apacissatha odano devadattena, apacissisu. ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayalopābhāve apacīyissatha iccādi. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ apaccissa tena, paccissa, apaccissā, paccissā vā, apaccissaṃsu, paccissaṃsu iccādi.

[02] so agacchissa, gacchissa, agacchissā, gacchissāvā, agacchissaṃsu, gacchissaṃsu. tvaṃ agacchissa, gacchissa, agacchisse, gacchisse vā, agacchissatha, gacchissatha. agacchissaṃ, gacchissaṃ, agacchissamha, gacchissamha, agacchissāmhā, gacchissāmhā vā. agamissa, gamissa, agamissā, gamissā vā, agamissaṃsu, gamissaṃsu. agamissa, gamissa, agamisse vā, agamissatha, gamissatha. agamissaṃ ^a^M0.0285^ea^, gamissaṃ, agamissamha, gamissamha, agamissāmhā, gamissāmhā vā. agacchissatha, gacchissatha vā iccādi.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ agacchīyissatha, agamīyissatha, agacchīyissa, agamīyissaiccādi. tathā aghammissā, aghammissaṃsu iccādi.

[03] ^b^isuyamu^eb^iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto ^b^ccho^eb^ hoti vā. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, ``anto ccho vā''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^āsa^eb^ssapi. so saggaṃ icchati, icchanti. icchasi, icchatha. icchāmi, icchāma. ^b^cchā^eb^desābhāve asaṃyogantattā ``aññesu cā''ti vuddhi, esati, esanti iccādi.

[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ attanopadassa yebhuyyena parassapadattameva payojīyati, tena cettha attanopade rūpāni saṅkhipissāma. so icchīyati, esīyati, issate, issati, ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ^a^M0.0286^ea^ pubbarūpattaṃ. tathā icchatu, esatu. iccheyya, eseyya. parokkhāhiyyattanīsu pana rūpāni sabbattha payogamanugamma payojetabbāni, icchi, esi. icchissati, esissati. icchissā, esissā icchādi.
[03] ^b^yamu^eb^ uparame, ^b^ni^eb^pubbo, ^b^cchā^eb^deso ca. niyacchati, niyacchanti. niyamati, niyamanti. ^b^saṃ^eb^pubbo ``saye cā''ti ^b^ña^eb^ttaṃ, dvittañca. saññamati, saññamanti.

[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ niyacchīyati, niyamīyati, niyammati, saññamīyati vā. tathā niyacchatu, saññamatu. niyaccheyya, saññameyya. niyacchī, saññamī. niyacchissati, saññamissati. niyacchissa, saññamissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^āsa^eb^ upavesane, yogavibhāgena ^b^cchā^eb^deso, rassattaṃ. acchati, acchanti. acchasi, acchatha. acchāmi, acchāma. aññatra ^b^upa^eb^pubbo upāsati, upāsanti. acchīyati, upāsīyati. acchatu, upāsatu. accheyya, upāseyya. acchī, upāsī. acchissati, upāsissati. acchissa, upāsissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^labha^eb^ lābhe, labhati, labhanti. labhasi, labhatha. labhāmi, labhāma. labhate, labhante. labhase, labhavhe. labhe, labhāmhe.
[03] ^b^kamme ya^eb^kārassa pubbarūpatte kate ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā purima^b^bha^eb^kārassa ^b^ba^eb^kāro, labbhate, labbhante. labbhati, labbhanti. labbhataṃ, labbhatu. labbhe, labbheyya.

[03] ^b^labha^eb^iccetasmā dhātuto paresaṃ īiṃnaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ^b^ttha tthaṃ^eb^iccete ādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ^a^M0.0287^ea^ ca. alattha, alabhi, labhi, alabhiṃsu, labhiṃsu. alabho, labho, alabhi, labhi, alabhittha, labhittha. alatthaṃ, alabhiṃ, labhiṃ, alabhimha, labhimha iccādi.

[03] bhavissantimhi ``karassa sappaccayassa kāho''ti ettha ^b^sappaccaya^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^vaca muca bhujā^eb^dito ^b^ssa^eb^ssa^b^khā^eb^deso, ^b^vasa chida labhā^eb^dito ^b^chā^eb^deso ca vā hotīti ^b^ssa^eb^ssa ^b^chā^eb^deso, ``byañjanantassa co chappaccayesu cā''ti dhātvantassa ^b^ca^eb^kāro, lacchati, lacchanti. lacchasi, lacchatha. lacchāmi, lacchāma. ^b^chā^eb^desābhāve labhissati, labhissanti. labhissasi, labhissatha. labhissāmi, labhissāma iccādi. alabhissa, alabhissaṃsu iccādi.
[03] ^b^vaca^eb^ viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vacati, vacanti. vacasi, vacatha. vacāmi, vacāma.

[03] ^b^vaca vasa vaha^eb^iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ ^b^va^eb^kārassa ^b^u^eb^kāro hoti ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye pare, ^b^ādi^eb^saddena ^b^vaḍḍha^eb^ssa ca. ``vassa a va''iti samāsena dutiyañcettha ^b^va^eb^ggahaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ, tena ^b^a^eb^kārassapi ^b^u^eb^kāro hoti, purimapakkhe paralopo. ``tassa cavagga''iccādinā sadhātvantassa ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ^b^ca^eb^kāro, dvittaṃ. uccate, uccante. vuccate, vuccante. vuccati, vuccanti vā iccādi. tathā vacatu, vuccatu. vaceyya, vucceyya. avacā, avaccā, avacū, avaccū. avaca, avaco, avacuttha. avaca, avacaṃ, avacamhā. avacuttha iccādi.

[03] ^b^vaca^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^a^eb^kāro ^b^o^eb^ttamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi. avoci, avocuṃ. avoco, avocuttha. avociṃ, avocumha, ^b^u^eb^kārāgamo. avoca, rassattaṃ, avocu iccādi. avuccittha.

[03] bhavissantimhi ^b^sappaccaya^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ssa^eb^ssa ^b^khā^eb^deso, ``byañjanantassā''ti vattamāne ``ko khe cā''ti dhātvantassa ^b^kā^eb^deso, vakkhati, vakkhanti. vakkhasi, vakkhatha. vakkhāmi, vakkhāma iccādi.
[03] ^b^kamme u^eb^ttaṃ, pubbarūpattañca vussati, vussanti iccādi. vasatu. vaseyya. avasi, vasi.
[03] bhavissantiyaṃ ^b^ssa^eb^ssa ^b^chā^eb^deso, dhātvantassa ^b^ca^eb^kāro ca, vacchati, vacchanti. vacchasi, vacchatha. vacchāmi, vacchāma. vasissati, vasissanti. avasissa, avasissaṃsu.
[03] tathā ^b^ruda^eb^ assuvimocane, rodati, rucchati. rodissati iccādi.
[03] ^b^kusa^eb^ akkose, ^b^ā^eb^pubbo dvittarassattāni, ^b^a^eb^ppaccayavuddhiyo ca. akkosati. akkosatu. akkoseyya.
[03] ^b^kusa^eb^ iccetasmā dhātuto īvibhattissa ^b^cchi^eb^ādeso hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. akkocchi maṃ, akkosi vā. akkosissati. akkosissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^ha^eb^kārassa vipariyayo hoti ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye pare, ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayassa ca ^b^la^eb^kāro hoti vā. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, tena ``gayhatī''tiādīsu ^b^la^eb^ttaṃ na hoti, nimittabhūtassa ^b^ya^eb^kārassevetaṃ ^b^la^eb^ttaṃ, ``vacavasa''iccādinā uttaṃ. vuyhati, vulhati, ^b^vu^eb^yhanti. vahatu, vuyhatu. vaheyya, vuyheyya. avahī, avuyhittha, avahittha. avahissati, vuyhissati. avahissa, avuyhissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^jaramara^eb^ iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ ^b^jīrajīyyamīyyā^eb^desā honti vā, saralopādi. jīrati, jīranti. jīyyati, jīyyanti. ``kvacā''disuttena ekayakārassa kvaci lopo hoti. jīyati, jīyanti.
[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ jīrīyati, jīrīyanti. jīyiyyati, jīyiyyanti. jīratu, jīyyatu. jīreyya, jīyyeyya. ajīrī, jīrī, jīyyī. jīrissati, jīyyissati. ajīrissa, ajīyyissa.
[03] ^b^mara^eb^ pāṇacāge, ^b^mīyyā^eb^deso, mīyyati, mīyyanti. mīyati, mīyanti vā. marati, maranti iccādi.

[03] ^b^disa^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^passa dissa dakkha^eb^iccete ādesā honti vā. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, tena ^b^dissā^eb^deso kammani sabbadhātuke eva. passati, passanti. dakkhati, dakkhanti.
[03] ^b^kammani ya^eb^kāralopo, dissate, dissante. dissati, dissanti. vipassīyati, dakkhīyati. passatu, dakkhatu, dissatu. passeyya, dakkheyya, disseyya.

[03] tathā apassi, passi, apassiṃsu, passiṃsu. apassi, passi, apassittha, passittha. apassiṃ, passiṃ, apassimha, passimha. addasi, dasi, addasaṃsu, dasaṃsu. ^b^kammani^eb^ adissaṃsu. addakkhi, addakkhiṃsu.

[03] passissati, passissanti. ``bhavissantimhi ssassa cā''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^ssa^eb^ssa lopo, ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo ca, dakkhiti, dakkhinti. lopābhāve dakkhissati, dakkhissanti. apassissa, adakkhissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^sada^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^sīdā^eb^deso hoti sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu kvaci. sesaṃ neyyaṃ. nisīdati, nisīdanti. ^b^bhāve^eb^ nisajjate, idha kvacādhikārena ^b^sīdā^eb^-deso ^a^M0.0291^ea^ na bhavati. nisīdatu. nisīde. nisīdi. nisīdissati. nisīdissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^yaja^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ādissa ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ^b^i^eb^kārādeso hoti ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye pare, saralopo. ijjate mayā buddho. tathā yajatu, ijjataṃ. yaje, ijjetha. yaji, ijjittha. yajissati, ijjissate. yajissa, ijjissatha iccādi.
[03] ^b^vada^eb^iccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ^b^vajjā^eb^deso hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu. vibhatyādhikārattā cettha sabbāsūti atthato siddhaṃ.
[03] ^b^bhūvā^eb^dito paro ^b^a^eb^ppaccayo ^b^etta^eb^māpajjate, lopañca vā. vikaraṇakāriyavidhippakaraṇato cettha ^b^a^eb^kāroti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayo gayhati.

[03] idha dhātvādhikāre ākhyāte, kitake ca avihitalakkhaṇesu payogesu kvaci dhātūnaṃ, tyādivibhattīnaṃ, dhātuvihitappaccayānañca dīghatabbiparītāadesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpato bhavanti. tattha --
[22] āyūnaṃ vā vibhattīnaṃ, mhā, ssāntassa ca rassatā..
[21] gamito cchassa ñcho vāssa, gamissajjatanimhi gā.
[22] ucāgamo vā tthamhesu, dhātūnaṃ yamhi dīghatā..
[22] okārā attamittañca, ātthā papponti vā tthathe..
[21] tathā brūtoti antīnaṃ, au vāha ca dhātuyā.

[03] ^b^e^eb^kārato parassa ^b^antia^eb^kārassa lopo, vajjenti, vadenti, vadanti. vajjesi, vadesi, vadasi, vajjetha, vadetha, vadatha. vajjemi, vajjāmi, vademi, vadāmi, vajjema, vadema, vajjāma, vadāma.

[02] ^b^kammani^eb^ vajjīyati, vajjīyanti. vajjati, vajjanti. vadīyati vā. vajjetu, vadetu, vadatu. vajje, vajjeyya, vade, vadeyya, vajjeyyuṃ, vadeyyuṃ. vajjeyyāsi, vajjesi, vadeyyāsi. avadi, vadi, vadiṃsu. vadissati, vadissanti. avadissa iccādi.
[03] abbhāsante ^b^niggahīta^eb^ñcāgamo hoti vā. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, tena ^b^kamā^eb^dīnamevetaṃ. caṅkamati, caṅkamanti iccādi. kamati, kamanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^jhe^eb^cintāyaṃ, ^b^a^eb^ppaccaye ``o, sare, e''ti ca adhikicca ``te āvāyā''ti yogavibhāgena akāritepi ^b^e^eb^kārassa ^b^āyā^eb^deso, jhāyati, jhāyanti iccādi, visesavidhānaṃ.

[03] ^b^tuda^eb^ byathane, ^b^tyā^eb^dyuppatti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayo, ``aññesu cā''ti ^b^e^eb^tthānuvattita ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^tudā^eb^dīnaṃ vuddhiabhāvova viseso, tudati, tudanti. tudasi, tudatha. tudāmi, tudāma.

[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ``tassa cavagga''iccādinā sadakārassa ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayassa ^b^ja^eb^kāro dvittaṃ, tujjate, tujjante. tujjati, tujjanti, tujjare vā. tathā tudatu, tudantu. tude, tudeyya, tudeyyuṃ. atudi, tudiṃsu. atudi, atudittha. atudiṃ, atudimha. atujjittha, atujji. tudissati. atudissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^visa^eb^ pavesane ^b^pa^eb^pubbo, so gāmaṃ pavisati, pavisanti. pavisasi, pavisatha. pavisāmi, pavisāma.

[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ^a^M0.0294^ea^ pavisiyyate, pavisiyyante. pavisiyyati, pavisiyyanti. pavissate vā. tathā pavisatu, pavisantu. paviseyya. pāvisi, pavisi, pāvekkhi pathaviṃ, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ajjatanimhi ^b^visa^eb^ssa vekkhādeso ca. pāvisiṃsu, pavisiṃsu.
[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ pāvisīyittha, pavisīyittha, pāvisīyi, pavisīyi. pavisissati, pavisissanti. pavisīyissate, pavisissate. pāvisissa. pāvisīyissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^hū, bhū^eb^ sattāyaṃ, ^b^tyā^eb^dyuppatti ``bhūvādito a''iti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayo, ``vā''ti adhikicca ``lopañcettamakāro''ti bhūvādito parassa appaccayassa lopo, ``aññesu cā''ti vuddhi. so hoti, te honti, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā parasarassa lopo. hosi, hotha. homi, homa. ^b^bhāve^eb^ hūyate.
[03] tathā hotu, hontu. hohi, anakāraparattā ^b^hi^eb^lopo na bhavati, hotha. homi, homa. ^b^bhāve^eb^ hūyataṃ.
[03] ^b^sattamiyaṃ^eb^ saralopādi, heyya, heyyuṃ. heyyāsi, heyyātha. heyyāmi, heyyāma. heyyaṃ vā. ^b^bhāve^eb^ hūyetha.

[03] ^b^hiyyattaniyaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0295^ea^ ^b^a^eb^ppaccayalope ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^hū^eb^dhātussa ^b^ū^eb^kārassa ^b^uvā^eb^deso. ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvū. ahuva, ahuvo, ahuvattha. ahuvaṃ, ahuvamha. ahuvattha, ahuvatthuṃ. ahuvase, ahuvavhaṃ. ahuviṃ, ahuvamhase. ^b^bhāve^eb^ ahūyattha.

[03] ^b^ajjatanimhi^eb^ ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^hū^eb^to īvibhattissa lopo rassattaṃ, so ahu, lopābhāve ``karassa kāsattamajjatanimhī''ti ettha ``sattamajjatanimhī''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^sā^eb^gamo, vuddhi, ahosi, ahesuṃ, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^o^eb^kāra^b^sse^eb^kāro. ahavuṃ vā. ahosi, ahosittha. ahosiṃ, ahuṃ, parasarassa lopo, rassattañca, ahosimha, ahumha, rassattaṃ. ^b^bhāve^eb^ ahūyittha.
[03] ``hi lopaṃ vā''ti ito ``lopo, vā''ti ca vattate.
[03] ^b^hū^eb^iccetassa dhātussa saro ^b^eha oha etta^eb^māpajjate bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi, ^b^ssa^eb^ssa ca lopo hoti vā. ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo, saralopādi.

[02] hehiti, hehinti. hehisi, hehitha. hehāmi, hehāma. lopābhāve -- hehissati, hehissanti. hehissasi, hehissatha. hehissāmi, hehissāma. ^b^ohādese^eb^ -- hohiti, hohinti. hohisi, hohitha. hohāmi, hohāma. tathā hohissati, hohissanti. hohissasi, hohissatha. hohissāmi, hohissāma. ^b^ekārādese^eb^ -- heti, henti. hesi, hetha. hemi ^a^M0.0296^ea^, hema. hessati, hessanti. hessasi, hessatha. hessāmi, hessāma. ^b^bhāve^eb^ hūyissate.
[02] ^b^hū, bhū^eb^ sattāyaṃ, bhū itīdha ^b^anu^eb^pubbo, ^b^tyā^eb^dyuppatti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayassa lopavuddhiyo, anubhoti, anubhonti. anubhosi, anubhotha. anubhomi, anubhoma.

[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ anubhūyati, anubhūyanti. tathā anubhotu, anubhontu. anubhohi, anubhotha. anubhomi, anubhoma. anubhūyatu, anubhūyantu. anubhave, anubhaveyya. anubhūyeyya. anubhosi, anubhavi. anubhossati, anubhossanti. anubhossasi, anubhossatha. anubhossāmi, anubhossāma. anubhavissati vā. anubhossa, anubhavissa vā iccādi.
[03] ^b^sī^eb^ saye ^b^a^eb^ppaccayalopo, vuddhi ca, seti, senti. sesi, setha. semi, sema. sete, sente iccādi.
[03] ^b^e^eb^kārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ^b^ayā^eb^deso hoti, saralopādi. sayati, sayanti. sayasi, sayatha. sayāmi, sayāma.
[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ^a^M0.0297^ea^ ^b^ati^eb^pubbo, ``kvaci dhātvā''dinā yamhi rassasarassa dhātvantassa dīgho, atisīyate, atisīyante. atisīyati, atisīyanti. ^b^bhāve^eb^ sīyate.

[02] tathā setu, sentu. sehi, setha. semi, sema. sayatu, sayantu. saya, sayāhi, sayatha. sayāmi, sayāma. sayataṃ, sayantaṃ. sayassu, sayavho. saye, sayāmase. atisīyataṃ, atisīyantaṃ. atisīyatu, atisīyantu. ^b^bhāve^eb^ sīyataṃ.
[02] asayi, sayi, asayiṃsu, sayiṃsu, asayuṃ. sāgame atisesi, atisesuṃ. ^b^kamme^eb^ accasīyittha, accasīyi, atisīyi. ^b^bhāve^eb^ sīyittha.
[02] sayissati, sayissanti. ^b^i^eb^kārāgamābhāve sessati, sessanti. ^b^kamme^eb^ atisīyissatha, atisīyissati. ^b^bhāve^eb^ sīyissate.

[02] ^b^nī^eb^ pāpuṇane, ^b^dvikammako^eb^yaṃ, ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, nenti. nesi, netha. nemi, nema. lopābhāve nayati, nayanti iccādi. ^b^kamme^eb^ nīyate gāmaṃ ajo devadattena, nīyare, nīyante. nīyati, nīyanti.

[02] tathā netu, nayatu. nīyataṃ, nīyantaṃ. naye, nayeyya. nīyetha, nīyeyya. anayi, nayi, anayiṃsu, nayiṃsu. vinesi, vinesuṃ. anīyittha, nīyittha. nayissati ^a^M0.0298^ea^, nessati. nayissate, nīyissate, nīyissati. anayissa, anīyissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^ṭhā^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^tiṭṭhā^eb^deso hoti vā. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, ^b^a^eb^ppaccayalopo. tiṭṭhati, tiṭṭhanti. ṭhāti, ṭhanti. lopābhāve ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^ṭhā^eb^to ^b^ha^eb^kārāgamo ca rassattaṃ, ^b^saṃ^eb^pubbo saṇṭhahati, saṇṭhahanti. ^b^e^eb^tte adhiṭṭheti, adhiṭṭhenti.
[03] 493^b^.^eb^ ^b^yamhi dādhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha mathādīnamī^eb^.

[03] bhāvakammavisaye ^b^ya^eb^mhi paccaye pare ^b^dā dhā mā ṭhā hāpā maha matha^eb^ iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto īkāramāpajjate, niccatthoyamārambho. upaṭṭhīyati, upaṭṭhīyanti. ^b^ha^eb^kārāgame rassattaṃ, īkārāgamo ca, patiṭṭhahīyati, patiṭṭhahīyanti. ^b^bhāve^eb^ ṭhīyate.

[02] tathā tiṭṭhatu, tiṭṭhantu. ṭhātu, ṭhantu. saṇṭhahatu, saṇṭhahantu. tiṭṭhe, tiṭṭheyya. saṇṭhe, saṇṭheyya, saṇṭheyyuṃ. saṇṭhahe, saṇṭhaheyyuṃ. aṭṭhāsi, aṭṭhaṃsu. saṇṭhahi, saṇṭhahiṃsu. pakiṭṭhissati, patiṭṭhissanti. ṭhassati, ṭhassanti. patiṭṭhahissati, patiṭṭhahissanti. patiṭṭhissa, patiṭṭhissaṃsu. patiṭṭhahissa, patiṭṭhahissaṃsu iccādi.

[02] pibati. pibatu. pibeyya. ``kvaci dhātvā''dinā ^b^ba^eb^kārassa ^b^va^eb^kāro, pivati, pivanti. pāti, pānti, panti vā. pīyate, pīyante. pīyati, pīyanti. pivatu. piveyya. apāyi, pivi. pivissati. apivissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^asa^eb^iccetasmā dhātumhā parassa ^b^ti^eb^ssa vibhattissa ^b^tthi^eb^ttaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. atthi.
[03] sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu ca ^b^asa^eb^iccetāya dhātuyā ādissa lopo hoti vā, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. santi.
[03] ^b^asa^eb^dhātussa antalopo hoti ^b^simhi^eb^ vibhattimhi ca. tvaṃ asi.
[03] ^b^asa^eb^iccetāya dhātuyā parassa ^b^tha^eb^ssa vibhattissa ^b^ttha^eb^ttaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. tumhe attha.
[03] ^b^asa^eb^iccetāya dhātuyā parāsaṃ ^b^mi ma^eb^iccetāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ^b^mhimha^eb^iccete ādesā honti vā, dhātvantassa lopo ca. amhi, amha. asmi, asma.
[03] ^b^asa^eb^iccetāya dhātuyā parassa ^b^tu^eb^ssa vibhattissa ^b^tthu^eb^ttaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. atthu. ^b^asa^eb^ssādilopo ca, santu. āhi, attha. asmi, asma.
[03] ^b^sattamiyaṃ asa^eb^ssādilopo, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^asa^eb^to ^b^eyyaeyyuṃ^eb^ vibhattīnaṃ ^b^iyāiyu^eb^ñca honti. siyā, siyuṃ.
[03] lopābhāve ``kvaci dhātvā''dinā ^b^asa^eb^to ^b^eyyā^eb^dīnaṃ sadhātvantānaṃ ^b^ssa ssu ssa ssatha ssaṃ ssāma^eb^ādesā honti.
[03] ^b^e^eb^vamassa vacanīyo, assu. assa, assatha. assaṃ, assāma.
[03] ^b^ajjataniyaṃ a^eb^kārāgamo, dīgho ca, āsi, āsiṃsu, āsuṃ. āsi, āsittha. āsiṃ, āsimha.
[03] ^b^asa^eb^sseva dhātussa ^b^bhū^eb^ādeso hoti vā asabbadhātuke. bhavissati, bhavissanti. abhavissa, abhavissaṃsu.

[03] ^b^brū^eb^iccetāya dhātuyā paro īkārāgamo hoti ^b^ti^eb^mhi vibhattimhi kvaci, vuddhi^b^avā^eb^desā, saralopādi. bravīti, brūti, ``aññesu cā''ti suttānuvattitavāggahaṇena ^b^brū^eb^dhātussa byañjane vuddhi na hoti, ^b^bahuvacane^eb^ ``jhalānamiyuvā sare vā''ti ūkārassa sare ^b^uvā^eb^deso, bruvanti. ``kvaci dhātvā''dinā ^b^brū^eb^to ^b^tiantīnaṃ^eb^ vā ^b^a u^eb^ ādesā ^b^brū^eb^ssa ^b^āhā^eb^deso ca.

[02] āha, āhu. brūsi, brūtha. brūmi, brūma. brūte, bruvante. brūse, bruvavhe. bruve, brūmhe. brūtu, bruvantu. brūhi, brūtha. brūmi, brūma. brūtaṃ, bruvantaṃ. bruve, bruveyya, bruveyyuṃ. bruveyyāsi, bruveyyātha. bruveyyāmi, bruveyyāma. bruvetha, bruveraṃ. abruvā, abruvū.
[03] ^b^parokkhāyaṃ^eb^ ^a^M0.0302^ea^ ``brūbhūnamāhabhūvā parokkhāya''nti ^b^brū^eb^dhātussa ^b^āha^eb^ādeso, saralopādi, supine kira māha, tenāhu porāṇā, āhaṃsu vā iccādi.
[03] ^b^ajjataniyaṃ^eb^ abravi, abruvi, abravuṃ. bravissati. abravissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^hana^eb^ hiṃsāgatīsu, ^b^ti^eb^mhi kvaci ^b^a^eb^ppaccayalopo, hanti, hanati, hananti. hanasi, hanatha. hanāmi, hanāma.
[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ``tassa cavagga''iccādinā ^b^ña^eb^ttaṃ, dvittañca, haññate, haññante, haññare. haññati, haññanti. hanatu, hanantu. haneyya.

[03] ^b^hana^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^vadhā^eb^deso hoti vā sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. vadheti. vadhīyati. vadhetu. vadhīyatu. vadheyya. avadhi, avadhiṃsu. ahani, ahaniṃsu. vadhissati, hanissati. ^b^khā^eb^dese paṭihaṅkhāmi, paṭihanissāmi. avadhissa, ahanissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^ha^eb^kārassa abbhāse vattamānassa ^b^jo^eb^ hoti. ``lopañcetta makāro''ti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayalopo, vuddhi. juhoti.
[02] juhvati, juhoti, juhvanti, juhonti. juhvasi, juhosi, juhvatha, juhotha. juhvāmi, juhomi, juhvāma, juhoma.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā dīgho, hūyate, hūyante. hūyati, hūyanti.
[02] tathā juhotu, juhontu, juhvantu vā. juhe, juheyya, juheyyuṃ. ajuhavi, ajuhavuṃ. ajuhosi, ajuhosuṃ. ahūyittha aggi. juhissati, juhissanti. juhossati, juhossanti vā. ajuhissa, ajuhissaṃsu iccādi.
[02] jahāti, jahanti. jahāsi, jahātha. jahāmi, jahāma.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ ^a^M0.0304^ea^ ``yamhi dādhāmāṭhāhāpāmahamathādīnamī''ti dhātvantassa ^b^ī^eb^kāro. hīyate, hīyante, hīyare. hīyati, hīyanti.

[02] tathā jahātu, jahantu. jahe, jaheyya, jaheyyuṃ. hīyetha, hīyeyya. ajahāsi, ajahiṃsu, ajahāsuṃ. pajahi, pajahiṃsu, pajahaṃsu, pajahuṃ. ^b^kamme^eb^ pajahīyittha, pajahīyi. pajahissati, pajahissanti. hīyissati, hīyissanti. pajahissa, pajahissaṃsu iccādi.
[03] ^b^dā^eb^ dāne, ^b^tyā^eb^dyuppatti, dvebhāvarassattāni, ^b^a^eb^ppaccayassa lopo, dadāti, dadanti. dadāsi, dadātha. dadāmi, dadāma.

[03] ^b^dā^eb^iccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ^b^dajjā^eb^deso hoti vā, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, ^b^a^eb^ppaccayalopo. dajjati, dajjanti. dajjasi, dajjatha. dajjāmi, dajjāma. ^b^dajjā^eb^desābhāve ``lopañcettamakāro''ti ^b^a^eb^ppaccayassa ^b^e^eb^kāro, dānaṃ deti, denti. desi, detha.
[03] ^b^dā^eb^iccetassa dhātussa antassa ^b^aṃ^eb^ hoti vā ^b^mima^eb^iccetesu paresu, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ. dammi, damma. demi, dema.
[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ``yamhi dādhā''iccādinā ^b^ī^eb^kāro, dīyate, dīyante. dīyati, dīyanti. dīyyate, dīyyante. dīyyati, dīyyanti vā iccādi.

[02] dadātu ^a^M0.0305^ea^, dadantu. dadāhi, dadātha. dadāmi, dadāma. dadataṃ, dadantaṃ. dadassu, dadavho. dade, dadāmase. dajjatu, dajjantu iccādi. detu, dentu. dehi, detha. demi, dema. ^b^kamme^eb^ dīyataṃ, dīyantaṃ. dīyatu, dīyantu.
[02] ^b^sattamiyaṃ^eb^ dade, dadeyya, dadeyyuṃ. dadeyyāsi, dadeyyātha. dadeyyāmi, dadeyyāma. dadetha, daderaṃ. dadetho, dadeyyāvho. dadeyyaṃ, dadeyyāmhe. dajje, dajjeyya.

[02] ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā eyyassāttañca, dajjā, dajjuṃ, dajjeyyuṃ. dajjeyyāsi, dajjeyyātha. dajjaṃ, eyyāmissa amādeso ca, dajjeyyāmi, dajjeyyāma. dvittābhāve deyya, deyyuṃ. deyyāsi, deyyātha. dīyetha, dīyeyya.
[02] ^b^hiyyattaniyaṃ^eb^ adadā, adadū. adado, adadattha. adadaṃ, adadamha. adadattha, adadamhase. ^b^kamme^eb^ adīyittha.
[02] ^b^ajjatanimhi^eb^ adadi, adadiṃsu, adaduṃ. adajji, adajjiṃsu. adāsi, adaṃsu. adāsi, ado, adittha. adāsiṃ, adāsimha, adamha. adādānaṃ purindado. ^b^kamme^eb^ adīyittha, adīyyi.
[02] ^b^bhavissantiyaṃ^eb^ ikārāgamo, saralopādi, dadissati, dadissanti. dajjissati, dajjissanti. rassattaṃ, dassati, dassanti. dassasi, dassatha. dassāmi, dassāma. dassate. dīyissate, dīyissati.
[02] ^b^kālātipattiyaṃ^eb^ adadissa, adajjissa, adajjissā, adassa, adassā, adassaṃsu. adīyissatha, adīyissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^dhā^eb^ ^a^M0.0306^ea^ dhāraṇe, pure viya vibhattuppatti, dvittarassattāni, appaccayalopo ca, ``dutiyacatutthānaṃ paṭhamatatiyā''ti ^b^dha^eb^kārassa ^b^da^eb^kāro, dadhāti, dadhanti. apipubbo tassa ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā akāralopo, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^dha^eb^kārassa ^b^ha^eb^kāro, rassattañca, dvāraṃ pidahati, pidahanti. dvebhāvābhāve nidhiṃ nidheti, nidhenti.
[02] tathā dadhātu, pidahatu, nidhetu, nidhentu. dadhe, dadheyya, pidahe, pidaheyya, nidhe, nidheyya. dadhāsi, pidahi. dhassati, pidahissati, paridahessati. adhassa, pidahissa iccādi.
[21] avuddhikā tudādī ca, hūvādi ca tathāparo.
[03] ^b^rudha^eb^ āvaraṇe, pure viya dhātusaññādimhi kate vibhattuppatti.

[03] catuppadamidaṃ. ^b^rudha^eb^iccevamādito dhātugaṇato ^b^a^eb^ppaccayo hoti kattari vibhattippaccayesu, niggahītañca tato pubbaṃ ^a^M0.0307^ea^ hutvā āgamo hoti, tañca niggahītaṃ pakatiyā sarānugatattā dhātussarato paraṃ hoti. ^b^ca^eb^saddena ^b^īieo^eb^paccayā ca, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ. idha saṃyogantattā na vuddhi hoti, tadāgamassa taggahaṇena gahaṇato.
[02] so maggaṃ rundhati, rundhanti. rundhasi, rundhatha. rundhāmi, rundhāma. rundhate, rundhante iccādi, ^b^i^eb^kārādippaccayesu pana rundhiti, rundhīti, rundheti, rundhotītipi hoti.

[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ nipubbo yappaccayassa ``tassa cavagga''iccādinā sadhātvantassa jhakāre kate ``vagge ghosā''tiādinā dvittaṃ, maggo nirujjhate tena, nirujjhante. ^b^parassapadatte^eb^ nirujjhati, nirujjhanti. nirujjhasi, nirujjhatha. nirujjhāmi, nirujjhāma.

[02] rundhatu, rundhantu. rundhāhi, rundhatha. rundhāmi, rundhāma. rundhataṃ, rundhantaṃ. rundhassu, rundhavho. rundhe, rundhāmase. nirujjhataṃ, nirujjhantaṃ. nirujjhatu, nirujjhantu. rundhe, rundheyya, rundheyyuṃ. rundhetha, rundheraṃ. nirujjhetha, nirujjheyya iccādi. rundhi, rundhiṃsu. arundhi, nirujjhittha. nirujjhi, nirujjhiṃsu. rundhissati, rundhissanti. nirujjhissate, nirujjhissante. nirujjhissati, nirujjhissanti. arundhissa, arundhissaṃsu. nirujjhissatha, nirujjhissa iccādi.

[02] ^b^chidi^eb^ dvidhākaraṇe, chindati, chindanti. ^b^kamme^eb^ chijjate, chijjante. chijjati, chijjanti. tathā chindatu, chindantu. chijjatu, chijjantu. chinde, chindeyya. chijjeyya. achindi, chindi, chindiṃsu. achijjittha, chijji. chindissati, chindissanti. ssassa chādese -- checchati, checchanti. checchiti vā. ^b^kamme^eb^ chijjissate, chijjissante. chijjissati, chijjissanti. achindissa. achijjissa iccādi.

[02] ^b^yuja^eb^ yoge, yuñjati, yuñjanti. yujjate, yujjante. yujjati, yujjanti. yuñjatu. yujjataṃ. yuñje. yujjetha. ayuñji, ayuñjiṃsu. ayujjittha, ayujji. yuñjissati, yuñjissanti. yujjissate, yujjissante. yujjissati, yujjissanti. ayuñjissa. ayujjissatha, ayujjissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^bhavissantiyaṃ^eb^ ``karassa sappaccayassa kāho''ti sutte ^b^sappaccaya^eb^ggahaṇena bhujato ssassa khādeso, ``ko khe cā''ti dhātvantassa kakāro, vuddhi, bhokkhati, bhokkhanti. bhokkhasi, bhokkhatha. bhokkhāmi, bhokkhāma. khādesābhāve bhuñjissati, bhuñjissanti iccādi.

[02] ^b^muca^eb^ mocane, muñcati, muñcanti. muccate, muccante. muñcatu, muñcantu. muccataṃ, muccantaṃ. muñce, muñceyya, muñceyyuṃ. muccetha, mucceraṃ. amuñci, amuñciṃsu. amuccittha. mokkhati, mokkhanti. muñcissati, muñcissanti. muccissate, muccissante. amuñcissa, amuccissatha iccādi.
[03] ^b^``ya^eb^ggahaṇaṃ, cavagga yakāra vakārattaṃ sadhātvantassa, pubbarūpa''nti ca vattate.

[03] yathā bhāvakammesu yappaccayassādeso hoti, tathā kattaripi ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayassa sadhātvantassa ^b^ca^eb^vagga ^b^ya^eb^kāra^b^va^eb^kārādeso, pubbarūpañca kātabbānīti dhātvantassa ^b^va^eb^kārattā saha tena ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ^b^va^eb^kāre kate dvibhāvo, ``do dhassa cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena ``bo vassā''ti vuttattā ^b^va^eb^kāradvayassa ^b^ba^eb^kāradvayaṃ, dibbati, dibbanti. dibbasi, dibbatha. dibbāmi, dibbāma.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ dibbate, dibbante. dibbati, dibbanti. dibbatu. dibbataṃ. dibbe. dibbetha. adibbi. adibbittha. dibbissati. dibbissate. adibbissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^sivu^eb^ tantasantāne, sibbati, sibbanti. sibbatu. sibbeyya. asibbi, sibbi. sibbissati. asibbissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^pada^eb^ gatimhi, ^b^u^eb^pubbo dvittaṃ, ``tathā kattari cā''ti sadhātvantassa ^b^ya^eb^kārassa ^b^ja^eb^kāro, dvittañca.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ paṭipajjate, paṭipajjante. paṭipajjati, paṭipajjanti. ^b^bhāve^eb^ uppajjate tayā.
[02] tathā ^a^M0.0310^ea^ uppajjatu. uppajjeyya. udapajjā. udapajjatha. udapādi, uppajjī. uppajjittha. uppajjissati. uppajjissa, uppajjissā iccādi.
[03] ^b^budha^eb^ avagamane, yappaccayaparattā na vuddhi, jhakārādesova viseso, dhammaṃ bujjhati, bujjhanti. bujjhate, bujjhante, bujjhare vā.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ bujjhate mayā dhammo, bujjhante. bujjhati, bujjhanti. bujjhatu. bujjheyya. abujjhi. abujjhittha. bujjhissati. abujjhissa.
[03] ^b^naha^eb^ bandhane, ``ha vipariyayo''ti yogavibhāgena vipariyayo. sannayhati, sannayhanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^mana^eb^ ñāṇe, ñādesova viseso, maññati, maññanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^dā^eb^ ādāne, ^b^saṃā^eb^pubbo ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^ya^eb^mhi dhātvantassa ^b^i^eb^kāro, sīlaṃ samādiyati, samādiyanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^tusa^eb^ pītimhi, yappaccayassa pubbarūpattaṃ, tussati, tussanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^jana^eb^janane, ``janādīnamā timhi cā''ti ettha ``janādīnamā''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^ya^eb^mhi dhātvantassa ^b^ā^eb^kāro. jāyati, jāyanti. jāyate, jāyante.
[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ^a^M0.0311^ea^ janīyati, janīyanti. jāyatu. jāyeyya. ajāyi, ajani. jāyissati, janissati. ajāyissa, ajanissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^su^eb^iccevamādito dhātugaṇato ^b^ṇu ṇāuṇā^eb^iccete paccayā honti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu. ``aññesu cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ṇu^eb^ppaccayassa vuddhi. tatthevānuvattita^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena svādīnaṃ ṇuṇādīsu na vuddhi.
[02] dhammaṃ suṇoti, saralopādi, suṇanti. suṇosi, suṇotha. suṇomi, suṇoma. ^b^ṇā^eb^paccaye suṇāti, suṇanti. suṇāsi, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā rassattaṃ, suṇasi, suṇātha, suṇatha. suṇāmi, suṇāma.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ yappaccaye ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā dīgho, sūyate, sūyante. sūyati, sūyanti. dvitte rassattaṃ, suyyati, suyyanti. sūyyati, sūyyanti vā.

[02] suṇotu, suṇantu. suṇohi, suṇotha. suṇomi, suṇoma. suṇātu, suṇantu. suṇa, suṇāhi, suṇātha. suṇāmi, suṇāma. suṇataṃ, suṇantaṃ ^a^M0.0312^ea^. suṇassu, suṇavho. suṇe, suṇāmase. ^b^kamme^eb^ sūyataṃ, sūyantaṃ. sūyatu, sūyantu.
[02] suṇe, suṇeyya, suṇeyyuṃ. suṇeyyāsi, suṇeyyātha. suṇeyyāmi, suṇeyyāma. suṇetha, suṇeraṃ. suṇetho, suṇeyyāvho. suṇeyyaṃ, suṇeyyāmhe. sūyetha, sūyeyya.

[02] asuṇi, suṇi, asuṇiṃsu, suṇiṃsu. asuṇi, asuṇittha. asuṇiṃ, suṇiṃ, asuṇimha, suṇimha. asuṇittha, suṇittha. ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sassa dvibhāvo, sāgamo, assosi, assosiṃsu, paccassosuṃ. assosi, assosittha. assosiṃ, assosimha, assosimhā vā, assosittha. asūyittha, assūyi.

[02] saralopādi, suṇissati, suṇissanti. suṇissasi, suṇissatha. suṇissāmi, suṇissāma. suṇissate, suṇissante. suṇissase, suṇissavhe. suṇissaṃ, suṇissāmhe. ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sossati, sossanti. sossasi, sossatha. sossāmi, sossāma. sossate. sūyissate, sūyissati. asuṇissa. asūyissa iccādi.
[02] ^b^hi^eb^ gatimhi, ^b^pa^eb^pubbo ṇāpaccayo, pahiṇāti, pahiṇati vā, pahiṇanti. pahiṇātu, pahiṇantu. pahiṇeyya. pahiṇi, dūtaṃ pāhesi. pahiṇissati. pahiṇissa iccādi.
[02] ^b^apa^eb^ ^a^M0.0313^ea^ pāpuṇane, ^b^pa^eb^pubbo saralope ``dīgha''nti dīgho, uṇāpaccayo, sampattiṃ pāpuṇāti, pāpuṇanti. pāpuṇāsi, pāpuṇātha. pāpuṇāmi, pāpuṇāma.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ pāpīyati, pāpīyanti. tathā pāpuṇātu. pāpīyatu. pāpuṇe, pāpuṇeyya. pāpīyeyya. pāpuṇi, pāpuṇiṃsu. pāpīyi. pāpuṇissati. pāpīyissati. pāpuṇissa. pāpīyissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^saka^eb^ sattimhi, dvibhāvo, sakkuṇāti, sakkuṇanti. ^b^bhāve^eb^ ``pubbarūpañcā''ti pubbarūpattaṃ, sakkate tayā, sakkati vā, sakkuṇātu. sakkuṇeyya. ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā sakantassa khādeso ajjatanādimhi, asakkhi, sakkhi, asakkhiṃsu, sakkhiṃsu. sakkhissati, sakkhissanti. asakkhissa, asakkhissaṃsu iccādi.

[03] ^b^kī^eb^icceva mādito dhātugaṇato ^b^nā^eb^paccayo hoti kattari. ^b^nā^eb^parattā na vuddhi, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā kiyādīnaṃ ^b^nā^eb^mhi rassattaṃ, kīto ^b^nā^eb^paccaya^b^na^eb^kārassa ^b^ṇa^eb^ttañca.

[02] bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇāti, vikkiṇanti. vikkīyati, vikkīyanti. vikkiṇātu, vikkiṇantu. vikkīyatu, vikkīyantu. vikkiṇe, vikkiṇeyya ^a^M0.0314^ea^. vikkīyeyya, vikkīyeyyuṃ. avikkiṇi, vikkiṇi. vikkīyittha, vikkīyi. vikkiṇissati, vikkiṇissanti. vikkīyissati, vikkīyissanti. avikkiṇissa, avikkiṇissaṃsu. vikkīyissa, vikkīyissaṃsu iccādi.

[02] ^b^ji^eb^ jaye, kilese jināti, jinanti. jīyati, jīyanti. evaṃ jinātu. jīyatu. jineyya. jīyeyya. ajini, jini, ajiniṃsu, jiniṃsu. ajesi, ajesuṃ. ajinittha. ajīyittha, ajīyi. jinissati, jinissanti. vijessati, vijessanti. jīyissati, jīyissanti. ajinissa. ajīyissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^ñā^eb^iccetassa dhātussa jā jaṃ nāiccete ādesā honti vā.
[21] jādeso nāmhi jaṃ ñāmhi, nābhāvo timhi evidha.

[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ viññāyati, viññāyanti. ivaṇṇāgame pubbalopo, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ekāro, dvittañca, ñeyyati, ñeyyanti. vijānātu, vijānantu, rassattaṃ. vijāna, vijānāhi, vijānātha. vijānāmi, vijānāma. vijānataṃ, vijānantaṃ. vijānassu. viññāyatu, viññāyantu.
[03] ^b^eyya^eb^ssa vibhattissa ^b^ñā^eb^iccetāya dhātuyā parassa ^b^iyā ñā^eb^iccete ādesā honti vā, saralopādi. vijāniyā.
[03] ^b^ñā^eb^iccetāya dhātuyā parassa ^b^nā^eb^paccayassa lopo hoti vā, ^b^ya^eb^kārattañca, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. tena --
[02] niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ, vijaññā, vijāneyya, vijāneyyuṃ. vijāneyyāsi, vijāneyyātha. vijāneyyāmi, vijāneyyāma, vijānemu vā. vijānetha. viññāyeyya, viññāyeyyuṃ.

[02] samajāni, sañjāni, sañjāniṃsu. ^b^nā^eb^lope aññāsi, aññāsuṃ. vijānittha. viññāyittha. paññāyi, paññāyiṃsu. vijānissati, vijānissanti. ñassati, ñassanti. viññāyissate, viññāyissante. paññāyissati, paññāyissanti. ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^ssa^eb^ssa ^a^M0.0316^ea^ ^b^hi^eb^ ca, paññāyihiti, paññāyihinti. ajānissa. ajānissatha. aññāyissatha, aññāyissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^mā^eb^ māne, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^mā^eb^ntassa ^b^i^eb^kāro, mināti, minanti. ^b^kamme^eb^ mīyati, mīyanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^lū^eb^ chedane, nāmhi rassattaṃ, lunāti, lunanti. lūyati, lūyanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^dhū^eb^ kampane, dhunāti, dhunanti. dhūyati, dhūyanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^gaha^eb^iccevamādito dhātuto ^b^ppa ṇhā^eb^iccete paccayā honti kattari. ^b^ādi^eb^saddoyaṃ pakāro.
[03] ^b^gaha^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^ha^eb^kārassa lopo hoti ^b^ṇhā^eb^mhi paccaye pare. sīlaṃ gaṇhāti, rassatte gaṇhati vā, gaṇhanti. gaṇhāsi, gaṇhātha. gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma.
[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ``ye''ti vattamāne ``havipariyayo lo vā''ti ^b^ha^eb^kārassa ^b^ya^eb^kārena vipariyayo hoti. gayhati, gayhanti.

[02] gaṇhātu, gaṇhantu. gaṇha, gaṇhāhi, gaṇhātha. gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma. gaṇhataṃ, gaṇhantaṃ. gayhataṃ, gayhantaṃ. gayhatu, gayhantu. gaṇhe, gaṇheyya, gaṇheyyuṃ. gayheyya, gayheyyuṃ. aggaṇhi, gaṇhi, aggaṇhiṃsu, gaṇhiṃsu.
[03] yadā ^a^M0.0317^ea^ ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā asabbadhātuke vikaraṇapaccayassa lopo, ikārāgamassa ekāro ca, tadā sāgamo.

[02] aggahesi, aggahesuṃ. aggahi, aggahiṃsu, aggahuṃ. aggayhittha, aggayhi. gaṇhissati, gaṇhissanti. gahessati, gahessanti. gahīyissate, gahīyissante. gayhissati, gayhissanti. aggaṇhissa, aggahissa. aggaṇhissatha, aggahissatha. aggayhissatha, aggayhissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^gaha^eb^iccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ^b^ghe^eb^ādeso hoti ^b^ppa^eb^ppaccaye pare. gheppati iccādi.
[03] dhammaṃ tanoti, tanonti. tanosi, tanotha. tanomi, tanoma.

[03] ^b^tanā^eb^dito ^b^o^eb^kārappaccayo ^b^u^eb^ttamāpajjate vā. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo. ettha ca vikaraṇakāriyavidhippakaraṇato ``okāro''ti ^b^o^eb^vikaraṇaṃ gayhati. tanute, bahuvacane ``yavakārā cā''ti ^b^va^eb^ttaṃ, tanvante. tanuse, tanuvhe. tanve, tanumhe.

[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^tanu^eb^dhātvantassa ^b^ya^eb^mhi ^b^ā^eb^kāro, patāyate, patāyante. patāyati, patāyanti. ākārābhāve pataññati, pataññanti. tanotu, tanontu. taneyya, taneyyuṃ. atani, ataniṃsu. atāyittha, patāyi. tanissati, tanissanti. patāyissati, patāyissanti. atanissa. patāyissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^kara^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^a^eb^kāro ^b^u^eb^ttamāpajjate vā. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo, ``yavakārā cā''ti apadantassa para^b^u^eb^kārassa ^b^va^eb^kāro, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā dhātu^b^ra^eb^kārassa ^b^va^eb^kārasmiṃ lopo, ^b^va^eb^kārassa ^b^dvi^eb^tte tassa ``bbo vvassā''ti ^b^ba^eb^kāradvayaṃ, kubbanti, karonti. karosi, karotha. karomi, karoma. tathā kurute, kubbante. kuruse, kuruvhe. kubbe, kurumhe. ^b^yira^eb^ppaccaye ^b^ra^eb^kāralopo, kayirati, kayiranti iccādi.

[03] ^b^kamme^eb^ ^a^M0.0319^ea^ ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye ``ivaṇṇāgamo vā''ti īkārāgamo, ^b^ya^eb^kārassa dvittaṃ, karīyyate kaṭo tena, karīyyati, karīyyanti. karīyati, karīyanti vā. ^b^ī^eb^kārābhāve ``tassa cavagga''iccādinā sadhātvantassa ^b^ya^eb^kārattaṃ, dvittañca. kayyati, kayyanti. ^b^i^eb^kārāgame ``kvaci dhātu''iccādisutte ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^rayānaṃ^eb^ vipariyayo, kayirati kaṭo tena, kayiranti iccādi.
[02] tathā kusalaṃ karotu, kurutu vā, kubbantu, karontu. karohi, karotha. karomi, karoma. kurutaṃ, kubbantaṃ. kurussu, kurassu vā, kuruvho. kubbe, kubbāmase.
[02] ^b^sattamiyaṃ^eb^ kare, kareyya, kareyyuṃ. kareyyāsi, kareyyātha. kareyyāmi, kareyyāma. ^b^u^eb^tte kubbe, kubbeyya.

[03] saralopādi, kayirā, kayiruṃ. kayirāsi, kayirātha. kayirāmi, kayirāma. ^b^attanopade^eb^ kayirātha dhīro, kubbetha, karetha vā, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā kussa kru ca, krubbetha, krubberaṃ. krubbetho, krubbeyyāvho. krubbeyyaṃ, krubbeyyāmhe. ^b^kamme^eb^ karīyeyya, karīyeyyuṃ.
[02] akā, akarā, akarū. akaro, akattha, akarottha. akaṃ, akaraṃ, akamha, akaramha. akattha. akariṃ, akaramhase.

[03] ^b^kara^eb^ iccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva ^b^kāsa^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi pare. ``kāsatta''miti bhāvaniddesena aññasmāpi dhātuto ^b^sā^eb^gamo. atha vā yadā ^b^kara^eb^ssa ^b^kā^eb^ hoti, ^b^sa^eb^ttañcāgamo ajjatanimhi vāti attho, tadā ``sattamajjatanimhī''ti yogavibhāgena aññasmāpi dhātuto ^b^sā^eb^gamopi sijjhati, ``yogavibhāgato iṭṭhappasiddhī''ti yebhuyyena dīghatova hoti, ``karassa kā''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^kā^eb^bhāvo ca hiyyattaniyaṃ siddho hoti.

[02] akāsi, akāsuṃ. akāsi, akāsittha. akāsiṃ, akāsimha. akāsittha. ^b^kāsa^eb^ttābhāve akari, kari, akariṃsu, kariṃsu, akaṃsu, akaruṃ. akari, akarittha. akariṃ, kariṃ, akarimha, karimha. akarittha. akarīyittha, akarīyi vā.
[03] ``vā, lopo, bhavissantimhi ssassa cā''ti ca vattate.

[03] ^b^kara^eb^iccetassa ^a^M0.0321^ea^ dhātussa sappaccayassa ^b^kāhā^eb^deso hoti vā bhavissantimhi, ssassa ca lopo hoti. adhikabhūta^b^sappaccaya^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^vacamucabhujā^eb^dito ^b^ssa^eb^ssa ^b^khā^eb^deso, ^b^vasa chidi labhā^eb^dito ^b^chā^eb^deso ca hoti.

[02] kāhati, kāhanti. kāhasi, kāhatha. kāhāmi, kāhāma. ikārāgame kāhiti, kāhinti iccādi. ^b^kāhā^eb^bhāve karissati, karissanti. karissasi, karissatha. karissāmi, karissāma. karissate, karissante. karissase, karissavhe. karissaṃ, karissāmhe. karīyissati, karīyissanti. akarissa. akarīyissā iccādi.
[03] yadā ^b^saṃ^eb^pubbo, tadā ``purasamupaparīhi karotissa kha kharā vā''ti yogavibhāgena tyādivibhattīsupi ^b^saṃ^eb^pubba^b^karoti^eb^ssa ^b^kharā^eb^deso.
[02] abhisaṅkharoti, abhisaṅkharonti. abhisaṅkharīyati, abhisaṅkharīyanti. abhisaṅkharotu. abhisaṅkhareyya. abhisaṅkhari, ^b^khā^eb^dese abhisaṅkhāsi vā. abhisaṅkharissati. abhisaṅkharissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^saka^eb^ sattimhi, ^b^o^eb^paccayo, sakkoti, sakkonti. sakkosi, sakkotha. sakkomi, sakkoma iccādi.
[03] ^b^apa^eb^ pāpuṇane, ^b^pa^eb^pubbo, pappoti, papponti. papposi, pappotha. pappomi, pappoma. pappotu, pappontu iccādi.
[03] ``tathā kattari cā''ti ito ``kattarī''ti ca sīhavilokanena ^b^bhāvakamma^eb^ggahaṇāni ca vattante, maṇḍūkagatiyā ^b^kārita^eb^ggahaṇañca.
[03] ^b^cura^eb^iccevamādito dhātugaṇato ^b^ṇe ṇaya^eb^iccete paccayā honti kattari, bhāve ca kammani, vibhattippaccayesu. ``kāritaṃ viya ṇānubandho''ti ^b^ṇe ṇayānaṃ^eb^ kāritabyapadeso.
[03] asaṃyogantassa dhātussa kārite pare vuddhi hotīti ukārassokāro vuddhi.

[02] dhanaṃ coreti, corenti. coresi, coretha. coremi, corema. ^b^ṇaya^eb^ppaccaye -- corayati, corayanti. corayasi, corayatha. corayāmi, corayāma. corayate, corayante. corayase, corayavhe. coraye, corayāmhe.
[02] ^b^kamme ya^eb^ppaccaye ^b^ī^eb^kārāgamo, saralopādi ca, corīyate devadattena, corīyati, corīyanti iccādi.
[02] coretu ^a^M0.0323^ea^, corentu. corehi. corayatu, corayantu. coraya, corayāhi.

[02] coreyya, coreyyuṃ. coraye, corayeyyuṃ. acoresi, coresi, acoresuṃ, coresuṃ. acorayi, corayi, acorayiṃsu, corayiṃsu, acorayuṃ, corayuṃ. acoresi, acoresittha. tvaṃ acorayi, acorayittha. acoresiṃ, acoresimha. acorayiṃ, acorayimha. acorayittha. acorīyittha, acorīyi.
[02] corissati, corissanti. corayissati, corayissanti. corīyissate, corīyissante. corīyissati, corīyissanti. acorissa, acorayissa. acorīyissatha, acorīyissa iccādi.
[02] cinteti, cintayati, cintenti, cintayanti. cintetu, cintayatu. cinteyya, cintayeyya. acintesi, cintesi, acintayi, cintayi. cintessati, cintayissati. acintissa, acintayissa iccādi.
[03] ^b^pāla^eb^ rakkhaṇe, dhammaṃ pāleti, pālayati. pālīyati. pāletu, pālayatu iccādi.
[03] ^b^ghaṭa^eb^ ghaṭane, ghāṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati, ghaṭādittā vikappena vuddhi.
[03] ^b^gaṇa^eb^ ^a^M0.0324^ea^ saṅkhyāne, ``ghaṭādīnaṃ vā''ti na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati iccādi, sabbattha subodhaṃ.
[21] bhūvādī ca rudhādī ca, divādī svādayo gaṇā.
[22] kiyādī ca tanādī ca, curādī cidha sattadhā..
[03] ``dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā''ti ito ^b^dhātu^eb^ggahaṇaṃ anuvattate, ``parā, paccayā''ti ca adhikāro.
[03] 528^b^.^eb^ ^b^tija gupa kita mānehi kha cha sā vā^eb^.
[03] ^b^tija gupa kita māna^eb^ iccetehi dhātūhi ^b^kha cha sa^eb^ iccete paccayā parā honti vā.
[21] tijato khantiyaṃ khova, nindāyaṃ gupato tu cho.
[03] dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhehi ^b^khā^eb^di^b^kārita^eb^ntehi paccayehi ^b^tyā^eb^dayo vibhattiyo hontīti pure viya vattamānādayo yojetabbā.
[03] ativākyaṃ titikkhati, titikkhanti. ^b^kamme^eb^ titikkhīyati. tathā titikkhatu, titikkhantu. titikkheyya, titikkheyyuṃ. atitikkhi, atitikkhiṃsu. titikkhissati. atitikkhissa iccādi.

[03] ^b^gupa^eb^ gopane, ^b^cha^eb^ppaccaye dvibhāvo, ``pubbobbhāso''ti abbhāsasaññā, ``abbhāsassā''ti vattamāne ``antassivaṇṇākāro vā''ti abbhāsantassikāro, ``kavaggassa cavaggo''ti abbhāsa^b^ga^eb^kārassa ^b^ja^eb^kāro ca.
[03] dhātvanthassa byañjanassa ^b^ca^eb^kārādeso hoti ^b^cha^eb^ppaccayesu paresu. tato vibhattiyo, kāyaṃ jigucchati, jigucchanti. sesaṃ purimasamaṃ. ^b^chā^eb^bhāve gopeti, gopenti iccādi.

[03] abbhāsagatānaṃ ^b^māna kita^eb^iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ ^b^va^eb^kāra^b^ta^eb^kārattaṃ hoti vā yathākkamanti ^b^ta^eb^kāro, dhātvantassa ^b^ca^eb^kāro, sesaṃ samaṃ. rogaṃ tikicchati, tikicchanti iccādi. ^b^ta^eb^kārābhāve ``kavaggassa cavaggo''ti ^b^ca^eb^kāro, vicikicchati, vicikicchanti iccādi.

[03] tato abbhāsato parāsaṃ ^b^pāmānānaṃ^eb^ dhātūnaṃ ^b^vāmaṃiccete^eb^ ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ ^b^sa^eb^ppaccaye pare. ^b^sesū^eb^ti bahuvacananiddeso payogepi vacanavipallāsañāpanatthaṃ. atthaṃ vīmaṃsati, vīmaṃsanti iccādi.

[03] ^b^bhuja ghasa hara su pā^eb^ iccevamādīhi dhātūhi ^b^tu^eb^micchatthesu ca ^b^kha cha sa^eb^iccete paccayā honti vā. tumicchānaṃ, tumantayuttaicchāya vā atthā ^b^tumicchatthā,^eb^ tena tumantarahitesu ``bhojanamicchatī''tiādīsu na honti, ``vuttatthānamappayogo''ti vākyassa appayogo, dhātvādissa dvebhāve kate ^a^M0.0327^ea^ ``dutiyacatutthānaṃ paṭhamatatiyā''ti abbhāsa^b^bha^eb^kārassa ^b^ba^eb^kāro, dhātvantassa ``ko khe cā''ti ^b^ka^eb^kāro, bubhukkhati, bubhukkhanti iccādi.
[03] ^b^ghasa^eb^ adane, ghasitumicchatīti atthe chappaccayo, dvittaṃ, tatiya ^b^ca^eb^vagga ikāra ^b^ca^eb^kārādesā, jighacchati, jighacchanti.
[03] ^b^hara^eb^iccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ^b^gī^eb^ hoti ^b^se^eb^ paccaye pare. ``gīse''ti yogavibhāgena jissapi, ṭhānūpacārenādesassāpi dhātuvohārattā dvittaṃ, bhikkhaṃ jigīsati, jigīsanti.
[03] ^b^su^eb^ savaṇe, sotumicchati sussūsati, sussūsanti, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā dīgho.
[03] ^b^pā^eb^ pāne, pātumicchatīti atthe ^b^sa^eb^ppaccayadvittarassatta^b^i^eb^kārādesā, ``tato pāmānānaṃ vāmaṃ sesū''ti ^b^vā^eb^deso, pivāsati, pivāsanti iccādi.
[03] saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati, pabbato iva ācaratīti vā atthe --

[03] ācaraṇakriyāya kattuno upamānabhūtamhā nāmato ^b^āya^eb^ppaccayo hoti ācāratthe. upamīyati etenāti ^a^M0.0328^ea^ upamānaṃ, kattuno upamānaṃ ^b^kattupamānaṃ,^eb^ ``vuttatthānamappayogo''ti ^b^iva^eb^saddanivatti, dhātuppaccayantattā ``tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā cā''ti sutte ^b^tesaṃ^eb^gahaṇena vibhattilopo, ``pakati cassa sarantassā''ti pakatibhāvo, saralopādi, ``dhātuppaccayehi vibhattiyo''ti vibhattuppatti, pabbatāyati saṅgho, evaṃ samuddamiva attānamācarati samuddāyati, cicciṭamiva attānamācarati cicciṭāyati saddo. evaṃ dhūmāyati.

[03] upamānabhūtā nāmato ^b^īya^eb^ppaccayo hoti ācāratthe. puna ^b^upamāna^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ^b^kattu^eb^ggahaṇanivattanatthaṃ, tena kammatopi sijjhati, sesaṃ samaṃ. achattaṃ chattamivācarati chattīyati, aputtaṃ puttamivācarati puttīyati sissamācariyo.
[03] ^b^upamānā^eb^ti kiṃ? dhammamācarati, ^b^ācāre^eb^ti kiṃ? achattaṃ chattamiva rakkhati.
[03] nāmamhā attano icchatthe ^b^īya^eb^ppaccayo hoti. attano pattamicchati pattīyati, evaṃ vatthīyati, parikkhārīyati, cīvarīyati, paṭīyati, dhanīyati, puttīyati.

[03] dhātuyā rūpe nipphādetabbe, ``taṃ karoti, tena atikkamati''iccādike payujjitabbe vā sati nāmamhā ^b^ṇaya^eb^ppaccayo hoti, kāritasaññā ca. ṇalope, vibhattilopasaralopādīsu katesu vibhattuppatti, daḷhayati vīriyaṃ, evaṃ pamāṇayati, amissayati, tathā hatthinā atikkamati atihatthayati, vīṇāya upagāyati upavīṇayati, visuddhā hoti ratti visuddhayati, kusalaṃ pucchati kusalayati iccādi.
[03] 540^b^.^eb^ ^b^dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe^eb^.

[03] sabbehi dhātūhi hetvatthe abhidheyye ^b^ṇe ṇayaṇāpe ṇāpaya^eb^ iccete paccayā parā honti, te kāritasaññā ca honti. hetuyeva attho ^b^hetvattho,^eb^ so ca ``yo kāreti sa hetū''ti laddhahetusañño suddhakattuno payojako hetukattā, atthato pesanajjhesanādiko payojakabyāpāro idha hetu nāma.
[21] ṇe ṇayāva uvaṇṇantā, āto dve pacchimā siyuṃ.
[21] akammā dhātavo honti, kārite tu sakammakā.
[22] na bhāve suddhakattā ca, kārite kammasaññito..

[03] tattha yo koci bhavati, tamañño ``bhavāhi bhavāhi'' iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā bhavantaṃ bhavituṃ samatthaṃ payojayati, bhavituṃ payojetīti vā atthe iminā ^b^ṇeṇaya^eb^ppaccayā, kāritasaññā ca, ``vuttatthānamappayogo''ti vākyassa appayogo, ``kāritānaṃ ṇo lopa''nti ^b^ṇa^eb^lopo, ``asaṃyogantassa vuddhi kārite''ti ^b^ū^eb^kāra^b^sso^eb^kāro vuddhi.

[03] te dhātvantabhūtā ^b^o^eb^kā^b^re^eb^kārā ^b^āvāayā^eb^dese pāpuṇanti kārite pare. ``te āvāyā''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^jhe^eb^ādīnaṃ akāritepi hontīti ^b^o^eb^kārassa ^b^āvā^eb^deso, saralopādi, ``dhātuppaccayehi vibhattiyo''ti ^b^tyā^eb^dayo.
[02] so samādhiṃ bhāveti, bhāvayati, bhāventi, bhāvayanti. bhāvesi, bhāvayasi, bhāvetha, bhāvayatha. bhāvemi, bhāvayāmi, bhāvema, bhāvayāma. bhāvayate, bhāvayante.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ attanopadayappaccayaīkārāgamā, saralopādi ca, tena bhāvīyate samādhi, bhāvīyante. bhāvīyati, bhāvīyanti.
[02] tathā bhāvetu, bhāvayatu, bhāventu, bhāvayantu. bhāvehi, bhāvaya, bhāvayāhi, bhāvetha, bhāvayatha ^a^M0.0331^ea^. bhāvemi, bhāvayāmi, bhāvema, bhāvayāma. bhāvayataṃ, bhāvayantaṃ.

[02] bhāveyya, bhāvaye, bhāvayeyya, bhāveyyuṃ, bhāvayeyyuṃ. bhāveyyāsi, bhāvayeyyāsi, bhāveyyātha, bhāvayeyyātha. bhāveyyāmi, bhāvayeyyāmi, bhāveyyāma, bhāvayeyyāma. bhāvetha, bhāvayetha, bhāveraṃ, bhāvayeraṃ.

[02] abhāvesi, bhāvesi, abhāvayi, bhāvayi, abhāvesuṃ, bhāvesuṃ, abhāvayiṃsu, bhāvayiṃsu, abhāvayuṃ, bhāvayuṃ. abhāvesi, abhāvayasi, abhāvittha, abhāvayittha. abhāvesiṃ, bhāvesiṃ, abhāvayiṃ, bhāvayiṃ, abhāvimha, abhāvayimha.
[02] bhāvessati, bhāvayissati, bhāvessanti, bhāvayissanti. bhāvessasi, bhāvayissasi, bhāvissatha, bhāvayissatha. bhāvessāmi, bhāvayissāmi, bhāvessāma, bhāvayissāma.
[02] abhāvissa, abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṃsu, abhāvayissaṃsu. ^b^kamme^eb^ abhāvīyissatha, abhāvīyissa iccādi.

[03] tathā ^a^M0.0332^ea^ yo koci pacati, tamañño ``pacāhi pacāhi'' iccevaṃ bravīti, atha vā pacantaṃ payojeti, pacituṃ vā payojetīti atthe vuttanayena ^b^ṇe ṇayā^eb^dayo, ^b^a^eb^kāra^b^ssā^eb^kāro vuddhi, sesaṃ neyyaṃ.

[02] so devadattaṃ odanaṃ pāceti, pācenti. pācesi, pācetha. pācemi, pācema. pācayati, pācayanti. pācayasi, pācayatha. pācayāmi, pācayāma. ^b^ṇāpeṇāpayesu^eb^ pana so puriso taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpeti, pācāpenti. pācāpayati, pācāpayanti.
[02] ^b^kamme^eb^ so odanaṃ pācīyati tena, pācayīyati, pācāpīyati, pācāpayīyati.

[02] tathā pācetu, pācayatu, pācāpetu, pācāpayatu. pācīyataṃ, pācīyatu, pācayīyataṃ, pācayīyatu, pācāpīyataṃ, pācāpīyatu, pācāpayīyataṃ, pācāpayīyatu. pāceyya, pācayeyya, pācāpeyya, pācāpayeyya. pācīyeyya, pācīyeyyuṃ. apācesi, apācayi, apācāpesi, apācāpayi. pācessati, pācayissati, pācāpessati, pācāpayissati. apācissa, apācayissa, apācāpissa, apācāpayissa iccādi.
[03] gacchantaṃ, gantuṃ vā payojetīti atthe ^b^ṇe ṇayā^eb^dayo, vuddhiyaṃ sampattāyaṃ --
[03] ghaṭādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti vā kāriteti ettha ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇena vuddhi na hoti, vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo.
[03] so ^a^M0.0333^ea^ taṃ purisaṃ gāmaṃ gameti, gamayati, gacchāpeti, gacchāpayati. so gāmaṃ gamīyati tena, gamayīyati, gacchāpīyati, gacchāpayīyati iccādi. sabbattha yojetabbaṃ. evaṃ uparipi.
[03] ^b^ghaṭa^eb^ īhāyaṃ, ghaṭantaṃ payojayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭādīnaṃ vāti na vuddhi, ghaṭayati, ghaṭāpeti, ghaṭāpayati.
[03] ^b^guha^eb^ saṃvaraṇe, guhituṃ payojayati gūhayati, gūhayanti. ^b^dusa^eb^ appītimhi, dussantaṃ payojayati dūsayati, dūsayanti iccādi.

[02] tathā icchantaṃ payojayati icchāpeti, icchāpayati, eseti, esayati. niyacchantaṃ payojayati niyāmeti, niyāmayati. āsantaṃ payojayati āseti, āsayati, acchāpeti, acchāpayati. labhantaṃ payojayati lābheti, lābhayati. vacantaṃ payojayati vāceti, vācayati, vācāpeti, vācāpayati. evaṃ vāseti, vāsayati, vāsāpeti, vāsāpayati. vāheti, vāhayati, vāhāpeti, vāhāpayati. jīreti, jīrayati, jīrāpeti, jīrāpayati. māreti, mārayati, mārāpeti, mārāpayati. dasseti, dassayati iccādi.

[02] tathā tudantaṃ payojayati todeti, todayati, todāpeti, todāpayati. pavisantaṃ payojayati, pavisituṃ vā paveseti, pavesayati, pavesāpeti ^a^M0.0334^ea^, pavesāpayati. uddisantaṃ payojayati uddisāpeti, uddisāpayati. pahontaṃ payojayati pahāveti, pahāvayati. sayantaṃ payojayati sāyeti, sāyayati, sāyāpeti, sāyāpayati. ettha ^b^e^eb^kārassa ^b^āyā^eb^deso, sayāpeti, sayāpayati, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ṇāpeṇāpayesu ^b^āyā^eb^desassa rassattaṃ. nayantaṃ payojayati nayāpeti, nayāpayati. patiṭṭhantaṃ payojayati patiṭṭhāpeti, patiṭṭhāpayati, patiṭṭhapeti vā.

[03] ^b^hana^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^ghātā^eb^deso hoti ^b^ṇa^eb^kāravati kāritappaccaye pare. ghāteti, ghātayati, ghātāpeti, ghātāpayati, ``vadho vā sabbatthā''ti ^b^vadhā^eb^dese vadheti, vadhāpeti.

[02] juhontaṃ payojayati juhāveti, juhāvayati. jahantaṃ payojayati jahāpeti, jahāpayati, hāpeti, hāpayati. dadantaṃ payojayati dāpeti, dāpayati. pidahantaṃ payojayati pidhāpeti, pidhāpayati, pidahāpeti, pidahāpayati.

[02] rundhantaṃ payojayati rodheti, rodhayati, rodhāpeti, rodhāpayati. chindantaṃ payojayati chedeti, chedayati, chedāpeti, chedāpayati. yuñjantaṃ payojayati ^a^M0.0335^ea^ yojeti, yojayati, yojāpeti, yojāpayati. bhuñjantaṃ payojayati bhojeti, bhojayati, bhojāpeti, bhojāpayati. muñcantaṃ payojayati moceti, mocayati, mocāpeti, mocāpayati.

[02] dibbantaṃ payojayati deveti, devayati. uppajjantaṃ payojayati uppādeti, uppādayati. bujjhantaṃ payojayati bodheti, bodhayati. ``dādhāntato yo kvacī''ti ^b^ya^eb^kārāgamo, bujjhāpeti, bujjhāpayati. tussantaṃ payojayati toseti, tosayati, tosāpeti, tosāpayati. sammantaṃ payojayati sameti, samayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi. kuppantaṃ payojayati kopeti, kopayati. jāyantaṃ payojayati janeti, janayati, ghaṭādittā na vuddhi.
[02] suṇantaṃ payojayati dhammaṃ sāveti, sāvayati. pāpuṇantaṃ payojayati pāpeti, pāpayati.

[02] vikkiṇantaṃ payojayati vikkāyāpeti, vikkāyāpayati. jinantaṃ payojayati jayāpeti, jayāpayati. jānantaṃ payojayati ñāpeti, ñāpayati. gaṇhantaṃ payojayati gāheti, gāhayati, gāhāpeti, gāhāpayati, gaṇhāpeti, gaṇhāpayati.
[02] vitanantaṃ payojayati vitāneti, vitānayati. yo koci karoti, tamañño ``karohi karohi''iccevaṃ bravīti, karontaṃ payojayati, kātuṃ vā kāreti, kārayati, kārāpeti, kārāpayati iccādi.
[02] corentaṃ payojayati corāpeti, corāpayati. cintentaṃ payojayati cintāpeti, cintāpayati ^a^M0.0336^ea^, pūjentaṃ payojayati pūjāpeti, pūjāpayati iccādi. sabbattha subodhaṃ.

[03] tena titikkhantaṃ payojayati titikkheti, titikkhāpeti. tikicchantaṃ payojayati tikiccheti, tikicchayati, tikicchāpeti, tikicchāpayati. evaṃ bubhukkheti, bubhukkhayati, bubhukkhāpeti, bubhukkhāpayati, pabbatāyantaṃ payojayati pabbatāyayati. puttīyayati iccādipi siddhaṃ bhavati.
[22] taṃ yathā bhikkhu bhāveti, maggaṃ rāgādidūsakanti..
[03] tattha kiccakitakavasena duvidhā hi paccayā, tesu kiccasaññāya paṭhamaṃ vuttattā, kiccānamappakattā ca kiccappaccayā tāva vuccante.
[03] ^b^bhū^eb^ sattāyaṃ, ``bhūyate, abhavittha, bhavissate vā devadattenā''ti viggahe --
[03] ``dhātuyā kammādimhi ṇo''ti ito ``dhātuyā''ti sabbattha paccayādividhāne vattate, ``parā, paccayā''ti ca adhikāro.
[03] ^b^bhāvakamma^eb^iccetesvatthesu sabbadhātūhi ^b^tabba anīya^eb^iccete paccayā parā honti. yogavibhāgena aññatthāpi.
[21] akammakehi dhātūhi, bhāve kiccā bhavanti te.
[03] tikāle niyuttā ^b^tekālikā,^eb^ ye idha tatiye dhātvādhikāre vihitā aniddiṭṭhakālā ^b^ṇā^eb^dayo paccayā, te tekālikā hontīti paribhāsato kālattayepi honti.

[03] yathāgamaṃ yathāpayogaṃ jinavacanānuparodhena dhātūhi paro ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo hoti kvaci byañjanādikesu ^b^kiccakitaka^eb^ppaccayesu, ``aññesu cā''ti vuddhi, ``o ava sare''ti avādeso, ``naye paraṃ yutte''ti paraṃ netabbaṃ.

[03] ye idha vuttā ^b^tabbānīyaṇya teyya ricca^eb^ppaccayā, te ^b^kicca^eb^saññā hontīti veditabbā. tato ``aññe kiti''ti vacanato kiccappaccayānamakitakattā nāmabyapadese asampatte ``taddhitasamāsakitakā nāmaṃvātavetunādīsu cā''ti ettha ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena nāmabyapadeso, tato ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti. ^b^bhāve^eb^ bhāvassekattā ekavacanameva, ``si''nti amādeso. bhavitabbaṃ bhavatā paññena, bhavanīyaṃ.
[03] idha byañjanādittābhāvā anuvattita^b^kvaci^eb^ggahaṇena ikārāgamābhāvo. ^b^bhāve^eb^ kiccappaccayantā napuṃsakā. ^b^kamme^eb^ tiliṅgā.

[03] ^b^kammani^eb^ abhipubbo, abhibhūyate, abhibhūyittha, abhibhūyissateti abhibhavitabbo kodho paṇḍitena, abhibhavitabbā ^a^M0.0339^ea^ taṇhā, abhibhavitabbaṃ dukkhaṃ, evaṃ abhibhavanīyo, abhibhavanīyā, abhibhavanīyaṃ, ^b^purisa kaññā citta^eb^saddanayena netabbaṃ, evaṃ sabbattha.
[22] vattabbassa abhāvā na, dutiyā paṭhamā tato..
[03] ^b^āsa^eb^ upavesane, āsīyittha, āsīyate, āsīyissateti āsitabbaṃ tayā, āsanīyaṃ. ^b^kamme^eb^ upāsitabbo garu, upāsanīyo.
[03] ^b^sī^eb^ saye, asīyittha, sīyate, sīyissateti sayitabbaṃ bhavatā, sayanīyaṃ, ^b^``e^eb^ ayā''ti ^b^ayā^eb^deso, atisayitabbo paro, atisayanīyo.

[03] ^b^pada^eb^ gatimhi, uppajjittha, uppajjate, uppajjissateti uppajjitabbaṃ tena, uppajjanīyaṃ, ettha ca ``kattarī''ti adhikāraṃ vinā ``divādito yo''ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena ^b^ya^eb^ppaccayo, ``tassa cavaggayakāra''iccādinā ^b^ca^eb^vaggo, ``paradvebhāvo ṭhāne''ti dvibhāvo, paṭipajjitabbo maggo, paṭipajjanīyo.
[03] ^b^budha^eb^ avagamane, abujjhittha, bujjhate, bujjhissateti bujjhitabbo dhammo, bujjhanīyo.

[03] ^b^su^eb^ savaṇe, asūyittha, sūyate, sūyissateti sotabbo dhammo, idha ^b^yathāgama^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^i^eb^kārāgamābhāvo, suṇitabbo, ``svādito ṇu ṇā uṇā cā''ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena ^b^ṇā^eb^paccayo, savaṇīyo.

[03] ^b^kara^eb^iccetassa dhātussa antabhūtassa ^b^ra^eb^kārassa ^b^ta^eb^kārattaṃ hoti vā tuṃ ^b^tu na tabba^eb^iccetesu paccayesu paresu. kattabbo bhavatā dhammo, kattabbā pūjā, kattabbaṃ kusalaṃ, ^b^ta^eb^ttābhāve ``karotissā''ti vattamāne ``tavetunādīsu kā''ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^saddena ^b^tabbe^eb^pi ^b^kā^eb^deso, kātabbaṃ hitaṃ.
[03] karaṇīyo dhammo, karaṇārahoti attho, karaṇīyā, karaṇīyaṃ.

[03] ^b^gaha^eb^ upādāne, agayhittha, gayhati, gayhissatīti gahetabbo, ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^i^eb^kāra^b^sse^eb^kāro, saṅgaṇhitabbo, ``gahādito ppaṇhā''ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena ^b^ṇhā^eb^paccayo, ^b^ha^eb^lopasaralopādi, saṅgaṇhaṇīyo, gahaṇīyo.
[03] ^b^ādi^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ramu^eb^ kīḷāyaṃ, ramīyittha, ramīyati, ramīyissatīti ramitabbo, ramaṇīyo vihāro.
[03] ^b^apa^eb^ ^a^M0.0341^ea^ pāpuṇane, ^b^uṇā^eb^paccayo, pāpīyatīti pāpuṇitabbo, ``gupādīnañcā''ti dhātvantassa lopo, dvittañca, pattabbo, patteyyo, pāpuṇaṇīyo, pāpaṇīyo.

[03] ^b^gama khana hana^eb^iccevamādīnaṃ ^b^ma^eb^kāra ^b^na^eb^kārantānaṃ dhātūnamantassa ^b^na^eb^kāro hoti vā ^b^tuṃ tabba tave tuna tvānatvā^eb^iccevamādīsu ^b^ta^eb^kārādippaccayesu paresu. agacchīyittha, gacchīyati, gacchīyissatīti gantabbo maggo, gamitabbaṃ, gamanīyaṃ.
[03] ^b^khanu^eb^ avadāraṇe, akhaññittha, khaññati, khaññissatīti khantabbaṃ āvāṭaṃ, khanitabbaṃ, ``kvaci dhātū''tiādinā ^b^khana^eb^ntassa ^b^ṇa^eb^ttañca, khaṇitabbaṃ, khaṇaṇīyaṃ, khananīyaṃ vā.
[03] ^b^hana^eb^ hiṃsā gatīsu, ahaññittha, haññate, haññissateti hantabbaṃ, hanitabbaṃ, hananīyaṃ.
[03] ^b^mana^eb^ ñāṇe, amaññittha, maññate, maññissateti mantabbo, manitabbo, ^b^ya^eb^ppaccaye ^b^ca^eb^vaggādi, maññitabbaṃ, maññanīyaṃ.

[03] ^b^pūja^eb^ pūjāyaṃ, apūjīyittha, pūjīyati, pūjīyissatīti atthe ^b^tabbānīyā^eb^. ``curādito ṇe ṇayā''ti akattaripi ^b^ṇeṇayā, i^eb^kārāgamā^b^nīye^eb^su ``saralopo''tiādinā kāritasarassa lopo, pūjetabbo, pūjayitabbo, pūjanīyo bhagavā.
[03] ``tabbānīyā''ti yogavibhāgena kattukaraṇesupi, ^b^yā^eb^ pāpuṇane, niyyātīti niyyānīko maggo. gacchantīti gamanīyā ^a^M0.0342^ea^ bhogā. ^b^naha^eb^ soce, nahāyati etenāti nahānīyaṃ cuṇṇaṃ.

[03] ^b^anubandho^eb^ appayogī, ^b^ṇa^eb^kārānubandho paccayo kāritaṃ viya daṭṭhabboti kāritabyapadeso, ``kāritānaṃ ṇo lopa''nti ^b^ṇa^eb^lopo, ``asaṃyogantassa vuddhi kārite''ti vuddhi, ^b^i^eb^kārāgamo, kattabbaṃ kāriyaṃ.
[03] ^b^hara^eb^ haraṇe, aharīyittha, harīyati, harīyissatīti vā haritabbaṃ hāriyaṃ.
[03] ^b^vaca^eb^ viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayādimhi kate ``antānaṃ, ṇānubandhe''ti ca vattate.
[03] ^b^caja^eb^iccetesaṃ dhātvantānaṃ ^b^ka^eb^kāra ^b^ga^eb^kārādesā honti ^b^ṇa^eb^kārānubandhe paccaye pareti ^b^ca^eb^ssa ^b^kā^eb^deso. vacanīyaṃ vākyaṃ.

[03] ^b^ci^eb^ caye, acīyittha, cīyati, cīyissatīti cetabbaṃ ceyyaṃ, ^b^i^eb^kāra^b^sse^eb^kāro vuddhi, ^b^ya^eb^kārassa dvittaṃ, ^b^vini^eb^pubbo ``do dhassa cā''ti sutte ^b^ca^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ca^eb^kārassa ^b^cha^eb^kāro, viniccheyyaṃ, vinicchitabbaṃ, vinicchanīyaṃ. ``kiyādito nā''ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena ^b^tabbānīya tuṃ tunā^eb^ dīsu ca ^b^nā^eb^paccayo, vinicchinitabbaṃ, vinicchinanīyaṃ.
[03] ^b^nī^eb^ pāpuṇane, anīyittha, nīyati, nīyissatīti neyyo, neyyā, neyyaṃ. netabbaṃ.
[03] ^b^bhū^eb^ iccetasmā parassa ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayassa saha dhātvantena ^b^abbā^eb^deso hoti. bhavitabbo bhabbo, bhabbā, bhabbaṃ.
[03] 556^b^.^eb^ ^b^vada mada gamu yuja garahākārādīhi jjammaggayheyyāgāro vā^eb^.

[03] ^b^vada mada gamu yuja garaha^eb^iccevamādīhi dhātūhi, ^b^ā^eb^kārantehi ca parassa ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayassa dhātvantena saha yathākkamaṃ ^a^M0.0344^ea^ ^b^jja mma gga yha e yya^eb^iccete ādesā honti vā, ^b^gara^eb^ssa ca ^b^gārā^eb^deso, ^b^garaha^eb^ssa ^b^gara^eb^ssevāyaṃ ^b^gāro^eb^. vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ ^b^vā^eb^saddo.
[03] ^b^vada^eb^ viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, avajjittha, vajjati, vajjissatīti vā vajjaṃ vadanīyaṃ, rassattaṃ. vajjaṃ doso.
[03] ^b^mada^eb^ ummāde, amajjittha, majjate, majjissati etenāti majjaṃ madanīyaṃ. ^b^mada^eb^ggahaṇena karaṇepi ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayo. ^b^gamu sappa^eb^ gatimhi, gantabbaṃ gammaṃ.
[03] ^b^yuja^eb^ yoge, ayujjittha, yujjate, yujjissatīti yoggaṃ, niyojjo vā.

[03] ^b^garaha^eb^ nindāyaṃ, agarayhittha, garahīyati, garahīyissatīti atthe ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayo, tassiminā dhātvantena saha ^b^yhā^eb^deso, ^b^gara^eb^ssa ^b^gārā^eb^deso ca, gārayho, gārayhā, gārayhaṃ, garahaṇīyaṃ.

[03] ^b^ādi^eb^saddena aññepi ^b^damajaha^eb^ntā gayhante. ^b^gada^eb^ viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, gajjate, gadanīyaṃ vā gajjaṃ. ^b^pada^eb^ gatimhi, pajjanīyaṃ pajjaṃ gāthā. ^b^khāda^eb^ bhakkhaṇe, khajjateti khajjaṃ khādanīyaṃ. ^b^damu^eb^ damane, adammittha, dammate, damīyissatīti dammo damanīyo. ^b^bhuja^eb^ pālanabyavaharaṇesu, abhujjittha, bhujjati, bhujjissatīti bhoggaṃ, bhojjaṃ vā, ^b^kāra^eb^ggahaṇena ^b^ya^eb^ssa ^b^ja^eb^kāro. gahetabbaṃ gayhamiccādi.

[03] ^b^ākārantato pana dā^eb^ dāne, adīyittha, dīyati, dīyissatīti atthe ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccayo, tassiminā dhātvantena ^b^ā^eb^kārena saha ^b^eyyā^eb^deso, deyyaṃ, dātabbaṃ. ^b^anīye^eb^ ``saralopo''tiādinā pubbasarassa lope sampatte tattheva ^a^M0.0345^ea^ ^b^tu^eb^ggahaṇena nisedhetvā ``sarā sare lopa''nti ^b^ā^eb^kāre lutte parasarassa ^b^dīgho,^eb^ dānīyaṃ.

[03] ^b^pā^eb^ pāne, apīyittha, pīyati, pīyissatīti peyyaṃ, pātabbaṃ, pānīyaṃ. ^b^hā^eb^ cāge, ahīyittha, hīyati, hīyissatīti heyyaṃ, hātabbaṃ, hānīyaṃ. ^b^mā^eb^ māne, amīyittha, mīyati, mīyissatīti meyyaṃ, mātabbaṃ, minitabbaṃ, metabbaṃ vā. ^b^ñā^eb^ avabodhane, aññāyittha, ñāyati, ñāyissatīti ñeyyaṃ, ñātabbaṃ, ñāteyyaṃ. ``ñāssa jā jaṃ nā''ti ^b^jā^eb^dese ``kiyādito nā''ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena ^b^nā^eb^paccayo, ikārāgamo ca, jānitabbaṃ, vijānanīyaṃ. ^b^khyā^eb^pakathane, saṅkhyātabbaṃ, saṅkhyeyyaṃ iccādi.

[03] ^b^ra^eb^kārānubandhe paccaye pare sabbo dhātvanto ^b^rādi^eb^ paccayarakāramariyādo ^b^no^eb^ hoti, lopamāpajjateti attho. ^b^ranto^eb^ti ettha ^b^ra^eb^kāro sandhijo, kattabbaṃ kiccaṃ. ``riccā''ti yogavibhāgena bharāditopi ^b^ricca^eb^ppaccayo, yathā, bharīyatīti bhacco, saralopo. i gatimhi, pati etabbo paṭicco.

[03] ^b^pesa atisagga pattakāla^eb^iccetesvatthesu ^b^kicca^eb^ppaccayā honti. ^b^pesanaṃ nāma^eb^ ``kattabbamidaṃ bhavatā''ti āṇāpanaṃ, ajjhesanañca. ^b^atisaggonāma^eb^ ``kimidaṃ mayā kattabba''nti puṭṭhassa vā ^a^M0.0346^ea^ ``pāṇo na hantabbo''tiādinā paṭipattidassanamukhena vā kattabbassa anuññā. ^b^pattakālo nāma^eb^ sampattasamayo yo ^b^a^eb^ttano kiccakaraṇasamayamanupaparikkhitvā na karoti, tassa samayārocanaṃ, na tattha ajjhesanamatthīti. te ca ``bhāvakammesu kiccattakkhatthā''ti vuttattā bhāvakammesveva bhavanti.
[03] ^b^pesane^eb^ tāva -- karīyatu bhavatā kammanti atthe iminā ^b^tabbānīyā,^eb^ sesaṃ vuttanayameva, kattabbaṃ kammaṃ bhavatā, karaṇīyaṃ kiccaṃ bhavatā.

[03] ^b^bhuja^eb^iccevamādīnaṃ ^b^ja^eb^kārādiantānaṃ dhātūnamanto ^b^no^eb^ hoti, parassa kiccakitakappaccaya^b^ta^eb^kārassa ca ^b^dve^eb^bhāvo hoti. bhottabbaṃ bhojanaṃ bhavatā, bhojanīyaṃ bhojjaṃ bhavatā.

[03] ^b^i^eb^kārāgamayutta^b^ta^eb^kāre pana -- ``namakarānamantānaṃ niyuttatamhī''ti ettha ``antānaṃ niyuttatamhī''ti yogavibhāgena dhātvantalopādinisedho, ``rudhādito niggahītapubba''nti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena, ``niggahītañcā''ti vā niggahītāgamo, bhuñjitabbaṃ tayā, yuñjitabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^samayārocane^eb^ pana -- ^b^i^eb^ ajjhayane ^b^adhi^eb^pubbo, adhīyataṃ bhavatāti atthe ^b^tabbānīyā^eb^di, ^b^i^eb^kārāgamavuddhi^b^ayā^eb^desa^b^ajjhā^eb^desā ca, ^b^ṇya^eb^ppaccaye tu vuddhi, ^b^ya^eb^kārassa dvittañca, ajjhayitabbaṃ, ajjheyyaṃ bhavatā, ajjhayanīyaṃ bhavatā, avassaṃ ^a^M0.0347^ea^ kattabbanti vākye pana ``kiccā''ti adhikicca ``avassakādhamiṇesu ṇī cā''ti avassakādhamiṇatthe ca ^b^tabbā^eb^dayo, kattabbaṃ me bhavatā gehaṃ, karaṇīyaṃ, kāriyaṃ. evaṃ dātabbaṃ me bhavatā sataṃ, dānīyaṃ, deyyaṃ.
[03] ^b^dhara^eb^ dhāraṇe, curādittā ^b^ṇeṇayā,^eb^ vuddhi, ikārāgamo ca, dhāretabbaṃ, dhārayitabbaṃ iccādi.

[03] ``nudādīhi yuṇvūnamanānanākānanakā sakāritehi cā''ti sakāritehipi ^b^yuṇvū^eb^namādesavidhānatoyeva dhātuppaccayantatopi kiccakitakappaccayā bhavantīti daṭṭhabbo. tena titikkhāpīyatīti titikkhāpetabbo. evaṃ tikicchāpetabbo tikicchāpanīyo. ^b^a^eb^bhāvīyittha, bhāvīyati, bhāvīyissatīti bhāvetabbo maggo. bhāvayitabbo, bhāvanīyo, bhāvanīyaṃ, bhāvanīyā, akārīyittha, kārīyati, kārīyissatīti kāretabbaṃ, kārayitabbaṃ, kārāpetabbaṃ, kārāpayitabbaṃ, kārāpanī^b^ya^eb^miccādi ^b^ca^eb^ siddhaṃ bhavati.
[03] kammasmiṃ ādimhi sati dhātuyā paro ^b^ṇa^eb^ppaccayo hoti.
[03] tatiye dhātvādhikāre vihitā kiccehi aññe paccayā kiticceva saññā hontīti ^b^kita^eb^saññā katā.

[03] kattari kārake ^b^kita^eb^paccayo hotīti niyamato kattari bhavati, so ca ``ṇādayo tekālikā''ti vuttattā kālattaye ca hoti. pure viya kāritabyapadesa^b^ṇa^eb^lopavuddhiyo, paccayantassāliṅgattā ^b^syā^eb^dimhi asampatte ``taddhitasamāsakitakā nāmaṃvātavetunādīsu cā''ti kitakantattā nāmaṃva kate ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti, tato kumbhaṃ karotīti atthe ``amādayo parapadebhī''ti dutiyātappurisasamāso, ``nāmāna''ntiādinā samāsasaññā, ``tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā cā''ti vibhattilopo, ``pakati cassa sarantassā''ti pakatibhāvo, puna samāsattā nāmamiva kate ^b^syā^eb^dyuppatti.

[03] so kumbhakāro, te kumbhakārā iccādi. ^b^itthiyaṃ^eb^ kumbhakārī, kumbhakāriyo iccādi, tathā kammaṃ karotīti kammakāro. evaṃ mālākāro, kaṭṭhakāro, rathakāro, suvaṇṇakāro, suttakāro, vuttikāro, ṭīkākāro.
[03] ^b^gaha^eb^ upādāne, pattaṃ agaṇhi, gaṇhāti, gaṇhissatīti vā pattaggāho. evaṃ rasmiggāho, rajjuggāho.

[03] ^b^ve^eb^ ^a^M0.0349^ea^ tantasantāne, tantaṃ avāyi, vāyati, vāyissatīti vā tantavāyo, ``te āvāyā kārite''ti ^b^āyā^eb^deso, vākye panettha ``te āvāyā''ti yogavibhāgena ^b^āyā^eb^deso. evaṃ tunnavāyo.
[03] ^b^mā^eb^ parimāṇe, dhaññaṃ amini, mināti, minissatīti vā atthe ^b^ṇa^eb^ppaccaye kate --
[03] ^b^ā^eb^kārantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ antassa ^b^āyā^eb^deso hoti ^b^ṇa^eb^kārānubandhe paccaye pare, saralopādi. dhaññamāyo. evaṃ dānaṃ dadātīti dānadāyo.

[03] ^b^kamu^eb^ kantimhi, dhammaṃ akāmayi, kāmayati, kāmayissatīti vā dhammakāmo puriso, dhammakāmā kaññā, dhammakāmaṃ cittaṃ. evaṃ atthakāmo, hitakāmo, sukhakāmo, dhammaṃ pāletīti dhammapālo iccādi.
[03] ^b^damu^eb^ damane, ``ariṃ adami, dameti, damissatī''ti viggahe ``dhātuyā''ti adhikāro, ``kammādimhī''ti ca vattate.

[03] kammūpapade ādimhi sati saññāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ dhātuyā ^b^a^eb^ppaccayo hoti, upapadante ^b^nu^eb^kārāgamo ca. ettha ca ``nu niggahītaṃ padante''ti sutte ``padante''ti vacanato upapadanteyeva ^b^nu^eb^kārāgamo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ``tesu vuddhī''tiādinā ^b^u^eb^kāralopo. ayaṃ pana ^b^nvā^eb^gamo samāsaṃ ^a^M0.0350^ea^ katvā upapadavibhattilope kateyeva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
[03] upapadabhūtanāmapadante vattamāno ^b^nu^eb^kārāgamo ^b^niggahīta^eb^māpajjate, niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ, sesaṃ samaṃ, vuddhābhāvova viseso, arindamo rājā.
[03] tathā ^b^tara^eb^ taraṇe, vessaṃ taratīti vessantaro, taṇhaṃ karoti hiṃsatīti taṇhaṅkaro bhagavā. evaṃ medhaṅkaro, saraṇaṅkaro, dīpaṅkaro.

[03] ^b^pura^eb^sadde ādimhi sati ^b^``dada^eb^ dāne''iccetāya dhātuyā ^b^a^eb^ppaccayo hoti, ^b^pura^eb^sadde ^b^a^eb^kārassa ^b^i^eb^ñca hoti. ettha ca ``tadanuparodhenā''ti paribhāsato ^b^pura^eb^saddantasseva ^b^iṃ^eb^ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^ṇā^eb^dīnaṃ tekālikattepi upapadatthavisesena atīteyevāyamappaccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. pure dānaṃ adadīti purindado sakko. idhāpi vibhattilope kateyeva ^b^iṃ^eb^ādeso.
[03] sabbato dhātuto kammādimhi vā akammādimhi vā sati ^b^a ṇvu tu āvī^eb^ iccete cattāro paccayā honti. ^b^vā^eb^ggahaṇaṃ ``akammādimhi vā''ti vikappanatthaṃ.

[03] ^b^a^eb^ppaccaye ^a^M0.0351^ea^ tāva -- ^b^dhara^eb^ dhāraṇe, dhammaṃ adhari, dharati, dharissatīti vā dhammadharo. evaṃ vinayadharo. tathā taṃ karotīti takkaro, dvittaṃ. evaṃ hitakaro, divasakaro, dinakaro, divākaro, nisākaro, dhanuṃ gaṇhātīti dhanuggaho. evaṃ kaṭaggaho, sabbakāmaṃ dadātīti sabbakāmadado, sabbadado.

[03] ^b^āto^eb^ pana -- annaṃ adāsi, dadāti, dadissatīti annado. evaṃ dhanado, saccaṃ sandahatīti saccasandho. ^b^pā^eb^ pāne, majjaṃ pivatīti majjapo. ^b^tā^eb^ pālane, gavaṃ saddaṃ tāyatīti gottaṃ. evaṃ kattari.

[03] ^b^nī^eb^ pāpuṇane ^b^vi^eb^pubbo, vinesi, vineti, vinessati etena, etthāti vā vinayo, ``aññesu cā''ti vuddhi, ^b^ayā^eb^deso ca, nayanaṃ nayo. ^b^si^eb^ sevāyaṃ ^b^ni^eb^pubbo, nissīyittha, nissīyati, nissīyissatīti vā nissayo. ^b^si^eb^ saye, anusayi, anuseti, anusessatīti vā anusayo.

[03] ^b^i^eb^ gatimhi ^b^pati^eb^pubbo, paṭicca ekasmā phalametīti paccayo, samudayo. ^b^ci^eb^ caye, vinicchīyate anena, vinicchayanaṃ vā vinicchayo, uccayanaṃ uccayo, sañcayo, dhammaṃ vicinātīti dhammavicayo. ^b^khī^eb^ khaye, khayanaṃ khayo. ^b^ji^eb^ jaye, vijayanaṃ vijayo, jayo. ^b^kī^eb^ dabbavinimaye, vikkayanaṃ vikkayo, kayo. ^b^lī^eb^ silesane, allīyati etthāti ālayo, layo. evaṃ ^b^ivaṇṇa^eb^ntato.

[03] āsuṇantīti ^a^M0.0352^ea^ assavā, avādeso, paṭissavanaṃ paṭissavo. ^b^su^eb^ gatimhi, ābhavaggā savantīti āsavā. ^b^ru^eb^ sadde, ravatīti ravo. bhavatīti bhavo. pabhavati etasmāti pabhavo. ^b^lū^eb^ chedane, lavanaṃ lavo. evaṃ ^b^uvaṇṇa^eb^ntato.

[03] niggaṇhāti, niggahaṇaṃ vā niggaho, paggaho, saṅgaṇhāti tena, saṅgahaṇaṃ vā saṅgaho. ^b^vara^eb^ varaṇe, saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro. ^b^dara^eb^ ādare, ādaraṇaṃ ādaro. āgacchati, āgamananti vā āgamo, āgamīyanti ettha, etena vā atthāti āgamo pariyatti. sappatīti sappo. dibbatīti devo. ^b^kamu^eb^ padavikkhepe, pakkamanaṃ, pakkamatīti vā pakkamo. evaṃ vikkamo.
[03] ^b^cara^eb^ caraṇe, vane caratīti vanacaro, kāmo avacarati etthāti kāmāvacaro loko, kāmāvacarā saññā, kāmāvacaraṃ cittaṃ. gāvo caranti etthāti gocaro, chaṭṭhītappuriso.
[03] pādena pivatīti pādapo. evaṃ kacchapo, tatiyātappuriso.

[03] ^b^ruha^eb^ janane, sirasmiṃ ruhatīti siroruho, guhāyaṃ sayatīti guhāsayaṃ cittaṃ. evaṃ kucchisayā vātā. ^b^ṭhā^eb^ gatinivattimhi, pabbate aṭṭhāsi, tiṭṭhati, ṭhassatīti vā pabbataṭṭho puriso, pabbataṭṭhā nadī, pa^b^bba^eb^taṭṭhaṃ osadhaṃ. evaṃ thalaṭṭhaṃ, jalaṭṭhaṃ, sattamītappuriso.
[03] ^b^gaha^eb^iccetassa dhātussa ^b^upadhassa e^eb^ttaṃ hoti vā, ^b^upadhā^eb^ti antakkharato pubbakkharassa parasamaññā, gayhatīti gehaṃ, gahaṃ vā.
